1b1(rgyud): /phyogs kyi ngos sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul shing ljon pa rab tu snang ba'i nags tshogs na/dag
1b2(rgyud): slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu lo 'od lta ste/tshe dang ldan pi shA ri'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan
1b3(rgyud): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa ga ye 'od srung dang /tshe
1b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /tshe dang ldan pa cang shes ko'u di n+ya dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /tshe
2b1(rgyud): pa gsus po che dang /tshe dang ldan pa dag dbang dang /tshe dang ldan pa bral dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /
2b2(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa lag bzang dang /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gegs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyus 'od srung dang /tshe
2b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa nam gru nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i bar de la sogs pa'i dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
2b4(rgyud): chen po dag dang thebs gcig tu bzhugs so//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun drang bcas pa la lus 'phags
2b5(rgyud): mo'i bu yul ge d+ha'i rgyal po mi skyes dgras na bza' dang /ba shos dang gzims che dang /bsnun gyi glasos sman dang /yo byad
2b6(rgyud): rnams kyis bkur bstor byas/bla mar byas/sti stang du byas/mchod par byas so//yang de'i tshe sa yang cher g.yos par
3a1(rgyud): @g+hur+yA ra sbyin 'das pa chen po yang byung /dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /ser ba chen po dang /sbyin
3a2(rgyud): chen po las char pa chen po yang 'brab par gyur/'drug kyang di ri ri zer/klog kyang byung /phyogs bcu yang 'khrug
3a3(rgyud): par gyur to//mun pa mun nag chen po yang byung ste/skar ma rnams kyang mi snang /nyi ma dang zla ba rnams kyang 'od dang mi lda ni
3a4(rgyud): par gyur to/lhan ni ra ma yin lhang nger ma yin zhing 'od mi gasngal bar gyur to//de nas yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por
3a5(rgyud): 'jigs pa de dag byung ba dang /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi kha cig gi grong gzhan dang /grong khyer gang yin pa de dag gdon
3a6(rgyud): 'byung pos btab par gyur/grong gi gzhon nu rnams dang /rtsis mkhan rnams dang /blon po dang blon po chen po dang /'khor
3b1(rgyud): nA gnas pa dang /bran po dang bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /mngag pa dang /g.yog kha cig kyang gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur/yul yangs pa can
3b2(rgyud): gyi ljongs kun gyi dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang 'jigs skrag dngangs te/spyi bung zhes byed nas kha gnam
3b3(rgyud): du bltas te ngu 'bod cing /sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal/bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa lo mngon par ma
3b4(rgyud): dad pa'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag de dag kha cig ni tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal/kha cig ni brgya byin la/kha cig ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal
3b5(rgyud): kha cig ni dbang phyug chen po dang /nor bu bzang po dang /gang ba bzang po dang /'phrog ma dang /nyi ma dang zla ba dang /gza' drang skar ma dang /ri dang
3b6(rgyud): nags tshogs dang /sman dang shing ljon pa dang /klung dang /lteng ka dang /mtsho'u dang rdzing bu dang /rdzing dang /mchod rten gyi gnas na gnas pa dag
3b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal zhing /bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i gan de pas/'jigs pa'i gnas nas ji ltar thar bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing 'khod pa dag bcom
4a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi mi las 'phags pa'i spyan rnam par dag pas gzig so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngo du med pa rlo
4a2(rgyud): dza pra stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur nas lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang par gyur te/
4a3(rgyud): 'dres par gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa/mngon par 'du mdzad do de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /chungs ris kyi lha
4a4(rgyud): rnams dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
4a5(rgyud): dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /gnod sbyin chen po stobs po che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /'phrog ma bu dang bcas/'khor dang bcus
4a6(rgyud): pa kha dog 'phags pa dag rub mo 'das pa dang /dag pa lnga bu'o bya rgod phung pi'i ri la bdag gi kha dog dang mthus snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/bcom
4a7(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der dang nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/tshig gcig
4b1(rgyud): dbyangs gcig /dag gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad mngon par bstod pa/shin tu 'bar byang gser dang 'dra//d+hU ba ta ba du dang ma tshungs//dpal ldan rnam thos
4b2(rgyud): bu bzhin brtan//rin chen rnams kyis 'byung gnas legs//seMng+ge glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros//glang chen myos pa bzhin du gnan//gser gyi ri bo dang yang mtshungs//rngam+bu
4b3(rgyud): gling gi gser rgyun 'dra//snyir ma rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'o//na mkha'i zla ba dri med bzhin//nyen thos dge 'dun rnams kyi dbus//mtshan rnams kyis ni rgyan par gyur//
4b4(rgyud): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di//thub pa la ni skyabasu mchi//mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir//srung ba dus nye bar gnas//sangs rgyas sngams bshad pa yi//stong chen rab 'joms
4b5(rgyud): mdo sde 'di//kho ra khor yug ri mtha' bar//mtshoms gcod pa'i dam pa lags//phyog 'tsho lnga skyes bu dpa' khyod la//phyag 'tshale skyes bu mchog khyod laM//chos kyi rgyal po
4b6(rgyud): thub chen la//thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsa mo cig cang mi gsung bar dgongs nas//rgyal po chen po dag la bko' stsal pa/rgyal po chen
4b7(rgyud): po dag gang khyed kyi 'khor ngo'i 'khor la 'tshe bar sems pa de ni tshul ma yino//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mi'i 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas byung ba dang /chos legs par gsungs
5a1(rgyud): pa dang /dge 'dun legs pa sgrub pa de la sa bon 'di btab na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang //
5a2(rgyud): nyan thos rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/de la 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis las lha'i ris gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur//
5a3(rgyud): rgyal po dag kyang dmag rnam bzhi dang ldan pa nas gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro//rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen por chos kyi rgyal
5a4(rgyud): srod byed par 'gyur te/de dag la yang bu dpa' ba/rtul phod pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs bdog pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu
5a5(rgyud): 'joms pa/rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bas na 'jig rten 'dir rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur bar khyed snying las chu dus gnas pas gnas par
5a6(rgyud): gyis shig/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la
5a7(rgyud): ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la grong dang /bskyed mos tshal dang /gzhal med khang dang /
5b1(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs pa dang /bsil khang dang /sgo khang dang /rta babs dang /skar khung dang /dar gyi lnga ldi bzung zhing mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs drang ldan pa dang /dril bu dang /mu
5b2(rgyud): tig gi dra bas yongasu bskor ba dang /pog phor nas bdug pas bdugs pa dang /me tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang /gnas dang khang pa chen po dag mchis te/der bdag
5b3(rgyud): cag bud med brgya phrag stong dag gis yongasu bskur cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan par gyur nas gnas te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rab tu
5b4(rgyud): myos pas bag ma mchis par gnas pas gnas pa na/'khor zas dang skom tshol du phyogs bcu kun tu 'byir zhing skyes pa dang /bud med dang khye'u dang /bu mo dang btsas ma
5b5(rgyud): theg pa dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/'tshe bar bgyid/bgegs bgyid/'gum par bgyid/gsod par bgyid/srog dang
5b6(rgyud): bral bar bgyid de btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag gis 'khor bzhi'i mdun du bdag cag gi 'khor gyi tshul gyi mtshan ma bstan par bgyi'o//gang gi 'khor gyi gdon
5b7(rgyud): byung ba der rgyal po chen po de'i gzugs mchod rten dang bcas pa chen po bgyis te/nad pas rgyal po chen po de'i ming nas dbyung zhing dri sna tshogs kyis rang gi lag nas bdug par bgyi'o//
6a1(rgyud): dog sa la me tog bsil ma bkram ste/zhugs mar bus la mchod rten de la mchod par bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis
6a2(rgyud): btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/phyi phyir rgod cing 'jigs par 'gyur//smra bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur//de ni gnyid kyang log par 'gyur//yod na shin tu na
6a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur//rtag tu gyen du blta bar 'gyur//skar ma dag la rnyog par bgyid//nub mo shin tu dga' bar 'gyur//rtag tu 'dar zhing sgra 'byin te//de la sngags kyi tshig
6a4(rgyud): mchis kyis//'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson//s+yAd ya the dan/sid+d+he/su sid+d+he/sa twe a re/a ra Ne/ba le/ma hA ba le/dzam+ni/dzi Ti le/e kha ne/ma kha
6a5(rgyud): ne/kha kha ni/kha ran+do/ha ri pi ga le/ti mi gi le/ti li gA li ni/maM ga le swA hA/bdag gi sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig/rgyal po chen po rnam thos
6a6(rgyud): kyi bu'i ming dang /stobs dang dbang phyug dang /byin gyis bdug dge bar gyur cig swA hA/de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
6a7(rgyud): gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
6b1(rgyud): bdag gi 'khor dri za'i gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/glu len cing ni bro rdung ste//rgyan rnams la yang dga' bar bgyid//brkam pa ma mchis mang par
6b2(rgyud): sgra//rgod par bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur//rnam par 'gyur la mig dmar te//rtag tu rims kyis 'debs par bgyid//mig kyang 'byed par mi bgyid de//rgyab kyis phyogs
6b3(rgyud): shing nyal bar bgyid//de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis//'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson//s+yAd ya the dan/a khe/na khe/biM na khe/bin+de/ba
6b4(rgyud): rAt+yaM/tsa pa le/ba khaM/ba kha ne/ba kha ne/a Shi le na Shi ne kha hA le b+ha ge/b+ha gan+da laM/ba she ba sha bar+t+ti ni swA hA/rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gi ming dang /stobs dang dbang phyug dang /
6b5(rgyud): byin gyis bdag gdon thams cad las thar bar gyur cig swA hA/de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po stan las longs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
6b6(rgyud): sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dir log su thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to//
6b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor yo dgas grul bum gyis zin pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/shin tu skom pas 'debs par 'gyur/
7a1(rgyud): na nga pa rnam/na sa ra // smra na sa smra chog/
7a2(rgyud): dang so mo ring ba ste//dri ma can pa dri mi gdul//brdzun dang kyal ba smra bar bgyid//de la sngags kyi tshig chos kyis//'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/
7a3(rgyud): s+yA thed//g+ha la mo//kham ni/kha mam//kha ra laM/kAR+Sha /kashrIn/karan+te/kAkule/n+dan/bab la/bi d+hi ya sha/ti sha si/shA m+bi n+ti
7a4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'i ming dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang /byin gyis bdag gi gdon dang /gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/de nas rgyal po chen po mirga rma
7a5(rgyud): bzang stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ltu ngas pa btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan
7a6(rgyud): 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor ka mdong batshangs kyi gdon gyis ram pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/skyede
7a7(rgyud): dus 'dibs shing dbugs kyang 'byin//de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur//rdul zhing dbu ba kha chu 'byung //phyi phyir gnyid kyang log par 'gyur//kha dag ldan zhing dpa'o
7b1(rgyud): ste//de bzhin 'dar zhing rgyug par 'gyur//so mo dag kyang ston par 'gyod//dog sar mchis shing ngu bar bgyid//de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis//'jig rten mgon po bdag
7b2(rgyud): la gson//s+yAd ya thai dr-in/kra ka ye/kra ga she/kra gr-i saM/kru sha me/kruk+Sh+me/krug kha maM/kru ge/aM ga lAM/nA ga le/sa ma ga le/ku mu mo ku me/a la kaM/
7b3(rgyud): ka lA k+She/i ri mi re/d+hi re/e ru ga pa tI swA hA/rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gi ming dang /stobs dang /byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA//de nas bcom ldan 'das
7b4(rgyud): kyis de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa/nga ni stobs bcu dang ldan zhing //mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa ste/'khor gyi nang du seng gi sgra khyu
7b5(rgyud): mchog lta bu rgya chen po yang dag par bsgrags//tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro//sde dang mthu dang bzhon bcas pa'i//bdud kyang gcig gis rab tu btul//sems can thams
7b6(rgyud): cad srung ba'i phyir//rig sngags thams cad nga la nyon//s+yad ya the dan/a sang gi/kharnA ba te/bA la nir+g+ho She/shU re/shru ra d+ha re badz+ra ga me badz+ra d+ha re/stam+b+he dzaM b+he dri TA sA re/
7b7(rgyud): bi ra dza bi b+ha sa~M/bi rA gra pAp+te/a ra Ne d+harma luk+te/ngi shi bi b+huSh+Te swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang /stobs dang dbang phyug dang /byin gyis bdag dge bar
8a1(rgyud): gyur cig swA hA/phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag/sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas//'jigs dang skrag dang sngangs gyur to//thal mo sbyar nas 'khod par
8a2(rgyud): gyur//'byung po'i tshogs ni lhags pa rnams//sngangs 'a khrugos rod rod por gyur nas//phyogs bcur rab tu 'byer byed cing //sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed//rgyal po chen
8a3(rgyud): pos de shes nas//gsang ba gsum ni yang dag ste//kye ma rig sngags rig sngags che//stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa//sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de//thos nas
8a4(rgyud): 'byung po skrag gyur te//dper na rab tu 'bar me dang //til mar ngar btags ral gri bzhin//go'u ta mas ni rab bshad pa'i//rig sngags spu gri'i so dang 'dra//drang srong
8a5(rgyud): tshig ni legs bshad pa//de la gang zhig ma dad na//de yi bu yi thu bo ni//tshangs pa'i zhags pas med par 'gyur//me ni rab tu 'bar byas li//bla dang 'og dang phyogs
8a6(rgyud): bzhir yang //sbyin sreg gi ni chus gtor te//nas dang nyung kar blangs na su//mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas//mo yi nang du blugs par bya//legs par gsungs pa 'di thos
8a7(rgyud): nas//gal te myur du mi gtong na//thaMd 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni//mar dang nyungs kar mir blugs bzhin//gnod sbyin chad pas bsdigs nasu//de dag bde ba mi rnyed de//
8b1(rgyud): de yi rtsa ba yogs g.yas par ni//'bras chen nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur//gnod sbyin nad kyi byutab pa na//sha bkya'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur//lhung lo can gyi pho brang du//gzhan
8b2(rgyud): yang 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro//lus ngan grogs dang ldan pa yi//khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te//'byung po mang po tshogs pa na//stan yad thob par myi 'gyuraro//gnod sbyin dag gi
8b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du//zas sgrom dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur//stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde la//gnod sbyin gang dag mi phyogs pa//de la rdo rje 'chang khros tI//spyi bo dag ni 'gems
8b4(rgyud): par 'gyur//spu gri'i so ni rtsub mo yis//de yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur//mtshon che shin tu rnon po yis//de yi sna dang rna ba gcod//'khor lo spre gro'o so 'dra bas//klad pa
8b5(rgyud): rab tu bsheg par byed//tho ba lcags kyis dkris pa yis//de yi snying yang 'joms par byed//rnag dang khrag ni dron mo dag/de yi kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur//rig sngags
8b6(rgyud): zhags pa'i chad pa yis//rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na//'khor ba gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du//de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur//rgyal po chen po dpal ldan pa//phyogs bzhi
8b7(rgyud): dag tu song gyur nas//chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te//bzang po'i khri la 'dug po ni//shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung //lho phyogs ni ni 'phags skyes po//nub phyogs na ni mig
9a1(rgyud): mi bzang //byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po//dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba yin//rgyal po dag ni byin pa dang //de tshe ston pa thams cad mkhyen//byar snang gnas
9a2(rgyud): la rab tu 'phags//tshangs pas sprul pa'i gzhal med khang //de ni rdo rje'i gdan la zhugs//de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams//thal mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tshalo//dpal
9a3(rgyud): ldan gser gyi ri bo 'dra//gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs//me tog pad+ma bzhin du rgyas//sa lnga'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyas//nyi ma dang 'dra zla nya lo//skar ma rnams kyis
9a4(rgyud): yongs bskor bzhin//thub sku gser gyi kha dag la//mtshan rnams kyis ni yongasu bskor//'jig rten mes po tshangs pa yis//'jig rten sgron ma bstod byas te//'jig rten mgon
9a5(rgyud): po'i spyan sngar ni//'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras//'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis//rjesu bstan pa ma thob ste//gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang //rang sangs rgyas
9a6(rgyud): dag 'byung 'gyur zhing //'di las nyan thos rnams kyang ste//lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur//rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyin//dam ze rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur//drang song
9a7(rgyud): skal pa chen po dang //dge slong bram ze 'di las skye//khyed cag snying las chung byed pa//mi yi skye dgu gnod par 'gyur//tshongs pa yi ni tshig thos nas//'jig rten skyong gi
9b1(rgyud): tshig smras pa//tshangs pa chen po de bzhino//thub pa chen po de bzhino//bdag gis ri rab bskul byas shing //sa yang rab tu bzlog byas la//rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams//rnam par
9b2(rgyud): sbyang po nyid du bya//zhugs pa dam po me nyams pas//nyi ma zla ba rlung rnams dang //skar ma dag ni thams cad kyang //bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya//gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing //
9b3(rgyud): 'jig rten la ni phan mi byed//de dag la ni thams cad du//phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o//'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de//'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod//'byung ba mo yi skye
9b4(rgyud): dgu la//gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed//gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang //rig sngags las ni 'da' byed pa//'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni//pha rol gnod pa ston par byed//
9b5(rgyud): rig sngags las ni 'do' ba'i 'khor//kun tu chad pas bsdigs byas te//'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni//yang dag par yang brjod par bgyid//gang gis 'byung po'i dkyil
9b6(rgyud): 'khor du//'di bshad pa ni mi nyan pa//de dag chad pa bshad par bya//tshangs pas sprul pa'i medo sde'o//sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te//phan tshun du ni bltas byas la/
9b7(rgyud): bai DUr+ya dang gser dang dngul//mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang //spug dang rdo yi snying po dang //rin chen bdun gyis rgyan pa yis//rtsibs stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i/
10a1(rgyud): shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa//bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste//rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas//'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid
10a2(rgyud): du dong //sa ni gser gyi phye ma dang //me tog drag gis bkang byas nas//mgul bar ltung dang skud pa dang //zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la//phyogs kyi sa ni ji snyed pa'i//
10a3(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad khrid shog ces//gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon kun//phyogs bzhi dag tu bgyi ba byas//stong chen rab tu 'jams pa yi//mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di//tshangs pa'i
10a4(rgyud): 'jig rten bar du byung //lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsems//stong chen po yi lus kyi su//gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul//lus ngan po yi tshig thos nas//gnod sbyin gyi
10a5(rgyud): ni sde dpon dag/phyogs bzhi dag tu sang nasu//gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo//thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad//dri za las byung gdon gyi rnams//shar phyogs cha ni 'khod pa
10a6(rgyud): dge/mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun//bcing ba lnga yim bsdams pa yi//'byung po mang po nga la nyon//thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad//grul bum las byung gdon gyi rigs//
10a7(rgyud): lho phyogs che 'dir 'khod pa dag/mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun//bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi//'byung po mang po nga la nyon//thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad//klu
10b1(rgyud): las gdon du gyur pa rnams//nub phyogs chu 'dir 'khod pa dang //mdo sde'i zhogs pas de dag can//btsong ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi//'byung po mang po la nyon//rngu
10b2(rgyud): pa 'byung ba nyi shu brgyad//gan skyon las ni gdon gyur pa//byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/mdo sde'i zhags pas de drug kun//bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/
10b3(rgyud): 'byung ba mang po dra lo nyon//lus ngan po yi bu thu bo//kun tu rgyal ba me la zhon//de yi drung na 'khod pa yi//gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag/bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams
10b4(rgyud): nas/mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs//de nyid kyi na buM gnyis pa//skyed pa po zhes rnam grags pa//de yi drung na'o khod pa yi//gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag/bcing
10b5(rgyud): ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas//mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs//de nyid kyi ni bu gsum pa//de yi ming ni gdon po che//de yi drung na 'khod po yi//gnod sbyin bye ba
10b6(rgyud): drug cu rnams//bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas//mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs//de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa//de yi ming ni bum pa'i lto//de yi drung na 'khod pa yi//
10b7(rgyud): gnid sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams//bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nes//mdo sde'i 'gas pas kun tu drangs//dbang phyug chen po lha chen po//lag bzhi pa la stobs po che/
11a1(rgyud): de yi drung na 'khod pa yi//gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams//bcang ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas//mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs//'byung po 'joms pa'i ri la
11a2(rgyud): ni//'byung po thams cad lhags na su//rig sngagaso thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas//rig sngags 'di ni kun tu bsams//chad pa mi bzad drag po ste//gang phyir sangs rgyas kun
11a3(rgyud): gyis gsungs//go'u ta ma gus par ni//thams cad de la skyabasu song //g.yo med par ni rjes zhugs shig/thams cad med par gyur ta re//de nas thong cig tsamo gyis ni//
11a4(rgyud): 'byung po mang po thams cad lhags//ri rnams dang ni gra yang so dang //rgya mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang //klung dang 'bab chu lu ma dang //dba' klong dag na gang 'khod dang //skyes
11a5(rgyud): mos tshal dang gzhal med khang //kun dga' dang ni nags rnams dang //mchod rten gnas dang grong gi gnas//ljon shing drung na gang gnas dang //grong khyer sgo na gang gnas
11a6(rgyud): dang //grong rdal dang ni ljongs rnams dang //rgyal po'i pho brang sga rnams dang //gzhal med khang na gang gnas dang //dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khrod dang //de bzhin lha khang rnams
11a7(rgyud): dang ni//mtshams dang sho gam gnas rnams dang //khang stong dang ni 'gram sa dang //gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang //phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams nas//gnod
11b1(rgyud): shes gongs can rdzogs pa dang //tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang //mgul ba mdzes dang mgul des dang //skye dgu'i blo mar gyur pa dang //lha las byung ba'im ldan dang //
11b2(rgyud): dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni//mi rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang //de bzhin phud bu lnga zhes bya//g.yer ma dang ni nyi zer dang //nya lcibs dang ni ral gri bu//kun gyi bshes dang
11b3(rgyud): grags 'dzin dang //'brog gnas dang ni yid bzang dang //khab sna dang ni ri sul kha//kaulnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzang dag/sde dag dpung dang bzhon par bcas//lha dang klu dang
11b4(rgyud): dri za dang //gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin//nyin gsum pa ni smyo byed dang //de bzhin bzhi pa'i rims dag dang //'jig rten 'tshe ba gang yin pa//gnod sbyin srin po ma ru ngas/
11b5(rgyud): rnams//phyogs bzhi nas ni bkug na su//bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa rnams//'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru//thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad smras//phyag mtshal
12a1(rgyud): skyes bu dpa' khyod la//phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la//thal ma sbyar nas phyag 'tshal//chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal//de dag gi ni mngon rgyun
12a2(rgyud): pa//'byung po gnod sbyin lus po che//'gro pa bzhi pa mo rungs pa//rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa//rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis po//rkang pa sgreng la spyi'u tshugs dang /
12a3(rgyud): lus ngan mgo bo gcig pa dang //lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi pa//ming mangs po la lus phyed dang //mig gcig lto ni bcu gnyis dang //bong bu rnga mo gleng chen mgo
12a4(rgyud): lag pa sgreng laM mgo btud dang //mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag/mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin bu rnams//zangs kyi sgra dang zangs kyi so//zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag
12a5(rgyud): zangs kyi tho ba'i rkang pa dang //zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha//rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang //mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams//sgur zhar lba ba gsum yod pa//mig
12a6(rgyud): mi sdug la kha glal pa//chu srin rtag gi gzugs dang ni//gzugs mi sdug dang khwa ral po//mchu 'changs po dang sa yon por//rab tu gtum po khro gnyer can//gsus
12a7(rgyud): po che dang bum rna po//rna 'phyong ba dang rna ba med//lag ring dang ni rna ba ri //sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring //lus skam lus ni ring ba dang //skra rings rab tu rgyan pa dang /
12b1(rgyud): rkang bi mid pa phra ba dang //dri nga ba dang bum lto bo//yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang //gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto//gnam sto bo la rna bo che//gyen du brdzes skra rab tu dmar//
12b2(rgyud): mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin po//skem po sgur po bum lte bo//ri rlab rtse mo bskulda na su//me 'dag gi ni char pa 'bebs//ljon shing ri dang rdo ba dang //sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba/
12b3(rgyud): dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang //grul bum rnga bran rnams kyi sgra//'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin//ming po che la bong bu'i sgra//nag po ser po sngon po dang //dmar ser me ltar dmar ser
12b4(rgyud): drang //khab 'dre'i spu dang ral gri'i sgra//dmar po khrig gis bskus pa rnams//mi r-I dag ni khyer nasu//za bzhin du ni rnam par rgyug/so rnon lag pa dmar po dang //mchu ni khrag
12b5(rgyud): gis bskus pa dang //lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang //mkhal ma snying dang nang grol gyis//snyim pa shin tu bkang ba dang //byis pa dag ni za bzhin du//mer mer po dang srog
12b6(rgyud): chags kyis//rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog/keng rus kyi ni lus kyi su//skye bo mang po skrag par byed//khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yis//mi ya lpags pa thogs
12b7(rgyud): nasu//mi bzad dug gis kun bskus te//phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyug/grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang //byis nas khyim du rnam par 'thar//rlung dang bad kan
13a1(rgyud): madris pa rnams//phyogs bzhi dag tu 'jug par byed//de ltar den rgyal ba yi//gdon dang 'jigs pa chen po rnamapa//lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang /
13a2(rgyud): rig sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams//phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la//phyag 'a tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la//thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshalo//chos rgyal khyod
13a3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo//grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang //pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba ni//gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa//snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba//lus
13a4(rgyud): chen 'jigs pa chen po ste//stobs po che la sgra yang che//mgrin bcu po la mig stong po//gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams//'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste//lag na
13a5(rgyud): mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs//sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang //lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs//lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs//rdo rje mdung rtse log par tho//
13a6(rgyud): rab tu drag pa'i dmag brtul nas//phyogs kun tu ni skrag par byed//sdang ba'i gnas na 'khrid pa yi//gsang ba po ni dang kun kyang //mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu//skyes
13a7(rgyud): pa dud med gzhan yang 'dzin//sha khrog dron par bcas pa la//rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs//seng ge dang ni stag dang rtsa//ma he ba lang bong bu rdo//glang po che
13b1(rgyud): yi gzugs 'dra ba//dom dang gzig dang spyang ki dang //khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang //byi la byi ba spre'u'i gzugs//bse dang phrag dang sre mong dang //nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs//
13b2(rgyud): kha cig dang ni sram gyi gzugs//khwa dang 'ug pa khu byug dang //bya rgod khra dang nya mod bcos//rma bya ngang pa thi bya dang //khrung khrud deng ni bya rnam pa dang //kha cig bya gag gzugs
13b3(rgyud): rnams//gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis mthong //'dab bzangs bya yi tshul gyis kyang //skye bo mang po skrag par byed//kha cig mi yi mgo can la//lus ni bya gag bong bu
13b4(rgyud): 'dra//kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe//lus dang bral ba dag tu snang //rnam par 'khrugs shing 'did la moso//sgyu ma'i phreng bas kun tu dkris//rtse gsum mdung gis rab
13b5(rgyud): 'dibs shing //srog chags rnams la gnod par byed//mi bzed gdug pa'i dbugs 'byin cing //skye dgu 'di di ga skrag par byed//srog chags rgyud ni ji snyed par/
13b6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi ni gzugasu snang //kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs//la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs//grangs ni brgya brag stong rnams te//dbyug pas bsdigs shing kha drag po/
13b7(rgyud): mig phyung ba la bzhin mi sdig/srin po so ni rno ba dang //sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang //lce spyang gdang ni gnyer ma can//rkang lag dang ni tubos pa dang //mgo bo bcad pa'i sri
14a1(rgyud): po rnams//skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed//sdig pa can rnams mdangs can 'phrog/mi dag gi ni yus rnams la/rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang //spu yi
14a2(rgyud): bar dang gnad rnams dang //de bzhin rma yi kha rnamasu//lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang //rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs//phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la//
14a3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la//thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshalo//chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//ri yi rgyal po ri rab dang //de bzhin kho ra khar yug dang /
14a4(rgyud): bya rgod phung po gshol mda' 'dzin//spos dad ldan dang gangs kyi ri//sna tshogs brtsegs dang pad+ma pA//na la da yi ri gnyis dang //dpal gyi ri yi rtse mo ni//gang dag
14a5(rgyud): shin tu 'thor 'phags dang //ri bo de dag kun la yang //lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa//de dag thams cad mi dga' zhing //'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed//bye
14a6(rgyud): ba stong gi lha dgra dang //bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang //lha yi bu mo skal chen dag/thal mo rab tu sbyor bar byed//thags zangs ris dang sgra can dang //sim par byed
14a7(rgyud): nga'ang der phyin te//lha mi ni bye ba phrag stang dang //lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang //de dag bu mo 'phrul ljon pa//mang po kun kyang thal mo sbyor//rab tu gnas dang rgya mtsho
14b1(rgyud): dang //klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang //klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang //dga' bo nye dga' gnyis dag dang //rdorjeblo gros ngag shu dang //gang gA dga' ba sin+d+hu mtsho//bya yi rgyal
14b2(rgyud): po mdab bzang dang //rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug byed dang //stong phrag bye ba'i klu yi rnams//bye ba brgya yi klu dag dang //de dag bu mo skal chen rnams//thal mo rab tu sbyor
14b3(rgyud): bar byed//nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka yang //skar ma'i 'khor gyis yongasuM bskor//gser gyi me tog yan lag na//ma ga d+hA na 'jigs byed pa//gso bas mtha' na mi thod
14b4(rgyud): can//ko sa la na rab tu dkar//bzang po'i yul na kha spu can//gyad kyi yul na grags pa 'dzin//lnga 'dzin pa na skrag byed pa//rta skye ba na mig dmar gnas//srung
14b5(rgyud): byed pa na ser skya ste//sems pa na ni mig ser po//be'u la na bum pa'i lto//dga' ba'i yul na ring por skyes/ba lang 'dzin na rab tu 'joms//dung yul na ni nyi ma'i gro Da//
14b6(rgyud): ljongs chen rnams kyi gnod sbyin ni//brjod pa bcu drug de dag dang //lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che//rje skyong rab tu dkar ba dang //ser skya rab mdzes khyab 'jug pa//bum lta
14b7(rgyud): gsum pa zlum po dang //chu srin bden pa'i 'chang po dang //lnga ldan rgyal ba khyu mchog dang //gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che//lag po bzhi can stobs po che//sde pa rab
15a1(rgyud): tu 'dul ba ni//mthu bo che la stobs bro che//gshin rje gshin rje'i po ny+dza dang //bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa dang //gnod sbyin bye ba'i g.yog 'chang ba//gnang
15a2(rgyud): sbyin de ming 'drog po yin//sha ri ta ni sder bcas dang //rI yi bu mo gnod sbyin ma//gzi brjid chen mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs//'phrog ma zhes kyang grags pa dang //gdal pa ma
15a3(rgyud): nigatum po dang //bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor ba dang //mi rdung nag mo karka te//pad+ma dang ni pad+ma can//me tog so dang sa ga dang //srin mo bong bu'i rna can dang //tsan dan dang
15a4(rgyud): ni khyab 'jug len//seng ge ser skya dmar sder po//glang po klu yi so can dang //re shes drag po'i mche ba can//srin po sa bzang yod pa dang //tshangs pa lan dang khyab 'jug
15a5(rgyud): len//gnod sbyin ta la ha la dang //gnod sbyin rnam pa'i mchu can dag/mdung dang mda' gzhu kun thogs shing //mi rta ba lang ri dgas rnams//za zhing 'tshe ba de dag ni//phyogs
15a6(rgyud): rnams kun tu rgyug cing 'dong //sa 'di rab tu goyo bar byed//nags tshal rnams kyang rab tu skems//ri rnams kun nas g.yo bar byed//skye dgu 'di dag 'tshe byed cing //phun
15a7(rgyud): tshun nas ni 'du ba dag/rig sngags kyis ni drangs nas lhags//phyag 'tshal skyes bu dnga'i khyod la//phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyed la//thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tsha'o//
15b1(rgyud): chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo//'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru//de dag lhags par gyur pa dang //de nas rgyal po rnam thos bus//'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol//bdag
15b2(rgyud): gi phyogs tsho byang phyogasasu//rgyal po'i gnasu sprul pa ni//lcang lar ldan pa yid du mchi//de bas bdag ni lcang lo'i bdag/rgyal po'i pho brang lcang la can//lha rnams kun gyis
15b3(rgyud): bsams par gyur//phyir shin tu mthon po cani//rin chen kun gyis rgyan pa lags//'phang du dpag tshad bcu drug ste//gsor gyi rgyas las bgyis pa lags//phyogs bzhi
15b4(rgyud): cog ni re re la'ang //gnod sbyin rdo rje 'chang ba dag/kun nas rab tu gnas par gyur//lag na mtshan cha legs par sprul//rgyal po'i pho brang de yi sgo//bzhi po gtod par bgyid
15b5(rgyud): pa ni//gcig ni gser las bgyis pa'i sgo//gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa ste//gsum pa shel gyi sgo mo lags//bzhi po gser gyis rnam par spras//grong khyer de yi nang dag
15b6(rgyud): na//bskyed mos tshal gyis me tog rgyas//de yi nang na gzhal med khang //rin chen bdun rgya sna tshogs mchis//rin chen sna tshogs ljon shing can//bya brar sna tshogs skad kyang
15b7(rgyud): 'byin//me tog sna tshogs legs par bkram//sna tshogs spos kyis byugs pa lags//gnod sbyin mo ni 'joms ma dang //glu dang rol mos rab tu rkyen//dpal gyi dam pa
16a1(rgyud): nyam su myong //de ni 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor deng //gang dag 'khor zhing mchis pa dag/rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ste//chos 'tshal ba dang chos spyod pa//
16a2(rgyud): srog chags rnams la 'tsho mi bgyid//zas dang skom gyis mi brel te//skye dgu mi zad gzhan dag ni//longs spyod chen po tshol bgyod cing //phyogs bzhi kun tu rnam par lta//
16a3(rgyud): grong khyer sga yi gam yo dang //bza' shing ra ba nags tshal ni//gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i tshogs//bye ba stong phrag brgya mchis pa//de dag thams cad mdo sde yis/
16a4(rgyud): zhags pas drangs te brlag par bgyi//rgyal po'i pho brang dbus na ni//chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas gyur pa//bsil ba'i rdzing bus bskor ba ste//tsan dan nags kyi 'khor ba
16a5(rgyud): lags//kun nas dpag tshad drug cu ste//khang pa brtsegs ma sprul pa dag/gcig ni gser las bgyis pa ste//gnyis ni dngul las bgyid pa lags//gsum pa bai DUr+ya
16a6(rgyud): las bgyis//bzhi pa gtsang dang shel gyi rgyu//lnga pa mu tig dam po ste//drug pa rdo yi snying po lags//bdun pa spug las bgyis pa ste//brgyad pa rin chen bdun las bgyis
16a7(rgyud): bud med stong phrag brgya dag kyang //de dag re re kun na gnas//lhab lhub sna tshogs mchog dag dang //cha byad sna tshogs mang pos rgyan//glu dang rol mo sna tshogs dang //bza
16b1(rgyud): yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis//de lta'i rab tu dga' ba yis//bde zhing tshim pa'i yid gyur cing //de na bdag ni dgun snyoms dang //'dod pa dag gis rab myos pas//bdag gi
16b2(rgyud): 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid cing //phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed//bud med dag dang skyes pa dang //de bzhin khye'u bu mo dang //mngal na gnas pa'ang 'jigs par bgyid//
16b3(rgyud): dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs la'ang 'tshe//skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang //gtum pa'i gza' rnamos gnod par bgyid//lo tog sa bon 'bras bu dang //me tog sman dang zas skom
16b4(rgyud): dang /mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing //mthon po rnams kyang dmal bar bgyid//'jig rten drag na nongs pa rnams//dmag dang 'thab mo shar gnyer dang //tshig gam zhig gam
16b5(rgyud): bsad phye ba//de kun 'byung po'i rnam par gyur//sbed cing ston par bgyid pa dang //bzlog par bgyid cing rgod par bgyid//'jigs par bgyid cing lta bar bgyid//dgrar 'gyur pa
16b6(rgyud): yang ston par bgyid//sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid//nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid//sgo nas se gol sgra phyung zhing //mi snyan brjod za bar bgyid//mdza' bo gnyen bshes
16b7(rgyud): gzugs dag tu//gda' zhing bka' mchid smra bar bgyid//bu mo sdu gu'i gzugs dag tu//'dod la spyod pa dga' bar bgyid//nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni//zla ba'i gzug
17a1(rgyud): /su gda' bar bgyid//rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs//tshol gnod par de dag gdang//skar mda'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag/'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyed/
17a2(rgyud): rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang //mchod rten dag ni gnas na 'da'//skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pas//'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin//gnas rnams dang ni shum
17a3(rgyud): dag tu//rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston//grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyi//sgo yang gnod sbyin de dag 'byed//srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyid cing //lam ngan kun tu
17a4(rgyud): bskor bar bgyid//rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang //rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang //rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyis rnams//lus la na ba gnas par ston//nad rnams
17a5(rgyud): kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang //phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid//ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhini dag/thams cad log par de dag ston//rig sngags zhags pas drangs pas na//de dag
17a6(rgyud): kun kyang 'dir mchis//de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu//langs te thul mo rab sbyar nas//zhabs la 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba//gser gyi mchod sdong 'brar ba bzhin//'jig
17a7(rgyud): rten snang bar mdzad pa po//thub pa chen po me dang 'dra//gnod sbyin gsang sngogs mi bzad can//stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag/byang gi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/
17b1(rgyud): b+had byugs dargan garjod par n+ti//'jig namagon pa'i spyan snga na//de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad//s+yAd ma the na//bam+b+ha //T+Tagar+b+ha/ sa~MSh+Tha/krArA dzan/
17b2(rgyud): ma/ /ban+d+ha klo dz+wa li nA nI/ur+b+ba ga / ga hU~M/'dag byung byen ge byur gyur ga /
17b3(rgyud): brgya byin dang //'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che//gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang //'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang //bdag gi me tog spos dag dang //sbyin sreg 'di
17b4(rgyud): ni blang bar gyis//de dag go ni brtson 'grus dang //gzi borjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang //nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur//bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams
17b5(rgyud): cad las dge bar gyur cig/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la//phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la//thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'chi lo//chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo//
17b6(rgyud): rgyal chen yul 'khar srung ba yang //langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas//me tog tshogs ltar rgyas gyur cing //kA la bong ka'i sgra dbyangs can//khro byug dadong ni rma bya'i sgra/
17b7(rgyud): rnga dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa//thub chen gnod sbyin srin po dang //dri za stong phrag drug nu bzhi//shar gyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas//shar phyogs pa la gnod par byed/
18a1(rgyud): /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sbyar ni//de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad//s+yAd ya the dan/d+hA ra Ni d+hA rA Ni/pad+hA na swa ni b+hany+dza ni/pra b+hAny+dza ni bi d+hA ma ni/ka~M pu ru Sha/
18a2(rgyud): sha ka le/sA ra thaM/shU lo d+ha re/shU la d+h+r-i ri Ni/shud+d+ha tsa ra Ne/g+ho Sha ba te shA rA gre/shAn+ti/bdag shar phyogasu dge bar gyur cig swA hA/tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang //'jig
18a3(rgyud): rten skyong drang dbang phyug che//gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang //'brog ma bu dang bcas pa yang //bdag gi me tog spos drag dang //sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis//de
18a4(rgyud): dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang //gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang //nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur//bdag 'jigs pa tha mos cad dang //gnod pa thams cad
18a5(rgyud): las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la//phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la//thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tsha lo//chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tsha lo//
18a6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes kyang //thal mo sbyar te de nas langs//thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs//spro ba thams cad rab 'joms pa//the tsomo thams cad gcu
18a7(rgyud): mdzad pa//'jig rten thams cad rnam 'dren po//grul bum yi dgas srul po dag/stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams//lho yi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas//de nas byung
18b1(rgyud): la gnod par bgyid//'jig rten mgron po'i spyan sbyar ni//de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad//s+yAd ya the dan/shAn+ti shA ra ba ti/krAn+ti/kA ra bA ti/ki ka ra si/kau ka ra ti/ki ba ti/
18b2(rgyud): d+ha ra Ni/bar+d+ha ni/b+hU mi/d+hA raNi/hi ma pra ti/d+h+r-i ti sh+tsa ra Ni/mU lA gri/bdag lho phyogs dge bar gyur cig stan/tshangs pa dring ni brgya byin dang //'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug
18b3(rgyud): tshe//gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang //'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang //bdag gi me tog spos dge dang //sbyin sreg 'di ni blangs par bgyi//de dag gis ni brtson 'grus
18b4(rgyud): dang //gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang //nad rnams thams cad gcom par gyur//bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/
18b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la//phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la//thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalo//chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo//rgyal po mig mi bzang ba yang /
18b6(rgyud): thal mo sbyar po byas nas longs//sprin tshon seng ge chen po pa//che bo che ba rgya mtsho che//gsung po chen po dpa' chen po//gau yul tshon rab tu 'joms mdzad pa//klu dang mdab bzang
18b7(rgyud): gsang ba po//stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag/nub kyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas//de nas byung la gnod par bgyid//'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni//de dag chad pa bdag gis
19a1(rgyud): m+b+has/atsa la/bdag dri'i phyogasu dag par gyur cig sna/tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang //'jig rten bye dang dang phyun cha//gan sbyin rje dpa na tham /
19a2(rgyud): 'phrag ma bu dang bcas pa yang //bdag gi me tog spos dgra dang //sbyin skyeg 'di ni blang bar bgyis//de dag gri ni brtson 'grus dang //gzo brjid dpung phyug stobs kyi
19a3(rgyud): kyang //nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur//bangadag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swAhA/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpe' khyod la//phyag
19a4(rgyud): skyes bu mchog rgyu la//thAb mo sbyar te phyug 'tsha/tshwasgra rgyul khyod la phyag 'argya'o//de na sa tshangs pa chings rkyen yang //thal mo sbyor ba byas nas srungs/
19a5(rgyud): pos byezlos pa dog pa//ge byung na gyi ma sbyin//rgyu bo dog mjed ston pa ///'jig rten thams cad gas mdzad pa//gan sbyin min po gang gi rnams/
19a6(rgyud): dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa dang //sa yi 'og dang bar ro dang steng //na mkha' dag la gnas pa'i gdon//'jig rten mgon gyi skyon sngar na//de dag chad pa bdogs
19b1(rgyud): bshad//skad ma the dan/brAd+d+he/prad+yA b+h+yoSha/prah+ma stA re/badz+re bad+d+ha b+ho She/badz+ra d+har/s+thi te pA re/a tsa laM/a ra Ne/aSh+Ta ni/aR+Shar+N+Na ti/shU re/b.rA gra d+hAd+d+ha/
19b2(rgyud): sA ra ba te/bdag phyogs thams cad du dge bar gyur cig swA hA/tshangs pa dang ni ngargya byin dang //'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che//gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang //'phros
19b3(rgyud): ma bu dang bcas pa yang //bdag gi me tog spos dag dang //sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar bgyis//de dag ga ni brtson 'grus dang //gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang //nad
19b4(rgyud): rnams thams cad bcom par gyur//bdag 'jigs pa dang ga nod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur//bad kan las gyur 'dus
19b5(rgyud): las gyur//nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur//bdag 'jig pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swAhA/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la//phyag 'tshal
19b6(rgyud): skyes bu mchog khyed la//thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tsha'o//chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
19b7(rgyud): ni rgyal srid gcig gi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /grong dang khyim nas sems
20a1(rgyud): can gcig gi bar gyi don gyi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin gyi/'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang btsas pa/dge sbyong dang /
20a2(rgyud): bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ste/de ni dper na sman pa mkhas pa'i
20a3(rgyud): mchog tu phyin pa/goso ba la brtson pa/sman pas shes par bya ba shin tu bslabs la rgyal po gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin/yul gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin pa nas
20a4(rgyud): sems can gcig gi don gyi bar du byung ba ma yin pa dang 'dra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyogs gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i phyogs de dag tu mi rnams dang /
20a5(rgyud): mi ma yin pa dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bya bar sems kyis/nga yang yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ba dang /yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo'i
20a6(rgyud): tshogs phal po che'i don kyang byas par 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas par 'gyuraro//snyam du dgongs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gros dang /
20a7(rgyud): sham thabs banabs nas lhung bzed bsnams te/dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shod du gshegs pa dang /mi mdzad kyi bdag
20b1(rgyud): po tshangs pas lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la g.yas rol du phulo//phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yo cing 'dug par gyur to//lha
20b2(rgyud): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phu lo//phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug
20b3(rgyud): par gyur to//rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la snam logs nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug
20b4(rgyud): par gyur to//lho'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /gnod sbyin mi thu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang
20b5(rgyud): bcas pas kyang sa so nas lha'i gdugs dag blangs te/nyan thos rnams la phul nas rdul yab kyis g.yab cing 'dug par gyur to//de lta bu'i grags pa dang /bkur sti dang /brnyes par
20b6(rgyud): bya ba brnyes nas/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod phung po'i ro las shod du babs te/yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der gshegs
20b7(rgyud): pa dang /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das shin tu mdzes pa/dad par 'os pa/dbang po zhi ba/thugs zhi ba/dbang po dul ba/thugs dul ba/dul ba
21a1(rgyud): na nanas sa smra sbyi pa sapa/da ba sa sa pa/ /rnasan sun su r+m+ma du shu
21a2(rgyud): gsal ba/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtswa gnyis kyis sgo legs par brgyan pa/dpe byed bzang po brgyad cus shin tu rgyan po/shing sa lnga'i rgyal po ster de bzhin gshegs
21a3(rgyud): po'i sku rnam par smras pa/nyi ma ltang 'ad zer byir bkun tu byed pa/mtshan mamun pa'i ni ni nga ma sgro la mo'i nga po rib tu 'bar bya dang 'dra zhing /ma ldan 'das gas
21a4(rgyud): na pa dam pa hU~M ma/ni/ ts+tshe rdzi ba nas ginas de dag ga des b+h+rid //mangs pa d+hA yangs bdun gyi nanas sa na sul su
21a5(rgyud): bar byed nas/sems dad par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khye chen por ldum gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de phyogs shing chag chag 'dibs/byid
21a6(rgyud): me ta~M 'thor/dang gyi sde rje dang /dril bu dang /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /byidon sna tshogs kyis rgyun te/bdug smros sna tshogs kyis gdugs nas/bcom ldan 'das nim
21a7(rgyud): bang da sa phyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'dis gyen shol mgo bos phyaga'i chag//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thig gi mi thil 'kho la rtsibs steng dang ldan pa'ir man/
21b1(rgyud): me tog pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa/sngon legs par spyad pa'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa/gnon sha chags shing 'jam pa/nyi ma 'od zer bas lhag pa 'od dang ldan pa/'od zer brgya phrag
21b2(rgyud): mang po kun tu 'phro ba/dri ma med pa'i phyag gis li tsa byi dog gi mgo la byugs te/rjesu bstan pa mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i nang du gshegs
21b3(rgyud): nas/nam gyi gung thun la sgo skyes kyi gzhi zhabs kyis mnan nas phyogs bzhir gzigs te/phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas na bza' bla gos bsil-i te bka' stsal pa/phye ma'i/
21b4(rgyud): dus na dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/gang su yang rung ba dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa
21b5(rgyud): dang /stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
21b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyog rgya 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing ston pa dang /kun chub par byed pa la yams nad dang /'jigs pa dang /'tshe ba
21b7(rgyud): dang /nad 'gro ba dang /'khrugs pa dang /'thob pa dang /rtsod pa dang /'ching ba dang /kha mchu dang /shags dang /tha na phra ma dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i sdug bsngal ba'i/
22a1(rgyud): las kyis mi tshugs shing /'tshe bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyuraro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag
22a2(rgyud): po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa'i
22a3(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya de gang lags/de
22a4(rgyud): skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshangs pa de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
22a5(rgyud): shrig dang ngas khyod la bshad//btsun pa de bzhi no zhes gsol nas/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
22a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces bko' stsal to//s+yAd ya thaM dan/a tsa le/ma tsa laM/sA ra ma tsa le/pra kI ti bar+Ne/pra kri ti nor+b+ho She/sa man+ta/mu khe/s+thi raM/sta ba ri/bi g+huSh+Ta/
22a7(rgyud): shab+de/brag la ne/pA rang+ga mai/sA rA su te/sA radrA ba te/ba la ma hA ba le/ma hA nid+h+waM se swAhA/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/lusu rtogs pa dran pa dang /zhi ga nas
22b1(rgyud): dang /lhag mthong dang /ting 'dzin gsum dang /rdzu tshul gyi rkang pa pazhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar gzhug pa ban pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /'bas
22b2(rgyud): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /rjesu dran pa drug dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /mthar gyis gnas
22b3(rgyud): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /rnam par grol ba'i skye mched bcu gcig dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis
22b4(rgyud): dang /rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor la dang /dbugs dbyung ba dang /rngub pa rje su dran pa bcu drug dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pra bco brgyad dang /yaM g+ha
22b5(rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang /tshangs pa de ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
22b6(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/sangs rgyas sgrub pa'o//chos sgrub po'o//dge 'dun sgrub pa'o//tshangs pa sgrub
22b7(rgyud): 'o//dbang po sgrib pa'o//'jig rten skyong po sgrub pa'o//dbang phyug sgrub pa'o//bden pa sgrub pa'o//la mi sgrub pa'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgrub pa'o//zla ba sgrub pa'o//
23a1(rgyud): nyi ma sgrub pa'o//gza' sgrub pa'o//rgyu skar sgrub pa'o//stad ya the dan/sA le/ka si ni/bi d+ha ra NI/pa rA grA/sA re A maR+Sha Ni/a mo g+ha ba ti/
23a2(rgyud): sa tsa ne kA li/na kA li/ka shi ka pa ti/b+hau ra NI/b+ha ra kr-i sha khi/sa man+ta prAp+te/sa ra pAp+te/stam+b+ha ne/stam+ma na pAp+te/badz+ra d+ha ri swA hA/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
23a3(rgyud): tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dgra bka' stsal to//'jig rten 'di 'am gang dag 'das pa dang //mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa//de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi lhur gyur
23a4(rgyud): pa//mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med//de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs//bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma
23a5(rgyud): byas//shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu phye//bdud rtsi zhi bas 'dus byas ma yin pa//chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med//de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs//
23a6(rgyud): bden pa de yis 'di ni dge bar shog/mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab bstan pa//ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa//rdo rje lta bu'i mi gnyis lam mthong ba//ting
23a7(rgyud): 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin//de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/gang zag chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing /
23b1(rgyud): glang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni//drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa//bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas zhes gsungs//de la byin na 'bras bu tshur gyur te//
23b2(rgyud): zhing rab bashrIn la sru bon btab pa bzhin//'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs//bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/gang dag brten pa'i yid kyis rab brtson
23b3(rgyud): zhing //go'u ta mA'i bstan la 'jug byed pa//de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste//mun pa gsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa//dri bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs//
23b4(rgyud): bden pa de yis 'di ni dge bar shog/lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni//'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang //the tsom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag/cig/
23b5(rgyud): char spangs te 'phags pa'i bden mthong ba//des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs//bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang ///
23b6(rgyud): sdig sde rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing //blo bur byas na'ang 'chab pa mi byed la//de ltar de dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed//de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs//bden
23b7(rgyud): pa de yis 'di ni dge bar shog/ji ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs po//phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g.yo ltar//'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi//gang
24a1(rgyud): zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no//des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs//bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/shes rab zab mos shin tu brtan
24a2(rgyud): yin//'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing //lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pa ni//de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dam brang mi 'gyur//des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs///
24a3(rgyud): bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ji ltar me ni rlung gis rabo gtor ba//lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid//de ltar kun tu sbyor ba rab btang ba/sangs rgyas sras rnams
24a4(rgyud): bstan du med par 'gro/des na dge 'dun rin tshon mchog tu gsungs//bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba//de dag thams cad 'dir
24a5(rgyud): ni bder gyur cig/ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa//sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba//de dag thams cad
24a6(rgyud): 'dir ni bder gyur cig/zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa//chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba//de dag thams
24a7(rgyud): cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa//dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba//de
24b1(rgyud): dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te//sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/nyin dang //
24b2(rgyud): mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog/'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis//shin tu bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa//bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bor shog/de kun 'jigs
24b3(rgyud): pa che las thar gyur tsog swAhA/s+yAd ya thaM dan/d+hi r-i d+hi d+hi rai/ba la ni g+ho She/ba la sA re/sa ra ba te/stu ti pra b+hU ta prAp+taM/A ra d+he/a ra nin+d+ho Sha/sA ra ba ti/a ts+yu te/
24b4(rgyud): ba la ba te/shU ra b+hUp+te/sU rAng+ga mai/sur+ya ba le/sur+ya nir+g+ho She swA hA/tshangs pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mi gdon thams cad las
24b5(rgyud): rab tu thar bar byed pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya'o//sangs rgyas kyi gnaso//
24b6(rgyud): chos kyi gnaso//dge 'dun gyi gnaso//tshangs pa'i gnaso//dbang po'i gnaso//'jig rten skyong ba'i gnaso//dbang phyug gi gonaso//drang srong chen po'i gnaso//'byung
24b7(rgyud): po'i gnaso//mig gi gnaso//rgyu'i gnaso//phyogs kyi gnaso//bstan pa'i gnaso//sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o//nyan thos rnams
25a1(rgyud): /kyis reg pa'o//tshangs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o//dbang pos rab tu bsngags pa'o//'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mchod pa'o//dbang phyug gis phyag
25a2(rgyud): byas pa'o//lha thams cad kyis kun tu mchod pa'o//rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o//mkhas pa rnams mngon par dga' bar gyur pa'o//drang srong rnams kyis
25a3(rgyud): rab tu bsngags pa'o//tshangs pa rnams kyis rab tu rgyan pa'o//lho rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'o//khrus byed pa rnams kyis bsangs pa'o//rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyis
25a4(rgyud): dga' bar byas pa'o//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yulo//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bskyed mos tsha lo//drang srong rnams kyi gnaso//nyan thos rnams kyis mya ngan las 'das
25a5(rgyud): pa'o//rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis gnas//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'byung gnaso//nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o//bag la nyal gyi zug rngu rnams 'byin
25a6(rgyud): pa'o//'phags pi'o lam kun tu ston pa'o//thar pa'i sgo rnams 'byed pa'o//'jig tshogs la lta ba rnams 'jig par byed pa'o//nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu snyil bar byed pa'o//'khor
25a7(rgyud): ba'i rgya mtsho skems pa'o//'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can thams cad sgrol ba'o//bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa'o//bdud kyi 'khor skrag par byed pa'o//bdud kyi
25b1(rgyud): mchil ma 'dor ba'o//nyon mangs pa'i g.yul las sgrol po'o//mya ngan las 'das de'i grong khyer du 'jug pal//'khor ba'i khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa'o//sAdA yA thA dan/
25b2(rgyud): khang+ge/khang+ga g+ho She/u Sho d+ha ne/sA ra thi/pra b+he daM/bi pu la pr-i b+he sad kaR+Sha Ni/bi kaR+Sha NaM/bi shwa gra ba ta/shud+ha sA d+ha ni/ba ru Ne ba te/bA sa be/be b+h+ye Sha Ne/baM sa
25b3(rgyud): ga me/pa shu pa ti/puSh+pa gAr+b+he/bdang dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang /nye bar 'tshe ba dang /ngal ba thams cad las bde leg su gyur cig swA hA/stong chen
25b4(rgyud): po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
25b5(rgyud): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/'dis ni lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag rgyas btab pa ste/mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer bla na
25b6(rgyud): med par zhug so//de'i don gyis phyir sngon mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang /
25b7(rgyud): pa ma dang /sbyin gnas dang /bla ma lte bu rnams la bsnyen bkur to//tshangs par spyod pa spyad//tshul khrimaso bsrung so//sbyin pa byin no//snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
26a1(rgyud): bskangaso//byang chub thob par bsgrub so//bdud pham par byas//de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /rgyal ba
26a2(rgyud): chen po bzhi dag gis skad cig blo gros gcig dang /dbyangs gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/kye ma rig sngags rig sngogs che//stong chen
26a3(rgyud): rab tu 'joms byed pa//sangs rgyas phyag rgya de yis ni//phyogs bzhi'i sems can thams cad srung //phyag rgya gang gis btab gyur na//'byung po thams cad skrag
26a4(rgyud): bgyid pa/stong chen rab tu 'jo mos pa'i mdo//phyag rgya bdog cag stsal bar bgyi//mi gang rab tu sdang ba dang //bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa//de dag tshangs pas sprul
26a5(rgyud): pa yi//rig sngags chad pas bcad par bgyi//brgya byin gyis ni spyi bos blangs//'jig rten skyong bas rgyas btab bo//stad ya the dan/ka ling+gi/b+ha ra de/dzA ta gre/
26a6(rgyud): ma ne/si he bi de/sa ra bA prAb+h+yAM/hi sa gA mi nau/mA li ni/hu li si hu li si hu li se hu lo me/ha ha ma/ha ha ma/sU da nI/ba rA gra bra ti/hasti ne/nai ba ra mri te/
26a7(rgyud): tsaN+DA li/tsa ra me/tsa R+Sha tse ro smr-i hA/stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad pa'i cha/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
26b1(rgyud): khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/phyogs bzhi'i gnod sbyin dang /srin po sha zla ba rnams kyis sgra skad drag po phyung ba
26b2(rgyud): mdo sdug bsngal kye ma'i brlag/bdag cag 'byung po'i tshogs phung ngo //'byung po'i tshogs ni rab tu phung //bdog cag rtag tu dbang gis khrid//srog chags 'byung po thams
26b3(rgyud): cad ni//di rang dgrar bcas dbang medo//de dag sa la 'khod nus ni//zhum zhing rnam par zhum gyur nas//'dre zhing ldog par rab tu byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
26b4(rgyud): gzhi rdo rjer mngon par sprul pa dang /de dag kyang phyogs bzhir byi ro//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir me lce'i phung po chen po mngon par sprul pa dang /de dag na malnga
26b5(rgyud): la rgyug go/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas na mkha' lcagasu mngon pa ro sbal pa dang /de dag shing ta la bdun tsam nus na mkha' la kun tu rgyu go/de nas lha rnams kyi
26b6(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin gyis ral gri dang /mda' dang /mdung thung dang /mdung dang /mda' bo che dang /shing ljon pa dang /ri'i char mngon par pha'o//de'i tshe gnod sbyin lnga skyong
26b7(rgyud): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'dus pa rnams rig sngags kyi dmod pas bcom ste/rims nad kyis btab nas myos te rmya zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zha bos gnyis la
27a1(rgyud): gtugs te gsol pa/dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /thugs brtse ba can lags kyis dge sbyong go'u ta mas bdag cag bskyab tu
27a2(rgyud): gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba po'i bdag po de dag la byams pas khyab pa mdzad nas bslab pa 'dzin du bcu do//bdag cag phyag rgya spong gyur na//ma bosad
27a3(rgyud): pa yi 'gro gang dang //pha bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang //dgra bcom pa yang gsod gang dang //dge 'dun dbyen bgyid 'gro gang dang //rdzogs sangs rgyas la sdang sems kyis//
27a4(rgyud): sku mchil phyung ba bgyis bu yis//'gro ba gang lags der mchi'o//ar+tha ka yi dog pa ltar//mgo ni tshol pa bdun 'gas shing //gnod sbyin nod kyis btab pa dang //bdag
27a5(rgyud): lus sha bkra 'byung bar shog/gang 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa'i mdo//stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi//rig sngags rgyal las 'gal bgyis na//bdag cag 'dod bzhin mi
27a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro//de'i tshe grong khyer chen po yangs pa can na yams kyi nad dang /'jigs pa dang /gnod pa dang /nad 'go ba dang /'khrug pa thaMd rgyun chad par gyur to//gnod sbyin dang /srin
27a7(rgyud): po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rang rang gi spyod yul las 'daso//ngang pa dang /ne tsa dang /ri skegs dang /lu byug dang /rma bya dang /ngur pa dang /shing shang te'u dang /
27b1(rgyud): byang tshogs rnams kyang sgra snyan pa 'byin no//mi 'am ci rnams ni lha'i bu mo bzhin du lus pa gnod pa mdo//rin po che'i cha byad rnams kyang ma dkrol bar 'khrolo//rnga bo che dang /dung
27b2(rgyud): dang /rdza rnga dang /rnga bran dang /pi pang dang /gling bu rnams kyang ji ltar gan su bkod pa bzhin du skye byung ngo //bal po se'i dang /bil be dang /skyu ru ra dang /n+ya gro da dang /
27b3(rgyud): byang chub kyi shing dang /spre'u gnas dang /blag sha dang /u dum ba ra dang /sa la dang /ta ma lo'o shing ljon pa rnams kyang dri rab tu 'byin//lha brgya stong dag gis kyang a
27b4(rgyud): l-i la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/bar snang la me tog gi char mngon par pha po//mi ma yin pa'i dri dag kyang 'jig rten du byung ngo //de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis thal mo sbyar te/
27b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'odas la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis bslab pa'i gzhi slongasu gzung ste/gos ngur smrig bgos nas stong chen po rab tu
27b6(rgyud): 'joms pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs shing gzung ste/bklags shing bshad la kun chub par
27b7(rgyud): dgyis shing yi ger bris nas mdud pa bor te 'chang na/de la yams kyi nad dang /'dzegs pa dang /gnod pa dang /nad 'go ba dang /'khrug pa dang /khrag khrug dang /'thab mo dang /
28a1(rgyud): bcing ba dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa nas phra ma'i bar gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lagaso//rnam par 'tshe ba thams
28a2(rgyud): cad las rgyal bar 'gyur lagaso//yul 'khor mtshams bcad par 'tshal ba/khrus bgyis pa/zas dkar gsum 'tshal ba/zas ngan pa rnam pa lnga spangs pa/mi'i
28a3(rgyud): bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongasu gzung ba/sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/shin tu rgyan pa/gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa des grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong
28a4(rgyud): rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /sum mdo dang /khyim rnams nyal nyil gyi phung po ma mchis par bgyid te/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi dbus kyi dog sa rnamasu me tog sil
28a5(rgyud): ma bkram la/spros sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug par bgyi'o//phyogs bzhir bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis pas rgyan pa/lag na mtshon thogs pa bzhi dang /dril bu bzhi dang /
28a6(rgyud): rin po che'i snod bzhi bzhigo/snga dro'i dus kyi tshe gdugs shar ba dang /rig sngags bklags par bgyi ste/mdo sde bzlas shing klag par bgyi'o yi ger bris te mchod rten chen po
28a7(rgyud): dang /shing ljon pa chen po dang /rgyal mtshan chen po'i rtse mo la bstod btags la/me tog sna tshogs dang /spos sna tshogs dag gis dgung zla phyed kyi bar du mchod par bgyid
28b1(rgyud): gdugs re re zhing rig sngags lan re klag par bgyi'o//de ltar na yul 'khor yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro//de ltar grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang yul 'khor dang /
28b2(rgyud): pho brang 'khor dang /gnas dang /gtsug lag khang dang /khyi mo dang /zhing dang /las khang dang /shing ljon pa dang /'bras bu dang /ne'u sing dang /kun dga' ra ba dang /gnag
28b3(rgyud): lha sa dang /phyugs lhas rnams nyal nyil ma mchis par bgyis te/seng ldeng dang rgya shug gi zhugs bltams la/dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste/sgo gang g.yas g.yon
28b4(rgyud): nas dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs la/sa bon thams cad mar gyis bskus te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi/chab skor tshon skud sna tshogs bre bar bgyi'o//dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa
28b5(rgyud): dag ni bton la slar yang gzud par bgyi'o//rig sngags kyang klag par bgyi'o//yi ger bris sam/mdud pa bdud de mthon po'i khar btegs la mchod par bgyi'o//nad pa'o
28b6(rgyud): mdun du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel lam/tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs spre'u 'am/
28b7(rgyud): za ma tog gi steng du bzhag ste/phyag rgya bzhi bgyis las bzhag par bgyi'o//me tog sna tshogs dang /spos sna tshogs dang /tshangs pa dang /brgya byin dang /rgyal po chen
29a1(rgyud): ba bzhi dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /gan kun gyi sde dpon dang /gnod sbyin stobs po che dang /'drag ma la sogs pa'i ming gis dkon mchog gsum la
29a2(rgyud): mchod par bgyi'o//de rnams kyi stobs dang /dbang phyug dang /byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig/bdag la srung ba gyis shig/nad thams cad las thar bar gyur cig
29a3(rgyud): nad pa'i zas dang /skom dang /sman rnams kyang rig sngags 'dis btab te stsal bar bgyi'o//rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas tshe//'jig rten skyong bas phyogs bzhi nas//
29a4(rgyud): snod bzhi dag ni blangs na su//bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang //mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa//lha yi snod mchog de dang ni//bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams//
29a5(rgyud): sbyin pa'i phyag na bsnams gyur pa//bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis//sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/de bzhin lha mo 'phrog ma yis//lha rjes dge ba a ru ra//blangs
29a6(rgyud): nas ston lo rab phul ba/bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams//bden pa'i tshig ni 'di dag gis//nod pa rnams kyi nad sel cig/nyes pa thams cad 'phrog byed pa//sman rnams
29a7(rgyud): bdud rtsir gyur par shog/sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi brjid dang //gtsug tor can gyi stobs rnams dang //thams cad skyob kyi bden tshig dang //log dad sil gyi ting
29b1(rgyud): 'dzin dang //gser zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang //'od srung gi ni rdzu 'phrul dang //shAkya sring go'i mthu rnams kyis//sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/nad pa shar phyogs kha
29b2(rgyud): bstan la//sman rnams nye bar stsal bar dgyi//de yi che na rig sngags 'di//lag mthil bzhag ste klog par bgyi//s+yAd ya the dan/kha She/kha Te/kha Te/kha Te/bi kha Te/
29b3(rgyud): bi ma li/bi li be/ba le/ba la ba ti/tsan+d+he/tsa ra Ne/a mr-i ta nir+g+ho She swA hA/rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur//bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur//nad rnams
29b4(rgyud): thams cad rab bcom ste//bdag la rtag tu dge bar shog/byad dang ro longs dang ldan pa'i las rnams la skyes pa 'am/bud med gdugs zhag tshig bsrung ba bgyis pa/rab tu
29b5(rgyud): khrus gyis/shin tu rgyan pa des dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste/spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs lalnga song ldeng dang /rgya shugs rigs gnyis kyi zhugs bus te/sa bon
29b6(rgyud): thams cad phyogs bzhor gtor bar bgyi'o//zhugs kyi nang du 'ang gtor bar dgyi'i//rtsa ba thams cad dang me tog thams cad tshon skud sna tshogs la brgyus te ral gri 'am/mdung rtse
29b7(rgyud): gsum pa 'am/mdung ngam mda' la gdags par dbye'o//spos chab sna tshogs sbyar te/bum pa chen po'i nang du blugs li/gang byad snyoms kyis phog pa de skad pa
30a1(rgyud): des bcings te/bum pa'i chab kyis bkru bar bgyi/blud pa yang ral gris bcad de shugs kyis nang du dor ro//stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di
30a2(rgyud): yang brjod par bgyi'o//gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos dang //tshangs dbang dang ni 'jig rten skyong //gnod sbyin sde dpon dbang phyug
30a3(rgyud): dang //de bzhin gnod sbyin stobs chen dang //'phrog mo bu dang bcas pa dang //de dag mthu dang gzi brjid kyis//ro langs las rnams chad gyur cig/rdo rjes rin chen
30a4(rgyud): phug pa dang //me yis bud shing sreg pa dang //rlung gis sprin ni 'thor ba dang //nyi mas nags tshal skems byed pa//bden pa'i chag ni de dag gis//byad stems las
30a5(rgyud): rnams tshig par shog/spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis//sdig pa thams cad nges par bsal//tad+ya thA/hu me hu me/ka kha li/ka kha li/kha r-i le/dzu hA ni/
30a6(rgyud): dza ba le/ha ra gre/ha ri ni shra ba ri/shAn+ti/pra shAn+ti/swAh+ma/d+hA ba ni swAhA/pra d+hA ba ni swA hA/gAn d+ha ra b+hai swA hA/ba lang gi ni swA hA/sarba kA kho ra dats+tshe da ni swA hA/lha
30a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis bdag gi byad dang /ro langs dang /sman dang /sngags dang /dug dang /dug sbyar ma rnams bcad do//bai shig/pham par
30b1(rgyud): bya//nga rol pham par byas//s+thAt+ma/lba ba dang /shu ba dang /spro ba dang /'bras dang /'brum bu dang /kaum po dang /dug 'thungs pa las thar bar 'tshal ba shin tu khrus bgyis
30b2(rgyud): pa/shin tu rgyan pa ston pa bzang po'i steng du mchis te/rig snga gas 'di brjod par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang //rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang //dgra
30b3(rgyud): bcom dag gis mthu dag dang //gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang //shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang //mo'u dgal bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang //ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni//
30b4(rgyud): 'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang //ko'u de n+ti'i sngags thob dang //kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang //tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang //brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang //'jig
30b5(rgyud): rten snying po'i yul rnams dang //dbang phyug chen po stobs drug dang //sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang //'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang //de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis/
30b6(rgyud): bdag gis dug ni dug med shog/dug meng drug rnams 'jig byed pa//gsang sngags tshig rnams de lagaso//s+yAd ya thAM daMn/ha ri ke shi ni ki laM/e he re/a ma re/
30b7(rgyud): /kaiTakr-i/ / sir+b+basaM/kha so khaMs khas/ she/ma jug tani ts+tshid+ha/mu pra ts+tshe swAH/hi ya s+thAt+ma/mi ye swAt+ma/'bras dang rma dang shung
31a1(rgyud): dang //g.yan pa pa ni 'a drA da //zlog pa dang ni ga'a'adun//dran pa lags ga tu btsam//'dod chags zhe sdang gti m+b+ham rnams//dngang
31a2(rgyud): 'jig rten dug gsum ste//bcom ldan sangs rgyas drub mi mnga'//sangs rgyas gzi yis duge bcom//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//de dag 'jig rten dug
31a3(rgyud): gsum te//bcom ldan chos ni dug mi mnga'//chos kyi ga ji yis dug btso mo//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste//bcom ldan
31a4(rgyud): dge 'dun dug mi mnga'//dge 'dun gzi yis dug bco mo//sa ni dug gi ma yin te//sa ni dug gi pha yang yin//bden pa'i bden tshig de dag gas//bdag ni dug
31a5(rgyud): ni drud /mid shog/dug ni sa yi nang du song //gang ba'i snod du drug song zhig swAhA//de nas khrag khrug dang /'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang /pha rol gyi dmas
31a6(rgyud): tshogs dang /dgra rnams las rgyal bar 'tshal bas thog mir mchod rten chen po la mchod pa bgyi'o//stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang
31a7(rgyud): brjod par 'gyi'o//sangs rgyas kyis ni bdud pa ma mdzad//chos ma yin ni chos kyiso//dge 'dun gyis ni mu stegs pam//dbang pos lha min pham por gyur/
31b1(rgyud): rgyu tu na tshu ga rgyu na na na na na rgyu ma na rdzutu tu chu //
31b2(rgyud): sa ni don chen bug/lha rnams bden pa rab tu gsu sa//swA yang bden par gnas pa lags//sangs rgyas dang na chos kyang bdin/bden pa rgya la byung rdzu
31b3(rgyud): nga dpa/uH suH/d+hAstAM/nIn+nadaH/sa m+b+ha d+hAn/swA \u0f7f/d+hU /bu d+hAr+dz+nyA te///
31b4(rgyud): kun ma byin gyis/tshig chod pa 'di dag gsungs//mi 'khrugs pa dang snang mdzod skyon ras gzigs kyi da //rin chen 'od lho rI rAb su khyed 'od derig med
31b5(rgyud): rnams po mtshan rnams rtag tu gzu na ni//'jigs par 'gyur ba mA yin non par mi 'gyur//glang gis mthu myobs chen po brgyad de 'di dag go//mtshan rnams rjesuM ga
31b6(rgyud): byi na sa sbyid cing//kun tu sgye pa byas na de yi bu ma ma ni//seM de rug dang mtshan gyi mtshugs par mi 'gyur//gol te de la gnod pa byed pa nye bar gdas
32a1(rgyud): gshed mas mtshon rnams kyis ni gdab par gzas pa las//spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rje su dran na ni//mtshon cha de dag dum+bu dum dur chag cing 'brul//
32a2(rgyud): gral te mtshon cha rnams ni thogs par gyur na yang //lag pa chag nas sra la rab tu lhung bar 'gyur//de yi lus la cung zad 'bab par mi 'gyuraro//sngan chad byas pa gang
32a3(rgyud): yin pa ni ma gtog so//lha rnams kyis 'thun par tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas khyod la phyag 'tshalo//bden pa rabang ston
32a4(rgyud): thub pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo//deng ni bden pa rnams la gnas nas mchi bar bgyi//bdag gi las rnams thams cad 'bras bur bcas gyur cig/de nas tshangs pa tshangs
32a5(rgyud): chen gyis//langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas//stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa//legs par gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di//byis pa rnams la phan bgyid pa//rig
32a6(rgyud): sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi//gang gis dang por 'dzam gling du//rig sngags rab tu ston mdzad pa//chos kyi rgyal po snang mdzad pa//sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tsha'o//
32a7(rgyud): khyad par 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang //tshogs kyi dam pa dge 'dun dang //sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas//tshangs pas 'di skad tshig gsol to//gang
32b1(rgyud): dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas kyi ni nyan thos dang //drang srong dang ni 'jig rten skyong //lha rnams ji snyed mchis pa dag/de kun mi yi 'jig rten na//'di las skyes
32b2(rgyud): pa sha s+ya //thub chen mnga' la 'tshal ba yi//gnod sbyin srin po 'di ni mchis//rgyal po rnams kyis mthong mi nus//bstan par yang ni mi nuso//gang la bu ni mi 'chags dang //
32b3(rgyud): gang gi mang lo ni mi gnas dang //skyes pa bud med 'du bo na//dbang po rnams ni myos par bgyid//mer mer po dang nur nur po//bu yi sa bon ma rung bgyid//gang yang mngal
32b4(rgyud): ni thur du gyur//sha ma mi 'byung gnod bgyid pa//de rnams kyi ni ming brjod kyis//'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson//'jam pa po dang ri dgas rgyal//skem byed brjed
32b5(rgyud): byed khu tshur can//ma mo dang ni dza mi ka/'dod pa can dang nam gru dang //srul po dang ni ma dga' byed//bya dang gnya' ba'i lag can dang //bzhin rgyan dang ni mig 'phyang ba/
32b6(rgyud): do dag thams cad sa la rgya//gdon rnams bco lnga de dag ni//byis pa rnams la 'jigs par bgyid//ji ltar byis pa 'dzin pa yis//mtshan dang gzugs kyang brjod par
32b7(rgyud): bgyi/'jam pa pos ni zin gyur na//mig ni rab tu 'gyur bar bgyid//ri dgas rgyal gyis zin gyur na//skyugs pa mi bzad skyug par 'gyur//skyem byed kyis ni
33a1(rgyud): rnon rgyus//myu skyed pas ni pa la//da rgyu na ni gyu na//sbyin de m+b+ha yang hrIn//dbu rgyulajug/rgyu sgyu
33a2(rgyud): zin nu//khu tshur 'chang zhing 'byed par bgyid//ma mo yis ni zin gyur na//rgod cing de bzhin sgra yang 'byin//dza~M mo kas ni rab zinan//mu no nu bar mngon mi dga'//'dod
33a3(rgyud): can gyis rab zin na//mal na gnyid log ngu bar 'gyur//nam grus rab tu zin gyur na//lce la sos ni 'cha' bar bgyid//srul pos rab tu zin gyur na//ku co 'don cing
33a4(rgyud): sgra yang 'byin//ma dga' byed pas zin gyur na//rnam pa sna tshogs gzugasu 'gyur//bya yis rab tu zin gyur na//mnam pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur//gnya' lag can
33a5(rgyud): gyis zin gyur na//mgul pa rab tu 'gag par 'gyur//bzhin rgyan gyis ni zin gyur na//rims kyis btab cing 'khru bar 'gyur//mig 'phyang bas ni zin gyur na//skyigs
33a6(rgyud): bu dang ni sdom pa 'byung //byis pa ji ltar skrag bgyid pa//de yi gzugs ni brjod par bgyi//'jam pa po ni ba lang gzugs//ri dwags rgyal po ri dgas 'dra//ske ma byed pa
33a7(rgyud): ni gzhon nu'i gzugs//brjed byed pa ni waM 'dra'o//khu tshur can ni bya rog gzugs//ma mo de ni ma yi gzugs//dza mi ka ni rta yi gzugs//'dod pa can ni rdo rje'i gzugs/
33b1(rgyud): rnam gru khyi yi gzugs kyis te//srul po phag gi gzugs kyiso//ma dga' byed pa phyi la'i gzugs//bya ni mdab chags gzugs kyiso//gnya' lag can ni bya gag gzugs//
33b2(rgyud): bzhin rgyan 'ug pa'i gzugasu te//mig 'phyang ba ni pa bang gzugs//'di dog byis pa skrag par bgyid//'di dag bu 'phrog ma rungs pa//byis pa rnams la 'jigs bgyid pa/
33b3(rgyud): mdo sde'i zhags pas drangs nas ni//'di dag shin tu dgug par bgyid//gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po ni//dri za tsan dan zhes bgyi ba//yi ge phyag rgya de stsal de//song la gdon
33b4(rgyud): ni drug po pa//bco lnga de dag khug cig ces//pho nyar yang ni btang bar bgyi//de dge rnams ni skad cig gis//bcing ba lnga yi bcing bzhin bkug/de nas 'jig rten
33b5(rgyud): mgon po la//tshangs chen thal sbyar 'di skad gsol//srog chags sa bon 'jig bgyid pa//'byung po 'di dag rnams lhags te//mgon po yi ni spyan snga ru//'di
33b6(rgyud): dag chad pas bshad par dgyid//bud med gang dag bu mi 'tshal//gang zhig btsas pa 'dzin 'tshal bas//tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la//bslab go zung dam chos skyabs
33b7(rgyud): mchis la/mchod rten legs par mchod par bgyi//khrus bgyis shin tu rgyan nas ni//sa gzhir yungs kar gtor na su//me tog spos kyis rgyan par bgyi//sna lnga'i
34a1(rgyud): tshon gyi rlung dus ni//khor yug tu ni bskor bar bgyi//nam phyed par du mchis nas ni//spyi bor yungs kar bzhug nus//tshangs pas rab tu byas pa te/
34a2(rgyud): tshangs pas sprul ces brjod par 'i gyi//lo grangs bcu gnyis bar du ni//gzhon nu rnams la phan pabyid pa//tsha gi pas sprul pa'i mdo sde yi//rig sngags 'di la gang gda' ba/
34a3(rgyud): ar+tha ka yi dge ba bzhin//mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas//s+yAd ya the dan/aM ge/baM ge/b+haM ge/d+hU ba te/i nr-in+di/sU la re/gi rig be ri/shra ba ru/gA ru
34a4(rgyud): sha ru NI/gi ri/ga ba re/lo tsa ni/lo sa ni/ro tsa ni/a la b+he/aM ga ne/a la b+he/ta la b+he pra kaR+Sha Ni swA tA/mngal na bde bar gnas gyur cig/dbang po yang
34a5(rgyud): dag 'phel bar shog/mngal na 'dug par bder gyur cig/btsas pa 'jig par ma gyur cig/mngal na bde bar gnas gyur cig/dus bzhin du ni 'byung bar shog/tshon
34a6(rgyud): skud sna tshogs rnams dang ni//yungs kar 'bru ni ma grugs pa//de dag srung bar gsungs pa ste//byis pa ring du 'tsho bar shog/de nas ston pa kun mkhyen gyis//rig pa'i sngags
34a7(rgyud): ni 'di dag gsungs//mngal na 'jug pa srung bar shog/byis pa rnams ni bder gyur cig/s+yAd yi the dan/bo d+hi bo d+hi/ma hA bo d+hi/b+ho d+ha a nu mo te/pha li ni/ba hU dr-i
34b1(rgyud): lo/shik+Sha shik+Sha/sA ra ba te/sa ra ba te/sA gA le du rA sa de/du rA ga me/shU prap+te/shU ra ba te/b+ha ge/b+ha gA b+ha ge/b+hA gA ni ni bA ra Ni swAhA/de nas gdon ni bco lnga
34b2(rgyud): po//rtag tu khrag la 'thungs rnams kyis//'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal to//thal mo sbyar nus 'di skad gsol//grong ngam khyim mam grong khyer ram//gang na legs
34b3(rgyud): par gsungs pa yi//mdo sde 'di ni bzhugs pa der//byis pa rnams ni 'chi mi 'gyur//thub chen khyod ni ji bzhin du//rje su 'thun par 'jug par bgyi//sangs rgyas btso
