34b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalo//tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal//gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig/grub par gyur cig/rig sngags kyis sgrol bar gyur cig/
34b5(rgyud): tshangs pas bsam par gyur cig swA hA/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di
34b6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gang la la stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin tam/'chang ngam/ston tam/klog gam/kun chub par
34b7(rgyud): bgyid pa des mang du thos pa la brtson par bgyi'o//mchod rten mchod pa la brtson par bgyi'o//tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang /bco lnga'i dus su mchod rten la mchod pa rgya
35a1(rgyud): chen po bgyis nas rig sngags klag par bgyi'o//tshes brgyad kyi tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i skyes bu dag rgyal po chen po rnams kyi mdun na de lnga sems par
35a2(rgyud): bgyid/ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do//tshes bcu bzhi'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid mdun na sems par bgyid/ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do//tshes
35a3(rgyud): bco lnga'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po dag nyid sems par bgyid cing ming nas kyang gdon par bgyi de/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde
35a4(rgyud): 'di len pa dang /'chang ba dang /ston pa dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa/de ni srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par bgyid lagaso//
35a5(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang de la gos dang /zas dang mal che dang /stan dang na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis mi 'brel
35a6(rgyud): bar bgyi'o//sems can thams cad kyang sti stang bgyid par 'gyuraro//rgyal po dang /blon po dag gis kyang bla mar bgyi ba dang /rim gro bgyi bo dang /mchod par bgyid
35a7(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//gzhan mu stegs can dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa can dang /kun tu rgyu dang /mdza' ba dang /mi mdza' ba dag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod//
35b1(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa des gtsang mar bgyis te/lus gcong ba dang /gos dang /rgyan dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /yo byad khyad par can gtsang //
35b2(rgyud): mar bgyi/yul ngan pa rnyed par mi bgyid/yul ngan pa'i mdza' bo dang bston par mi bgyi/yul dran pa na gnas pa la bsngags par mi bgyi'o//gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin
35b3(rgyud): pa'i mdun du stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di dran par gyur na/de la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid srung ba dang /skyob pa dang /sbed par bgyid par 'gyuraro//btsun
35b4(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di mthu che ste/gang gis rang gi khyim du mtshan gcig gam/nyin gcig kyang rung yang dag par bsams na//
35b5(rgyud): de la lo gcig gi bar du mi ma lags pas klags rnyed par mi 'gyur//'byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'o su 'gyur ba lag so//gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms
35b6(rgyud): pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de 'tshal na/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bzhin ston par 'gyur na/gnod sbyin dong /srin po dang /phal pa gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/de ci'i phyir
35b7(rgyud): zhe na/sems can rnams la sman pa'i slod du 'jig rten la gang su dag rig sngags bgyid pa de dog pas gsang sngags kyis tshig 'di dag rab mchog/gtso bo khyad par du
36a1(rgyud): 'asems pa/dam pa/zab pa/rgyu che ba/tshad ma mchis pa/'jug par dka' ba/thun mong ma lags pa'i slad du ste/'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya lagaso//
36a2(rgyud): nus dbang po mig stong ngo //lha yi rgyal po bad sogs khyod//thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas//'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol//'jig rten kun la phan bgyid pa//
36a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs//gsang sngags sman dang ldan pa yi//rig sngags bdag gi brjod par bgyi//shing sha me tog a ba marga dang //ka ta ka yi 'bras bu
36a4(rgyud): oM ga ru//rdo dreg dang ni sed btsod rnams dang //sU ka ri dang dzA ye marba ti//pa ri pe la sa ra bi ra dang //sa ma ka dang pu sa rgya smos dang //tsan dan a brta ka ru rta dang //sder
36a5(rgyud): mo lo ma kA ta ma ba ra dang //pri yang ku dang 'bu gsug smig bcu da dang //yungs kar dag dang ldong ros rnams dang ni//shing tsa shu dag gur gum shing kun dang //lo ma dge
36a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i brna ka/de dag sbyar te reng bur bgyis pa ni//gdon rnams kun las grol bar bgyid pa ste//'byung po dag ni kun gyi 'gyur ba la//mig la de yis bskus pa
36a7(rgyud): bgyid na ni//de nas 'byung po rdo rje dang //gnam lcags mda' yis zin las thar//ljon shing tshe dang de bzhin du//mchod rten che la bskus bgyid na//gang gis gnas de
36b1(rgyud): mthong ba de//'byung po la ni 'jigs ma mchis//der ni 'byung po mi gnas te//gnod byed gzhan yang ma lagaso//rnga chen dung dang rdza rnga dang //rnga bran dag la'ang bskus na na//de
36b2(rgyud): dag sgra ni gar grags par//'byung po'i dkyil 'khor skrag par 'gyur//grong du rgyu ba'i bya rnams kyi//mdab ma dag la bskus na ni//yul dang phyogs ni gzhan dag tu//bya
36b3(rgyud): de gang du mchis pa der//'byung po rnams ni mi gnas te//gnod byed gzhan yang ma lag so//chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka 'am//gang dang gang du bor yang rung //de ni dpag
36b4(rgyud): tshad khor yug tu//bde ba dang ni zhi bar 'gyur//pha rol dmag tshogs nang mchis te//mtshon cha dag ni 'bab pa ni//gnas rnams kun tu byugs bgyis na//bde blag
36b5(rgyud): du ni thar bar 'gyur//lba ba dang ni gzhang nad dang //me dpal dang ni 'bras byung dang //gdug pas zin dang dug 'thungs pas//'thungs sam byugs na thar bar 'gyur//
36b6(rgyud): lus la de yis byugs na ni//byang stems thams cad gcod par bgyi//rtsod pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur//rgyal po'i gyod las thar bar 'gyur//ma grub pa yang
36b7(rgyud): grub par 'gyur//dbul po las ni phyug por 'gyur//bu ma mchis pa bu rnyed 'gyur//nor ma mchis pa nor rnyed 'gyur//rig sngags 'chang gnas bar du yang //
37a1(rgyud): 'dis ni gsang sngags byung bar byed//dud 'gro'i skye gnas myur pa dang //sngon shing rnams kyi 'bras su dang //ga sngags 'chung ba thob la yang //'dun na
37a2(rgyud): 'i las dge byed//'di lnga gsang sngags tshig mchis te//dpe na dbang po'i tshig bzhin no//s+yAng+tha ya the dan/e kra me/be kra ma~M/b+hu ta g+ho She b+hU taM/ga maM/dat+te nar+d+had+d+ha
37a3(rgyud): ra/d+ha ra d+ha ro/dad+ha ni/ni kham/khe kha me/kha kha kha kha/sA rigam/tsan+tu/tsapa laM/hA lim/d+hal/d+hUrmANA~M.AH/phyogs thams cad nas/bdag gi ga
37a4(rgyud): thams cad zhi bar gyur cig hAhA/de nas tshungs pa dbang po dang //'jig rten skying dang dbang phyug che//gnod sbyin sna dpon thams cad dang //'phrog ma bud bcas pa ye/
37a5(rgyud): thal mo dag ni rab sgyur nas//skad gcig tu 'di skad gsol//nyi mA steng ltar gsal ci zo//zla ba nyi ltar 'di gas ldag//lha mAr bcasde pa 'jig rten na//khyod
37a6(rgyud): 'dra ba yod ma mchis//legs pasam legs par sbyar na ni//gnod sbyin srin po rnams 'joms pa//rgyal srid thar bgyid ces bgyi ba//rig sngags rgyal srid rob
37a7(rgyud): ga/stong chen gyi ni 'jig rtenan//srung ba'i mad sde dam pa lags//phyog 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la//phyag 'tshal skyes du mchog khyod la//thal mo sbyar te bya
37b1(rgyud): 'tshal nas//de nyid du ni mi snang gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das nub kha'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag stong chen
37b2(rgyud): po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde long zhig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/ston cig/kun chub par bgyis shig/de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la yun ring po'i don dang /
37b3(rgyud): phan pa dang /bde ba dang /bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de'i dge slong gang la la zhig gis stang chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'dis shing skam po
37b4(rgyud): lnga skud pas bcings na de la lo ma dang /me tog dang 'bras bu rnams skye bar 'gyur na/rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lha smos kyang ci dgos te/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par
37b5(rgyud): smin pa ni ma gtog so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde chen po lnga
37b6(rgyud): gsungs pa de dag gi 'di lta ste/stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa dang /rma bya chen mo dang /bsil ba'i tshal chen mo dang /so sor 'brang ba chen mo dang /gsang sngags kyi rjes
37b7(rgyud): 'brang ba chen mo lags te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag zas rnam pa lnga langasu spongs la chongs shig ces kyang bka' stsal le/zas bsod snyoms la brten te rab tu
38a1(rgyud): rlung zhiganas ga ma/bcom ldam dus rnas ma pa lda ma smos pa da nas nga /( sman sa smra dang sgo na ma
38a2(rgyud): d+ha/btsun pa bcom ldan 'dis de la bdag cig gis ji ltar nan twen du da byi/de nad ces gsol pa dang /com ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag le 'di snyed ces byi na'i
38a3(rgyud): //dge slong dag de nyid kyi phyir du stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'chang des/ma med pa'i nor bu'i gzung sa zhes bya ba de bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir tshangs shig
38a4(rgyud): des bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe zas lo mi mthun pa med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa'i bso snyoms la yang zas rnam pa lnga dang mo 'dres pa
38a5(rgyud): 'du shes bskyed par bya/'dus byas thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes
38a6(rgyud): skyed par bya'i//thos rnam po lnga po dag ga la yod/zas rnam po lnga bcu yin/su'i pa zis rnam pa lnga ba Te/sems can da mig sa ma do//de la zas rnam pa
38a7(rgyud): 'dros na chos brgyad dang /bcu bzhi dpa/bco lngal bdag srung ba byis te/rgyal rigs kyi bu mo legs par bkrus pa/shin tu rgyun pa/nyin zhag gcig zas
38b1(rgyud): bslab pa'i gnas lnga bzung ba/skud pa dmar po bzhi skyil du 'khal du bcug la/gsang 'dzin pas rig sngags dran par byas te/skud pa de 'dud pa la 'dud la/skud pa de mtshon gsar/
38b2(rgyud): pache de bsregs la rin po che'i snod dam/lcags kyi snod kyang rung chus khong ste/me tog gis khyab par khrom la/bdug pa sna tshogs kyis gdugs te/snod kyi nang nas sdud pa/
38b3(rgyud): de slar 'byi ti ma byung bar du rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//de yang lag pa la bcings la tshig 'di skad brjod do//bram ze rnams kyis bsdus nas//shUHsi ge skyob pa lnga/
38b4(rgyud): dpal spos kyis ni dug can gyi//bsod snyoms dag ni phul ba dang //de las de ni blangs na su//ston pas dug ni bas de nas gsol//bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis//zas ni bdud
38b5(rgyud): rtsir 'gyur bar shog/rnam par gzigs dang lha gang dang //gtsug tor can dang kun skyob dang //lag par dad pa sel ba la//stobs chen lha gang dad pa dang //gser dang
38b6(rgyud): dpal ldan 'od srung dang //shAkya yi ni seng ge la//rab dang lha yi dbang po dang //tshangs dbang sum cu'i dbang phyug dang //'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang //nor bu bzang
38b7(rgyud): dang dbang phyug tsho//srin mo nag mo chen mo dang //de bzhin gdol ma gtu mo dag/me tog dang ni 'dug pa dang /bdag gi sbyin sreg 'od bzhes shig/de dag tshim zhing
39a1(rgyud): dam+b+ha nas/dag kha nas byu bar 'dzad//rnas dag dang sa yang//bdag lam man na ldan la// dung smos pa yang//
39a2(rgyud): kun ni bza' bar bgyi//saM bon dag gis tshigs kun la//sa yis bcud ni bzhugs pa yi//kha zas 'dres pa thams cad kyang //bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gal/
39a3(rgyud): ji ltar skud pa bcad bsregs pa//daM lta bu yang slar 'byor pa//de ltar zlas rnams 'dres pa yang //ma 'dres par yang bdag la mdzod//s+yAd ya the da na//kha kha~M me//khA ga
39a4(rgyud): kha kho kha me/shi me shi me/shi hu ma/shi me/shi me swasti swa sti swasti ma me shAn+ti/sha rA gI/kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang //ji ltar mi 'dres zan bzhin tu//gang gis rdzi
39a5(rgyud): ltar skud bsregs pa//de 'dra'i bden pa mdzad du gsol//s+yAd ya the dan/kA l-i ke/ka la la/ba la ni/ka ru te/a la ye/aMg+ni/sed krA ma Ni swA tAM/sangs rgyas
39a6(rgyud): rnam par gzigs dang gtsug tor can//bde gshegs kun slob sangs rgyas log par dang sel dang //gser thub 'od srung shAkya thub pa gi ru tam//bsnyengs pa mi mngal ba
39a7(rgyud): skya bu mchi bar bgyi//mi mchog bdun po de dag gi ni sku rnams la//me tog dag dang spos rnams kyis ni mchod par bgyi//lus dang ngag dang rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis
39b1(rgyud): ni//de dag rnams lnga skyabasu nye bar mtsho bar bgyi//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshe dang ldan pa de dag la//lha gang mngon par rab tu drang ba yod pa yi//lha mgu zhing yid ni rab tu dgar gyur nas//
39b2(rgyud): rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bdag la srung du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rengs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
39b3(rgyud): bstod do///'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzog so///rgya gar skad du/ma hA ma yU nI bi d+ya rA dzI/bod
39b4(rgyud): skad du/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos dang /rang sang+yas
39b5(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//chos la phyag 'tshalo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
39b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa bdun po dag la phyag 'tshalo//'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo//byams po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyog 'tshalo//phyir mi 'ong
39b7(rgyud): ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo//rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo//'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag
40a1(rgyud): 'tshal//yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo//de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la sbyar bar bya'o//bdag la rig sngags
40a2(rgyud): de grub par gyur cig/'byung po'i tshogs gang su dag sa la rgyu ba rnams dang /na mkha' la rgyu ba rnams dang /chu la rgyu bo rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /lha me
40a3(rgyud): yin rnams dang /rlung lha rnams dang /nam mkha' lding rnams dang /dri za rnams dang /mi 'ami ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /srin po rnams
40a4(rgyud): dang /yi dgas rnams dang /sha za rnams dang /'byung po rnams dang /grul bum rnams dang /srul po rnams dang /lus srul po rnams dang /skem byed rnams dang /skyosmyo ba
40a5(rgyud): rnams dang /gring gnon rnams dang /brjed byed rnams dang /gnon po rnams bdag la nyon cig/'byung po'i tshogs gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang /zasu mngal za ba rnam sa
40a6(rgyud): dang /za su khrag 'thungs pa rnams dang /ze suM zhag za ba rnams dang /za su sha za ba rnams dang /za su tshil za ba rnams dang /brisu rkang za ba rnams dang /za su btsas pa zab
40a7(rgyud): rnams dang /srog 'phrog pa rnams dang /zasu gtor ma za ba rnams dang /zasu phreng ba za ba rnams dang /zasu dri za ba rnams dang /zasu bdug pa za ba rnams dang /zasu
40b1(rgyud): me tog zla ba rnams dang /zasu 'bras bu za ba rnams dang /zasu lo tog za ba rnams dang /zasu sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang /zasu rnag za ba rnams dang /zasu phyes za ba rnams dang /
40b2(rgyud): zasu gcin 'thung ba rnams dang /zasu lhag ma za ba rnams dang /zasu mchil ma za ba rnams dang /zesu ngar snabs za ba rnams dang /zasu snabs za ba rnams dang /zasu mi gtsang
40b3(rgyud): bza ba rnams dang /zas skyugs bza ba rnams dang /zasu stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang /sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /sdang ba'i sems dang ldan
40b4(rgyud): pa rnams dang /drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams bdag la nyon cig/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o//
40b5(rgyud): spos dang me tog dang /bdug pa dang /gte ma yang sbyini//bdag la sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /dge shul gyi sems
40b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa rnams dang /gzhan gyi srog 'drog pa rnams dang /zasu mdang sde za ba'i gdon thams cad ni dengs shig/zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /byams pa'i sems
40b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa rnams dang /dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni bdag la nyon cig/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa rnams bdag mnyan cig/
41a1(rgyud): 'di ste/nag mo bzhin myur ma/grul dumam/dung nanam/me tog ka mA la sbya bu'i m+b+higan+dan ma/snga mdog byu l+h+wam+b+ha/dang ldanam/ la dam sa ma/
41a2(rgyud): 'phyang ma/rab tu 'phyang mo/dus kyi zhugs po can ma/bum lto ma/gshin rje'i pho nya mo/gshinad+hA'i sring mo/'byung po za ba mo/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri dang /gtor
41a3(rgyud): ma 'di dbul gyis bzhos shig/'jigs pa dang /gnod pa thams cad bdag la srung du gsol/lo brgya mtsho bar gyur cig/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/bdag la rig
41a4(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gtsog na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan 'od na/rnam du rgyal byed kyi tshal mngon med rgyas sbyin
41a5(rgyud): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu thor bu lung 'tsho la bab pa/
41a6(rgyud): rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi sro gang bya ba'i phyir shing bshags
41a7(rgyud): pa dang /shing rul ba'i ser gzhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang /lus sbrid nas sa la 'gyel te/lbu bar skyug cing mig
41b1(rgyud): kyang gyur nas nyal ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri nad kyis btab ste sdug bsngal zhing nad tshabs tshe nas sa la 'gyel te/lbu bar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing
41b2(rgyud): 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ge la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyog 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug//
41b3(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas//
41b4(rgyud): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'di na dge slong so re zhes bgyi ba gzhon nu thor bu/lang 'tsho la bab pa/rab tu byung nas ring po ma legs pa/bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lag pa/chos 'dul
41b5(rgyud): bo 'dir mchis nas ring por ma legs pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi sro gang bgyi ba'i slad du shing bshags pa dang /shing rul pa'i sor ga zhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas
41b6(rgyud): rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang /lus sbrid nas dog sa la 'gyel te/lbu bar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing mchis na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis
41b7(rgyud): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i
42a1(rgyud): bkas khyod song la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis lha'i gdon dang /klu'i gdon dang /lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /rlung lha'i gdan dang /na mkha' lda
42a2(rgyud): gi gdon dang /dri za'i gdon dang /mi bam ci'i gdon dang /lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang /gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /srin po'i gdon dang /yi dgas kyi gdon dang /sha za'i
42a3(rgyud): gdon dang /'byung po'i gdon dang /grul bum gyi gdon dang /srul po'i gdon dang /lus rgyal po'i gdon dang /skem byed kyi gdon dang /smyo byed kyi gdon dang /grib gnon gyi
42a4(rgyud): gdon dang /brjod byed kyi gdon dang /gnon po'i gdon dang /skar ma'i gdon dang /gshed byed dang /sgyur ba'i las dang /byad dang /go yengs byed dang /ro langs dang /
42a5(rgyud): sems sgyur ba dang /rbod gtong dang /bza' nyes dang /skyug nyes dang /gnod sgrib dang /gnod bltas dang /bri nyes dang /sgom nyes dang /smad pa dang /rims nyin
42a6(rgyud): gcig blo dang /nyin gnyis pa dang /nyin gsum pa dang /nyin bzhi pa dang /nyan bdun pa dang /zla ba phyed pa dang /zla ba gcig pa dang /nyin mo pa dang /yud tsam pa dang /
42a7(rgyud): rtag pa'i rims dang /rims drag po dang /'byung po'i rims dang /mi'i rims dang /mi ma yin pa'i rims dang /rlung las gyur pa dang /mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /bad
42b1(rgyud): kan las gyur pa dang /'dus pa las gyur pa dang /rims thams cad las dge slong sa ri la srung ba bgyis shig/smra ba dang /yang su bskyab pa dang /yang su bzung ba dang /yongadu
42b2(rgyud): bskyab pa dang /zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dang /chad pa spang ba dang /mtshon cha spang ba dang /dug gzhil ba dang /dug bsad pa dang /mtshams bcang po dang /sa bci
42b3(rgyud): bgyis shig/klad pan pa med par gyis shig/gzhogs phyed na ba dang /yi ga 'chus pa dang /mig nad dang /sna nad dang /kha nad dang /mgul nad dang /snying nad dang /
42b4(rgyud): lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /rna ba na ba dang /so na ba dang /snying na ba dang /rtsib logs na ba dang /rgyab na ba dang /lto na ba dang /mkhur ba na ba dang /chu saso nu ba dang /skye gnas
42b5(rgyud): na ba dang /rab tu skye gnas na ba dang /rked pa na ba dang /brlan pa drang /byin pa na ba dang /lag pa nu ba dang /rkang pa na ba dang /yan lag na ba med par gyis shig/mtshan mo
42b6(rgyud): dge dang nyin mo dag/nyi ma'i gung gi dge ba dang //nyin mtshan kun gyi dge ba dag/sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol//tad+ya thA/i Di bi Di/ki Di/hi DI/mri Di ni Di/me rje do
42b7(rgyud): dum+b+ha/A DaM/g+ha De/durba De/hi ri ni/ba gu De/bA na su/pi shA tsi ni/baR+Sha Ni/A ro ha ne/a ha ta nr-i/ai le/ma ye te le/ti li ti li/ti me ti maM/du me du me/du
43a1(rgyud): / rmyar+m+ma/sa so/ sa k+ka tA krU k+Sha ka smra du na /na na /
43a2(rgyud): smra/ / na /rjes duH/byAd+yAH/mad+hiH/br-iSh+ma rmA// m+b+ha /
43a3(rgyud): to li t+ti li/ti l-i ti li/mi li mi lau/mi li mi li/mi li mi l-i/mi la mi laM/mi li mi li/ti la rti li/ti li ti li/to li te 'o/ li ti li/ti li ti li/tsu lu tsuM su/
43a4(rgyud): nas/tsus ts+tsha sa?/tsas nA sa/ts+tshas rgyas/sarbasaH/mucu sruH/muhra muH/mAdzum d+ha prany+tsa/swa swa su ma?/mu sa rdu la/mu lus /su ma smra/
43a5(rgyud): k+Shi dz+wa ladz+nyA ni/ ni/\u0f7fb+h+rU~M/g+hu ni/ nAM/rbani/tA ba nA~MtA pa ne/pA~MHnidz+nyAHna/r-iSh+Thada~MH/kA bAn/m-i ni/mai/makA ra rak+Sha pA sh+tsa
43b1(rgyud): na /ga pa dag N+Dinani ldan po dang //nacanas yang na mo// da rgyun dukhyod ldan
43b2(rgyud): ni ni ba 'dzi//de'i'i tshul rgya /na popa'i 'du la byas/byung ba'i tshul /
44a1(rgyud): dang //de bzhin me yi bla ma dang //klu chen tshal ba'i tshul can dang //btang zung zhes ni grags pa dang //klu gang sa la rgyu dag dang //de bzhin chu la gnas rnams
44a2(rgyud): dang //gang dag bar snang rgyu ba dang //glang dag lhun por gnas pa dang //mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa//de dag la ni nga rta ka byams//rkang pa med la da byams te//rkang
44a3(rgyud): gnyis pa la'ang nga byams so//rkang bzhi pa la'ang da byamaso//rkang mangs la yang nga byamaso//rkang med nga la gnod ma byed//rkang gnyis nga la gnod ma byed//rkang bzhi nga la
44a4(rgyud): gnod ma byed//rkang mangs nga la gnod ma byed//gang dag chu la gnas pa yi//klu rnams kun la da byamaso//gang suM sa la gnas pa yi//'byung po kun la dA byamaso//
44a5(rgyud): sems can gang dag gnas par bcas//sems can kun la nga byam so//sems can kun dang srog tshogs kun//'byung po dag ni thams cad kyang //thams cad bde ba 'ba'/
44a6(rgyud): zhig shog/thams cad nad myed gyur cig/kun gyis bzang po mthong bar shog/gang dag sdog par ma gyur cig/byams pa'i sems la gnas na su//dug ni rab tu bsad
44a7(rgyud): par bya//srung bar yongasu gzung ba dang //de bzhin yongasu bskyang bar bya//sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshal lo//grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshalo//
44b1(rgyud): zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la phyag 'tshalo//rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshalo//bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams gsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshalo//de
44b2(rgyud): dag gis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/'jigs pa thams cad dang /gnod pa thams cad dang /nad mgo bo dang /'khrug pa thams cad dang /rims thams cad dang /nad thang
44b3(rgyud): dang /gdon thams cad dang /dug thams cad las srung ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs
44b4(rgyud): ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/de nang par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bde lag su 'gyur ba byas te nyin mo dge bar
44b5(rgyud): gnas/nub dkar bde leg su 'gyur bar byas te mtshan mo dge bar gnas//sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//chos la phyag 'tsha lo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo//rig sngags
44b6(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo r+m+ma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo//tad+yathA/hu hu hu hu/hu hu/nA gA lA la lo/duM bI lA lA le/nA ga le la l-i/hu ya hU ya/bI dze bi dzi/thu su tru su/gu lu gu lu
44b7(rgyud): tsutsi rje ni tsi dzo ni/a gu lu/e lA me lA/e lA me lA/ti li me lA/i li mit+te/i li ti li mit+taM/duM be su duM be/ta su to su/go lA be lA/tsaM pa lA/bi ma lU/
45a1(rgyud): k+Shur/TIr/na mo bud+d+hA nan/6ba~M kaM sa/rgad d+hak+Sha/na mo an+tat+pan/dz+wA lat+tA la/ltas phyogs bcu kun tu char dos shig/sangs rgyas rnams la phyag
45a2(rgyud): 'tsha lo swA hA/de dus gzhan zhig na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba dang /bde legasu 'gyur ba ma byas par 'dod pa rnams la zhen cing chags te rgyags pas myos/
45a3(rgyud): nas rab tu rmongs shing brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur nas rab tu zhen te/nags kyi rma bya gzhon nu mang po dang lhan cig tu kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra bar/skyed mos tshol nas snyeng
45a4(rgyud): mos tshal du/ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngosu rgyu zhing song song ba las do bag med par gyur nas/ri'o ser ga zhig tu chud nas/de der rigs ngan gzhon nu yun ring du phyir rgol ba dgror
45a5(rgyud): gyur pa/'tshe bar gyur pa/glags lte ba rnams kyis rma bya stis bzung ste/de mi mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang dran pa slar rnyed nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'di nyid yid la
45a6(rgyud): byaso//sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo//chos la phyag 'tshal lo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo//rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshalo//tad+ya thA/hu hu hu tu/nu
45a7(rgyud): ga laM le le/duM ba le l-i le/nA ga le le le/hu ya hu ya/bi dza bi dza/thu su tru su/gu lu gu lu/hu tse dzi no/tse dzi na/a ga ru/e lA me lA/au li me lA/ti li maM
45b1(rgyud): krA/i la mit+te/a pat+ta ma lon+ti/duM ba/su dube/to su to su/go ny+dza/beSh+Ta/tsa bA lka/ngi ma lA/sh+tsA raM/n+dAr/rin+ti ri/nA mo bud+d+hAn+dan/tsa paM ki si/gr-i do t+tik+Sha/nA ma~M saH
45b2(rgyud): tAn/hA la dz+wa la/lhas phyogs kun tu char yob shig/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo swA hA/de nas de sdug bsngal de las thar te dge ba dang /bde bar bdag gi yul du phyin nas
45b3(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bzla so//sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//chos la phyag 'tshalo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo//rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshalo//
45b4(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal me rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tsha lo//tad+ya thA/sI d+he/su sid+d+he/mo tse ni/mo k+Sha Ni/muk+te/bi muk+te/a ma laM/bi ma le/nirma li/aN+Da rau/paN+Da re/
45b5(rgyud): mAM ga le/maM ga l+ye/hi ra N+ye/hi ra N+ye gar+b+he rat+ne/rat+na gats+tsha b+ha dre/su b+ha dr-i/sa man+ta b+ha dre/shI b+ha dre/sarba ar+tha sA dA ni/pa ra mAn+ma sA d+ha ni/sar+b+ba a nan+ma pra shra ma ni/sar+b+ba
45b6(rgyud): maM ga la sA d+ha ni/sarba a maM ga la sA d+ha ni/yi sho bi ti/ma na si/mA na si/maM d+hA ma na si/ad b+hu de/a t+ya b+hu de/muk+te/bi muk+te/mo tsa ni/mok+Sha naM/yaM
45b7(rgyud): ts+tsha te/a ra dza/bi ra dze/bi ma laM/a mr-i ta/a ma re/a ma ri NaM/brar+b+r-i/brah+ma swa re/pUr+NaM/pUr+Na ma nor thi/a mr-i ta san+d+hi ba ni/shI b+ha dr-i/tsan+na/
46a1(rgyud): n+tu/prad+h+we/b+hUm+b+ha smyan /b+h+r-i tad+d+ha yo/mu g+ha/prad+yA b+hU Sha/pra dz+raSh+Ta/sar+b+ba/ar+b+ba tIHtiswAt+ma/sangs rgyas la phyug 'tsha'o//bdag 'ang+yas
46a2(rgyud): pa dang srung ba mdzad du gsol/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/tad+ya thA/hU~M tsi gu tsi g+hu tsi/mu tsi swA hA/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rma bya
46a3(rgyud): rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rma bya'i rgyal po
46a4(rgyud): gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur to//kun dga' bo reg sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po'i stong po 'di yang bzlas par bya'o//tad+ya thA/oM li mit+te/ti li mit+te/ti li mi li
46a5(rgyud): mit+te/ti li mi li maudz+nyo/ti li mi lim l-i ti li/ti pa mit+te/thi mi mi li mit+ti/be li mi li mit+to/bi li mau li mi li tI la mi li/suM dr-i b+h+ra/duM dz+r-i/su ba tsa/
46a6(rgyud): ri ki siM yA/b+hin na maM Di/na mo bud+d+hA nan/tsi li ki si/prAn+ta mU le/i tit+kA re/lo hi ta mU le/duM bA/su duM bA/kur+b+baM/ku nan+di/ti lA kuny+dza/nen+di/lcang lo can
46a7(rgyud): du ltas zla ba dbu'am/zla ba bcu tsho 'ob shig/rmil ma mo/ka li m+bi ma/ka la mo'i/kau tum+bA raM/du dri be/suM du bau Da~M/dab me/sairU n+dza/bus ban+d+ha/
46b1(rgyud): bus ra/busA ra/d+hA na bstA ra ka/nad lA ma/kha la ma g+ho ShA/ra kha la/I ti sAd rje mI/du be/su d+ya be/aT+Ta/nIn+te/pranan+tu/anaHn+te/A na mA le/lhas kun
46b2(rgyud): nas chu sang pa'i char phobs shig/nA rA ya nI/pA R+ShA ya ni/hA ri tI lA/kun+d+ha li/i li mi sti/ki la ti li misti 'gro lding ba'i ga/sang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag grub par gyur/
46b3(rgyud): tsag swAhA/kun dga' bo 'di ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying po yino//kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bye chen po 'di grong ni 'dug pa na yang yid la bya'o//
46b4(rgyud): dgon pa ni 'dug gam/lam na 'dug gam/lam gol ba na 'dug gam/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na 'dug gam/chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/me'i nang na 'dug gam/
46b5(rgyud): chu'i nang na 'dug gam/dgra'i nang ni 'dug gam/phyir rgol ba dang /dgra bo'i nang na 'dug gam/'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/rtsod pa'i nang na 'dug gam/sbrul gyis zan
46b6(rgyud): ta ma dug 'thungs sam/'jigs pa thams cad 'dug pa na yang yid la bya'o//rlung las gyur pa dang /mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /bad kun las gyur pa dang /'dus pa las
46b7(rgyud): gyur pa dang /nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi las nad gang yang rung bas btab par gyur pa dang /phongs par gyur pa ni yang shin tu yid la bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo
47a1(rgyud): bsad pa'i rig pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyuraro//chad pas bcad pa'i rig pa ni bzhu bcog gi so//bzhu bcog pa'i rig pa ni spyo bas so//skyo ba'i rig pa ni dam bcas bsod ma bcas bI
47a2(rgyud): rig pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so//spu zing zhes bya ba'i rig pa ni de bzhin du thar par 'gyur te/de'i nad tha~Md kyang ldog par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo rig sngags dang /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di yang yid la
47a3(rgyud): bya'o//tad+ya thA/tsi li mi li/ki li mi li/keng+gu mU le/bu sa ban+de/bu sa ri ni/ke ban+d+he/ki baT+Te ka/mU laM/i ti sha ba re/dri ge/duM go pr-i yi ka re/A ban+thi/pa ri ban+d+he/lhas kun tu chu sar pa'i tshwa phobs shig/na
47a4(rgyud): mo b+ha ga ba ti/iT+TA ya/in+d+ra go mi si k+Sha yaM/A sha ne/bA sha ne/pA pa ni ku'u le/ka pi li min+d+hi/i li nit+te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalo//gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams
47a5(rgyud): grub par gyur cig swA hA/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung bar gyis shig/yongasu bsgrub pa dang /yongasu bzung ba dang /
47a6(rgyud): yongasu bskyang ba dang /zhi ba dang /bde legasu 'gyur ba dang /chad pa spang ba dang /mtshon cha spong ba dang /dug gzhil ba dang /dug bsad pa dang /mtsham so bcad pa dang /sa bcing ba gyis
47a7(rgyud): shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/srung ba byas shing sba ba dang /yongasu bskyab pa dang /yong
47b1(rgyud): /bzung ba dang /yongasu babyung ba dang /zhi ba dang /bde lag su 'gyur ba dang /chad pa sbyang ba dang /mtshon cha spang ba dang /dug gzhil ba dang /dug bsadadra pa dang /mtshams bcad pa dang /sa bcad pa byas
47b2(rgyud): pa la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir 'ong ba lha 'am/lha mo 'am/lce'i bu pho 'am/lha'i bu mo 'am/lha rgan po 'am/lha rgan mo 'am/lha'i 'khor po 'am//lha'i 'khor mo 'am/klu 'am/klu mo 'am/klu'i bu po
47b3(rgyud): 'am klu'i bu mo 'am/klu rgan po 'am/kruM rgan mo 'am/klu 'khor po 'am//klu'i 'khor mo 'am/lha ma yin nam/lha ma yin mo 'am/lha ma yin gyi bu po 'am/ mI yin gyi bu mo 'am/lha
47b4(rgyud): yin rgan po 'am/lha ma yin rgan ma 'am/lha ma yin gyi 'khor po 'am/lha ma yin gyi 'khor mo 'am/rlung lha 'am/rlung lha mo 'am/rlung lha'i bu pho 'am/rlung lha'i bu mo 'am/rlung lha rgan po'i
47b5(rgyud): rlung lha rgan mo 'am/rlung lha'i 'khor po 'am/rlung lha'i 'khor mo 'am/na mkha' lding ngam/na mkha' lding mo 'am/na mkha' lding gi bu pho 'am/na mkha' lding gi bu mo 'am/na mkha' ldin
47b6(rgyud): chen po 'am/na mkha' lding rgan mo 'am/na mkha' lding gi 'khor lo 'am/na mkha' lding gi 'khor mo 'am/dri za'am/dri za mi 'am/dri rnaM bu pho 'am/dri za'i bu mo 'am/dri za rgan po 'am/dri za rgan mo 'am/dri zi 'khor po'i/
47b7(rgyud): dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/mi 'am ci'am/mi 'am ci mo 'am/mi 'am ci'i bu pi 'am/mi 'am ci'i bu mo 'am/mi 'am ci'i rgan po 'am/mi 'am ci rgan mo 'am/mi 'am ci'i khor
48a1(rgyud): pa 'am/mo 'am ci'i 'khor mo'am/'i phye chen pa'am/lto 'phye chen mo 'am/stau 'phye chen po'i bu po 'am/stau phyo chen po'i bu mo 'am/s+ho phye chen po rgan
48a2(rgyud): po 'am/lto 'phye chen po rgan mo 'am/lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor po 'am/lto 'phyo chen po'i 'khor mo 'am/gnod sbyin nam/gnod sbyin mo 'am/gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/
48a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/gnod sbyin rgan po 'am/gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po 'am/gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'amo/srin mo 'am/srin po'i bu pho 'am/
48a4(rgyud): srin po'i bu mo 'am/srin po rgan po'am/srin po rgan mo 'am/srin po'i 'khor pho 'am/srin po'i 'khor mo 'amo/yi dgas sam/yi dgas mo 'am/yi dgas kyi
48a5(rgyud): bu po 'am/yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/yi dgas rgan po 'am/yi dges rgan mo 'am/yi dgas kyi 'khor pho 'am/yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/sha za 'am/sha za mo
48a6(rgyud): 'am/sha za'i bu pho 'am/sha za'i bu mo 'am/sha za rgan po dang /sha za rgan mo 'am/sha za'i 'khor po 'am/sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/'byung po 'am/'byung po ma
48a7(rgyud): 'am/'byung ba'i bu po'am/'byung po'i bu ma 'am/'byung po rgan po'am/'byung po rgan mo 'am/'byung ba'i 'khor lo'am/'byung po'i 'khor mo'am/gru
48b1(rgyud): bum mam/grul bum mo 'am/brul bum gyi bu pho 'am/grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/grul dum rgan po 'am/grul bum rgan mo 'am/grul bum gyi 'khor po 'am/grul bum
48b2(rgyud): gyi 'khor mo 'am/srul po 'am/srul po mo 'am/srul po'i bu pho 'am/srul po'i bu mo 'am/srul po rgan po 'am/srul po rgan mo 'am/srul po'i 'khor pho 'am/
48b3(rgyud): srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/lus srul po 'am/lus srul po mo 'am/lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/lus srul po rgan po 'am/lus srul po rgan mo
48b4(rgyud): 'am/lus srul po'i 'khor pa 'am/lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/skem byed dam/skem byed mo 'am/skem byed kyi bu phye 'am/skem byed kyi bu mo 'am/skyem byed rgan pa
48b5(rgyud): 'am/skem byed rgan mo 'am/skem byed kyi 'khor pho 'am/skem byed kyi 'khor mo 'am/smyo byed dam/smyo byed mo 'am/smyo byed kyi bu po 'am/smyo byed kyi bu mo 'am/smyo byed
48b6(rgyud): rgan po 'am/smyo byed rgan mo 'am/smyo byed kyi 'khor pho 'am/smyo byed kyi 'khor mo 'am/grib gnon na ma/grib gno na mo 'am/grib gnon gyi bu pho 'am/grib gnon
48b7(rgyud): gyi bu mo 'am/grob gnon rgan po 'am/grib gnon rgan mo 'am/grib gnon gyi 'khor po 'am/grib gnon gyi 'khor mo 'am/brjed byed dam/brjed byed mi 'am/
49a1(rgyud): rdza bye kyi zla po 'am/dz+red byed kyi mo 'am/smye byed rgyun pa 'am/spyod byed nan mo'am/d+hU pyod kyi 'khor po 'am/ts+tsha d+yo rgyal
49a2(rgyud): /gnon po'am/gnon po ma'am/gnon pa'i bu pho 'am/gnan po'i bu mo 'am/gnan pa rgan po'am/gnon po rgan mo'am/gnon pa'i 'khor po'am/gnon/
49a3(rgyud): po'i 'khor mi 'am/'ga' yang 'ong bar ngas lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/lha dang mi dang
49a4(rgyud): ma smin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong //glegs tshol bar 'dod cing grags ldan yang glags mi //lha ni lta 'du po'i gan sum yin/glen m+bu 'dra ba'i gan du ma yin
49a5(rgyud): mA yin ni lha ma yin 'dra ba'i'o glan sum yin/rlung lta ni rlung lha 'du ba'i gnasum yin/namakha' lding na namakha' 'du ba'i gan sum yin/dri zin drin 'dra ba'i gan du
49a6(rgyud): yin/mau maci ni mi'i mu ci 'du ba'i gnasum yin/spyi'i chen dza ni lha byo chen po 'du ba'i gan sem yin/gnod sbyin ni gnod sbyin 'du ba'i gan sum yin/sprin po na
49a7(rgyud): srin pa 'du ba'i gan sum yin/yi dgas ni yi dgas 'du bo'i gan sum yin/sha za ni sha za 'du ba'i gan su ma yin/'byung po ni 'byung po 'du ba'i gan sum yin
49b1(rgyud): rgyal bus nI sbrul bum 'dra ba'i gnasum yin/rgyal phyi ni rgyal po 'du ba'i gan su ma yin/lus srul po ni lus rgyal po 'ju ba gan sum yin/skom byed ni sgom byed 'dra ba'i gan sum yin
49b2(rgyud): N+Di 'du TIg ma yin/nan dag sa 'i / ni 'i rdzun
49b3(rgyud): byed do//gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rmya bya chen mo las 'gal bar byed na de'i mgo a rdza kI'i dog pa bzhin du chal pa bdun du 'gaso//gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang
49b4(rgyud): yid la bya'o//tad+ya thA/i lo mi li/ki li mi li/kin dug d+he/muk+to/su muk+te/A Den+sa DaM su NA De/lcing lo can du mchog tu lhas chur phobs shig/A rA bAR+ShA/
49b5(rgyud): gro do hi kAM/I li mI li/b+hid+d+hi li kA/u du kA/u du kA/kA du Tu kA/I li miM l-i/ti li mi laM/sa man+ta tA/krI tA/hu lu hu lu/hi li hi li/mi li mi laM/pau
49b6(rgyud): bi liM/ki li ki li/shI ShiN/baR+Sha t+yaM/tsu lu tsu lu/tsa li tsa la/tsi li tsi li/tsu lu ru lu/tsiTi tsiTi/shi khI shau kr-i/shrI khaM shi khe/i Ta Ti bI Ti Ta kha kha kha kha/dzu
49b7(rgyud): dz+ya hu dzu tu d+hu Tudz+ra hu dzu hu dzu tu dz+ra tu dz+ra hu dz+ra tu/ha ra ha ra/ha ra Ne/dzam+b+he/pra dzam+b+he/sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/dzam+b+he mi/stam+b+he mi/bdag la srung ba gyis shig/sba ba dang /
50a1(rgyud): yongasu gzung ba dang /yongasu bskyang ba dang /zhi ba dang /bde log su 'byur ba dang /chad pa spang ba dang /mtshon cha spang ba dang /dus gzhil ba dang /du
50a2(rgyud): bsad pa dang /mchil sa bcad pa dang /sa bain+de'aMs gyis shig swA t+ma/la brgya 'tsho ba gyu cig/ston brgya mthong bar sheg shig/trad+yaSh+Ta/hrI tsiN+ye mA we/
50a3(rgyud): tre mA le/ha le ha le mA le/pha le pha la mA le/khu ru khu ru khu ru/ba ru Ne bI re/d+ha ya/su ru su ru/mu ru mu ru/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis
50a4(rgyud): snang ba dang /rab tu sdang ba rnams kyi dug dang /'tshe ba'i dug dang /rtsa ba'i dug dang /kha zas kyi dug bco mo//su ru su ru kaM/tsa ra tsa ro ke/bar ba ra ke/tsa rak+Sha/
50a5(rgyud): pi ri hi ri/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun po dag gis gzi brjid kyi dug bcom//dug nges par bco mo//dug med//e
50a6(rgyud): lA me lA/i li me lA/ti li mAM/ti ha dug hA/ti li mA/tim+ba/du mA/d+hi mA/d+hu mA/d+hu su kuM b+hA kum+b+he su kum+b+ha suM bA/tu bA/sa ma tuM bA/A De nA De/ti la/
50a7(rgyud): kuny+dza NA De/daR+Sha tu de pa/i li ki si/nga sen thams cad la byams pas lhas zla ba dgu 'am/zla ba btsur kun tu char phobs shig/pu Sha De sha ba ri Ni/bu d+ha
50b1(rgyud): ri ni/kai b+dza/kaM badz+ro/ka mA la/i tI sha ba ro/tum+be tum+b+ha pri yo ka raM/A ban+d+he/pa ri ban+de/lhas kun nas chu sar ba'i char phobs shig/na mo b+ha ga da ta/an+d+ra gro mi/si kA
50b2(rgyud): ya/oMm+b+hi ya/god hi kA m+b+ha/b+hI bA rik+Sha ya/a le ta /kun+d+ha la/en+d+ra nan+d+he/ku nad+hi/A sa naM/pA shA ne/b+hA pa ni kA le/pra ti k+Sha laM/sangs rgyas gaster thub su
50b3(rgyud): duM ba ra'i drung //'od srung n+ya gr-i d+ha yi drung na gnas//shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du//phyin nas byang chub thob gyur go'u tam//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag lnga/
50b4(rgyud): mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag/lha rnams de dag ying dga' mgo byur nas//rtag tu dge dang zhi bar 'gyur bar byas//tad+ya thA/i li mi li/kI li mo le/ki ma
50b5(rgyud): lI/ki li bo li/u du rA/su du ru/su du mo de/bu sa ra bu sa ra/hu~M hu ka rany+dze/ka rany+dzi/mU le/i ti/sa na tAM/kun+da li/kun tA li/nA rA ya Ni/pA rA ya ni/pa sh+ye
50b6(rgyud): ni/pa sh+ya pa sh+ya ni/kau pa li bA sa/'gro lding ba'i sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/kun dga' bo sman chen po 'di dag ni mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /lha rnams
50b7(rgyud): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa ste/kun dga' bo gang sman chen po 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa la
51a1(rgyud): 'ga' zhig rab tu ltung ba'i sems kyis rgyun/de'i ma aHkA dag pa bzhin du shAn+da du 'gyus+ho//d+hASh+Ta/mUl+lA/oM mU la/
51a2(rgyud): man+ta mU le na Da nA De/a DaM/nA De/ku she nA De/it+taM/mit+te/b+ha ru/a ra Da ka/mA ra Da kA/i li ku shi/go do hika/u d+h+ye d+humaM/b+hin na/mau DI/sang+yas
51a3(rgyud): rnams la phyag 'tshalo//rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/lam du zhugs rnams 'di legs shog/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde
51a4(rgyud): legs shog/mtshan mo bde legs nyon bde legs//nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing //khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog/de dag sdig par mi gyur cig/nyi ma
51a5(rgyud): thams cad dge ba yin//rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin//sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che//dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med//bden pa'i tshig 'dis
51a6(rgyud): kun tu bde legasu gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/sba ba dang /yongasu bskyab
51a7(rgyud): pa dang /yong su bzung ba dang /yongasu bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang /bde legasu gyur po dang /chod pa spang ba dang /mtshon cha spang ba dang /dug gzhil ba dang /
51b1(rgyud): dug bsad pa dang /mtshams bcad pa dang /sa bcing ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston ngargya mthong bar shog shog/kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gang dag rgya mtsho
51b2(rgyud): la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /gang dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /gang dag ri'i rgyal po gzhan rnams dang /'brog rnams dang /'brog chen po rnams dang /klung rnams
51b3(rgyud): dang /klung chen po rnams dang /sman ljongs rnams dang /'bab chu rnams dang /lteng ko rnams dang /lu ma rnams dang /ri'i phug rnams dang /dur khrod rnams dang /dur
51b4(rgyud): khrod chen po rnams dang /bzhi mdo rnams dang /grong rnams dang /grong khyer rnams dang /lha rnams dang /bskyed mos tshal rnams dang /nags rnams dang /nags tshil
51b5(rgyud): rnams dang /lam rnams dang /lam gol ba dag na gnas pa dang /kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gang dag lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags
51b6(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston po rgya mthong bar shog shig/tad+ya thA/ha ri hA ri Ni/tsA li tsa li Ni/b+h+ra mA ni/b+h+ra ma
51b7(rgyud): ni/mo ha Ni/stam+b+ha ni/dzam+b+ha ni/sra yai b+hu be swA hA/kun dga' bo shar phyogs na/dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba dri za thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dri za 'bum
52a1(rgyud): phrag du ma yod pa dri za rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/gang shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/tsha bo dang byangs/
52a2(rgyud): spun dang bcas/blon po dang bcas/sde dpon dang bcos/mngag pa dang bcas/pho nya dang bcas/g.yog dang bcaso/'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma
52a3(rgyud): bye chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/sra ba dang /yongasu bskyab pa dang /yongasu bzung ba dang /yongasu bskyang ba dang /zhi ba dang /bde legasu 'gyur ba dang /chad
52a4(rgyud): po spang ba dang /mtshon cha spang ba dang /dug gzhil ba dang /dug bosad pa dang /mtshoms bcad pa dang /sa bo cing ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston pargya
52a5(rgyud): mthong bar shagashig/tad+ya thA/d+h+ye d+hA ru/dz+haiM d+hu ru/d+hu dz+ha ru/dz+ha ru/d+hu ru/d+hu ru me swA hA/kun dga' bo lho phyogs na grul dum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba/
52a6(rgyud): grul bum gyi bdag pa 'khor grul bu mi brgya stong du ma yod pa/grul bum rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/gang lho phyogs srung zhing yongasu skyong boraro byed pa de yod

54a7(rgyud): pa/rgya mtsho'i mtha' yi bar gyi sar//lan gsum bar du 'gro byed pa//stobs che zhing ni gzong rje che//dpag tshad bcur ni rnam par gnon//gnod sbyin mkha'
54b1(rgyud): rgyas pa na//sna tshogs sprad pa gnas sgo nas//gnod sbyin pa ku rgyal khyab na//sde bo che lnga stobs po che//gnod spyan nag pa nye nag po//ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas//thub pa chen

67b3(rgyud): po rnams dang /rlung las gyur pa rnams dang /mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang /bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang /'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang /mi'i rims rnams dang

68a5(rgyud): gnyis pa rnams bde logasu gyur cig/rkang bzhi pa rnams de legs gyur cig/rkang ma sa pa rnams bde legasu gyur cig/srid pa gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams

74b3(rgyud): d+ha ma d+ha ma na/sa ra~M sa ra Na/ki Ti ki Ti/kuT+Ti ku TaM/mu Ti mun+do/mri Te mi Ti/pe Ti prin+d+hi/sA ra sA raM/mA ra me ra/hA ra ha ra/ta rA ta rA/tI re ti ri/D+ha D+hA D+hAD+hA TA/d+hA d+hA dA dA d+hA/
74b4(rgyud): b+h+rUM b+hA b+h+rUM b+hA b+hA/ha la ha lA ha pa hA la ha la/sid+d+hi/sid+d+hi/sid+d+hi/sid+d+hi/sid+d+hi/swA swa ste sa ste/sa ste/s+yaste/rbod gtong dang /gshin rje pho nya dang /mtshan mi nag mi dang /dus
74b5(rgyud): kyi zhags pa dang /'chi bdag gi chad pa dang /tshangs pa'i chad pa dang /dbang po'i chad pa dang /drang srong gi chad pa dang /lha'i chad pa dang /klu'i chad pa dang /lha ma yin gyi ched
74b6(rgyud): pa dang /rlung lha'i chad pa dang /nam mkha' lding gi chud pa dang /dri za'i chad pa dang /mi 'am ci'i chad pa dang /lto 'phye chen po'i chad pa dang /gnod sbyin gyi chad pa dang /srin po'i
74b7(rgyud): chang pa dang /yi dgas kyi chad pa dang /sha za'i chad pa dang /'byung po'i chad pa dang /grul bum gyi chad pa dang /srul po'i chad pa dang /lus srul po'i chad pa dang /
75a1(rgyud): skam byung kyi chud pa dang /sgra byed kyi chad pa dang /gr-i gnon gyi chang pa dang /brjod byed kyi chad pa dang /gnon po'i chad pa dang /ro langs kyi chad pa dang /
75a2(rgyud): rgyal po'i chad pa dang /tshem rkun gyi chad pa dang /mo'i chad pa dang /chu'i chad pa dang /chad pa thams cad las bdag la srung ba gyis shig/la brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig
75a3(rgyud): ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/kun dga' bo khyod kyis klung gi rgyal po rnams kyi ming zungs shig/'di lta ste/klung gi rgyal po gang ga dang /klung gi rgyal po sin d+hu dang /klung
75a4(rgyud): gi rgyal po bag shu dang /klung gi rgyal po se tA dang /klung gi rgyal po mda' 'byung dang /klung gi rgyal po khyim ldan dang /klung gi rgyal po gshin rje sel dang /klung gi rgya
75a5(rgyud): gya gyur dang /klung gi rgyal po rgyas 'bab dang /klung gi rgyal po zhags dral dang /klung gi rgyal po zhi ba 'dzin dang /klung gi rgyal pos ldan dang /klung gyi rgyal ba zla ba'i
75a6(rgyud): dang /klung gi rgyal po dbyangs can dang /klung gi rgyal po ru sbal can dang kau klung gi rgyal po chu dran can dang /klung gi rgyal po chu mchog can dang /klung gi rgyal po zangs 'das
75a7(rgyud): dang /klung gi rgyal po srang rtsi can dang /klung gi rgyal po spa ldan dang /klung gi rgyal po bu ram shing dang /klung gi rgyal po ba glang ldan dang /klung gi rgyal po 'phags pa can
75b1(rgyud): dang /byung blo rtul pa spyad drung /klung gi rgyal ba mang 'ang nga /byung gi rgyal pa kun gyis bshes dang /klung gi rgyal pa 'am ma dang /klung ga rgyal bal tog pa dang /rlung na
75b2(rgyud): rgyal po rdzi na dang /gi rgyal po dngoso brdung dang /klung gi rgyal po rab bzang dang /klung gi rgyal po dka'i thub sbyin dang /klung gi rgyal po dri dra ba dang /klung gi rgyal ba sbyin na
75b3(rgyud): dang /klung gi rgyal po klung chen dang /klung gi rgyal po gser sngon dang /klung gi rgyal po ba 'di sbyin mchag dang /klung gi rgyal po gsang srung dang /klung gi rgyal ba 'khong nan
75b4(rgyud): dang /de dag dang /gzhan yang gang dag sa da dkyil 'khor 'dir/'bab de'i chu klung de dag thams cad la gang dag rgyun tu gnas pa dang /gzugs the dad po/gzugs mi phrag
75b5(rgyud): pa/gzugs mang ba/gzugs mtha' yas pa/'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs rkyen dang /gzugs sna tshogs pa'i lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /
75b6(rgyud): rlung lha rnams dang /namakha'i lding rnams dang /dri rna rnams dang /sgra 'phye chen po rnams dang /mi 'im ci rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams da /srin pa rnams dang /yaM dag
75b7(rgyud): rnams dang /sha za rnams dang /'byung po rnams dang /grul bum rnams dang /srul pa rnams dang /lus srul ba rnams dang /skem bying rnams dang /sgro byed rnams dang /
76a1(rgyud): grib gnon rnams dang /rjed byad rnams dang /gnan po rnams dang /zasu mad ya za ba rnams dang /sum la zad rnams dang /su khrag 'thung ba
76a2(rgyud): rnams dang /zasu sha za ba rnams dang /zasu tshil zab rnams dang /zasu zhag ze ba rnams dang /zasu rkang zab rnams dang /zasu btsas pa za ba rnams dang /zasu srog phrag pa
76a3(rgyud): rnams dang /zasu gtor ma za ba rnams dang /zasu phreng ba za ba rnams dang /zasu 'bras bu za ba rnams dang /zasu me tog za ba rnams dang /zasu dri za ba rnams dang /zasu bdug
76a4(rgyud): pa za ba rnams dang /za su lo tog za ba rnams dang /zasu sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang /zasu rnag 'thung ba rnams dang /zasu phyis za ba rnams dang /za su gcin 'thung ba rnams
76a5(rgyud): dang /zasu mchil ma za ba rnams dang /zasu ngar snabs zo ba rnams dang /zasu snabs za ba rnams dang /zasu lhag ma za bo rnams dang /zasu skyug pa za ba rnams dang /
76a6(rgyud): zasu mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang /zasu ster khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyis rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/lo brgya
76a7(rgyud): par gyur cig/ston brgya mthong ba shig cig/kun dga' bo khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po rnams kyis ming zungs shig/'di lta ste/ro'i rgyal po ri rab dang /ri'i rgyal po gang+ga
76b1(rgyud): nga /rgyal po sgyus na dang / tshum paH la dang /rgyal pos nga nan dang /la pa ga zugs dang/rgyal pa nga 'ardzu d+ha

76b3(rgyud): d+hI bzhi tu rgyas dang / ba na chen 'argyu gnas /la ba stan dutshun du/d+d+he na du hU~M/ rgyal ba thags nas dang /
76b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'byung gnas dang /ri'i rgyal po 'gras pa ldan dang /ro'i rgyal po lha mon 'bab dang //ri rgyal pa klog 'od dang /rI'i rgyal po khyab gnas dang /dri rgyal po zla 'od dang /
76b5(rgyud): ci'i rgyal ze brag bzang dang /ri'i rgyal pa nyi ma mdzes dang /ri'i rgyal ba thogs pa dang /ro'i rgyal po 'jigs byed dang /'i rgyal po zlo ba'i bye ga dang /ri N+Dol po sna chags
76b6(rgyud): dang /ri'i rgyal bam la yang /nga'i rgyal po gser gyi rtse mo dang /ron rgyal po kun nas 'gro dang /ri'i rgyal po lag bzang dang /ro rmyil ba nir du ldan dang /'i rgyal po rdzi
76b7(rgyud): dang /mi rgyal ba tshangs pa'i chu dang/'i rgyal ba gi byed srung dang / rgyal po 'i lang rna dang /ro'i rgyal ba sna tshogs phred dang /ring rgyal po ma'i rdzogs sna tshogs dang /
77a1(rgyud): rgyal po ral gri dang /ro'i rgyal po gdung ba dang /ri'i rgyal po mig bsku dang /ri'i rgyal po muny+dza dang /ri'i rgyal po ri dgas can dang /'i rgyal po 'joms byed/
77a2(rgyud): dang /ro'i rgyal po ti so dang /ri'i rgyal po mi mdzod dang /ro'i rgyal po nye dkar dang /ri'i rgyal po tsan don phreng dang /ri'i rgyal po stobs 'dzin dang /ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang /
77a3(rgyud): ri'i rgyal po dus bri byed dang /ro'i rgyal po skem ri dang /ri'i rgyal po ba lang srung dang /ri'i rgyal po bya rog sgra gcan dang /ri'i rgyal po bstan pa 'dzin dang /sa'i dkyil 'khor
77a4(rgyud): 'di ni de'i rgyal po 'di dge dang /gzhan dag kyang yod pa de la lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang /rlung lha rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /dri za rnams
77a5(rgyud): dang /mi'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /srin po rnams dang /yi dgas rnam pa dang /sha za rnams dang /'byung po rnams dang /grub
77a6(rgyud): bum rnams dang /srul po rnams dang /lus srul po rnams da /skem byed rnams dang /spyi byed rnams dang /grib banan rnams dang /brjed byad rnams dang /gnon pa rnam
77a7(rgyud): dang /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas po gang dag rgyun tu gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya cheni mo 'dis bdag la srung
77b1(rgyud): hAb+h+ya sargya tsho bar bya cig/ston brgya mthong bang shog cig/ldog pa thams ca sa cig/dge ba rnams snang bar gyur cig/mi dge bsol cag/don rnams la
77b2(rgyud): bar gyis shig/gdod pa rnams sil cig/mtshan ma bde legs nyin bde legs//nyi n+da'i gung gi byede legs dang //nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag/sangs rgyas kun gyis
77b3(rgyud): bdag la stsol swA hA/kun dga' bo khyod kyis rgyu skar gang dag na mkhara' la rgyu zhing snang bar byed pa rnams kyi ming zungs shig/'di lta ste/skyon drug dang ni sngar ma dang /mgo dang lag
77b4(rgyud): dang rnams dang //rgyal ni bkra shis phun sum chags//de bzhin skrag ste bdun pa yin//de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni shar gyi sgon gnas pa dge ste/gang dag shar phyogs
77b5(rgyud): srung zhing yongasu skyong bar byed pa dag go//de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung bgyis shig/lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ston brgya mthong bar shog
77b6(rgyud): cig/mchun mo mdza' 'joms pa dang //de bzhin gre dang dbo gnyis dang //mo bzhi nag pa sa rI dang /a ga ste ni bdun pa yin//de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni lho phyogs
77b7(rgyud): kyi sgron gnas pa dag ste//gang dag lha phyags srung zhing yongasu skyong bar byed pa dag go//de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo thongs bdag la srung ba gyis shig/
78a1(rgyud): lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston du rgya mthong bar shog cig/lha mtshams gzir rdzid chen mo dang //de bzhin snron dang snrums dang ni//chu skad dang ni chu snang dang //
78a2(rgyud): de ltar byi zhin gro zhin no//de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni nub phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/de dag gis
78a3(rgyud): kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma byo chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/min gru dang ni mon gre dang //de bzhin
78a4(rgyud): khrum stod khrum smad dang //namo gru dang ni tha skar dang //bra nye de ni bdun pa yin//de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni byang gi phyogs na gnas pa dag ste/gang dag byang phyogs
78a5(rgyud): srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa da //de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma byaM che na mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/lo b.rar+ya 'che bar gyur cig/ston po rgya mtho
78a6(rgyud): byar shog cig/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnams kyi khyod na rgyu zhing 'grib pa dang /'phel ba dang /bde ba dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /lo legs pa dang
78a7(rgyud): po nyes pa dag kyang rten pa rnams kyi ming zungs shig/'di lta ste/gza' nyi ma dang /gza' zla ba dang /gza' phur bu dang /gza' ba sangs dang /gza' spen pa dang /
78b1(rgyud): gza' mig dmar dang /gza' lhag pa dang /gza' lha min dbang po sgra gcan dang /gza' du ba 'jug ring so//rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun//skar ma
78b2(rgyud): gza' bdun de bzhin te//rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che//nyi me dang ni zla ba dang //sum cu rtsa bdun tshang ba dag/'chare ba dang ni nub pa dang //'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu//
78b3(rgyud): 'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed//gzi che rdzu 'phrul chen po dag/rab tu dang pa'i sems kyi su//rig sngags rje su yi rang byas//de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
78b4(rgyud): mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/sngon brgya mthong bar shog cig/kun dga' bo drang srong rnying pa brtul zhugs grub pa/rig sngogs grub pa/
78b5(rgyud): grags pa 'bar ba dang /klung dang ri la gnas pa/dmod pa'i mtshon cha can/dka' thub drag pa/rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/na mkha'
78b6(rgyud): la 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyis khyod kyis zungs shig/'di lta ste/drang srong chen po rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang /drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang /drang srong chen
78b7(rgyud): po g.yon phyog pa lha zhes bya ba dang /drang srong chen po lha skabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang /drang srong chen po 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang /drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba

79a7(rgyud): da pa smrazhes bya ba dang /dra sring can pa grags pa zhes bya ba dang /pra l+ra chen po grags nas bya ba dang /drang srong chen pa blam zhes bya /

79b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba sa khyo pa rgya kyinas bya nga/ na pos na gyi tshun kyi
80a1(rgyud): po ri bo zhes bya ba dang /drang srong chen po srin bu 'dzin ces bya ba ste/kun dga' bo drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni rig byed rnams byed pa/gsang sngags rnams
80a2(rgyud): byed pa/dmod par 'dod pa/gul zhugs grub pa/gan po rjed che bgrub pa/pha rol gnon pa grub pa dag ste/de dag gis kyang rig stegs kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dres

80a4(rgyud): mi 'aM 'i mi/si ri si ri/k+Sh+mA/DAr+tha//glus ni/mU tha ni/dr-inan+ti/da ni/g+hA ta ni/byananI/bA nI ta pA ni/tA ba ni/ha na ni/
80a5(rgyud): da ha ni/dA ha ni/da ha da ta/daha/da la d+hA la ni/paT ni mo ha ni/stam+b+ha ni/dzim+b+ha ni sra ya~M d+hA swA tAM/kun dga' bo khyod kyis skye dgu'i bdag po chen po gang dag lha rnams
80a6(rgyud): dang /kyu rnams dang /rlung lha rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nami khar lding rnams dkyi/dri za rnams dang /mi 'amatsho rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams /
80a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnams dang /srin po rnams dang /mi dang /dung 'phro'i skye gnas pa dang /sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi dge ba dang /mi dge ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i khyad
80b1(rgyud): bar grangs med pa dag gis 'jig rten gsum du rnam par bzhag pa rnamapa kyi ming zungs shig/'di lta ste/skye dbu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang /skye dgu'i bdag po bu can dang /skye dgu
80b2(rgyud): bdag po za tshul gyi bu dang /skye dgu'i bdag po mi dang /skye dgu'i bdag po gas ba dang /skye dbu'i bdagra po mdun du bdar dang /skye dgu'i bdag po spu zing sel dang /skye dgu'i
80b3(rgyud): bdag po go byad dang /skye dgu'i badrag po mdzes gnas dang /skye dgu'i bdag po zin po dang /skye dgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang /skye dgu'i bdage bo rab dga' dang /skye dgu'i
80b4(rgyud): bdag po mdzes pa dang /skyo dbu'i bdag po gus yod/kun doga'i bo skye dgu'i bdag pa bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni gnas pa dang /'gro ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs srung ba
80b5(rgyud): gnas pa dgo/de dag gis kyong rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdog la srung ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/thogs pa mod
80b6(rgyud): pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag gis kyang srung ba gyis shig/tad+ya thA/ti ri hi rI/khI ri khi ri/mi ri mi rI/phu ri phu ri/su ri su ri/hi li hi li/mi le mi li/si ri si rI/
80b7(rgyud): DAm+bu rU/DA m+bu/gras ni/tha ma ni/dam ni/da ha naM/b+hU ta ni pra tsa ni/pA tsa ni/ta \u0f7f ni/tA ba ni/tan ni/dI tAn/da ta ta da ta/da la da la/dA la ni/b+hA
81a1(rgyud): tAnra yau ta ma/s+yAm+mAn/dzan+na nIHSh+Ta/kun dga' bo khyod kyis dug chen po rnams kyi ming zungs shig/tad+ya thA/at+mar+tha/pat+kaR+Sha/krU R+ShaH/kle y+YAH/b+hU ti ga m+b+ha/
81a2(rgyud): b+hU ta ba ti/be duM pa ti/si ri pa t+taM/te dzA pa titi dzaM gra pa ti/ya sho pa tI/ya she gr-i pa tI/Ar+N+NanA/taR+sha /ti ratar+YaH/dan+ta/dza ha dzA d+hA/dzo wAM/mr-i b+hU/tAs+t+ya/
81a3(rgyud): b+h+r-il+la/gu la hU~M/ru tsanA/dr-i duR+sha/a dzakatsak+Sha/kam+b+he/sha tid+han+tu/bi pu le/ne ku la~M/ki r-i paM/ti ra g+h+r-i Sh+Ta/a mA ma te dzAmA ma t+ti/mad+h+ya mat+ti/ka ma maM/
81a4(rgyud): ma lI/kAN+DA mAM/ahrIt+sA d+hi/rIti/baT+Te/d+b+hati/bang sa nA d+h+we/mAr+d+ha ga re/tu li m+me/du lam+me/su lam+b+hi s+san+ta/kun dga' bo 'di dag ni dug tshon pa dag /
81a5(rgyud): de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis pidag la srung ba gyis shig/sba ba dang /yongasu bskyab pa dang /yangasu bzung ba dang /yongasu bskyang ba dang /zhi ba dang /
81a6(rgyud): bde legasu 'gyur ba dang /chad pa spang ba dang /mtshan cha spang ba dang /dug gzhil ba dang /dug bsrang po dang /mtshams bcad pa dang /sa btsong ba gyis shig/la
81a7(rgyud): brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston pargya mthong bar shog cig/kun dga' bo khyod kyis shing ljon pa rnams kyi ming zungs shig/'di lta ste shing ljon pa chen po gser zhes bya ba dang /
81b1(rgyud): shing ljon pa chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang /shing ljon pa chen po khyab gnas zhes bya ba dang /shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas zhes bya ba dang /shing ljon pa chen po pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba
81b2(rgyud): dang /shing ljon pa chen po ser po zhes bya ba dang /shing ljon pa chen po mya ngan 'tshong zhes bya ba dang /shing ldan po chen po rna ldan byed ces bya ba dang /shing ljon pa chen po rgyas byed ces
81b3(rgyud): bya ba dang /shing ljon pa chen po bil po zhes bya ba dang //shing ljon po chen po tsu ta zhes bya ba dang /shing ljon pa chen po de dag dang gzhan dag la lha gang dag gnas pa de dag gis
81b4(rgyud): kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdog la srung ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bor gyur cig/ston brgya mthong bar shig tsAg/kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
81b5(rgyud): mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyis gsungs shing rje su yi rang ba ste/'di lta ste/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs shing
81b6(rgyud): NAM su yi rang ba'o//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs shing rje su yi rang ba'o//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs
81b7(rgyud): shing rje su yi rang ba'o//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs shing rje su yi rang ba'o//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsor thub kyis
82a1(rgyud): gsungs sa so ra//yang dag par rdzogs pa 'os su rgyas 'ad spyang / sgrogs na sprul rang bal//yang dag par rdzogs du sa d+hA
82a2(rgyud): shUSh+Tathab b+ha /d+mad m+b+hi spyan rje yi rang //kun dug gag sngags kyi rmyil mchi byin mo 'di ni byang chub sems da byams pas kyang ba shad ci rnas
82a3(rgyud): bya'o//mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyung smras shing rje suM yi rang ba'o//sgyu rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang smras shing rjesu ya~M rang ba'o//rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag
82a4(rgyud): gis kyung smras shing rjesu yi rang ba ste/dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang skyes shing rje sa yi rang ba'o//grul rdum gyi bdage po 'phags skyes pos kyang smras shing rjesu mi
82a5(rgyud): ra ba//'i rgyal po mig mi zang smos kyang sgras shing su yi rang ba'o//kinod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bris byung smras shing d+he mu yi da ma//de ze'i rdzi bu ni ny-i
82a6(rgyud): ma brgyad dag dang //grul bum gyi sted dben nyi shu nI brgyud dashi dang / nyi shu d+d+he brgyad dag dang /gan sbyin gyi sde pan nyi shu rtswa brgyud dag dang /gnod
82a7(rgyud): snga dpon chen pa ldan dang /'dri gam bu lnga ba phyi'i 'a'i rkyen gyis kyang spros shing rje su ya~M rang ngor//kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mim bya chen ma 'dzin lce'i ga nod
82b1(rgyud): na na rdzun du du rdzun du na na du /susmra na rgyun klang /

82b3(rgyud): rnas dang / maN+Dag ni pa rnams dang / rna rnams dang /zlas Sh+T+ra zla rnams dang /zlas sbyin+ti ga rnam pa dang /sa rnyeg la ga
82b4(rgyud): rjes phyis zab rnams dang /zemu gcin 'thung ba rnams dang /zasum kyil maze ba rnams dang / bas zla ba rnams dang /zas srungs ni pa rnams dang /
83a1(rgyud): lcug ma za ba rnams dang /zasu skyugs pa za ba rnams dang /zlasu mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang /zasu stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams kyis 'gal bar bya
83a2(rgyud): ma yino//gshed byed dang /sgyur ba'i las dang /byad dang g.yeng byed dang /ro langs dang /sems sbyar dang /rbod gtong dang /bza' nyes dang /skyug nyes dang /gonod
83a3(rgyud): sgrib dang /gnod bltas dang /bri nyes dang /sgo mnyes dang /smod pa rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma rje yin pa'o//rims nyin gcig pa dang /!na gnyis pa dang /
83a4(rgyud): nyin gsum pa dang /nyin bzhi pa dang /nyin bdun pa dang /zla ba phyed pa dang /zla ba gcig po dang /nyi ma phyed pa dang /nyin mo pa dang /yud tsam pa dang /rtag par
83a5(rgyud): rims dang /rims dag po dang /'byung po'i rims dang /rlung las gyur pa dang /mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /bad kan las gyur pa dang /'das pa las gyur pas 'gal
83a6(rgyud): par bya ba ma yin pa'o//rims thams cad kyis 'gral bar bya ba ma yin pa'o//klad pa ni ba dang /gzhogs phyed na ba dang /yi ga mchus pa dang /mig nad dang /kha nad
83a7(rgyud): dang /mgul nad dang /snying nad dang /lkog ma'i lha gor no ba dang /rna ba na ba dang /so na ba dang /snying na ba dang /rtsib logs na ba dang /rgyab na ba dang /lto na pa
83b1(rgyud): dang /'khur ba na ba dang /chu son pa dang /skye gnas na ba dang /rab tu skyed pa na pa dang /brlan pa dang /byin pa na ba dang /lag pan pa dang /rkang pa na pa dang /yan lag na ba dang //
83b2(rgyud): nying lag na ba las 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no//shu ba dang g.ya' ba dang /'brum bu phra mo dang /mdze dang /'bras dang /phol mig dang /g.yan pa dang /me dpal dang /lhog
83b3(rgyud): pa rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o//nad thams cad dang dug thams cad dang /sdang ba thams cad dang /'jigs pa thams cad dang /yams kyi nad thams cad dang /
83b4(rgyud): 'thab pa dang rtsod pa thams cad dang /gnod pa dang nad mgo ba dang /'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o//kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
83b5(rgyud): mo 'di las 'galji bar byas na lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo che la pa bdun du 'gems par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos thams
83b6(rgyud): cad kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i snang ba ma rungs par 'gyuraro//sems mi rungs par 'gyuraro//'phags pa'i gang zag rnams bslus par 'gyur//rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang
83b7(rgyud): ga shu ra zhes bya ba la thug gi bar gyi gsang sngags kyis de la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyuraro//lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/
84a1(rgyud): rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur//tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar rlog par 'gyuraro//kun dga' bo su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal
84a2(rgyud): mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba byas sam/skud pa btags na de bsad pa'i rig pa ni chad pas glal bar 'gyur ro//chad pas bcad pa'i rig pa ni gzhu gcog paso//gzhu gcog
84a3(rgyud): pa'i rig pa ni spyobs so//spyo ba'i rig pa ni dam bca' bas so//dam bca' ba'i rig pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so//spu zing zhes bya ba'i rig pa ni de bzhin du thar bar 'gyur
84a4(rgyud): ro//de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro//de'i
84a5(rgyud): lus la dug gis mi tshugs te/mtshon gyis kyang ma yino//bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyuraro//bde ba dang /gnod pa med pa dang /'jigs pa med
84a6(rgyud): par 'gyur//phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang /dgra choms par 'gyuraro//smras pa med par 'gyuraro//'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur//bde bar yun ring du 'tsho
84a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma rtogs//kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni ha cang char che ba 'am/char dkon pa'i
84b1(rgyud): tshe daklag par bya'o//des ni klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/chur chen po ni gcod par byed/char dkon pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i ngang u pa ji srid par char 'bebs par
84b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//kun dga' bo rig sdigs kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang /dgra thams cad zhi bar 'gyur na sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba 'am/
84b3(rgyud): bde legasu 'gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/kun dga' bo khyod kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zungs shig/'khor bzhi pa dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge
84b4(rgyud): bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/'di kun chub par gyis shig/
84b5(rgyud): chongs shig/lhogs shing //tad+ya thA/yA ba tI/d+hA ba ti/d+hA ra ki/hu lu/tu lu me s+yAt+sA/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//de dog 'jig rten dug gsum ste//sangs
84b6(rgyud): rgyas pacom ldan dug med pa//sangs rgyas bden pas dug btso mo//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste//bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa/
84b7(rgyud): chos kyi bden pas dug bco mo//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste//bcom ldan dge 'dun dug med pa//dge 'dun bden pas dug

86a2(rgyud): smin po dang /mri dang mi ma yin pa gang dag la bair der 'dres te khong pa de dag zims cad ya rAswA te/com ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyed de// smrag
86a3(rgyud): kyi rgyal mi rma bya chen mo'i gzungs stog so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+da bo d+hi dang /dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang /shAkya pA b+hU dang /zhwa chen hUM latsA pa ban d+hi ya/
86a4(rgyud): shos sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la thob pa//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya mA d+ha pra ti sa rA bi r+d+har+t+ti dz+nyA/
86a5(rgyud): skad du/'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo sa sngar 'brang ba chen mo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis bris lte ba dus
86a6(rgyud): ga cig na/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i zom na/khung po brtsegs po rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnos/rdo rje chen po'i dpab bsam gyi shing ljon pas
86a7(rgyud): legs par rgyan pa/rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che dang /pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byis pa/sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/
86b1(rgyud): sa nan pa las smra/ nga ba stor / sa skyo nu b+h+yo rlog spyong sa sa pa/rlu da pa nga/ma rnan
86b2(rgyud): rnam da kyi rgyud gyis ba gas kyi rkyen gyis brgyas po/chos tham mi 'jug ni na pa'i phyi da nyid kyis sa pad+mo'i byung ni byang chubs
86b3(rgyud): dab 'bye ga khrag khro 'bum phrag brgyad rtsi rna bani thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa/me chen pa
86b4(rgyud): /rdo rje chen po'i rnam par zer pa dang /ting 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du myur rnam par 'phrul ba dang /tshe rgyal chen pa kun tu sbyin pa/sems kyi skyed cig thang cig yud
86b5(rgyud): ga lnga sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /smye rgyum+b+ha 'jug pa'i tshum sbyin pa sna tshogs spyan gyi ban cing yangs pad/sgrubs pa dang /tsho phrul dang ldan pa/sa
86b6(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i smon skyes mchod pa dang /rnam par zer po'i sgo dang gsus dang /nge 'dzin dang /dbang da mngon pa shes pa dang /
86b7(rgyud): 'dres pa dang /byang chun kyi yan lag dang /lam dang sa dang po rol tu phyin pa dang /thangs la mkhas pa dang /derje pa'i dngos po dang byams pa dang/stong rje dang /dag
88a1(rgyud): 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang /namakhyad lding blo rgyal po gser mi ga nam pa' lding gi rgyal po dayog du ma can dang /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thas
88a2(rgyud): kye bu dang /nor bu bzang dang /gang ba bzang dang /lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang /'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog du ma can dang /'jig rten gyi ma
88a3(rgyud): bdun dang /srin mo chen mo bdun dang /drang srong gi mchog chen po bdun dang /bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang /gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams dang /phyogs kyi lha rnams
88a4(rgyud): dang /phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang /sa'i lha dang /dbyangs kyi sa dang /'byung po rnams dang /bgrags rnams dang /log 'dren rnams dang /yi dgas rnams dang //
88a5(rgyud): 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang /ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang /'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang /'phags skyes po dang mig mi
88a6(rgyud): bzang dang /lag na be con dang /bden bral dang /me'i lha dang /rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang /dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yob byi ba khrag khro ba 'bum phrag du ma
88a7(rgyud): 6na dang /sred med kyi bu g.yag dang bcas pa dang /byin pa po dang /phreng ba can dang /zla ba can dang /lcags can dang /tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /spun tu
88b1(rgyud): la la dang /sman 'dun gyi dbang po bsgrags log 'dod gyi dbang po g.yog du ma can dang /shi gAseM krI l+yA d+hAg+h+ra n+d+ha dang /sring mo bani ming po dang bcas pa dang /rdo rje lwa gu
88b2(rgyud): rgyud dang /rdo rje'i po nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /rdo rje'i sngo dang /lag bzang dang /gtsug gis 'dra rdo rje'i ris kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang /de las gzhan pa snyings rgyas
88b3(rgyud): dang /chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /'byung
88b4(rgyud): po dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /gribI gnon dang /smyo byed dang /brjod byed dang /skem byed dang /sgrub pa dang /sbrul 'dzin bcas po dang /gnon po ched
88b5(rgyud): med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang /lha'i bu nyi ma dang /lho'i bu zla ba dang /nub ka'i lha dang /nad par gyi lha dang /dus kyi lha thams cad dang /sa'i lha dang thabs
88b6(rgyud): gcig tu bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa na shin du yongasu mthar phyin/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
88b7(rgyud): ni shin tu yong su rdzogs/thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin tu yongasu bzung /byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa ni brnyes/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
89a1(rgyud): kyis rgyan po'i sku ni rab tu 'bar/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par smras/dbu'i gtsug na sems can thams cad
89a2(rgyud): kyis bltar mi mthong /bdud kyi las thams cad la ni mkhas/sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod po ni shes/spyan rnam pa lnga ni mdang /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
89a3(rgyud): dang ni ldan/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/grags pa
89a4(rgyud): dang /sgra dang /tshig su bcad pas ni 'phags/khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs
89a5(rgyud): med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /thabs dang /stobs dang /smon lam
89a6(rgyud): dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bya dka' ba'i spyod pa las ni phyir ma long//sku ni skyes bu chem pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan te/
89a7(rgyud): rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khro chen po rdo rje rin po che dang /mu tog dang /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra be du ma sgra 'byung po/rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje r-i ni
89b1(rgyud): che'i stegs bu du ma shin tu bstan par gnas pa/rdo rje'i rin pa che'i chu srin du ma'i kha nas byung ba'i mu tog dmar po'i byeng ba bres pa'i pang bshams pa/rin po che du ma pad+ma'i snying pa
89b2(rgyud): la chags pa/rin po che ke kau ru dang /ke ke ru chen po dang /an da rnyil chen po dang /dun las kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsho re bas snang bar byas te/kun nas mdzes pa/gdugs
89b3(rgyud): rtsa ba dang bcas pa/rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du ma rnam par rgyan pa/bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par rgyan pa/b+he'i khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas kun nas bsgrungs
89b4(rgyud): pa/dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa//rdo rje na khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/gtsor mi re ba'i rgyal ba ltar dbul ni rab tu 'bar/sa phyogs
89b5(rgyud): nI nya mi stong pas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par rgyan/zla ba nya ba lngar 'jig rten thams cad la sdug par ni snang /dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas
89b6(rgyud): chos rnams ni shin du rgyas shing chos ston te/tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang ngom 'dres pa
89b7(rgyud): yong su rdzogs pra/yongasu dag pa/yongasu byang ba/yang dag par rab tu ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas
90a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/'ad zer byi dra ba des stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to//
90a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khro bkod pa du ma'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i gnal med khang na nyan thos dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90a3(rgyud): chen po dang /dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dpe bstan dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding
90a4(rgyud): dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab
90a5(rgyud): par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal pa/sems can kun la snying brtse'i'o phyiro//nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun//rab 'jims so sor
90a6(rgyud): 'brang ba yi//gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya//'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang //sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur//sems can kun la bde ba sbyin//nad do cog las grol bar
90a7(rgyud): byed//sems can kun la snying brtse bas//lus can ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang //de dag thams cad bsrub pa'i phyir//'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs//'di yi srung
90b1(rgyud): bo byAsan+na ni//l+h+wa ma yin gyi gan su 'jug/de bzhin ljang ljo can dang ni//smin+do po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gro/'byung po klu dang shu za rnams//mi bzad 'jigs bya'i g.yul 'gyed pa pa/
90b2(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang //dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs//ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang //skem byed brjed byid smyo byed dang //mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang //
90b3(rgyud): gdon rnams rab tu brlag par 'gyur//so sor 'breng ba'i gzi brjid kyis//gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang //mi yi skye dgu rna mos 'cha ba/de dag thams cad rengs byed
90b4(rgyud): 'gyur//byad stems mi bzad gang yin dang //pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed//sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur//rtsa ba'i las las rnam par grol//dug dang dug sbyar
90b5(rgyud): mes mi tshugs//mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs me 'gyur//lce 'bab klog gis mi tshugs te//dus kyi rlung gis gnod mo 'gyur//rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis//dgra
90b6(rgyud): kun rab tu 'joms par 'gyur//de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub//rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur//gang gis rtag tu mgul ba 'am//ldog par rig pa btags na ni//de yi
90b7(rgyud): dgos pa yod do cog/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang //sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'drin dang //de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang //lha dbang rnams
91a1(rgyud): na rgyun/ gardzun na na pa na sa rgyus//gan snang ba da
91a2(rgyud): lag ni rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang //de bzhin rgyal po ba ni rnams dang //de la nyin dang na chen rnamadu//byung bar byed rje chem med//rgya sprin s+t+rai dang bcas pa dang //chas pa
91a3(rgyud): ga nid do//dga' di // rgyu zu tshogs myed dang /ma tshogs rnams thams de //de zhi dus gzhan rnams dang /
91a4(rgyud): slo d+hI hrI rnams dang //rdzu sprul rgyu po'i sgyurnams dang //dbunas so byung ba 'o//gargyus 'a che la srung bar byed//sa ir+d+ha mi bdag nyid rnams /
