91a6(rgyud): dang //de bzhin rdo rjeb nyi dang //nags pa brji zhags/ // rdo rje //'dudu thams snar byud ba dang //danan gyis rmyi
91a7(rgyud): ma//rna ba nag mo stobs chen ma//dpal yin ldan pa rnam chen dang //rnaM tshig tu kar pad+ma dra//ma tig so can nor drugatsug/sgra mdag mdzes dang khyab pam//
91b1(rgyud): m+b+han ma dang // skyon pa zlog rlung ma//myud dus //sam+b+ha sna sa byu dang //rnam tshan rnam smya//spyog 'ang na 'a
91b2(rgyud): zha yang skam med pa rnams//sems can dzi byung /ga pa ga ga sa na ma/de m+b+ha smang ba par rgyum/ba ma
91b3(rgyud): can dang ni so brgyags ma//dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can yang //de mi rjes 'gro d+hAg tu srung //sa sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di//bu mau ga pa ni ga rtag 'chang na//de ya~M thams cad
91b4(rgyud): par 'gyur//rtag par mngasan bu po tshigs//mngal rnams na yang bde bar b+h+yo//rnam ma dag kyang ba bar 'gyur//nad dang sdig pa thams cad kya //'jig par 'gyur te tsho
91b5(rgyud): med// sod rnams ldan ning sgrub dang ldan//nang dang 'bru yang rtag tu 'jam//tshig kyang gi rgyu smrangos pa dang //mtshad pa'i 'o 'gyur ste//bu med dang ni sgyus shang dru/
91b6(rgyud): gtsang ma ga zhig 'chang sras nA~M//de ni sems can thams cad dag/thar bar bya byar btsun par 'gyum//rtag tu 'ang bar 'gyur ba yin//nad cig tu rnam par spe 'o//
91b7(rgyud): skye ba mang bcas pa'i//rgyal po'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur//phun sum tshags pa rnyog tu 'bar//bsod nams phung pa rnam par 'ong la//de yi bsam pa thams cad 'grug//kyil
92a1(rgyud): kun tu zhugs pa yin//rgyal ba rnams kyi dka' bzhin du//de ni kun tu dmachog skyes//rmi mdun pa rmi mi 'gyur//sdig pa thams cad 'dod pa
92a2(rgyud): mchog/sdig pa rnams dang de bzhin du//dgra yang rab tu phyung bar byed//gza' kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir//ye shes dbang phyug chen pos gsungs//'dod pa thams
92a3(rgyud): cad sbyin par byed//de phyir rtag tu bcang bar bya//'byung po'i tshog so rnams ngal nyon//nga ni rab tu 'di brjod do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas
92a4(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la phyag //oM ba~M phul gar+b+he/bai bu la brim lte/brimal barbe/hrI
92a5(rgyud): /dzo ya gar+b+he/badz+re dz+wA la gar+b+he/ga tig tA nI/ga ga na bi sho d+ha ne/sAr+b+ba prA pa be sho d+hA ne/ya~M gun byA ti/ga ga ne/bi t+tA ri Ni ga ga rI Ni gi ri gI ri/ge ri
92a6(rgyud): gi ri Ni/ga ma~M rig mare/ga ti gA hA//pan+d+ha ri gan+d+ha rI/ga ga rI gra ga ri/gai d+ha ri/ga~M d+hA ri/gai b+hi go b+hi/ga ti ga hI/ga ma ni ga ma ni/ga ri ga ri/gu
92a7(rgyud): gu d+ha/gu ha bu ta/gu ru gu Ni/na laM gu ha naM/gu ha ni/gu ru Ni/tsu lu tsu lu/tsa le tsa le/mu tsi la mu tsu le/dza ye bi dza ye/sar+b+ba b+ha ya bi ga te/sar+b+ba sa ra~M/
92b1(rgyud): Ne/si ro si rI/b+hi ri b+ha rau/mo ri mi ri/mi ri mo ri/gi ri gi ri/b+ha r-i g+hi ri/bcom ldan 'das ma sems can 'dren ma/kun nas 'dron ma/dgra thams cad 'joms pAr mdzad
92b2(rgyud): ma/bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /gnod pa thams cad dang /nad 'gro ba thams cad dang /nad thams cad las srung du gsol srung du gsol/tsi ri tsi ri/bi ri bi ri/

92b5(rgyud): 'das ma rig pa'i lha mo chen mo/sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/bdag la thams cad du kun nas srung du gsol/srung du gsol/tu ru hu ru/mu ru mu ru/mgon ma
92b6(rgyud): mchis pa/skyabs ma mchis pa/dpung gnyen ma mchis pa/bdag la srung du gsol/srung du gsol/bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar mdzad du gsol/tsaN+Da
92b7(rgyud): tsaN+De/tsit+ti ni tser+thi ni/be ga ba ti/sar+b+ba duSh+TA ni bA ra Ni/bi dz+wa ya/b+h+r-i ha ni/hu ru su ru/mu ru mu ru/tsu ru tsu ru/tu ru tu ru/A yu bA li ni/su ra bar
93a1(rgyud): bram tha na/sgra ba k+shaH b+huH////sa man+ta sa thamak+Shit+ta/prAT+Ta thAH/swa prASh+Ta/swa pradz+nyA ba~M shud+d+he sarbAb+hA pa sh+'ud+d+hasan+na
93a2(rgyud): pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/d+hu ru d+hu ru/d+ha ra Ni/d+ha re/d+hA ra d+ha ra/su mu su mu/mu su mu su/ru ru tsA la/tsa la ye/dpal gyi sku mnga' baM/bdag la gnod par sems
93a3(rgyud): pa las bskyab tu gsol/bdag gis bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/dza ya ka ma la/k+Shi ni k+Shi ni/ba ra da/a ku she/oM pad+ma bi shu d+he/sho d+ha ya na
93a4(rgyud): d+hA ya/shrod+d+he shud+d+he/b+hA ra b+ha ra/b+hi ri b+hi ri/b+hu ru d+hu ru/mang+ga la bi shud+d+he/pa bi tra mu khi/khan+ti ni khar+tha na/kha ra kha ra/dz+wa la ti shi kha raM/sa man+ta a ba 'o/
93a5(rgyud): ki ta pra b+h+re su pra b+hi bi shud+d+he/sa man+ta pra pAM ra ti a ba b+h+r-i saM ta shud+d+he/dz+wa la d+hi la/sar+b+bA daM ba ga Na/gra ha nak+Sha tra/sa ma yA kar+N+Na ni/sa d+yA pra ta/au hI traM ta ra ta ra/
93a6(rgyud): glang po tshe tri lta sta s+sa kyis gzigs ma/bedag sgral du gsol/la hu la hu/hu lu hu lu/hu dra du du/tu ru tu ru/kaM ni ki ni/k+Shi NI k+Shi Ni/hu Ni hu Ni/sar+b+ba gra ha
93a7(rgyud): b+ha k+Shi ni/piM ga le ba~M ga la/mu tsu mu tsu/su mu su mu/su bi tsa la/ta ra ta ra/bcom ldan 'das ma glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs ma/thams cad du kun nas
93b1(rgyud): ma da du rgyun du rdzun sa jug na du sna gas/na la

93b4(rgyud): yi rab dang /sa ngan pa dang /umai shes pa dang /sdig pa mas byed rnam par skyong ba banid snron dang /sbyin pa dang /zlarnams kyad 'dzungs /

94a2(rgyud): bcan/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par rig pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs su ng+ge sa// skye rgas la/dus tshig bskyed du gsol/'jigs pa mi bzang
94a3(rgyud): pachen pa brgyad phyis bdag la gzigasu gsil/sa re sa ra/prA s+ye rI pra sa re/sar+b+ba A ba raNI bi shrI d+ha naM/sa mar+d+ha a~M kA ra mAN+Da la bi shud+d+he/shi ga~M taM/bi gra tA mA le/sad+d+h+ya ma la ngi
94a4(rgyud): sho d+ha ni/kri nI kr-i nI/sar+b+ba pA pa bi shud+d+hi/ma la big te/te dze ti dzo ba ti/badz+re badz+re bi ti swA hA/'jig rten gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa lA swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa
94a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la swA hA/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la swA hA/lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swA hA/de
94a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegaso ba thams cad kyi snying po sa byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam tshig grub pa la swA hA/dbang po dang
94a7(rgyud): ldan pa dbang pos rnam par bltas pa la swA hA/tshangs pa dang tshangs pa la gnas pa la swA hA/khyab 'jug gis phyag byas pa la swA hA/dbang phyug chen pos phyag 'tshal zhi
94b1(rgyud): mchod pa la swAhA/rdo rje 'dzin lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang /brtson 'grus kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/yul 'khor srung la swA hA/'phags skyes po la swAhA/mig ma bzang
94b2(rgyud): la swAhA/rnam thos kyi bu lA swA hA/rgyal po chen po bzhis phyag 'tshal ba lo swA hU~M/gshin rjes s+thAn+tu/gshin rjes mchod cing phyug 'tshal ba la s+t+wa~M hA/chu'i m+b+ha lA swA hA/rlung
94b3(rgyud): wA l-i swAhA/rlung lha chen po ma s+t+wa~M trAM/me lha la swA hA/klus rnam par bltas bai li swAhA/lha'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/klu'i tshogs rnams la s+t+wa~M hUM/gnod sbyin gyi rgyu
94b4(rgyud): rnams li swA hA/srin po'i tshogs rnams laM swAdz+dza/dri za'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams li swA hA/na mkha' lding gi tshogs rnams la swA hU~M/mi 'am
94b5(rgyud): ci'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams la swAhA/mi rnams le swA hA/mi ma yin pa rnams la swAhA/gdon rnams la swAhA/'byung po thams cad la swA hA/yi
94b6(rgyud): dgas la swAhA/sha zi li swAhA/brjed byed la swA hA/gnon pa la swAhA/grul bum la swA hA/oM d+hu ru d+hu ru swAhA/tu ru tu ru s+t+ritA/mu ru mu ru sAtAM/ha na ha na/sar+b+ba~M sha druM
94b7(rgyud): swAhA/da he de ha sang+ga duSh+TA nA~M swAhA/gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyis lu si dz+ha li ya~M sad+d+ha dur+dz+dza tsi tI nA~M swA hA/'ab bo li swA hA/rab tu 'ab ba la
95b1(rgyud): dedz+nyAn na ga sheg pu than seM kyi ga d+hA spya / ba hU~M ni ti d+ha
96a1(rgyud): gang gis spyod la gnas par gyur pa dang sa rdo rje darig par bya'o//de'i lus la mas mjug so//tso mngon ldan/gang ga grong khyad chen po sar skya
96a2(rgyud): gnas na/gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo sA 'tshem bdag nyid ma'i nang du 'tshangs pa dang /dwer pad+ma dag byung ste/de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra
96a3(rgyud): gcan zin bzang po mongal na gnas bzhin du rig pa 'dra yid la byas//rig pa 'di rjesu dran pa tsam gyis me de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to//de nas shAkya'i bu mas
96a4(rgyud): mtsho ma'i lus la mes ma reg//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rig pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o//bram ze chen po rgyu des na mes mi 'tshig/dug
96a5(rgyud): gis kyang srog dang 'bral bar mi nus//de ci lta zhe na/bram ze chen po gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba zhes bye ba na/tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu
96a6(rgyud): rig pa smyo bar gyur to//de'i rig pa'i stob pa des kyu'i rgyal po 'jog po bkug/bkug nas kyang bag med pa'i dbang gis mA bcings pos nges khros nas de la bzung ba dang /de tshor
96a7(rgyud): ba ma bzod pa myong nas ji ltar yang bang gi ni srog dang dril snyam du shas//de nas smra ba can mang pos kyang 'ga' tsam gyis kyang dug las gos bar ma nus//de nas grong khyer
96b1(rgyud): chen po bang bar pha rol tu 'gro bar na dgra bsnyen ma dri ma med par dag pa zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di kha ton du shA sau//de de'i gnasu
96b2(rgyud): song ste phyin pa dang /rig pa chen po 'di brjod//des de la lan cig ba do pa tsam gyis de dug med par byas shing de dran pa rnyed par byas te/sdug bsngal chen po de las yongasu thar bar
96b3(rgyud): byas na rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du ched dpon gyi bu de'i snying la gnas par byas//bram ze chen po gzhan yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/rgyal po
96b4(rgyud): tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangasu chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po bA ra na sa na sngon yongasu rgyu ba'i tshe/de'i shar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur po'i rgyal po des dpung gi
96b5(rgyud): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bkon te/grong khyer tshon po bA ra na se kun nas bskor nas gzhom par bsham so//de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de la blon po rnams kyi smras pa/
96b6(rgyud): lha pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer 'drog la thugs na thabs gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par dgyi/bka' stsal du gosol zhes byas pa dang /rgyal pos
96b7(rgyud): khyed 'char 'bri ba chung ngur gyis shig/rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba yid/ngas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o//thal ba
97a1(rgyud): na du rgyu/smra/ dang /da du ma tshun du / rdzun dun nadun pa yang ba sa rgyun ga lags sa smra
97a2(rgyud): rgyal po dus de mngon sum sa bsti//de nas rgyal pa tsha sa pa da sa kyimachen b+h+ya/gos gtsang ma rigs nas drig pa'i rgyal ma da tshig bzhin
97a3(rgyud): sU b+hisatwe/mgo'i gtsug gau s+thi'i nang du bzhi gnas rig pa'i rgyal mo tshon mi 'di ny-i kyis ga byas te//g.yul gyi nang du thugs bu dang /gnyi gu pus dpung gi tshogs yan
97a4(rgyud): loge bzhi pa thams cad dam par byas hU~M/ji srid skyabasu dong ba de srid du 'dis tshor bcad nas stobs kyis 'khor los sbyor ba'i rgyal po de gcig pu bting //bram ze chen
97a5(rgyud): po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal po chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying ba dang /phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa/mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/
97a6(rgyud): mngon sum du gyur to//snyam du brdung bar byam//de bzhid gshegs pa thams cad dngo//mdzus pa nyid du bstsu bar byo'o//bye m+bu'i tshe bye ma'i dus ni sems can che cung
97a7(rgyud): brnams dnga'i sod rnams rung brnams dang /langs spyod drung brnams sa phan par 'byung ba dzina'o//drim ni chen po gang sa ma zhig rog pa'i sems sa sang chen/
97b1(rgyud): thA shAn du rgyu chub 'gyu/ smra nga du nag shogs na du sa mas pa ga bya//da da ga shegs pa
97b2(rgyud): na ga pa / ba na na Sh+T+rI Sh+T+rI na yi ra sa skyes
97b3(rgyud): yon par dag par bya//de chen po'is drug par byug//de 'bar ba 'di 'phrog pa'i sus dang ldan par dge par bya//dmi shegs pa'i ge kun du dag par bya/
97b4(rgyud): dag thams cad rab tu 'dzums pa rig par bya'o//de sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad 'dzums par rig par byer//de sems can dmyal bu'i 'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par d+ha'o//
97b5(rgyud): de ci'i phyir na ni/sngon yongasu shes par yin te/bram ze chen pa phyogs gnan zhig na dge slong ma dang po/de bzhin gshegs de'i rigs la bslab po 'dul ba/ma byon pa
97b6(rgyud): yin pa/ga ba 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog pa/dge 'dun gyi dang phyugs don dang /tshogs rjes gyur pa de thams cad gang zag pa sbyin gyis brlangs te ze bzhig dus gzhan nogan na
97b7(rgyud): tshangs chen pos btang pa dang /sdug bsngal chen po'i tshar po byung //nyan pangs te skye sa med dpung gnyen med nas kus spro chen po byin to//bram kyi chen po de nas byed sri
98a1(rgyud): na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des spyad thos//thos nas kyang dgra slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rig pa'i rgyal ma sa sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te/dag
98a2(rgyud): slong de'i mgul du btag so//rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad ni rab tu zhi/nad thams cad las ni yongasu
98a3(rgyud): thar te/sas par gyur nas de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang /dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byaso//lus de bor ba dang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes
98a4(rgyud): de'i ro de yang dge slong dag gis sbrang bu zhig la bzha'o//rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo de yang de'i mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnaso//dge slong de mnar med pa der skyes
98a5(rgyud): ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas/sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad
98a6(rgyud): kyis tshim par gyur to//mtshams med pa'i me'i phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongasu zhi bar gyur to//de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thams cad ngo mtshar skyes nas
98a7(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshig 'di dag rgyas par brjod//sems can las las skyes pa yi//sdug bsngal mi bzad rab tu zhi//shin tu ngo mtshar 'di no lha//
98b1(rgyud): sems dmyal nyam nga rnams na 'da'//sems can lus la rtag gnas pa'o//mA ma mur de rab tu zhi//sag le rnams kyis bsheg ma mchis//spu gli'i sos yang gcad mi bgyid//
98b2(rgyud): lcags sdong sha la mu ri yang chag/lcags zangs thams cad rab tu zhi//ral gri lo ma can nags na//las skyes lo ma gnod mi 'gyur//chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod//mi
98b3(rgyud): rnams la ni chos kyi ston//rgyu 'di mi chung bdag cag la//khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs//de nas chos kyi bdag nyid can//chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des//snying rje'i bas
98b4(rgyud): pa nyam rnams kyi//'di 'dri'i tshig dri thos gyur nas//myur du 'di ni ci yin smras//'di ni ci 'dra yang smros shig/de nas mi bzad gshin rje'i mi//gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis///
98b5(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje yi//'di skad kyi ni tshig smras//mnar med rab tu nyam nga bar//sems can chen po 'di skyes lha//gang gi ming ni mnar med pa//des na de ni nyam ngar
98b6(rgyud): brjod//gang gi sems can bde bgyis pa//rnam pa sna tshogs las la gzigs//'di ni kun tu bde gyur nas//slar yang lha yi gnasu mchi//chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje kyang /
98b7(rgyud): mthing nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni//'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste//'di ni tshe rabs lnga lus che//ji ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos//ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar//so sor 'brang
99a1(rgyud): ba mgul btag sna ngas//rol lasun dnganan mdzes//de nas sems can dmyal po'i slang ba de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po ku shin rje la 'ang skad ces smras//
99a2(rgyud): g+hA dza ltar na 'di so sor 'brang ba zhes bgyi/chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa//gang gis tshig rnams so sor dran//de ni ngan 'gror 'gro me 'gyur//sA sor 'brang ba rnam pa 'i/
99a3(rgyud): shes rab can de bde 'gror 'gro//sems can dmyal po'i srung mo khyod//rab tu rgyas dang ldan par dang //der ni snang bu mthon pa la//lha rnams kyis ni bskor bsdus//de ma
99a4(rgyud): masta rgan thams cad la//byams pa'i sem su 'gyur bar gyis//de nas gau shIn+d+he'i mi de dag rnyed kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan par dang ngo //de cha der ni de dag gis//rgyu
99a5(rgyud): po'i pho brang nye ba na//sbrad bu de ya~M khor yug na//'ber ba gcig gis gang bar mthong //me ro zhig gi mgul pan//so ser 'brang ba btags pa'ang mthong //lha dang hU~M
99a6(rgyud): dang dr-in dang //nad sbyin srin bu ma 'amachos//kun nas 'khor bar bsgyur nas na//blan med pa'i mchod pa byed//de la gnod sbyin de dag gis//sa sar 'brang ba'i sring
99a7(rgyud): shes btags//de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs de/slad la gnas lha khyod kyis bka'i stsal pa bzhin zhes rgyas par brjo /
99b1(rgyud): dedoskad ces smras ma thag tu tshig de smras pa'i tha ma la sems can chen pa de sems can dmyal ba'i lus de bor nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du smras//rgyu ngas na stan so sor
99b2(rgyud): 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes bya'o//bram ze chen po des na sngon chad yongasu shes//de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdon mi za bar bzung bar bya'o//yi ger bri bar bya/bklag par
99b3(rgyud): bya'o//cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la rtags nas bcang bar bya ste/de rtag tu sdugo bsngal zhing nyi ma thag pa thams cad las yang su thar bar 'gyur/ngan 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa
99b4(rgyud): thams cad lngas rgal bar 'gyur//grog gis 'gyel bar byed me nus//glog gis ji ltar mi nus zhe na/bram ze chen po sngon yong su shes te/grang khyer chen po'i mchog shing kun
99b5(rgyud): rje ba na/tshong dpon chen po dri med dung zhes bya ba/nor mang ba/gsar shin tu 'byor pa/mdzod dang bang ba kun tu gang zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig gnas te/ded dpon zhes bya
99b6(rgyud): ra grags//de nas ded dpon chen po des gro bo che de rnyed nas/rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang /nya ming rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas/rnam par gzhag par 'dzing ba'i klu rnams
99b7(rgyud): kyang 'khrugs te/'brug sgra chen po zla'o//klag dang skar mda' yang gtong nga rdo rje'i skye 'jebs par yang bshams//de ni sa tshong bde dag sdug bsngal chen pas sems non te/
100a1(rgyud): klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang glog dang /skar mda' dang /rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang /nya mid de dag gis kyang gru bo che bzung bar mthong nas ku tso'i sgra chen po brtan
100a2(rgyud): to//de dag lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dpung gnyen du ma gyur to//de nas de dag tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan pa'i gan du song nas
100a3(rgyud): de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di skad smraso//sems can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag bskyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar bar mdzad du gsol/de nas ded dpon chen

100a5(rgyud): shig dang //khyed rnams sdug bsngal chen po yi//rgya mtsho che las ngas bsgra'o//de nas yid ni brtan gyur nas//chong pa rnams kyis tshig 'di smos//sems can chen
100a6(rgyud): po 'di ci lags//bgegs bral myur du bka' stsol cig/blo gros chen po khyod kyis mthus//bdag cag ji srid 'tsho ba'i tshe//ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs//slad na
100a7(rgyud): khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi//de das 'grin mang bdag po yis//de dag la ni tshig 'di brjod//de la so sor 'bring ba yis//rig pa chen por grags pa yod//gnod byed thaMd
100b1(rgyud): sel bar byed//stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa//des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i//'jigs pa che las ngas bsgra'o//de nas ded dpon chen pos de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal ma 'di dus
100b2(rgyud): /nas rgyal mo tshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang /rig pa'i rgyal mi chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya med de dag thams cad kyis grub ched
100b3(rgyud): me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo //de nas klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas/mchod pa bya bar bshams//nya mid de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal po sa
100b4(rgyud): sor 'brang ba che ne mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer te zhi bar gyur to//'gron po phal pa che de dag kyang chen po de dag kyang klu chen po de dag gis rin po che'i gleng chen por phyin par

100b6(rgyud): mo zhes grag so//'di ni nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btegs te bcang bar bya'o//rlung dang /grang ba dang /dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang /glog dang /lce 'bab pa thams cad
100b7(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar byed de/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'thab pa dang /rtsod pa las yongasu thar bar byed de/sbrang bu ma rdo rings dang /sha sbrad dang /bye ba dang /srog chags kyi

101a2(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par 'jigs par 'gyuraro//me tog dang 'bras bu dang lo mya dang nags tshal dang /sman dang /lo tog la sogs phra thams cod 'phel bar 'gyur te/rab tu
101a3(rgyud): zhing zhim pa dang 'jam par 'gyuraro//legs par yangasu sbyin par 'gyuraro//ha cang char che ba dang /char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams yongasu mi 'byung ngo //tshar du su 'bab cing /

101b2(rgyud): dus bzhin rab tu bcas par 'gyur/cis mngon zhe na/bram ze chen po snga ma bzhin du de nyon cig yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur to//
101b3(rgyud): ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya ba de ni rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa brkyang nas ma'i nu zhi la bzung ste/nu zho mas ngom su 'thung so//nu mo de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gser gyi

101b7(rgyud): slongs mo pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byon to//bu pho 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la mchod pa dang /sti stangs cher byas kyang bu pho ma

102a2(rgyud): sbyin to//bsnyen gnas la yang nye bar gan so//bsod nams chen po byaso//sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi zad par byin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bram ze chen po sngon byung ba yul ma

102b1(rgyud): po che snyam pas so sor 'brang ba chen mo la phul nas/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu chen po 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba kun tu gcod pade gyur cig ces smon lam de skad kyang

102b4(rgyud): ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang /snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mochog las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du tshig bzhin du bris
102b5(rgyud): la/btsun mo dam pa sbyong ba byas la/cho ga bzhin du lus la btags na khyod bu po yod par 'gyur zhes bsgo'o//de nas rgyal po des de mtshan mo zad nas/rtsis dang yi ge'i 'bru
102b6(rgyud): dang /rgyu skar dang /gzo'i rnam par 'byed pa'i bram ze rnams bsogs nas cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du rgya skar gyi rgyas po rgyal gyi nyin par btsun mo dam pa lus shin tu las

103a1(rgyud): mchod pa chen po byaso//rin po che khyad par can yang sems can rnams la sbyin pa byin no//de nas zla ba dgu lon pa dang /du pha gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa

104b3(rgyud): dang drog shul du spyod pa dang /gnod pa'o sems dang ldan pa rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags po'i tshogs thams cad
104b4(rgyud): mchod pa dam pa byed par mngon par dga' ba rnams la yongasu skyob par byed pa/theg pa chen pa 'dzin pa dang /yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /tshig tu 'don pa dang /

104b6(rgyud): kyi bar du yang su rdzogs par byed pa ste/gang du thogs pa medo//ston pa dgra las rgyal ba ji lte ba bzhin du thams cad du yang mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur//ci mngon zhe na/
104b7(rgyud): rig pa chen po bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sngon yongasu shes te/gang ge tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
105a1(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya cher rab tu gzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang /gser dang rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'dugs par
105a2(rgyud): rgyal po dang po mngon par sangs rgyas nas/byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs te/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bzhed
105a3(rgyud): pa de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das do la bdud g.yog dang btsas pa bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor ba/gzugs sna tshogs mi sdug pa/'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug
105a4(rgyud): ba/sgra mi snyan pa bdud kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis rlob pa mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis char 'bebs pa/mngon par sprul nas lhags te/phyogs
105a5(rgyud): bzhi nas bskor nas bar chad bya bar brtsams pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhil nor bu dang /gser dang /rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon
105a6(rgyud): par 'phags nga'i rgyal po yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid kyis ldan bdud brjod//rig pang rgyal mo chen mo
105a7(rgyud): so sor 'drang ba chen po 'di brjod ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas skyes bu go cha gyon po bye ba khrag khrig
105b1(rgyud): s+yAng du ma ngas zla dang /dgra sgra dang zhags pa dang /dzab+hU dang /rgyu gsum pa 'bar ba lcag na thugs pa shAd+d+ha/chag 'a spyod du gang drug bcom ldan 'das lo gnod par spyod pa
105b2(rgyud): 'dung gning sems can rnams zungs shagazungs shig/nIngs sh+log chings shig/gnod par sems pa thams cad rab tu che mas shig//gnad sems can dang /gze dang /
105b3(rgyud): bgegs dang /ldog 'dren thams cad kyi srog phye mar gyis shig ces 'dzer cing 'thon pa mthong ngo //de nas bdud de dag thams cad byams pa'i ral gris mngon par btal nas/
105b4(rgyud): la las ni bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung nas/lo las ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsten pa'i bar du'o//de la mthu che ba gzhan dag ni de na
105b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu gnas 'thon pa'i skyes bu chen po de dag mthong nas/grong khyer de nyid du sku gang bar gyur/rdzu 'phrul ye su nyams/spobs pa dang /stobs dang /

105b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzhan dag dza lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khar lo rab tu bskor te//pa re tu ba tu gshegs//drim che chen po de ste na rig pa'i rgyal ma tha mar 'brang ba chen mo
106a1(rgyud): du rmo/rdzunadus rnam sa tu blon pa 'di sa rnam mamams can sas pas su dag pa nas gdu gan sums nasu
106a2(rgyud): bsngal ba dang /'jigs skrag pa thams cad las yong du zar bar byed//bram chen pa de lta bas na rtag pa dran pa'i med da pa sti yid la rgya'o/
106a3(rgyud): zis te rtag tu lus la gdags shing bcung bar byar//ci mngon zhe na/sdom bzhin du nyon cig rgyam po tshangs pas byin gyi yul na grong khyer chen po 'phag so rgyal cu mi ni
106a4(rgyud): eltos pa byung nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gshed ma'i mi rnams la khyod kyis mi 'di med cig ces basmra'o//de nas gshed ma'o mo de dag gos rgyal pos bsgrib bzhin
106a5(rgyud): du khri ra dul zhog tu sbyin nas/ma gle shugs nas phrang skye bsang por ba shAms b+hU dang / des rig du'i rgyal ma sa sor 'byung ba chen ma 'di yid lde dran/
106a6(rgyud): mi gang dris nas lag po g.yas pa la brtags shing 'dug/sems can chen pa de'i rig pa 'di'i mthus/ram gri mi skye gcig tu gyur nas dul gta rab bzhin
106a7(rgyud): budrum ngur byu //de nas gshed ma'i mi dag gis ngas pa di rgyal ba la zhib tu bskyed//de nis rgyal ba der bahU~M 'khrugs nas/kye mo 'di dag sa na
106b1(rgyud): rgyug rgyun ma rkun mad/ rgyun slong ma byag 'a dug sa sa/dang d+hA du ga rgyu/nas da ga shad man med da gas gan
106b2(rgyud): sbyin kyi drug de de ga mdi ni ste/na pa d+ma r+m+ma ga ste /na nasus
106b3(rgyud): cher 'khrugs te spangs nas gis tid sbyir na da ga dang sa kyi 'o rjes tegaces na /shad mas mi dag byed de rlung ba //mang chur ma thag
106b4(rgyud): tsu mr-i dz+haiM/raT+Ta ste rgyu mad par da // padadag kyi ma da//rgyal bsri da rgyas pa dang /denas rgyal pa mnar du byu rnaMs smyigad+hA
106b5(rgyud): /kyi 'gro //dum na ni sod ma dran pa pa sbyin nas sa//de nis rgyal ba de med jug ste/kyim can na gas
107a1(rgyud): zhes de skad smras//mi des smras pa/rgyal ba chen po rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'chang ba las gzhan ni ci yang ma 'tshal te/lha don de'i mthu lagaso//
107a2(rgyud): rgyal pos smras pa ngo mtshar che'o//rig pa chen mo dge bar gsungs//'chi bdag nan thur rmongs byed pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs//sems can thams cad
107a3(rgyud): rab tu sgrol//nad dang sdug bsngal gyur bar //rig pa chen mo gaN+DI d+hId ni//dus min 'chil sa rabs sprul//nad chen rnamos ni bzlog byed ba//mgon po zugs
107a4(rgyud): can gyis gsungs//de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo la mchod nas mngon par bstod//mi de yang blon thabs byin te
107a5(rgyud): rang gi gnyen gyi mdun du grong khyer gyi gtso bor dbang bskur to//bram ze chen po ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'dis thams cad du yang mchod pa chen po rnyed//
107a6(rgyud): sems can gnod sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'gal bar mi bya'o//de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di yongasu shes te gang du yang thogs pa med//de lta bas na gdon
107a7(rgyud): mi za bar rtag tu lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya'o//bram ze chen po skar ma bzang po la cho ga legs par byas te/reg pa'i rgyal mo 'di bri bar bya'o//de nas dram ze
107b1(rgyud): chen po de 'di rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das la yan lagra lngas phyag 'tshal te zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di'i cho ga ji ltar bgyis te dri bar bgyi/bcom
107b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/bram ze chen po khyod nyon cig/sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir//dus ni khyod la bshad par bya//gang gis sems can bde byed cing //nyam
107b3(rgyud): nga ba yi las las 'grol//nod rnams las kyang thar bya dang //bud med sbrum mar 'gyur ba dang //sems can rnams kyi dbul ba yi//rma rnams gso bar bya phyiraro//bsten
107b4(rgyud): gnas dag la gnas gyur nas//rgyu skar rgyal du shes pa la//sangs rgyas mchod la brtson byas te//byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed//snying rjes kun tu brnon sems dang //
107b5(rgyud): byams pa dang yang ldan gyur nas//rtag tu sems can thams cad la//phan pa bskyed pa brtson par bya//cin don dang ni gur gu me dang //gla rtsir bsres pa'i chus bkrus te/
107b6(rgyud): bdug pa rnams kyis gdugs pa yi//gos gtsang rnams kyis bgo bar bya//sa dong lci ba bsres pa yi//de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bya//bum pa gde ba bzhi bzhag ste/
107b7(rgyud): pa dkyil 'khor dbusu bzhag/de la rin thang chen po yi//me tog bdug pa sbom rnams gsol//tsan dang spri ka de bzhin du//a gau ru dang du ru ka/sha kha ra dang lnga sbyor ba'i/
108a1(rgyud): du duchurgyu na du dug/rmA du na na smonapa pa da na sa/ dus da//sgyums sun gyis 'ogs
108a2(rgyud): par rgyun//sAr dang snang rgyu 'om dang //na thug 'jigs sngags pas ma bris pa de dang ba ste/patsun ma na tu /shis //phyag la sbyin rnam su ga par
108a3(rgyud): kyi sa ga sa gleng ba'i rgyung rnams/b+hU ni drug tu zheg 'dzo gyis grub ga/ nan
108a4(rgyud): babugs la//tshen m+bung kha ga sA lnga yis//'khyor bar dam du bair bya//gal te drug 'brug 'din ni//bram ze de ltar byas napa b+his//kha zas dka ba zis nas//
108a5(rgyud): bAn bIr 'dod pas bri bar bya//der dri ma ras sam gro ga 'am//tsaM yang rung ba gzhan la bri//bud med dge lta bu 'dod na//go wang gis ni legs par bri//dbus
108a6(rgyud): TIg bris nas ni//rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//de bzhin rin chen gang bar tshwa'i//lag pa ga yon na thogs par bya//pad+ma rab tu rgyas gyur cing //brgyan pa la
108a7(rgyud): da dus gyi/na tha~Md shal gsang dag dang //rin chen gyi tshogs rnams kyis d+ha ni//'dul bar shin gyi ga' 'bri//gA ba~Mni dag tur 'gro//gal te dang /
108b1(rgyud): 'dzi 'dod na//rab tu basbyinas te de m+WAr bri//bye brag tu ni smras pa rnams//phur bum gyis ni bri bar bya//de yi dgos pa 'dod pa rnams//'grub 'gyur 'ad la the tshom med//pad+d+ha
108b2(rgyud): gnyis sam yang na gsum//bzhi 'am yod ni lnga bres tI//pad+ma la ni phyag rgya'i mtshan//rnam pa sna tshogs gzugasu bri//de bzhin du ni pad+ma rnams//ze bas kun tu 'khor
108b3(rgyud): bar bri//pad+ma 'dab ma rab rgyas la//sdod bu darI gyis bcings par ni//pad+ma li ni rtse gsum pa//zu brgyad la ni der sbyangs bri//de bzhin pad+ma dgra star bcas//'dab ma
108b4(rgyud): brgyad dang ldan par bri//pad+mar bcas pa'i ral gri bri//pad+ma de ni dkar por bya//pad+ma'i steng du dung yid byi//thams cad du yad rgyas par bya//kun tu cho ga'i mtshan ma rnams/
108b5(rgyud): mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya//gang la gnod pa'i sems 'byung ba//byis pa'i gzugs rnams mi dri'o//sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis//m+b+ha yi gzugs ni bri bar bya/
108b6(rgyud): dge slong phyir ni rdo rje 'chang //gnod sbyin bsdigs par brtson par bri//rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang //nges bzhi rnamasu bri bar bya//bram ze'i phyir ni dbang ldano//rgyal
108b7(rgyud): rigs la ni dbang phyug che//dmangs rigs phyir ni rtag zhi ba//khyer 'jug legs par bri bar bya//rje'u rigs phyir ni rnam thos bu//lho yi dbang phyug dbang po bri//khye'u yi
109a1(rgyud): phyir ni skye dgu'i bdag/blo gros chen po bri bar bya//sngo sangs mdog ni gang yin pa//de yi ched du khros pa bri//dkar mo'i phyir ni grags ldan pa//phun sur/
109a2(rgyud): tshogs pa'i gzugasu bri//sbom ma'i phyir ni nor bu bzang //rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya//skem mo'i phyir ni gang ba bzang //rang 'byung nga yis bsten par bri//sbrum ma'i
109a3(rgyud): phyir ni nag po che//tshangs lha rnams kyang bri bar bya//gzhan yang ji ltar cho ga les//gong du bshad pa bzhin du bri//las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni//rab tu bsgrims te de
109a4(rgyud): bzhin bri//rtag tu mgul du brtags na ni//de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin//rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i pad pa la//yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bre//pad+ma'i snying por zhags pa dang /
109a5(rgyud): de bzhin 'khor lo'ang bri bar bya//pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje dang //pad+ma'i snying por tha bo bri//cho ga las ni 'byung ba bzhin//pad+ma'i steng du mdung thung bri//cho ga las ni brjod pa bzhon//
109a6(rgyud): nar bu thams cad rtse mo 'bar//'od zer 'phro bas rgyas pa dang //dar gyi bcings pa bri bar bya//klu mgo gdengs ka dgu yod la//nor bu rab tu 'bar ba dang //de dag
109a7(rgyud): kun gyi snying khar yang //rdo rje gnas par bsgrims te bri//rgyal po rnams phyir stobs can dang //dad dpon mkhas pas rtag tu bri//rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad bri//
109b1(rgyud): glo rnams kyang smos/A mad+ha/ /sgyu gtsun 'jug rnaMs ga rgyud hU~M//rtog bzhin du sa smras //khro gru ldan pa mas sto//marnams /
109b2(rgyud): ning yang // po rnyed par 'gyur ba yon//sa ni rnams cad 'grub par byed//shes shing pa ni par byed//rang b+h+yo n+da bka' bzhin de//gnas kyi dam pa thab par 'gyur/
109b3(rgyud): 'jig rnyed 'din 'ang mchog tu bde//'jig rten pha rol shin tu 'di// du rgyu gsum gas la sogs//lcug nas de yi ga smra 'gyur//'dzum gling bzang zhing rnams
109b4(rgyud): dga' bar//khyad par can rigs grangs pa dang //rgyal rigs khyad par 'phags pa dang //bram ze byung par 'phags rnams//byungadag nyid chen po skyes te//rtag tu rig nga da
109b5(rgyud): deru 'drur//so sor 'brang ma 'chung ba'i mes//bso na pas thob pa ga yin pa//sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis//bsod rnams phung ba mi nus//sems can dan+ta
109b6(rgyud): ma byung/ri ma b+hA rnamasbyar rat+na //bde ba cung sum chags pa dang // na par 'gyur ba yin//sa sa r+b+bas b+ha skyes sa dpas cag
109b7(rgyud): tu thugs ni 'byon par 'gyur//spos kyi bde bdun sumatshogs//sgrubs kyang che bar 'gyur ba yi//rgyal bas ji ska gsungs ba skyed//'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur
110a1(rgyud): yin//mi dang lha rnams dbugs 'byin to//gnod par sems pa skrag par byed//gang phyir rig pa logs bshad pa//de ni ring po mi thogaso//de ni mtshon
110a2(rgyud): gyis mi tshugs te//dug dang mes kyang tshugs mi 'gyur//dus min 'chi ba'i sdig pa yang //de las thag ni ring du 'gro/rnam pa kun tu nyan pa 'am//mthong ba dang ni reg pa'ang
110a3(rgyud): rung /'byung po gdon dang rtsod pa dang //chu dang mi yis 'jigs pa dang //gcan zan sbrul dang seng ge dang //klu dang nad ni mi bzad rnams//gang la rig pa lags
110a4(rgyud): bshad pa//de la de dag kun mi 'byung //de dag sems can kun mchog 'gyur//bdud rnams kun gyis thams cad du//mchad par 'gyur ba'i 'os yin te//yang dag bshad/
110a5(rgyud): kyis mnyan par byos//dag pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i cho ga rdzog so///de nas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir reg sngags 'chang
110a6(rgyud): bsrung ba'i tshul gyi tshig bshad par bya'o//srung ba'i cho ga gang zhig gis//dngos grub chen po 'grub 'gyur ba//gang dang gang du srung byas nas//don yod 'gyur te the tsom
110a7(rgyud): med//'jigs med rims kyis mi btab ste//gza' rnams thams cad bzlog par byed//rgyu skar rnams kyang 'thun par 'gyur//las kyi lu gu rgyud kyang gcod//bza'
110b1(rgyud): nyes pa dang sgom nyes dang //dgra tshogs kun rtsis byas pa dang //gnod par bltas dang bre nyos dang //byad dang gang yang mi bzad dang //phye ma sngags kyis btab pa dang //dug 'thungs
110b2(rgyud): pa dang sbyar ba'i dug/gang zhig srung ba 'chang de lo//de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro//gang zhig rig las 'gal byed pa//yan lag rnams la rnam par smin//so sor 'brang
110b3(rgyud): ba'i da mod bsdigs na//pha rol 'khor ni mi bzad dang //'jigs pa chen po dgra yi rnams//de dag thams cad rab tu 'bros//sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa dang //byang chub
110b4(rgyud): sems dpa' nges pas srung //nyan thos dka' thub chen po dang //rang sangs rgyas kyis srung bar 'gyur//gzhan yang rnam pa mang po yi//lha klu rdzu 'phrul tshon pa rnams//'di la
110b5(rgyud): rtag tu brtson byed pa//de la srung ba byed par 'gyur//rig pa yi ni rgyal mo 'di//thos pa tsam gyis mi mchog rnams//kun tu 'jigs pa med 'gyur zhes//thub pa yis ni de
110b6(rgyud): skad gsungs//rmi lam ngan dang ngan byis dang //gang yang nad 'gro mi bzad dang //nAd kyis btab dang nad chen gyis//gang dag zin cing khrag skyugs dang //gzhan yang rnam pa
110b7(rgyud): mang po'i nad//'bras dang shu ba skom po dang //gang yang gnod pa mi bzad pas//me yi skye dgu zid pa dang //mi rnams ma rungs bya ba'i phyir//mchog tu mi bzad gnod byed
111a1(rgyud): /rnams//snang ba ma tshan gas dru/ded ga thams na mi rlung ngo //'od la nan//bangs pa dag d+hA nga 'gyur
111a2(rgyud): 'brang ba bris pas kyang //gA t+te dus kyi zhags pa yis//bzung nas gshin hUM gnas khrid pa//dri mtshan rnam par 'phel//gang shig tshi ni rbad b+hA ra d+ham//na
111a3(rgyud): bdunan ni 'chi 'gyur ba//yi go bris pa'i bar tsam+b+ha gyis//'chi bar gyur te the tshom med//cho ga bzhin du srung ba byas//yang na thos pa tsam gyis kyang //kun tu dge
111a4(rgyud): ba thob par 'gyur//'dod pa bzhin du bde bar 'tshe//gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum lha/stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dong //bye ba khral khrig phrag brgya dang //brgya byin
111a5(rgyud): mdun nas 'gro bkun//sems can de la srung ba'i byer//phyi bzhini 'brang zhing gnas par byed//'jog rten snang ba bzhi po dang //lag ni rdo rje stobs chen yang /
111a6(rgyud): rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang //lhan cig rtag tu srung bar byed//zla ba yid bzang nyi ma dang //tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che//nor bu bzang dang gshin rje dang /
111a7(rgyud): stobs kyi lha ni stobs chen dang //gang ba bzang po dpal chen dang //'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang //lnga 'dzin pa dang lngas rtsan dang //smin drug bu dang tshogs dbang
111b1(rgyud): dang //lha mo chen mo dpal can dang //rnam thos bu dang dbyangs can dang //dung can dang ni me tog so//de bzhin ral pa gcig pa dang //gnod sbyin chen mo dpal yon can//rtag tu
111b2(rgyud): srung ba byed par 'gyur//za ma rnams kyi bu yang skyed//mdal na gnas pa bde bar byed//de ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar//'di ni srung ba chen por 'gyur//'jigs mang 'thab mo
111b3(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed par//dpa' bo rnams la rtag rgyal sbyin//chos la nges pa'i lha rnams la//'dis ni gnang ba sbyin par byed//sdig pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir//gus par
111b4(rgyud): byas te brinA na//de bzhin gshegs dang de bzhin du//byang chub sems dnga'adra lta bar 'gyur//de yi grags po rnam par 'phe la//bsod nams dang ni tshe yang 'ophel//nor
111b5(rgyud): rnams dang ni 'bru dag kyang //'byor par 'gyur te the tsomo med//bde bar gnyid kyis log pa dang //bde bar rab tu sad par 'gyur//'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang //
111b6(rgyud): dgra kun gyis kyang me rje'o//g.yul 'gyed pa yi tshen yang //rig pa sgrub pa byas na ni//srung ba bla na med pa 'dis//rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur bar byed//bde bar rig pa sgrub
111b7(rgyud): byed cing //de la bgegs ni 'byung mi 'gyur//de yis bsam pa thams cad 'grug//kyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin//skye ba dag ni thams cad du//de ni myur
112a1(rgyud): du rgyun nas//rgyas pa'i yon tan tsun sa /'dzin yod snyan /yo//grwa shis pa An da rdzogs//bsam pa thams cad ga pa
112a2(rgyud): can sa d+his kya/ ba thabs ca 'gyur bar 'gyur//'de 'i tsho'i dus sa//mam gri ba 'gyu/'thab pa ni rtsod pa dang /
112a3(rgyud): pa mchog du mi bzad par//'jigs pa kun las rgyu blo 'gyur hU~M/rgyal bas ji skad gsungs bzhin//skye ba rnams skye ben//rtag tu skye dran the tsam med//rgyas po
112a4(rgyud): dU mA la 'i bas pa//'di yi dbang du 'gyur ba yon//'jig ni dge ba dgrags pa yin//rtag rgyun med 'gyur ba ya/ni byin sa sdug byung
112a5(rgyud): sti mi ni gang yang rung //nyin dang mtshan rnams rtag par yang //de la srung ba bdi bar 'gyur//yang dag rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas gsungs//sngags tshig 'di rdo/
112a6(rgyud): 'brug//sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha'o//chos la phyag 'tshal//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
112a7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas bstan pa 'apes
112b1(rgyud): b+hI b+h+yod//des lus rnas byug nal nas//sems can kun la stong potso byor//danang mos brjod par bya//go pa gan ba can du 'i//snubs rlon par sa sbyinan pa/
112b2(rgyud): rdo rje dan la thug pa yi//'di ni gsu sum thug tu yang //bdud dang bdud TI tshogs rnams dang //gan 'dring meg par 'dren pa dang //dgags rnams rdzi srid gang yod pa/
112b3(rgyud): de'i mau la //ts+tsha thA/oM kau gId+hI/hrINig rad+d+hi/g+hud+hI trAM/gur+N+Na ba~Mt+ti/shab tI/ASh+Ta sha tri nr-id+d+he/s+yAr+b+bab+hA pa bikrI tAM/Uk+ShA sha ga gan tal/
112b4(rgyud): At+ma sha sa doNi/dzI bau ti shi kha re/ma Ni mo ga ti/kha tsi ta mo lidz+ha rI/su ka shAM/suM D+h+we/sune tre/su n+te/su~M ba kr-i ri/ut+ka tAM/e d+h+r-i ga te/pra d+hA hU~M/
112b5(rgyud): nimiHsad+g+haNAM/brad+d+hAn+d+han dz+nyA sa ti/te dzas+t+waM/buH/su prad+d+he/b+hu ga bi ti/sud/suHmAM/suM braMb+h+yAM/sr-i dr-i maM/s+yA d+han+te/bA ba ra te/b+ha ga b+hU te/b+h+r-ing+ga /
112b6(rgyud): de// na/d+hA sanan rnan/ /tan//da te/sa Sh+Ta/dzin
113a1(rgyud): na/an nu rgyurmA rgyu tu mas/blonas dus gam tu spyan gsu na/ na sa dag rdzu sa
113a2(rgyud): cad gzhig tu gsol/gzhig tu gsol/thams tsa du 'jigs pa dang /gnod pa thams cad las bdag la srung du gsol/srung du gsel/ma rungs pa thams cad
113a3(rgyud): bcings du gsol/sar+b+ba kil+liShA nA sha mI sti m+ba t+yaM dan+ta/NA nI bA ra Ni mA nI ni/ma hA mA ni nI/ma Ni d+ha ra Ni/mAr+t+ta da na mA ni ni mar+d+ha ni mri ta daN+ye/tsa la tsa le bi ma laM/
113a4(rgyud): tsA Ti tsa Ti/bi Ti bi Ti/nI Ti na Ti/ne t+s+yaTaM/b+ha rIn b+ha ri ni/na mau NaM/bA r-Ir+thi/b+hI ni pra ba rI/pra bAR+Sha sa ma re/tsat+ta lI/mA ti gaM/run+d+ha sI/ka ra si/sa rI/
113a5(rgyud): si/su ma tI/bruklA si/shra ba ri gas ka tr-i rI/snga ma nrit+sa piTaM/d+hA mi DoM/da ha Ni/ba tsi ti/ma thA NI/mi ni/sau ra le/sa r-i laM b+he/hrIn ma d+hod kriSh+Ta/
113a6(rgyud): bid+hA rI NaM/bi d+hA ri NaM/ma hi li/ma hA ma hi li/ma hA ma hi/la ni ge dwe/ni gi De/b+hany+dzi/mid+b+hi/mad+b+hi/mat+ti ni/drAn+te tsakle/tsakra bA ki ni dzA le dzA laM/dz+r-I laM dz+nyA laM/
113a7(rgyud): dz+nyA l-i ni/sha ba ri sha ba ri/shA ba ri shA ba ri/sar+b+ba b+h+re d+h+ri ta ra ni/mu ni mu naM/nI ts+tshi na~Mn+mA dzi n+du da ni/ma hA ts+tshaHni/ni min mi/na mo d+hai ri/trai lo kaM/
113b1(rgyud): ni/trai lo ka A lo ka ka ri/tr-i d+hA ta bya ba l-i ka ni/badz+ra pa ra sh+tsa b+hA sh+tsa/mung+ga rA/brAd+b+ha/shau ka tsakra/tr-ish+tsA la/tsin+d+ra ma Ni/mad+habI d+hA d+hA ra NAM/bdag thams cad du
113b2(rgyud): gnas thams cad na gnas pa ni ma rungs pa rnams cad deng /mi drang mi mA yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang /nr-id thAms cung dang /'jig snga pa thams cad las srung du
113b3(rgyud): gsol/srung du gsol/badz+re badz+re badz+ra ba ti/badz+ra pA Ni d+ha re/hi li hi li/mI li mi li/ki li ki li/tsau li tsi li/bi li bi lI/si li sI li/ba ra ba ra/ba rA dA
113b4(rgyud): sad+d+ha tra/dzA yaM lab+h+raM swA tA//sar+b+ba b+hA pre/bi d+ha ri Ne smAt+te/saMd+b+ha paM/sar+b+ba b+hU d+hI tA ra Ni s+thAt+tha/sUd+b+hat+tha/sar+b+ba b+hU ya ha ra Ni swAhA/sar+b+ba b+hA ra Ni s+yAtA/srastId+d+ha b+hA t+yA mI swA hA/shAn+ti kar+tha

116a1(rgyud): de dag thams cad byang par 'gyur//dran pa dang ni 'chang ba dang //'dzin dang yi ger 'dri ba dang //tshig tu 'don tam klog pa dang //bzlas brjod byed dam

116b1(rgyud): lnga yis//dkyil 'khor sdug gur bri bar bya//mkhas pa rnams kyis cho ga bzhin//bum pa gang ba bzhi yang bzhag/de la me tog sil mas gtor//bdug pa bag gis bdug

121a3(rgyud): nI ba dag nga lan thams cad yod du/yul dang yang 'byud/'chab dang yang rngan/lus kyang bde/nad kyang med/nyam nga ba yang med//kye rgyal pa chen po dag pa'i lus
121a4(rgyud): la ni gnad pa yang med//rtse rgyal chen po dag ngas ni 'dag rten lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa/ches pa dang bcas pa/dge slong ded bram ze bcas pa'i skye dgu da/
121a5(rgyud): s+yA dang m-i na pa'i dgang di bzhin gshegs pa pa yang dag par rtags pa'i sangs rgyas lagano pa byed par sems pa yang dge pa ma mya nga/
121a6(rgyud): bye dag de lha mod kyi/khyod kyil bar rnams pa'i 'khor lo gnod pa byed pa sems//de skad ces ba//stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal pa chen po bzhis 'di da kyis das
121a7(rgyud): to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba mchis to//de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /bcom ldan
121b1(rgyud): 'das nyid la zhu ba'i slad du bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis log sa//de ci'i slad du na na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgon pa dang /bas mthara' gnas nal 'ad dag
121b2(rgyud): na shin tu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang dra za dang /klu dang /na mkha' lding dang /gsang ba pa dang /'byung po dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas dang /srul pa dang /sha
121b3(rgyud): za dang lha ma yin dang /rlung lha dang /skem byed dang /'tshe rgyu dang /smyo byed dang /mi 'am ci dang /gyen du rgyu dang /rgyu ba dang 'dun pa dang //ngan byed dang /gzi byin 'phrog dang /
121b4(rgyud): brjed byed dang /rims drag po dang /rims zhag gcig pa dang /zhu ga gnyis pa dang /zhag gsum pa dang /zhag bzhi pa dang mi dang mi ma lags pa sdang bar sems pa dang /glu
121b5(rgyud): lta ba dang /phan par mi sems pa dang /gnod par bgyid pa dag mchis//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag kyang de na gnas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni srong
121b6(rgyud): dang tho rangs mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas lag so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin nam/srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di
121b7(rgyud): la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni nyung zad cig mchis par bas so//gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni che sa med lags te/de
122a1(rgyud): dag ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos srod dang tha rangs la ma nyal zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa rnams la gnod par bgyid par sems lags twa/
122a2(rgyud): dag dgag pa'i slad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang /dad pa rnams slor zhing dad par bgyi ba dang /'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang /bde bar
122a3(rgyud): gnas par bgyi ba dang /ma lus par shin tu mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur ba'i slad bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bshad par 'tshalo//mi ma yin pa sdang son//rgyal
122a4(rgyud): ba'i bstan la ma dad pa//de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya//rgyal chen rnams ni bdag la nyon//mdo chen 'di ni thos nas kyang //me rnams la ni gnod ma byed//gnod sbyin srin pa
122a5(rgyud): klu rnams dang //na mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa//phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung //de dag thams cad bzlog par bya//lha dang lha min rlung lha dang //lha mo'i tshogs kyis gong ba yi//
122a6(rgyud): gzhal med khang mdzes de dag gis//me dang 'dre bar 'od gsal zhing //nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra ba//rin chen los byas shin tu snang //bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang //bar
122a7(rgyud): snang gdon rnams rnam par sgrubs//mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i//'byung po grul bum srin po dang //yi dgas srul pa de dag gis//rmad byung de dag mi mthong ste/
122b1(rgyud): gza byin ldan pa'i lha rnams kyi//grong khyer du yang de mi 'gro/'byung po chen po 'du ba na//de yang de dag 'dur mi dbang //stan nam yang na chu yang rung //zas dang skom yang ma
122b2(rgyud): dbang ngo //lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du//nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur//rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/'byung po gang zhig mi nyan pa//de yi kha nas khrag dron dag/myur du
122b3(rgyud): rab tu 'bab par 'gyur//de yi brla yi g.yas rol nas//phol mag dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te//de ni nad kyis 'chi 'gyur zhing //gnod sbyin gzugs kyang sbyin par 'gyur//
122b4(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong gis bshad pa yi//mdo lngas gang zhig 'gal byed pa//'jigs pa thams cad de la 'ang //mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'groso//rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/
122b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin gang dag mi nyan pa//'byung po srin po gang yod pa//ngan phreng lhag pa'i ngan phreng rnams//lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yi//mtshon cha spu gro sa 'dra bas//
122b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin de dag brlag par bya//rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan//go che phra zhing mtshon rno li//stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung //lho phyo
122b7(rgyud): na ni 'phags skyes pa//nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang //byang phyogs ni ni lus ngan po//de dag de na 'khod pa yi//nye 'khor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas//sang+ge gzugs
123a1(rgyud): dang stag gi gzugs//mi sdug pa dgu 'gro zhing rgyu//glang chen gzugs dang rta yi gzugs//kha cig ma he'i gzugs can la//dred mo dang ni wa yi gzugs//
123a2(rgyud): lug dang sbyang ki phag rgod rnams//rna ba 'phyang dang rna bo che//rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa//sgra cher 'byin cing 'jigs byed pa//sa gzhi rab tu g.yo bar byed//bong bu dang ni rnga
123a3(rgyud): mi khyi//tshe lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod//rgyal po chen po stobs po che//de dag phan tshun 'du ba na//lha yo shing rta bcas pa yis//na mkho las ni 'gro de
123a4(rgyud): byed//gnod sbyin dag gi bdag po yang //mi rnams la ni bde legs byed//s+yAd ya tha dan/ba ka hu mu le/ha shi Na sha shai Ne ba na mu ha le sa mu hA la/u du ha le/sa
123a5(rgyud): mi hA le/pra sha ma mI/rAk+Sha sa/a ma nu Sh+ya/bA re mi yak+Sha ni/d+h+r-i rA mi pra ta ma b+he the/du ma nu Sh+yA/ma sap+ta ha d+ha murnan/su ti Sha ti/rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu/
123a6(rgyud): mi le zhon pa sder bcas pas//'di smras nas ni chung ma lang //de bzhini ri yong g.yos par gyur//rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'o//rin chen shing rta bcas pa na//lha dang
123a7(rgyud): mi yi sgra skad bregs//rgyal po chen po mchi ba ni//dbang po rnams kyang 'bar bar 'gyur//srin po 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs//de yi mdun na rgyug par bgyid//
123b1(rgyud): mi ma yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis//'jigs shing skrag bskyed par 'byed//che zhing gtum la mi bzad pa//drag cing mthong na mi sdug la//spu yang ring zhing sen mo ring //lag
123b2(rgyud): na ral gri tho ba thogs//so ni zangs can 'jigs par bgyod//sna che rnga mo stag gi 'dra//drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba//yan lag ma tshang phyed tsam lus//mig ser lus
123b3(rgyud): kyang shin tu ser//dri ma can la lus skem pa//sgra brdzes lcags kyi mchu can la//mtshon cha tshabs cher 'debs par bgyid//rna ba gzhu sna gsus po che//sbrul gyi
123b4(rgyud): gzugs can be'u gzugs//phag gi gzugs can lto bo che//mgo bo che la lag ring ba//rna 'phyang ba la nu ma 'chang //de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi//g.yog 'khor
123b5(rgyud): dag gis yongasu bskor//gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams//de dag ma ni lim log can//g.yo go 'khor de dag lhan cig tu//bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchi//go
123b6(rgyud): tam dpa' bo khyod la ni//chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis//drag tsang rgod la gtum pa dang //mgo bo che la sgra ring ba//mi rnams dang ni ri dgas dang //d+ya rnams
123b7(rgyud): gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid//me 'bar za dang mang du za//mig gcig pa dang mig ser dang //sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang //chad pa bcad pa dang //mgo ma mchis dang mgo
124a1(rgyud): bcad dang //rus kyang skur la gnyer ma gdong //mig la me 'bar nang med pa//me rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa ste//phal kA che la rgod bag can//de bzhin
124a2(rgyud): zhing rgyu bar bgyid//de 'drar gnod sbyin mang po yi//g.yog 'khor dag gis yongasu bskor//gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams//de dag ma ni rkun ma lags//g.yog 'khor
124a3(rgyud): de dag lhan cig tu//bdag ni phyag 'tshal srad du mchis//go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni//chos pan no 'thun par lta zhing mchis//bdag cag gi ni gnas rnams na//shing
124a4(rgyud): rtazhes bgyi srin mo mchis//del bu pho stobs ldan pa//stong phrag bcu yis grangs skyed mchis//de dag bdag gi g.yog lags te//de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis//
124a5(rgyud): go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni//chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis//bdag cig gi ni gnas rnams na//mgrin rings zhes bgyi srin mo mchis//srin mo shin tu gnag
124a6(rgyud): pa dang //srin mo nog mo zhes bgyi dang //srin mo rab gnag rnams mchis te//de dag go'u tam 'thun par blta//sa yi gnod sbyin bdag nyid che//de dag sa steng gnas
124a7(rgyud): bste//g.yog 'khor de dag rnams kyis ni//yo su bskor te 'dir mchis lags//de dag kun dang lhan cig tu//bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis//go'u tam
124b1(rgyud): dpa' ba khyod la ni//chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis//bdag gi mdunan rgyug pa yi//yi dgas gnod sbyin sran po rnams//sus chen shugs kyang drag po ste//so yang
124b2(rgyud): che la lto 'i che//rna 'byung 'jigs pa chen po s+ho//skom rnal rab tu 'byung //yan lag drug paso brtan pa//gur gum mdog can tho ba 'dra//sa yang rtsub cing rno ba dang //mdung
124b3(rgyud): thungs gsal zhing 'jigs par bgyid//glang chen mgo dang bum rna can//mgo bo stag drang seng ge 'dra//lcags kyi so can lcags kyi sku//gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyed pa//
124b4(rgyud): lag na lcags kyis gtun du thogs//lag na lcags kyi tho ba thogs//sa rnon lag pa ring ba ste//'jigs pa'i gzugs can lcags kyi mchu//mgo bo che la sgra g.yengs pa/
124b5(rgyud): gnag cing mig ser sna zhom pa//bum pa'i mgrin dang mig dpar dang //mig gcig pa dang lto bo che//mchu 'phyangs pa dang lag gcig pa//rkang gcig pa dang rkang gnyis pa//
124b6(rgyud): kha mad kha gnyis drag po ste//mi rnams rab tu 'jigs par bgyid//lag na khang pa dbyug pa thogs//mdung rtsi gsum pa skrag cing 'jigs//skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste/
124b7(rgyud): gdon rnams rnam par skrag dgyid pa//skrag par bgyid cing smra bar 'gyid//sems kyang 'khrul par bgyid pa ste//skyo bar bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid//de nas kau ni byin
125a1(rgyud): brog par bgyid//de dag 'jig rten 'jigs pa ste//bas pa chol bsnun par ///spyang phrag d+hAg rtsa ba ni bla//rnalu tshan pa'i mang+gan+dan+tar+N+Nak+Sha/da dang //
125a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin mang po yi//g.yog 'khor dag gis yongasu bskor//gnod sbyi ni bye ba phrag stong rnams//dri dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis//phyo ru t+yam dpa' bo khyad li ni//
125a3(rgyud): bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis//sa ga lngas rten zla ba dang //seng ge sde dang rab gnon dang //ma la sbyin brtson drag po dang //gang po dang ni nor 'dzin dang //tsan dan dang ni
125a4(rgyud): 'dod mchog dang //sna tshogs sde dang gtor ma len//yid bzhin rab 'byor bzhin bzang dang //'damo bu can dang shin tu rgyal//'dod pa thams cad 'bar ba dang //dbang po
125a5(rgyud): rgyal ba khyu mchog dang //nor bu bzang sras rdzogs bzang dang //'dam bu sau mchog 'dam bus dga'//khab kyi spu can ring bzang dang //lag mchog skye dgu'i bdag po dang /
125a6(rgyud): 'dam bu'i rgyud dang mdung ring dang //rig pa stobs can nor bu dang //'dzeg po nag po chen po dang //la ba can dreng dre'u dang gnyis//klu yi rgyal po so srung bu//yan lag chen
125a7(rgyud): bo rdzu 'phrul che//namakha' lding ni shugs chen ldan//'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa//byi yi gzugs kyis mcheb gyid cing //rgya mtsho kun tu 'khrug par bgyid/
125b1(rgyud): lha dang lha min dA za rnams//'jigs par bgyid dang dge ba'ang rung //ma dad pa dang ngang pa rnams//de dag thams cad 'dir mchis te//goru tam dpa' ba khyod lan//chos bzhin
125b2(rgyud): 'thun par lta zhing mchis//'phrog ma zhes bgyi gnod sbyin mo//'jigs par bgyid pa stobs chen mo//de yi bu ni lnga brgya rnams//'jigs bgyid gnod sbyin mthu rtsal can//
125b3(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags te//de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis//go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni//chos bzhin 'thun par lha zhing mchis//ma ga d+hA na thams cad mthong //
125b4(rgyud): shi na ni pad+ma 'chung //yangs pa tsan na rgyal mchog gnas//kyang yul nA na grags 'dzin gnas//rgyal po'i khab na ku byi ra//ser skya'i gnas na drug po ste//ta ma lan 'byor
125b5(rgyud): pa gnas//mi ti la na kun tu rgyal//mo mo chen mo 'di brgyad ni//gnod sbyin rnams kyi sde dpon mchog/rdzu 'phrul chen po skal ba che//stobs chen de dag thams cad ni//yid
125b6(rgyud): dge dad pa'i sems dang ldan//rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs mchis pas//de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang //rgyal po chen po stobs chen gyis//yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas
125b7(rgyud): bstan la//mi rnams la ni snying brtsi'i slad //gnod sbyid 'byung po yi dgas dang //sdang ba'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang //mi ma yin rnams bzlog pa yi//srung ba 'di ni
126a1(rgyud): logs par bsdus//de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu//thab sgyur 'dug tu sbyar pa ni//don dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa//rnam grol zag pa mi mnga' ba//rgan
126a2(rgyud): tA ma dpa' bo khyod la ni//chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis//khyed la lci dang grub pa dang //bram ze thams cad phyag 'tshal te//gnod sbyin bye ba drug khri dang //bzhi
126a3(rgyud): stong dag kyang lhags nas ni//kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas//thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags//bdag ni rgyal po rnam thos bu//byang phyogs skyong bar bgyed pa ste/
126a4(rgyud): 'jig rten mgron po'o nye 'khor du//gnod sbyin rgyu skar smra byed dang //brjod byed dang ni ma'am ci//skem byed dang ni rims drag dang //de bzhin rims nad zhag bzhi pa/
126a5(rgyud): dwe dgra bdag gis bzlog par bgyi//s+yAdA ya tha~M daM/u ha hau/u ha haM/ma hA ha/u ha ma hA haM/sa la mu dzi/i lI mi lI/i lI mi lI/ki lAM me le/tsi ri Ti/
126a6(rgyud): i g+ni atra b+hi/pi ti la yaM/ma Ta ma laM/ma nan+da ya~M swAhA/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lus ngan lcang lo can gyi bdag po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig/gnod sbyin
126a7(rgyud): dang /rgyunar dang /smyo byed dang /brjed byed dang /mi ma ci dang /gyen du rgyu dang /rgyu ba dang /'dun pa dang /dor byed dang /gzi byin 'drog po rnams
126b1(rgyud): bzlog par gyur cig/lha'i nang na lha rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/de la bdag phyag 'tshalo//de yang bcom ldan drangs nyid la phyag 'tshal te/rdzogs pa'i
126b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dpa' ba ste//kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud//yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud//chos bzhin 'thun par lte zhing mchis//de nis rgyal po yul 'khor srung //
126b3(rgyud): thal sbyor 'dug ste smras pa ni//chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa//sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tsha lo//go'u tum dpa' bo khyod la nI//chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis/
126b4(rgyud): go'u ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa//de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to//srin po mthong na rab 'jigs pa//stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams//khor khor yug yongs bskor
126b5(rgyud): nas//thal mo sbyar te 'khod 'gyur lags//bdug ni rgyal po yul 'khor srung //shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste//'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du//srin po
126b6(rgyud): rnams dang sha za dang //dr-i TA dang ni rlung lha rnams//de dag bdag gis bzlog par dgyi//snod ya tha~M dan/i ti mo ni//khur rje/phu ra Te/ma ti'i ma tI/yu ma ti/
126b7(rgyud): e/mat+te/na//a nr-i ma~M/badz+ra ma/ma b+he/i re Ti/bai r-i Ti swA hUM/rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung phyogs skyong bar gyur cig/srin po dang /yaM dgas dang //dri
127a1(rgyud): d+hA dang /rmyam+b+ha dang /mi 'am nadang / zlon/pa rnams hU~Mb par gyur cig/rgyun na lta rgyul ban b+h+ya tu n+ti marnas
127a2(rgyud): de la bag phyag 'tsha'o//de ying bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag 'tshal te//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste//kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud//yang
127a3(rgyud): dag dpa'o khyod la 'dud//chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchi so//de nas rgyal po 'phags skyes po//thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni//'jig rten mgon po skyabs mdzad

127a5(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhi rnams//kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas//thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags//bdag ni rgyal po 'phags skyes po//lho phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa

127a7(rgyud): lo i la lo/ki yi ki le l-i/ku pa ku pa so+o/si l-i si li laM/si l-i li li/mi ma ma mi li/ti ti si li/ma ti su ma ti/su su ma ti/su su su su/su
127b1(rgyud): sum twAM/ti bi la la Sha swA hA/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po phyogs spang bar gyur cig/grul bum dang /yi dgas dang /srul pa dang /'byung po dang /rgyu ba dang /dra
127b2(rgyud): byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig/lha'i nang na so lha'i rgyal lo/nor lha'i bu zhes babye ba mchis te/de la bdag phyag 'tshal//de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la
127b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste//kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud//yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud//chos bzhin 'thun pa blta zhing mchis//

127b7(rgyud): po'i nye 'khor du//klu dang mkha' lding gsang po pa//lha mo ni dbang po stobs po che//de dag bdag gis bzlog par 'o gyi//s+yAd ya thaM dan/dgi dge/
128a1(rgyud): su bat+ti yai prATe/ana?/kramAn+tha/bi ma bA dam/bi dang ma/b+hU da dam+ba ni/a b+hI na me/gar+b+ha b+hA te/nul pi ye/bA ra rAt+naHtsi la/tsa ma la la la/
128a2(rgyud): li li swA hA/rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang phyogs skyong bar gyur cig/klu dang /na mkha' lding dang /gsang ba dang /lha ma yin dang /gzi byin 'brog pa rnams bzlog par
128a3(rgyud): gyur cig/lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo//de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
128a4(rgyud): dpa' bo ste//kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud//yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud//chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis//de nas rgyal po bzhi bla gos phrag pa
128a5(rgyud): gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas po'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing gros 'thun pa dang tshig 'thun pa
128a6(rgyud): dang skad 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba ste/'khor
128a7(rgyud): bzhi po rnams la yongasu khyab pa'o//gnod sbyin dang /srin po nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar du bzlog par 'gro ba dang /'khor bzhi rnams la srung ba dang /skyob pa
128b1(rgyud): dap+ta dang /di lcag b+h+ya nga/ ga sa pa da pa sdugs//smya ga ngan sa ma par na na nan
128b2(rgyud): /'astsal te/ rgyal ban blo dag rig sngags kyi rgyal chen po brjid ni //ni pa'i rdug gyi med chen po ngas yo snye zung zin//kye rgyal po chen po dag gzhan yang
128b3(rgyud): ngas bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po la rjes yi rang ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po brjod kyis/de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /ras gshad//bcom
128b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de ltar 'tshalo zhes rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po matan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas na bza' chos gos phyed nas
128b5(rgyud): 'byung ba'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//ngas 'di bstan par bya'o//rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis bu ste dbye bar bya'o//thams cad la go bar bya'o//de nas
128b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rigra sngags 'di bka' stsal to//s+yAd yA thaM dan/hI l-I hi lI/b+hi sa nI bak+She/a ha rA ya~M/tA ma ti/NA ma d+hi/
128b7(rgyud): da / slo su rkyen /man rje kyi na gas kyi rgyam na pa
129a1(rgyud): stsal ba nas kun tu gsos/'byung po thams cad dang b+h+ya dar nas kyi mtsho dang /kyem sgrub gal lo zhes sna chen po byung ngo //dran pa rnams kyis kyang 'dun
129a2(rgyud): sa te/'di lta'i yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas//sems can kun la tshigs brgya nas/'byung po kun 'jigs rten pa mo//rig sdigs 'di gsung bar mdzad//des
129a3(rgyud): kun mkhyen ston pa po//sems can kun la thugs brtse bas//gnod sbyin srin po dri zla dang //klu dang mkhar lding gsang ba 'o//'byung ba rgyu ba gzi byin 'bro//grul bu
129a4(rgyud): mi dgas srul po dang //lha min gshed byed do langs dang //brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci//skem byed dang ni rims drag dang //de bzhin dram ze srin po dang //smyo byeng rims nang
129a5(rgyud): zhag gsum pa//de bzhin zhag ni bzhi po rnams//skrag cing rab tu 'dor gyur te//phyogs bcu ro rgyug pa gzigs nas kyang //de dag lce ni thugs brtse'i phyir//rig sngags

129b1(rgyud): gsung gi chos la yang dag par so sor rtogs shog/khyed kun lus zhig ste/sha ba'i 'og tu dran skyong ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rna su skye zhing 'khor zla gro
129b2(rgyud): de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngogs kyi rgyal po chen po sngon ma thos pa 'di thos nas skrag cing dngang te/mi dga' la spyi bung zhes byed nas thal mo sbyar te//

129b7(rgyud): b+h+yong thi ru phu phu phu ra/gi sha lI ro Sha da ya ma la/khu la~M khu le ba ya swA hA/rig sngags kyi rgyal ma 'din lo gcig gi bar du mtshams gcod pa dang /'byung
130a1(rgyud): po thams cad zlog pa dang /don thams cad grub pa lags//de nas gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /dri zla nas gnod par bgyid pa'i byang rnams cag

130a3(rgyud): sti bung zhes byas nas sa lce 'dzul kun tu 'dzul/kun tu rab tu 'dzul bar byed //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer sprul nas de dag phyogs bzhir drug/de nas
130a4(rgyud): rgyal ba zhis phyogs bzhir me'i phung po che ni bsku te/de nas na pa lo d+h+r-ig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam 'i gisar du sgral te//sbyin pa 'jig

130b6(rgyud): ste//kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/shes rab chen po khyod la 'dud//go'u tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa//de ni lha
130b7(rgyud): rnams ma 'tshal to//yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud//chos bzhin 'thun pa lta zhing mchis//gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /dri za nas gnod par bgyi ba'i bar rnams ming
131a1(rgyud): 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la babs pa las gud du dengs shig/gal hUM ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du lung du mdong na/de dag la myur du 'jigs pa
131a2(rgyud): chen po dang /nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la/de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang /snying tshal brgya ro 'gas par 'gyur te/de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang /
131a3(rgyud): brlag pa dang /mtha' med par 'gyuraro//'bru dri'i gdon gang yin pa dang /skya rengs 'cha ro ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang /grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag
131a4(rgyud): kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'ang thos nas mang 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gung du dengs shig/gal te myur du gud du ma dang na de dag la myur du 'jigs pa

131a6(rgyud): dang /darlag pa dang /mtha' med par 'gyuraro//gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba//nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa//de dag gros kyang legs gsungs pa'i//mdo bshang

131b1(rgyud): bshad pa thos nas thang /lha dang lha min rlung lha dang //dri za dang ni gdon gyi zla//'byung po dang ni sha za dang //de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams//kun tu 'khrugs shing kun tu g.yos
131b2(rgyud): skrag cing kun tu rab tu 'gul//gdon snang gnod pa byed pa rnams//ltung ning rab tu pham par gyur//sa gzhi dag kyang rab tu g.yos//skra bo che dge sgrogs par byed//yi dgas
131b3(rgyud): dang ni grul du ma rnams//sdang ba'i gdon ni bzlog byed pa'i//mdo 'di dag ni thos gyur nas//'jigs pa drag pos 'debs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/

132a1(rgyud): slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma de dag gis kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di gzung bar bgyi/bcang bar bgyi/brjod par

132a3(rgyud): sba ba dang /gzhan srung ba dang /gzhan sba ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /brjod pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa de la na

132a5(rgyud): gcig tsam/gnas pa der yang gnod sbyin dang /srin po nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor du yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/de gang du rtag tu gnas pa der lta smos
132a6(rgyud): kyang ci 'tshal lags/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la mi ma lags pa'i gnod pas thebs pa de'i mdun du bsil bya'i tshal gyi mang chen po 'di brjod na/de myur ba kho nar

132b1(rgyud): lags te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i chol gyi med chen po 'di de ltar don cheb 'gaso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge

132b6(rgyud): mchis nas/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun du gnod sbyin rnams 'dus shing 'byung po thams cad tshogs pa'i nang du yang bsgrags nas/der de dag mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/
132b7(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba lagaso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dag
133a1(rgyud): brtson ma gang la la byu ga rlung da dang /bdage smra ba dang /gzhan byung ba dang /gzhan sa pa'i slad du bsil nga'i tshal gyi mngatshan pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'ang
133a2(rgyud): ba dang /brjod pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /sbyar bar bgyid pa de ni tshangs par spyad par gyu'o//chang mo bting ba dang /dran pa dang /shes bzhin can du mchis pa

133a4(rgyud): 'das gnod sbyin dang /srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /sbyo

133b6(rgyud): 'jig rten na sems can rnams srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba'i slad du rgyal po chen po bzhis srung ba bgyis pa gang ci yang rung ba'i srung ba de dag gi nang na ni 'di mchog dang /

134a1(rgyud): por srung ba dang //bde legs bgyud pa de la ni//srin po rnams kyang 'tsho mi bgyid//su yang rung ste mdo 'di dag/mi mchog gis ni gsungs pa bzhin//yongasu
134a2(rgyud): rdzogs shing ma chad par//shin tu tshang bar 'chang bgyid na//de la gnod sbyin yi dgas dang //'byung po grul bum srin po dang //smyo byed rgyu ba kru rnams dang //de lta bu dag

134a7(rgyud): du 'ongs te//rang gi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas lus ngan dang /yul 'khor srung dang /mig mi bzang dang /'phags skyes po rnams ngag la ba dang 'ongs te lhags nas/

134b5(rgyud): 'di'i cho ga ni zas dkar gsum za ba dang /legs par khrus byas pa dang /snang ba byas pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /bsam pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas rgyal po chen po
134b6(rgyud): bzhi'i gzugs ldeng ros sam bcag gis bris la/spos thams cad dang /mi ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du brjod par bya'o//
134b7(rgyud): bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po rdzogs///rgya gar skad du/ma hA man+ta a nu d+ha ro sU tra/bod skad du/gseng sdigs chen po rjesu 'dzin pa
135a1(rgyud): mad dkon mchog gsapa 'a phyug//sangs rgyas la phyag//chos la drug /go/thun pa\u0f88\u0f90 //yang dag pad

135a3(rgyud): sgrub//rig sngags 'di dag grub gyur cig/gang byed don du bsgrubs pa yi//don de yang ni grub par shog/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan la sa

135a5(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcos pa dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
135a6(rgyud): po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la

142b4(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog sgra gcan zin dang /mal cha dang stan bsgo ba rnams kyi mchog gyad bu nor dang /seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams kyi mchog b+ha ra d+h+wa dzA bsod snyoms len dang /khyim
142b5(rgyud): pa dad pa bskyed pa rnams kyi mchog nag po 'char ka dang /lha dang mis mchod pa rnams kyi mchog legs mthong gi bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig des maung 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung

143a2(rgyud): shes can ma yin pa 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ces bya ste bden pa dang bden pa'i tshi ga

143a4(rgyud): pa'i tshig gang gis 'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba mchog ces bya ste/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mang
