148b7(rgyud): !/b+h+r-i tir+thi ts+tsha/pi shA tsi nI m+bar+m+mAH/gan+d+ha dz+dzaT+TaH/kA mun+ta lan+yai d+d+haH/kanan+na kaM nisan+tuH/kr-in+danI Sh+T+rIH/bai tsa~M d+hib+h+r-i d+hIH/shakud+hIHd+hI/de geb d+haH
149a1(rgyud): de ba ku laM bai d+haH/nA gA bar+t+taHnA ga ku la dar+N+NaHa pu re ban+d+haHa su ra ku laM ban+d+haH/ga ru Dam+ba d+haH/ga ru Da ku laM ba d+haH/pag+h+nAM bo d+haH/paN+Di kiN ba d+haH/
149a2(rgyud): kain+na ra ba d+haH/kin+nar b+hu ba nau baMd+d+haH/mU nu ShaM bAn+tiH/mA nu Sha b+huM ba naM dat+taMH/a mA nu ShaM baM d+haH/am+ba nuSh+Ta b+hU ba ni ban+d+haH/tsin+ta daM t+yaM ban+d+haMH/tsan+ti daM d+yaM b+hU ba naM bin+d+haH/saMn+na
149a3(rgyud): taM ban+d+haH/sar+b+ba tata laM ban+d+haH/br-ik+Sha ma baM d+haH/br-ik+ShaM ta lAM ban+d+haH/swa ku laM ban+d+haH/pa ra ku laM ban+d+haH/mar+tha kat+sa paM bi d+haH/sa mA pA daMm+ma d+haH/A ni mi t+taM ban+d+haH/ni mit+ti ban+d+haH/
149a4(rgyud): sat+kAd+maSh+TA na saMd+g+ha ga pra d+hi ga bAM d+haHdwA da nid+d+haM dz+nyA yaM/d+hA da shaM ni tA yaM/bik+thaHkiM shIm+b+ha/tsan+na yaiHa ne karasmai sha taM/sa ha sra prA dzA li ta d+hIp+tA taM dz+nyA ye/u gr-i bo bo d+ha baM
149a5(rgyud): Shan+ti br-ir+t+ti/udat+ta kau sh+tsA ye/tsaM pa lpA yaM/ta thA gA ta/a pak+Sha rI satwAnAM bin+d+haH/i maM badz+ra shr-i kha lA/man+ta Ni/bany+tsa sha ta/yaM dza na pa raM biSh+Ti ti badz+ra shr-i kha lAM na bo d+haH
149a6(rgyud): pa mud+hi ts+tshin+da man pa la g.yen pa d+haH/u g+na len+de bad+d+haH/tsa tsu TI kin mA~M d+haH/tiSh+Tha Sh+T+r-i hU~M d+hU Ta swAt+ma/hu lu dr-i pu/nam sUd+g+ha ma hA kr-id+d+ha/d+h+ye hU~M amr-iHhrI
149b1(rgyud): tid da dz+nyAn prat+ta shud+d+hA sa twA/dz+ra sh+lau kha la na d+hats+tsharbA dz+nyAH/praHsa/r+pa snroT ya t+na pan m+b+ha tak+ShahA pA r+d+ha du kr-i d+ha Da ya ti/b+hA ta baud+d+haH/mob+h+rUM bad+d+haH/sang+g+had+had+haNA
149b2(rgyud): p+te/sha tap+da da~Md+d+haHsatwAm+b+hab+hU daM ts+tshaH/sak+Sha da bit+tad+d+haH/sar+b+ba da~MSh+T+rI dza/sar+b+ba nr-i bru~M maM ba~Mr+d+har+N+Na prad+d+hiSh+T+rIHng+ge b+hU ban+te ba d+hAH/bid+d+hiHb+h+ya/m+b+ha dz+nyA ba na d+hi/
149b3(rgyud): ma hi shwa ra~M ban+d+haH/ma he shwa ra b+hu ba na~M bi d+haH/maM tA de baM ban+d+haH/ma d+hu de ba dza ta b+h+r-i ma pA de nA bi kr-i m+bI bi d+haH/oM na ma~M b+haM ga be N+yai badz+ra shr-i kha le da sha tu di sha~M badz+ra pAk+Sha ra Na bar+t+taH
149b4(rgyud): d+hIts+tshahU~M d+hI d+hA dz+haiM/sa phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swAH/rig sngags 'di nyid gsungs tsam gyis//rgya che ni 'jig rten khams 'di rnams//rnam pa drug tu g.yas gyur nas/lha dang
149b5(rgyud): sgro min srin bcas dang //gnod sbyin dri zla grul bum dang //mkha' lding lnga 'phye lus srul pa//klu dang mi 'am ci la sogs//tshogs rnams thams cad myos brgyal te//sa
149b6(rgyud): sdong kha srub tu 'khyil nas//dang pa shin tu stor ba la//bde bachen po'i 'od zer gyis//phog po'i skad cig dam thag/dran pa slar rnyed gzi mdangs skyes//de nas bstod
150a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos bstod//e ma'i bde ba rje mchog dpal nyid las//rgyas pa stobs skyes bkra shis kyis//lha mos hUM brjod tsam nyid las//na mkha'i khamasu grag
150a2(rgyud): par 'gyur//bde chen ye shes mnga' bdag nyid//rdo rje zhes pa'i mtshan ldan pa'i/lha mo lu gu rgyud ma la//bdag cag rnams kyis gus par 'dud//sku yi 'od zer sna
150a3(rgyud): tshogs kyis//'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa'i//'od kyis bdag la bde ba skyes//lha mo bde bo khyod phyag 'tshal//stong nyid smon med mtshan ma bral//rgyal ba kun gyi
150a4(rgyud): rig pa las//ya mtshan lha mo'i rang bzhin thugs//mi rtog rang bzhin phyag 'tsho lo//de rjes rgyal po kun 'dus pa'i//gzugs sogs rig pa'i lha mo yis//'khor lo
150a5(rgyud): 'dri la legs mchod nas//mgrin gcig tu ni 'dus nasu//sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi//rdo rje cho ga gis bstod par byed//rdo rje na mkha' las byung ba'i//sa d+yas
150a6(rgyud): thams cad skyed pa'i yum//spros bral na mkha'i rang bzhin gsal//rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal//rdo rje gzugs kyi sgra yis ni//lha tshogs ma lus rnam 'tshong mdzad//
150a7(rgyud): bdud rnams tshar gcod rdo rje sgra//na mkha'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod//'gro drug bdud 'joms zhal drug ma//phyi nang rten 'brel dag phyir phyag/sgeg cing cung zad
150b1(rgyud): 'jigs par byed//rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tsham//de skad rdo rje lha ma lA//lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis//rmad byung bstod pa'i rgyal po des//bstod pa'i de ma thag tu ni//lha ma ga
150b2(rgyud): mdangs cher skyes nas//rang gi snying po 'di gsungs//oM badz+ra shrI khA lo hUM hUM phaT swA hA/rig pa gzungs kyi phreng ba 'am//gsang sngags 'di nyid bshad tsam gyis//rims dang shu
150b3(rgyud): ba g.yan pa dang //lhog pa sha bkra mdze nad 'bras//klad nad mig nad rna nad dang //lkog nad glo mtshan nad rnams dang //rgyu gzer snying nad mkhal nad dang //rkang khrag nad dang
150b4(rgyud): khyab par na//chu ser nang dang khrag nad dang //bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa dang //shin tu 'khrugs pa'i nad la sogs//yams nad thams cad zhi bar byed//gzhan yang 'byung
150b5(rgyud): po brjed byed dang //sha za mkha' 'gro ma mo dang //gza' dang rgyu skar yog 'dren dang //byad snyoms drag po phyi rol gyi//rig sngags gtum po la sogs pa//'jigs pa'i gnod
150b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kun//rlung gi sprin bzhin gtor bar byed//gzhan yang stag gzig dom drang dang //'pharo ba spyang ki gung po che//sre mong byi ba sbrul byi la//sbrang bu mchu rings
150b7(rgyud): batre ka/khwa dang se'u Tu'u rta laM sogs//'jigs pa rnams mang ji snyed pa//gsang sngags 'di brjod thos tsam gyis//thag ringasu ni skrod par byed//gnod pa rnam ma
151a1(rgyud): thams cad kyang //sngags kyi sbyor bas spel bar byed//gnod byas rnams ni gnod med byed//gnod med gnod dang ldan byed cing //sbyor ba yang ni sbyor ba
151a2(rgyud): 'gas//gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'ching bar byed//rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa las gsang sngags bstan pa'i le lu stau dang po'o////de nas 'dir ni bshad
151a3(rgyud): bya ba/mdzes ma rdo rje khro mo yi//lha ya ting 'dzin sbyor ba rnams//thig le chen mos mnyan par gyis//oM badz+ra shr-i kha le/At+ma rak+Sha dak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/gas
151a4(rgyud): sngags 'di ni bsrung ba dang //tha mal rtog pa'i lus sbyong byed//snying kar zla steng hU~M yig gi/'od kyis rigs kyi gtso mo dang //bla mi sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas/
151a5(rgyud): mdun du legs par dmigs nas ni//snying ka sa bon 'od rje las//me tog sogs 'dzin lha mos mchod//gzugs sogs rdo rje ma rnams kyis//'dud cing so sor legs
151a6(rgyud): par mchod//thog ma med pa'i srid rgyud nas//lus ngag yid kyis spyad pa yi//sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun//bgyis dang bgyid du sprul pa dang //bgyid la rje su yi
151a7(rgyud): rang ba//sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun//thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi//slan chad mi bgyid sdom pa yang //rgya chen bdag gis bzung bar bya//rgyal ba
151b1(rgyud): //sras btsas mdza pa dang //'gro da'i dge la rjes yo dang //dz+hal dang byang chub sems dpa' dang //rigs ldan rdo rje lham dang //sngags rgyud rgyu chen 'a khor lo la//kun na snang bas
151b2(rgyud): skyibasu mchi//mi rtogs blo gros skyed pa'i phyir//chos kyi 'khor lo bskur ba dang //gdul bya ji srid tshim pa ru//mya dran mi 'da' gsal ba 'dabs//rnam pa kun gyi mchog
151b3(rgyud): ljon pa'i//byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya//gdod nas ji srid da lta yi//bar du lus 'dis ci ma byas//ngan srid pa'i rlung rtogs nas//rang gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi/
151b4(rgyud): thig chen bla na med nga yi//lam chen rgya mtsho gang yin pa//theg chen 'bras bu thob byar du//rgyu ni mi 'chad par bsten par bya//de ltar dang sems 'dun byas te//bsod nams
151b5(rgyud): rgya chen rnams bsags pa'i//dge ba bla na med pa des//thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o//dang po byams pa'i 'od zer gyis//'gro rnams bde la dgod por bya//gnyis pa
151b6(rgyud): snying rje'i 'od zer gyis//'gro ba sdug bsngal 'bral sems bskyed//gsum po dga' bas bde ba thob//bzhi pa chags bral btang snyam so//de rjes rags pa'i stongs spong
151b7(rgyud): zhing /dpag chags dri ma bsapa nas kyang //na mkha' lta bur sgrub byed pa'i//de ras dag pa rjes dran bya//oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haH/sar+b+ba d+har+m+maHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/de yis
152a1(rgyud): dag par byas nas na//stang nyid rjes bsgom par bya//oM shU n+yat+tA dz+nyAn badz+rAs+thA b+ha Ar+thaka ts+tsha/dngos po rnams cad ma lus par//namakha' lta bur du rnam
152a2(rgyud): par bya//der ner skyes nyi dkyil 'khor//dmar po 'od zer 'khrigs pa skam//de dbus 'ahUM yige sngon po yi//'od kyis 'gro ba'i bdud bsal te//slar yang yi
152a3(rgyud): ge lo gzhug par//rdo rje khro mo yongs su rdzogs//zhal gsum phrag drug me dpung bzhugs//thugs ker nyi mar hUM sngon bsam//'od kyis srung ba'i 'khor lo bya//shar
152a4(rgyud): da du m+b+hi thug pa// N+Dir+m+ma byud du med/byung shar hU~M ga ma shir b+hU mo// nA nu byu rgyu//'og tu sna tshogs rdo rdzu //daphyugs
152a5(rgyud): gur//gsang sngags brjod pas bsgom par bya//hU~M las 'od zer rab spras pas//'khor lo bkod pa'i phyi rol tu//rdo rje rtsi gsum ra ba dang //gur nau rab tu bsgom
152a6(rgyud): par bya//de rjes rdo rje khro mo ni//zhu nas rang bzhin med par gyur//de las nyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i//bdud bzhi mnan cing nyi zla ni//A li kA li las byung ba'o//bar du
152a7(rgyud): hUM las rdo rje ni//khri ma'i rang bzhin 'od kyis bskor//khri mo dang bcas 'od zer rnams//rdo rje la bzhugs sku bzhengs te//zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug 'am/
152b1(rgyud): yang na zhangs bzhis bdud bzhi mnan//zhal kun sngo zhing khro gtor can//dmar sor gyon sgra thod phreng can//rdo rjes lus rgyan na mkha'i mdog/bcu gnyis phyag ste g.yas pa
152b2(rgyud): na//rdo rje zhags pa mda' gsor zhing //sbrul dang dgra sta gri gug 'dzin//g.yon pa dril bu bsdigs mdzub gzhu//dbyig pa rtse gsum tho ba'o//yang na phyag drug g.yas dang
152b3(rgyud): pos//rdo rje gnyis pas lcags sgrog ste//gsum pas mda' ni gsor bar byed//g.yon gyi dang pos bsdisngags mdzud ste/gnyis pa sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o//gsum
152b4(rgyud): pas gzhu ste 'gengs pa'i tshul//rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma yi//bsam gtan ting 'dzin la gnas na//yon tan kun gyi bdag nyid kyi//sngags kyu rtse bar 'gyur ba'o//sngags kyi
152b5(rgyud): bdag nyid yongs su bskyed//lha yi rang bzhin sgrub pa yi//rin chen gzungs kyi phreng bas ni//ches rnams mtha' dag thob 'gyur te//ral gri mig sman ril bu dang //rkang pa
152b6(rgyud): byugs dang gter chen dang //sa 'og 'gro dang bcud len dang //na mkhar 'gro dang gser skyar dang //de bzhin sa gzhan 'gro ba dang //zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyad//
152b7(rgyud): rmongs dang rengs dang paskrad pa dang //dbye dang dgug dang rig sngags 'chang //srung dang phyir zlog chen po dang //zhwa dang sbugs dang sems brgyal dang //long dang sna tshogs nad skyed
153a1(rgyud): pa'o//sbyor ba rgya chen 'grub pa dang //mngon shes drug pa yod sa rgyu zhing //sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lci//phyag rgya chen po thob 'gyur na//ltas mthong
153a2(rgyud): tsam la sogs pa yi//dngos grub phra mo smos ci dgos//sngags kyi sbyor ba bskyed pa'i lho//dmigs pa'i rtse bar gyur pa yi//hU~M las skyes pa'i lha mo ni//sngon mo zhal gsum
153a3(rgyud): phyag drug ma//g.yas pa ser zhing g.yon pa dmar//spyan gsum sdong mig khri gnyer can//dmar sar gyen skra thod pas rgyan//rus pa'i rgyan gyis spras shing 'gying //
153a4(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng can klu yis brgyan//zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum ro la brdzis//phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na//rdo rje gnyis pas gri gug ste//gsum pas sbrul gyi zhags
153a5(rgyud): pa 'dzin//g.yon gyi dang po bsdigs mdzub ste//gnyis pas thod pa gsum pa na//sbrul gyi zhags pa dkar po'o//yang na zhal kun sngo sangs nyid//'dis ni 'chang
153a6(rgyud): dang dbang gi las//mtha' dag rdzogs par byed pa'o//srid par bram ze las skyes lha mo ni//sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma//phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon lcag sgrob/
153a7(rgyud): gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan ldan pa//bsad pa'i los rnams thams cad ni//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 'das sgrub//de nas po tsam ldan rdo rje can//chos rnams thams cad 'byung
153b1(rgyud): byekhyod cing //dngas grub myur du spyod pa lo//phyag rgya 'byung zhes bya ba yi//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//yan lag phyag rgya bka' stsal pa//lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas shing //
153b2(rgyud): slor la khu tshur bcang byas te//rgyu ba gnyis sprad nas mdzub ma dang //mthe'u chung lcags skrag bcing byas te//kha yau thad kar bzhig nas ni//rig pa'i 'phreng po brjod pa yis//
153b3(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad 'grib par byed//phyag rgya bcings nas gsang sngags ni//rjesu dran par byas tsam gyis//lam du 'gro yang bde bar thar//gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par
153b4(rgyud): byed//'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i rgyud kyi rig sngags las lha dang phyag rgya gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/
153b5(rgyud): rjes kyi sbyar ba bla na med//mtshungs pa'i tshogs kun 'grub byed pa//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis nyon//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu maM/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya
153b6(rgyud): shre ye hU~M/dbang bskur ba ni bla na med//dri ma'i tshogs rnams dag byed cing //ji sri ye shes tshogs rgyas nas//rig pa'i rgyal po zab par byed//dzaHhUM baM hoHoM badz+ra puSh+pe
153b7(rgyud): AHhUM s+t+rihA/d+hU pa dI pi gan+d+he/nai d+ye AHhUM swAhA/oMk+ShI d+hIHsa~M ka la/g+ha na be na wa re/sh+tsar+ya saM pa ri wa ra/a a a~M/a d+hi tits+tsha/a d+hi ti ran+d+he/sar+b+bad shaM do ka/
154a1(rgyud): /lo kA pA la/lo ka pA la/i mo ba liM gr-it+ta tu/kha dan+d+ha pi ban+du hUM phaT/kha kha khA hi khA hi/l+li l+li badz+ra DA ka Ad+b+ha pa ya ti swA hA/ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba
154a2(rgyud): yis//rnam par rtog pa spong bar byed//mchod pa dang ni gter ma yis//bar gtsid thams cad sel bar byed//oM kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/gang zhig dbang pos
154a3(rgyud): yul mtshan pa'i//mtshon bya mtshan nyid rnam shes dang //ye shes nyid ni mngon sum du//skye ba nyid la the tsom med//de nas rgya chen sbyor ba'i gtso//'khor lo cho ga bshad
154a4(rgyud): par bya//gro ga ras sam shing shun la//gur gum gi'u wang tsan dan bcas//pu ka ser po 'khor lo bri//rtsibs bcu pad+ma'i steng du bri//mtha' nas me yi phreng bas bstor//
154a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'dab ma bcu la ni//phyogs bcu kun tu bcing ba yi//rdo rje la sogs bcu po bri//de yi rgyab tu phyogs bcu rnams//bcing ba'i sngags ni rim bzhin bri//'khor lo'i rtsibs
154a6(rgyud): rnams bcu po la//hUM gnyis bar du bsgrub bya'i ming //srung ba bcas pa bri bar bya//phyogs bzhir sngags dang phyag rgya dang //'khrul 'khor gcod dang 'tshang ba dang //'gugs
154a7(rgyud): pa'i sngagasu bcas pa po//gzhan yang mtshams rnams drug por ni//lha dang klu dang lha ma yin//gnod sbyin grul dum la sogs pa//bcang ba drug po bri bar bya//
154b1(rgyud): bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs brtan no//skyol byung thugs kar thal ma sbyar//mdzes pa'i gos ldan bri bar bya//de rjes gsang sngags phreng ba nyid//stong phrag gcig tu brjod byas nas//de rjes
154b2(rgyud): bstod pas bstod byas te//gser sogs dril nas lus sam mgul//gang 'de'i gan su gdags par bya//des ni rnal 'byor srung don du//ji ltar bsams pa kun 'grub ste/
154b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa brgyad pa med par byed//de nas gzhan yang rgyal po'i ras//gsar la tsan+da dan ga pur dang //dri zhim rnams kyis byas nas ni//rgyu skar rgyal gyi nyi ma la//gur gum
154b4(rgyud): gyi ni 'khor lo bri//dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa'i//phyi rol mu khyud gsum ldan pa'i//pad+ma lte bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs//yan lag rdo rjes mtshon pa de//de la snying po'i
154b5(rgyud): sngags kyis bskor//de rjes lta ba'i mu khyud la//steng 'og bcing ba'i sngags kyis bre//phyogs mtshams sngags rnams 'dab ma la'o//phyi rol mu khyud dang por ni//rtsa ba'i sngal
154b6(rgyud): ris dgod par bya//gnyis par 'od kyi rodzi ni//de zhim dkyil 'khor snying gzhag ste//rang nyid lha yi sbyor rdzogs bya//thugs ka'i sa boni 'od kyis ni//na mkha' 'khor
154b7(rgyud): sbyangs byas te//yi ge hU~M gi rnam par bsam//de yongs gyur las sku tshogs snam//de dbus shes zi rnam par bsam//zla dbus steng du hU~M las ni//'khor lo rtsibs ldan
155a1(rgyud): bsgom par bya//der ni yi go'i rnam pa ni//mar me lta bu gsal dmigs la//mkha' 'gro ma dang dbyer med bya//rang snyid sa bon las byung ba'i//gsang sngags/
155a2(rgyud): stong phrag bzlas byas nas//gser sogs dril nas lus sam mgul//btags na 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob//thams cad du ni srung bar nges//yungs kar ba yi rnam lnga dang //
155a3(rgyud): dur ba'i snyi mar bcas pa la//gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas nas ni//rgan mo ming med sbyor ba yis//gonas gsum thig le byas srung na//tshe ni stong phrag du mar 'phel//
155a4(rgyud): ku sha ba mar yungs kar ti la//gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas byas te//shis par gyur po'i nyi ma la//mchod rten spyi bor gdogs byas na//'gro bu'i nad rnams 'chad
155a5(rgyud): par 'gyur//khrag dang khro tshur bcas pa la//gseng sngags stong phrag gsum bzlas te//zla ba gzas bzung dusu ni//nye bsnyen rdzogs par byas nas ni//rdzas ni shin tu sba
155a6(rgyud): byas te//lha tshogs gnod pa gang dmigs pa'i//snying kar sngags ni bsnun byas na//gang dmigs bgegs ni rnam par 'jig/ras bal gosal bar gyur pa la//shes
155a7(rgyud): rab mtshan ldan khrus byas te//shis pa'i nyi ma la bkal nas//bcings pa'i drangs kyis mdud byas te//stong phrag gcig gi sngags bzlas nas//lus sam mgul lam
155b1(rgyud): /spyi bong gdags//des na tshol stong phrag thub//yang na rang lus rnams bsgoms nas//chu yi tshogs kyis dag byas te//nywa shu rtsa gcig grangs ldan par//gzus kyi phreng ba brjod byas
155b2(rgyud): no//gser phyag lag tu ma blangs shing //bden bral phyi rol ma song bar//gzhan gyi 'jigs pa ma bsngal zhing //tshe lo brgya ni rtsa brgyad par//rims nad tsam yang me gnod//
155b3(rgyud): gis dang zas dong snod spyad dang //sman la sogs pa'i rjes rnams ni//mi 'khrugs rgyal po'i phyag rgyu yis//bsrungs na cis kyang mi shod//seng ge rngam pa'i stabs kyis ni/
155b4(rgyud): drug pa'i sgra gsumi brjod byas na//phyi rol rig sngags stong phrag ni//dums cis kyang mi tshugaso//klu yi dbang po gnas lugs kyis//rtse gcig rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcas//
155b5(rgyud): nas gsang sngags gsum brjod na//nad dang gdon la sogs pa sel//ri bong nu ma'i mtshams byas nas//hUM gis mnan pa'i sngags kyis ni//dmigs med ting 'dzin yid
155b6(rgyud): bstan ning //'dis kyang gnod pa las srung 'gyur//phyi rol stsogs pa kun spangs nas//snang ba yid kyis bslab byas te//mi snang ba la mngon dmigs nas//srung ba rnams
155b7(rgyud): kyi dam pa bshad//de nas gzhan yang sbyor ba bshad//dur khrod la sogs 'jigs gnas sim//mtsho dang mtshe'u dang dgon gnas dang //gnas dang skyed mos tshal chen dang //
156a1(rgyud): me tog tshal lam yul 'khor ljongs//chu yi 'gram 'am shing gcig gam//yang na rang gi khyim nyid du//maN+Dal legs par byugs pa la//brten nas
156a2(rgyud): lha yi sbyor ba sgrub//ras ris la sogs mdun byas te//bde ba'i bstan la skyil krung gis//bsdad nas mnyam gzhog brtsam par bya//tha mal sbyangs pa'i lus kyis na//thar
156a3(rgyud): nga chen po thob 'gyur te//gzhan du de ltar ma yin no//sa gzhi shin tu nyams dga' zhing //legs par bkod pa'i ri bo lnga//nags chal shin tu sdug pa la//sil ba'i
156a4(rgyud): chu rgyun 'bab pa'i phyogs//rnam pakod me tog tshal gseb tu//shar du sgo bstan khang pa la//sngags bzhis mtshams bcing cho ga yis//gsal/khung dang bcas brtsigs
156a5(rgyud): pa'i phyogs//ston pa'i bya yis sgra sgrogs shing //dri zhim spos dang ldan pa li//dril bu sim sil sgra snyan sgrogs//lU ldi gos kyi phreng bas dkris//lhag pa'i 'dulardzi
156a6(rgyud): rnams spangs nas//spyod pa 'thun pa'i grogs dang ni//bde bar byang chub bsgrub par bya//'on kyang gnas dang grogs la sogs//rnal 'byor yid 'jug phyir brtsam so//
156a7(rgyud): mtha' dag spangs pa'i pha rol na//lhag pa'i byang chub ma mchis//bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams//rang gi sems las 'byung mod kyi//sems rtog ma lus spab
156b1(rgyud): pa las//dus ni chos gzhan 'ga' ma bshad//dro bas sems rtog sna tshogs rnams//spang bar bya phyir sna tshogs thabs//sngags drang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang //sbyor ba rgya chen
156b2(rgyud): rnams bshad//drag po sgrub pa'i thabs 'ga' ni//rig pa'i khro mos mnyan par gyis//so gzhi bdud rtsi lnga yis byug/me yi dkyil 'khor sa bon bcas//dur khrod
156b3(rgyud): phre gus bra bar bya//dar ni pho mo thod pa la//phyi rol dmar nag tshon gyis byung //nang du sna tshogs rdo rje ni//mu khyud gsum ldan bri bar bya//dbusu rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i//
156b4(rgyud): snying po sngags bcas bri rab bya//rdo rjer ni thams cad la//hUM bri ma khyud gnyis phreng sngags//gsum par khro bo'i sngags bri'o//thod pa kha bor nang du ni//ske tshe yungs
156b5(rgyud): kAr ba can dug dang //lan cha lag dang sha chen dang //rkang rjes sa la sogs pa blugs//gcer bu rnal 'byor skye bshig nas//lha yi sbyor ldan lhor bltas nas//zhabs
156b6(rgyud): kyis thod pa'i 'khor lo ni//man te sngags phreng brjod par bya//khro bo chen po'i sbyor ba yis//mnyam po zhag nas ni sdong drag tu//bzlas pa mtshan pyod par byas na/
156b7(rgyud): bsrad pa nyid la the tsom med//dur khrod a la 'khor lo na//dbusu me yi dkyil 'khor can//rtsibs brgyad mu khyud gsum ldan pa//dbus su snying po sngagaso rnams la/
157a1(rgyud): dzI gnyis bar du bsgrub bya'i ming //bsad pa nyid dang ldan par bya//mu khyud gnyis pa phreng sngags kyang //ming dang bsad par ldan pa'o//gsum pa khro bo'i sngags
157a2(rgyud): bris te//'khor lo mchod cing byin rlangs nas//dgra gzugs sor brgyad snyeng khar gzhug/de nyid til mar gyis byugs te//thod pa gnyis kyi 'khor la yi//bar du bcug
157a3(rgyud): nas me steng du zhag/seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pa//mnyam gzhag sbyor bas sngags dri gdab//gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis//shi bar 'gyur la gzhan du min//yang na
157a4(rgyud): byang chub ye ni leg les//dur khrod khrag gis 'khor lo bri//gru gsum brtsegs pa'i gzugs bris te//dbus dgra meng gsang sngags bcas//rtsibs la bcu gnyis bar du/
157a5(rgyud): ni//ming dang bsad pa bcas pa blo//mu khyud dang po'i sngags phreng yang //rgyas pa'i yan lag ldan par bri//spra tshol gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa'i//snying kar bcug
157a6(rgyud): nas skra yis dkri//rnal 'byor pa yi nyal ba'i zhabs//mgo bo lhor bstan bzhog par bya//chu shel mthong me bar du ni//nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod nas//mi yi rdo rje'i
157a7(rgyud): dar gyis rgyan//sdang byed sa steng 'dir mi gnas//klu yi gnasu grags pa 'am//chu yi rdzings la sogs 'gram du//dkyil 'khor ba yi rnam lngas byug/pad+ma dmar

157b2(rgyud): pa / du dgas pa / / sa dge zhing/rnams pa'is skyes //rnams 'di sa pa'i
157b3(rgyud): ste///sa kyibad//da pa'i de ma thug tu nirgyun yang 'ab bar 'gyur//grul te thu rgod pa 'as na/
157b4(rgyud): bcom rgyan na//klog gi phreng ba gtar byed na//tsha chen 'dzings la thotsam med//wa mo khrig des 'gro ba la//gong gi 'khor lo bad pa yi//zangs dang ldan
158a1(rgyud): bri byas nas//dur khrod sa las byas pa yi//rnga mo'i snying kar bcug nas kyang //rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni//sbyor bltas bkra' yi sbyor ba yis/
158a2(rgyud): gsang sngags khri phrag gcig brjod na//bskrad pa nyid la the tshom med//sbrul dang sre mo'i khrag gis ni//rta dang ma he'i lpags pa la//mnyam du gnyis kyi gzugs bris te/
158a3(rgyud): dbye ba'i sngags dang bcas pa yi//'khor lo thod pa'i gzugs bris la//lpags pa gnyis kyis bkris byas pa//zla gam bye brag dkyil 'khor lo//brten pas dbye ba'i
158a4(rgyud): sbyor ba rdzogs//mchil dang tsan dan ga pur bsres//zla gam dbyibs kyi dkyil 'khor lo//snying po dbang gi sbyor bar bcas//nub tu bltas nas bsgrubs pa yi//lha yi
158a5(rgyud): dbang po dbang du 'gyur//rgyud kyi khyad par sbyor ba'o//dri yi rgyal po sna tshogs kyis//shing gi lo ma dkar po la//rdo rje rgya gram gnyis brtsegs kyis//phyogs kyi rnga rnams hUM
158a6(rgyud): gis spras//mtshoms kyi rdo rnams dbu ma lo//b+h+rUM br-i ra yo yan lag la//phaT ni phyir la bltas pa bri//rgya chen gsol ba gdab par bya//gos bzang ma ni skyugs shing
158a7(rgyud): du/dang cug nas rgyal mtshan rtser btags na//rlung deng thog dang ser ba gcod//dman pa rnams dang 'brel ba spang //thal ba chu dang nyung kar la//sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas
158b1(rgyud): /rgyun la sogs pa lazhan // ba nam smos na dbyur 'gyur// ma pa satwA sno thal//bstugs nas lus la thugs tsam thos//dran chags na
158b2(rgyud): rnam nadu lus/tu na par bye//rigs pa sa na gnan mi
158b3(rgyud): bshad byug/sbyini sgeg pas kyi sbyong ba phyis/dus grub thams pade m+b+hi byed do//sgo tshogs lhums man pa byas//slo lnga smos shing gso/ med// la dang
158b4(rgyud): sras gan dang //u phyi chen la nag gi/ dun na smon nan kyi'i drugs kyi //da sa sa du
159a1(rgyud): /mAr brgya phrag rAr sbyin//sbyor bcus sbyin srog rdzogs pa dang //zhag bdun gyis ni bsgrub bya ste//shi bar 'gyur lnga tho tsom med//glang sha sbal sha pr-i la
159a2(rgyud): ku//sbyin sreg stong gis bsgob bya zhing /bya blo sdong ma d+ya d+hi dang //ling ga glang po bas shar bcas//sor por byas la stong phrag ni//gcig gis 'brel du rangs par byed//
159a3(rgyud): sbrul rto no'u li mA hi'i sha/khyi rog 'ug sha stong phrag gcig/sreg pas bsgrub bya 'bye bar nges//bra bo 'bras bu ra shi khrag/stong phrag gcig gis lkugs par 'gyur//rje
159a4(rgyud): mi bya rog rgan po'i sha//sa lu dmar til dkar bI dang //yungs kar ser po la sogs pa//stong du bsregs pas skrod par byed//'bru lnga smad 'tshong rang 'byung gis//nam
159a5(rgyud): byeng nub tu kha bltas dbyug//me tog pad+ma dang bcas pa'i//kha dog dmar dang ldan pa yis//'od zer dmar ldan stong phrag gis//nges par 'gug dang dbang du 'gyur//
159a6(rgyud): til bcas mar gyi sbyin sreg ni//stong phrab byas na sdig pa 'byang //mar dang dur ba tsan dan bcas//sbyin sreg stong gis tshe 'phel 'gyur//ku sha byang chub shing 'bras bu//
159a7(rgyud): yungs kar dkar po len tshwa yi//stong bsregs 'gro ba'i nad rnams 'chad//yungs kar sha chan phye ma dang //dur khrod thal ba dug sna tshogs//khro chu phye ma'i sbyin sra
159b1(rgyud): stong //lus pas byas na lha tshogs 'jig/ud pal dmar dang yang na dkar//gur gum dmang po'i sbyin sreg ni//stong rngu brgyad tsam bstsogs byas pas//rigs ldan bu mau dang
159b2(rgyud): du 'gyur//a ru ra dang yungs kar dang //ba'i 'o ma stong bsregs na//rnam thos rgyal po'i gter tsam gyis//longs spyod chen po 'thob byed cing //oM rak+Sha rAk+ShaM ku ru haM/srung
159b3(rgyud): ba'i sdig so//oM shAn+tiM ku ru au//thams cad du zhi ba'i sngags//hA wa sha ku ru hA/mtha' dag dbang du bya'o//swa puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/thams cad du rgyas par byed pa'i sngagaso//
159b4(rgyud): phaT hU~M mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/gsod pa'i sngags//bo bi di sha ya bi//dbyi bar byed pa'i sngagaso//AM uts+tsha Ta ya I/bskrad par byed pa'i sngagaso//laM s+t+r-i b+ho ya ste b+ha ya li/
159b5(rgyud): rengs por byed pa'i sngags so//ri dzA ra dzA ra raM//rims bskyed pa'i sngagaso//dzo A kaR+Sha ya hAMHdza/dbug pa'i sngagaso//oM ba rau sha ba ta ya pa ta ya au//tshar pa dbab pa'i
159b6(rgyud): sngag so//yi shi le b+hi sti b+ha ya laM//ser ba bcad pa'i sngagaso//dz+re dza te ya dze taM ya dzaM/zhi bar byed pa'i sngagaso//hI ya ra yany+tsa/mi tra/ti tra/ts+tshan+de ts+tshin+daM/bin+d+ha bin+ta/ban+na
159b7(rgyud): n+d+he/zhes pa ni thams cad du rig sngags gcod par byed pa'i sngagaso//rig pa'i rgyal po bla med no//gseng chen 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur//gsong chen rgyud 'di ngo mtsha
160a1(rgyud): to//rmad byung bas ches rmad du byung //dAstan pa snying pos gas d+ma chen 'di//gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu ni//phyogs bcu'i rig sngags 'chang bla rnams//ngo mtshur
160a2(rgyud): bskyed nas thal mo sbyar//bde ba'i snying po shin tu legs//leg so legaso rdo rje 'dzin//gang lnga bde bskyed dang la thob byed//bdag cag rnams le thugs rje yis//rgyud kyi snying
160a3(rgyud): po 'di bshad pa//rje chen legs ngo mtshar che//'phags pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa las sbyin dusrog gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud rtog pa ur+yan nas
160a4(rgyud): byung ba rdzogaso///paN+Di ta a tu la tA sha badz+ra zhus nas/bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur ba'o///
160a5(rgyud): rgyu ga ru skad du/Ar+ya tsun+de de bi nA mad+hA rad+h+r-i/bod skad du/'phags pa lha mo baphrul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzung sa/dkon mchog su ma la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das
160a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnar snang mdzod la phyag 'tsha'o//btsos lha mo bskul byed ma mthu dang stabs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/
160a7(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa la phyag 'tshal//bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dge bar mdzod
160b1(rgyud): cig/na maHsam+b+ha nA/sar+b+bak+ka bud+d+ha ka Tin+tu/d+ha r+N+Na/oM tsa la tsu la gun+d+he rAhA/brtson 'grus chen po thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/stobs co ba pha rol gnon pa tsha ba/phyag na ral gyi dang /
160b2(rgyud): dgra sta dang /lcags kyu drung /zhig pa bsnams pa/khro bo chen mo/khro bo chen mo'i dbang phyug ma/drag pa'i gzugs canA ma/zhal ras mtha' yas ma/phyog stang mnga' ma
160b3(rgyud): ma phyem ma/gzhan gyis ma thub ma/don yid ma/gdul bar dka' ma/mig stong ma/de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi byin gyis brlabs ma/lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing

160b6(rgyud): suM sr-i/rUn+taM/a be sha ya/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+na/gr-ih+na pi mo gr-ih+na pa ya/ha ra ha ra/b+h+yany+dzaHny+dzi/sa ra~M sa ro/mar mA ra/ma ra yaM ma ra yaM/ bcu/da ha da ha/grAn+tha
160b7(rgyud): br-id+d+ha/sdang ba'i gdon dang /rims zhig gcig pa dang /zhag gnyis pa dang /zhig sum pa dang /'ag bzhi pa dang /'gang dran pa dang /rtag pa'i rims da /

161a3(rgyud): shA ya/d+hU pa ya d+hU ba yaM/ut+pa s+yAd ya/ut+mas+yAd ma/rten tan dz+nyAH/s+yA sa dap+ta nI/m+bA yam+bA ra ya/ni///d+hId+hI/
161a4(rgyud): le tsun+de sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa lha mo bskul byed ma'i mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyi bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/'phaT

161a6(rgyud): rig sngags/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu

161b1(rgyud): somasnang par gyur pan/blangs rkyen byung ngasan//sdus dang ldan pa'ar bo la//de rgyul de yi dul gnas che//gzhon nu snod rnams brgya mi mtshan//ya nA yA si dgas can la/

161b3(rgyud): dri la de 'bod 'bod du 'jug/bu khyud tshur shog rdo la nyon//nga la dug sel ces bya ba//dug 'jig rig sngags dam pa yod//dug rnams gang yin de kun ni//nga yi mi

161b5(rgyud): A g+ha ne/i li/i li ye/AM khA m+b+hi li/a baM i ye/shwe te shA~M taM/tun+taM/oM na mu/rat+tek+te swAhA/dge slong dag nga'i dug sil gyi rig sngags 'di ni/sbyin pa thams cad dkar
161b6(rgyud): po ste/sus rig sngags 'di lan cig thos pa de la la bdun gyi bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o//de'i lus la dug gis mi chug so//sbrul gang zhig de la 'dzin pa de'i mgo shing ar+tha ka'i
161b7(rgyud): dag pa bzhin du chal pa bdun du 'gas//gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di sgrol gyi mdun du brjod par mi byora'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ la de chi ba'i phyir ro//'di lta ste/i la mA/

162a4(rgyud): dug sel gyi 'byung po 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags gang brjod cing bsnyed pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin no//gzhan ma yin pa de bzhino//yang dag pa'o//bden pa'o//ma nor
162a5(rgyud): ba'o//phyin ci mi log pa'o//dug 'di mi 'dug par gyur cig/sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song zhig/'dzin pa'i gan du song zhig/me'i nang du song zhig/chu'i nang du song zhig/thang
162a6(rgyud): la song zhig/ka ba'i nang du song zhig/rtsig pa'i gan du song zhing //na mkha' la song zhig/sa'i nang du song zhig/zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
162a7(rgyud): stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs//

162b2(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na lha bo dkar po lta bu'i rdo lab la byang chub sems dpa'i stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/bla na med pa ya
162b3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/skye ba gcig gis thogs pa shA stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
162b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka' stsal pa/legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par mi 'dod pa des/'das
162b5(rgyud): pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo //ma tha so//ma myong //gang gis 'od ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang /thos pa
162b6(rgyud): dang /myong ba des gzungs thob//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gis bsod nams byas zhes mi 'dzin/bdag gis
162b7(rgyud): bsod nams ma yin pa dang //dge ba dang mo dge ba bya'o zhes mi 'dzin to// ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni gzugs 'dzin
163a1(rgyud): par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i rnams la dngos
163a2(rgyud): por ram/mtshan nyid du mi rtog/yongasu mi rtog ste/rkyen du ma yin/rkyen med par ma yin/'gro bar ma yin/'gro ba med par ma yin/'chi 'phor ma yin/skye bar ma
163a3(rgyud): yin/stong par mo yin/mi stong par ma yin/mtshon mor ma yin/mtshan ma med par ma yin/smon par ma yin/smon pa med par ma yin/skye bar ma yino//'gag

170b1(rgyud): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/rgyal po chen po legaso legs//sems can chen po khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang /'jig rten tha~Md
170b2(rgyud): la bde ba dang /sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhus pa yang lag so//rig sngags kyi rgyal mo tshan mo rgyal ba can 'di gang yongasu skyab pa dang /
170b3(rgyud): yongasu bzung ba dang /yongasu bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang /dug dang /byad dang //gsod byed dang /rims dang /gdon thams cad kyi mi tshugs por 'gyur//
170b4(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab po'o//lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bzung zhig/tshengs shig/
170b5(rgyud): kun chub par gyis shig/lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam po'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/sems can drag shul can dang ldan pa/shin tu mi bzad pa mdadra
170b6(rgyud): 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang /srin po rnams dang /chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyuraro//tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul 'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe/rig
170b7(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal ma rgyal ba can 'dis sems can mi mnyam pa dang /sems can mi bzad pa de dag dang /sdang ba dang na rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur//
171a1(rgyud): chur gcod par 'gyu/rig sngags kyi rgyus chen po rgyal bcan na kyi stsol 'khor thams cad rnam par 'dzums par byed pa 'dren/sangs rgyas b+h+rUM gad+hAn
171a2(rgyud): khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsus pa/byin gyis brlabs pa/phyog rgyus btago/rig sngags kyi rgyal ma rgyal bcan 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
171a3(rgyud): le gsang ba'i bdage bo la gan rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di med ci lags/'di ji ltar bzung por bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
171a4(rgyud): stsal pa/lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pa dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal
171a5(rgyud): tsan zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsol nas/gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma
171a6(rgyud): yi dang dro zar bcas pa'i 'dzug rten mi rang n+ti/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa sa mngon par brjod do//'jigs pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzus rdzogs/
171a7(rgyud): drug da du/Ad+yam sbru dadrug rgyan pa/bod skad du/'alags pa rin sngags kyi rgyal mam bya'i yang mying shes bya ba/bcom ldan da ma bya chen ma la phyag 'chag
171b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//chos la phyag 'tshalo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo//dgra yis 'jogs pa 'am/'thab rtsod kyis 'jigs pa 'am/bgegs kyis 'jigs pa 'am/
171b2(rgyud): dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang /sbrul gyis 'jigs pa 'am/gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa'am/dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/me'i 'jigs pa 'am/chus 'jigs pa
171b3(rgyud): 'am/rlung gis 'jigs pa 'am/'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o//rlung las gyur pa 'am/mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/bad kan las gyur pa 'am/'dus
171b4(rgyud): pa las gyur pa 'am/gdon gyis zin tam/rims kyi btab pa 'am/dug 'thungs sam/nod thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o//na mo b+ha ga ba twe/in+d+rA ya/in+d+ra grA
171b5(rgyud): mi sik+ShA yA/A sha ne pA sha nAM/pU pa ni klu laM/ka pi lo mit+ta/i li mit+ta swA hA/gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/nA nA ya Ni/pA rA ya Ni/ti ri ta/tA li/
171b6(rgyud): kun+d+ha la~M/i lI mi sti/ki li ti li mi sti sni hA/rig sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ha ha hi hi hu du/kha rA/ma rA/kha hi kha ta/hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/bdag la bsrungs
171b7(rgyud): shig bsrungs shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ston pa rgya mthong bar shog shig/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod de/gtor mar chen po la btang por bya'o//des thams cad ni zhing phyir
172a1(rgyud): bzlog par 'gyur//rmya bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa rdzogs///rgyu gar skad du/Ar+yA A gra pra d+hi ba d+hA rA NI d+hAnaNA/bod skad du/'phags
172a2(rgyud): pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgron ma mchog gi gzungs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdeg gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan
172a3(rgyud): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /lha dang mi 'bum phrag du ma
172a4(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
172a5(rgyud): zhing bye bo brgya phrag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas shes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrol+la mchog ces bya/
172a6(rgyud): ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po dang /'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams
172a7(rgyud): mi mdzad 'dir btang ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ro ba gau la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
172b1(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba dang song ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
172b2(rgyud): bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
172b3(rgyud): zhing bye bo phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrol ma mchog ces bgyi
172b4(rgyud): ba da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes 'chos kyang ston to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrol ma'i mchog des bdag
172b5(rgyud): cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mijed 'dir btang ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das
172b6(rgyud): la gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho bam/stobs dang bde ba dang /kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la reg par gnas som zhes snyun gsol to//'di skad
172b7(rgyud): ces kyang gsung ngo //'di na mi 'am mi ma lags pa 'am/'byung po 'am sha za'am/gnod sbyin nam srin po 'am grul bum 'am/grul bum gyi sde dpon nam/rgyal po 'am/
173a1(rgyud): blon po chen po 'am chom rkun nam/sbrul lam sbyin bu 'am/srin bu lu tA 'am sbrang bu lcags phye 'am/nyo nga'i nyon mongs pa gang rung bdag la 'tsho bar bgyod
173a2(rgyud): pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes gsung ngo //sems can rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang bde ba dang /mdangs dang ldan par 'gyi ba dang /gzi brjod dang ldan par bgyi ba dang
173a3(rgyud): brags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /srung ba dang sba ba dang sgrub pa'i slad
173a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrol ma'i mchog des gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag kyang bkur te/'di lta ste/
173a5(rgyud): dz+ha le dza li/dz+wa la gra te/tug gu/mug gu/sa ma ma tA/ma hA sa ma ma te/ma hA dz+wa le/dzI ba la ma/sa ha sa hwe/ma hA dz+re le/ug mug ke/sha me saM ma tenaM mahA
173a6(rgyud): sim te/mahA sha me swAt+ma/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dpa' bo la bka' stsal pa//kun dag bo khyod kyis gsang sngags pa mi 'di dag zung shig long shig
173a7(rgyud): chongs shig/lhags shog/kun chub par gyis shig/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o//gzungs kyi gsang
173b1(rgyud): sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par da/'o//kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ribs kyi bu mo gangal
173b2(rgyud): la ni gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang len pa dang 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs
173b3(rgyud): bdun du tsho rabs dran par 'gyur ro//tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /'gro ba thams cad dang rje su 'thun
173b4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'da'
173b5(rgyud): bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yino//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham paM stan las langs te/gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo
173b6(rgyud): g.yos pa'i lhang sA la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bau dar los su thal mo sbyar ba tud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang
173b7(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi don dang /sbyin pa dang bdi ba dang /mdangs dang ldan par 'bye ba dang /gni pad+hid+ma dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /grags pa dang ldan par dbye ba dang yon tan dang
174a1(rgyud): ldan par bgyi ba dang /stobs dang ldan par dgyi ba dang mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang bsrung bdang /sgru ba dang dasgyur pa skad du gzus kyi gsang sngags gna'
174a2(rgyud): rnams brjod par bgyi'o//'di lta ste/yAd tAM/prad te/nad te/ku nad te/puk+Sha se/ku pu ka se/ka se an ka se/ts+tsho ma ka sa/a nu tA/prA n+ya ta/kha dzo mA hA Sha
174a3(rgyud): rje/sad be pe/taDa pe//tu ra b+he/ha li ma l+ya ti le s+yAt+ma/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang

174a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o//gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o//kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par
174a6(rgyud): dka'o//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzus kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /len pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun
174a7(rgyud): chub par byed pa dang gzhan dag pa yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu gnyi su tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro//tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod
174b1(rgyud): thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /'gro bzungs cud dang rjesu 'thun par 'gyur//kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang rdzogs gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis
174b2(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa ste/gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'dir bar byed pa ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no//de nas 'jam dpa gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs
174b3(rgyud): to/gos drag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhu ngas la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
174b4(rgyud): gsol te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde ba dang /mdangs dang ldan par dbye ba dang /gzi brjid dang ldan par dgyi ba dang /

174b6(rgyud): sledu gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o//de 'di sti ste/ag khyaM/bag khe/nA dza ta/nA gla sa rAM/nA ti le/dzA hi le/dza ha li ba te/tsaN nI lo pa te swAt+ma/
174b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cha dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag zung shig/long shig tshangs shig/
175a1(rgyud): shag/kun chub par gyis shig/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/kun dga' sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o//gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di
175a2(rgyud): dag rnyed par dka'o//kun dga'i' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o//kun dga' ba rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi tham gang la las gzungs

175a6(rgyud): las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ngas kyang sems can rnams kyi don

175b2(rgyud): ne Te/Taka ye na kaM/te te Te/tra Da be ra Ta ke lo laM/hu le hi le/mi ma ho li/shI la shI laM/ar+d+he ba d+hin d+he kun D+haM/a Da ba tI/ka saM kaM saM ka se/phas pha sa pha si/man+ta
175b3(rgyud): pha se pheM sa~M swA hA/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag zung shig/long shig/chongs
175b4(rgyud): shig/lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o//gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di

175b6(rgyud): sdigs gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /len pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu bzhir cha gas dran par
175b7(rgyud): 'gyuraro//tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang /'gro ba thams cad dang rje su 'thun par 'gyur//kun dga'
176a1(rgyud): gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sa gsungs te/gang gzungs kyi gsang sngag sa gzhi 'di dag las 'drar bar byed
176a2(rgyud): pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag shing skam po ga shar bag med pa la
176a3(rgyud): bsrung ba byas pa te/yongasu bskyab pa dang /yongasu bzung ba dang bcing ba dang zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba byas na shing de la lcu bu dang /lo ma dag kyang skye bar 'gyur te/me
176a4(rgyud): tog dang 'bras bu rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur na/mir gyur pa lta ci smos/na maHsarba bud d+he b+hu/sid d+hun tu d+hA ra NA/man+ta pA da ni swA hA/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
176a5(rgyud): yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag sems can rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang /bde ba dang mdangos dang ldan par bya ba dang /gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang /
176a6(rgyud): grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang /yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang /stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang /bsrung ba dang sba ba dang /bskyab pa'i phyi ro gzungs
176a7(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags gzhi gzhan dag kyang bshad par bya'o//de 'di dag s+t+waM/ad te/mor te/pa ka/pA ri ke/pau ka DA/dra ma ti/ta ra ma ti/D+haDa ma ti/nr-i Di T+Ta re/su
176b1(rgyud): ti li/mu la/ti lo swA hA/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags ga ni 'di dag zung shog/lang shig/
176b2(rgyud): tshangs shig lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/gzhan dge la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o//gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi

176b6(rgyud): 'dra' ba dang /'gro ba thams cad dang rdza su 'thun par 'gyuraro//gang la la zhig la bsrung ba byas na de la yang 'byung po thams cad kyis mi chugaso//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /
176b7(rgyud): dri za dang lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang /mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugaso//sbrul dang srin bu dang srin bu lu ta dang /
177a1(rgyud): sbrang bu lcags phye thams cad kyis mi tshugaso//rims rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dus pa dang /dus tshogs 'gyur ba las 'byung ba thams cad kyis
177a2(rgyud): mi tshugaso//zhig gcig pa 'am/zhog gnyis pa'am/zhag gsum pa 'am/zhag bzhi pa 'am/zhag bdun pa 'am zla ba byed pa'am/zla ba gcig pa 'am lo gcig pa
177a3(rgyud): 'am/nang rgyun rings sam skad cig pa rnams kyis mi tshugs/'bras sam pol mig gam/rkang shu 'am lhog pa 'am mi dpal lam/shu ba 'am khyi rdo 'am/g.yan pa
177a4(rgyud): 'am/mdze thams cad dam/klog pa thams cad dam gshed byed thams cad dam/sgyur ba'i las thams cad dam/byad thams cad dang ro langs thams cad kyis kyang mi
177a5(rgyud): tshug so//kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba brag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te//gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da'
177a6(rgyud): bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin//kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'i/chomadun gyi nang na
177a7(rgyud): 'dug na yang yid la bya'o//srin po'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o//gcan zad khro bo'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o//'brog dgon pa'i nong na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o//
177b1(rgyud): klung dang bgrod dka' ba na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o//me'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o//chu'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o//de yid la byas pa de rnams las 'jigs pa de dag
177b2(rgyud): thams cad mi 'byung //dug zos pa thams cad kyang kha zas nyid du 'gyuraro//kun dga' ba gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa ni 'byung thams cad kyis mi tshugs//
177b3(rgyud): yi dgas thams cad dang srul po thams cad dang /gshed byed thams cad dang sbyar ba'i las thams cad dang /byed thams cad dang mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs te/
177b4(rgyud): kun dga' bo mdor na de la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugaso//kun dga' bo gsang ba'i rigs pa ni chod pas bral bar 'gyuraro//chad pas gcad pa'i rigs pa ni brdegs
177b5(rgyud): ngas brdegs pa'i rigs pa ni brgyad pas/brgyad pa'i rigs pa ni bsdigs pas/sdigs pa'i rigs pa ni mi chug du ltas pas thar bar 'gyuraro//kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags
177b6(rgyud): gzhi 'di dag gis gang la bsrung ba byas pa 'am/yongasu bskyab pa 'am yongasu bzung bas bcings pa'am/zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba byas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba de ni gnas med/
177b7(rgyud): lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jog rten dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dku dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi nang na yang ngas ma mthong /
178a1(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni gnod pa dang /nad 'gro ba dang 'khrug pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byin gyis brlangs par phyu/
178a2(rgyud): de nas chos kyi rnam blangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes la rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'od
178a3(rgyud): rgya cher rgyas par bgyi ba dang /chos smra ba de dag rje su yongasu gzung ba dang /dam pa'i chos ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas pa dang /bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa'i slad du gzungs kyi
178a4(rgyud): gosang sngags gzhi 'dri rnams rjes stsal bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la legaso zhes 'gyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po
178a5(rgyud): bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mo gsung bar gyur pas gnang ste/rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba gyur par gnang bar rig nas
178a6(rgyud): du brjod pa ched du brjod//de ni 'di lta ste/drin na ne/don Di/mad+hA na d+he/dza ma d+ha ne/stam d+hA ne/Ta Te/Ta Tan+de/mahAT Ta naM/ku te kud Ta ne/ma hA gud ta na/
178a7(rgyud): d+harma le/tsam lo swA hA/bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur gdang ba lags te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang li la gzungs sngags
178b1(rgyud): gaN+Te di dag 'dzin pa dang / na nas nga ba dan dzin gyi las ma togs par kunan gyi gnod bya thams cad las 'ad nga /gro ba byams ca nga su 'dun par 'jug
178b2(rgyud): ldani dam pa'i chos thams cad li su gzung ba la yang ba da 'byung bar myi 'gyur lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po 'di po dag la grags pa dge khyed brjod pa dun
178b3(rgyud): ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa lag so//leg so zhes bya ba byin//de nas bcom ldan dus kyis tshe dang ldan bathun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' ba khyod kyis de dag
178b4(rgyud): 'phrul che bar 'byor ba da //na yon che ba dang / bar 'a byu phyir gzus rnam bral na//'ang shig/seM sa shig/rtogs shig/kun chub
178b5(rgyud): shog gzhan dgu la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rgyas par dbyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gzung lag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par
178b6(rgyud): d+hArdzun pa'i phyir da rje rdzog suM bcad po di dag pa phrul to//gsu me sngags kyi de rje 'di//sangs rgyas dun gyis gdungs pa ti//sems can rnangs la yin pa'i phyir/de
178b7(rgyud): pa lan//gnan ma di y-i/len tupa pa'i kyi byed / pas dra pa gyur//ga
179a1(rgyud): 'di rjod byed de la//ma man grang yang rung ba dang //gnod sbyin grul bum srin po dag/nams kyang bar chad mi byed//gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed de la//'dod//
179a2(rgyud): khams dbang phyug gang yin pa//sdig can bdud de nam du yang //bar chad pyod par mi 'gyur//gzungs kyi sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi//pha ma dang ni phu nu dang //sring mo mdza'
179a3(rgyud): bshes gnyen dag kyang //log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro//de phyir gzungs sdigs mdo sde 'do//'jigs med gang gis thos gyur nas//gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed pa des//
179a4(rgyud): nams kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o//gzungs sngags 'di 'dzod byed de yi//bskal pa bye ba stong rnamasu//sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa//zhag bdun gyis ni byang bar 'gyur//
179a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang //bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun//gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed pa des//zhag bdun gyis ni zil gyis non//phyogs ba'i'i 'jig
179a6(rgyud): rten skyong ba po//rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/lus ngan dngon yul 'khor srung //mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po//kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan//'khor bcas blon
179a7(rgyud): btsas de dag kyang //gzungs sngags 'di na rjod byed pa//de la rtag tu srung bar byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
179b1(rgyud): dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /'phags pa byams pa dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha dang mi dang
179b2(rgyud): lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rengs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs po la mngon par bstod//'phags ma rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgrol ma mchog gi gzungs rdzogs
179b3(rgyud): so///rgyu gar skad du/Ar+ya s+yASh+Ta de bi d+hA rA t+naM/bod skad du/'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
179b4(rgyud): 'tshalo//de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum sdig pa thams cad byang bar mdzad ma/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad ma/bgegs thams cad rab tu 'jigs par
179b5(rgyud): mdzad ma/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mdzad ma/gzungs sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo mchog 'di gsung so//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/te te bu d+harmA tA ri/
179b6(rgyud): sarba pA ba na sha naM/brdza gaH/b+ha na dza b+han dza/marda mdza/gla mo ri ga ma b+ha rI/ta sa ha la/dam ma/ma thA ma tha/br-ing+ga na sa yAM/pad+mA na sa yaM sar+b+ba sha trun tA ra ma ti/bi ma
179b7(rgyud): le/pU ra ya mU ra ya/pya tid dz+nyod/sarba dud d+ha ba r+ya ba sid ti/b+ha ga ba ta ga na ga na/Ne ti dza haM/bi mas ni/kra ma Ni/d+ha ba ni/d+ha bi na ra ma/Nim+ba tang gi ge sr-ihA/bcom
180a1(rgyud): @ldan 'das mA ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzung so//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu kho b+h+yaHsarba thA/a ma ri/a ma ri/
180a2(rgyud): tar+tha d+han dza/d+hAn dza/d+h+yeH/mi tsa mi tsi/s+phoT ya s+pho Ta ye/ma tha ma tho/dur dAn ta da mA ka swA hA/na maHsarbo ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA te te/kAn
180a3(rgyud): da/sarba ta thA gA taM b+ha ne ko/b+ha d+hi na dad/trA Ta tA Te/hU~M phaT hUM phaT/gardza gardza/ba ra ma te/bi hU re ke swA hA/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbo mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/b+ha
180a4(rgyud): ga ba ti padz+nyA pA mi te aM/sarba pA pa yaM ka ri dzI ne/ardzi s+pha ra no/b+han dza b+ha na dza/ma tha ma tha/da ma da ma/A na ya A na ya/sa ra sau ra/mA ra yau mA ra ya/sarba
180a5(rgyud): bud d+ha dza ni tA ye swAhA/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/gardza gArdza/ma tha ma thA/d+hA ma d+ha ma/b+han dze b+han dza/dun tu b+hi/sarba ne ra go She/ha na ha nA/
180a6(rgyud): bi dz+nyA na sa yA/bi d+hA na sa ya/bi d+hA na sa ya/mo Ta ya ma Ta ya/da ha da ha/bi pu la ni rma la ni ra dza taM/a ha ra a ha ra/gad tshe gad tshe/sarba bud d+ha pa r+yA ba sa taM
180a7(rgyud): ma/mA bi lam pa swAhA/bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i gzung so//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/oM b+ha ga ba ti/

180b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'o gan so//na mtshosarbatwa thA ga tib+h+yaHsarba mu khaM b+h+yaHsarbatwA thA/d+hA tadz+nyA ta/mu hu mu hU~M/sarba pA pa bi shi d+ha ni skrihA/bcom ldan 'das me sdig pa tha~Md srong
180b3(rgyud): ba zhos bya ba'i gzung so//na maHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsarba mu kho b+h+yaHdz+nya kad+hA/mau Ta moT/do had te/sar+b+ba ta thA gra tA dz+nyA na ni dze te swAn+d+ha/bcom ldan 'das ma gdul dka'
180b4(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba'i gzung so//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yoHsarba mu khe b+h+yoHsarba thA/ha ha mi du me hu/dam dam/khA hi khAn+te/d+hun d+hun/ma tsi me tsa~M/dur dAn ta na ma ni s+yAt+ma/
180b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i gzung so//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba b+h+rU~M/mi tsi mi tsi/gar+dz+dza ga/smr-i ta ya s+thita
180b6(rgyud): ya/ma tha ma tha/da ma da ma swAhA/bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzung so//'jam dpal ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor
181a1(rgyud): 'ad gang gi lag na gnas pa nyon mongs pa dang bral dang 'gyur/'jogs pa dang brusmra bar 'gyur/dag pa N+DI mdun gyi rlu na jug gam+b+ha/srin du da
181a2(rgyud): 'dug gam/dgra'i nang na 'dug gas/'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang da ste/de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/tshamu rgan gyis matsam par mi 'gyur srin po la

181a4(rgyud): sa d+h+yas d+h+ya gar+b+ha ka~M Sh+Na k+sha zlag dum gyis dge par rtsab bsags pa sa dil nyon cig pazhin na du 'gyur/la dris kyi ma das rgyus da/byang chub tu
181a5(rgyud): dubu rnams kyis ying su thod par 'gyur/shi nas kyang byede ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/gang 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang yid la byed pa dang /mi gtong bar 'dzin pa ste

181b1(rgyud): dus min 'chi las rab tu zar//rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur//'tsho ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang //ngan 'gro rnams las bsgyings 'gyur to//sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung nas/

181b3(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi len dA bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo che ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

181b7(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nid kyis yongasu gzing ba'i sems can tshe thung ba yad/de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'a

182b4(rgyud): d+hA dza yA/sma sbyar/sbyar skrir/s+phA y-i skAr ye/sarba bud+d+ha s+yA d+d+hiSh+TA na shUd+d+he/bud+d+he dzud+d+hi/d+de d+h+we/meny+tsa su~M dz+dza/'adz+ra gar+b+ha/

182b6(rgyud): ga mas sargya sa hU~M ts+tsha \u0f7f/ d+d+he/ ma~M ba~M d+d+ha la ci r+b+yA /
183a1(rgyud): tsa ya/shaud+d+ha yA sho d+ha ya/dr-i sho d+ha ya tri sho d+hA ya/sam+b+han+dan maHya mo tsaya/s+yA man+dArasmai ba ri shud+d+he/swAr+m+ma thA ga ta d+hi dA ya a d+hiSh+TA na a tu
183a2(rgyud): mu dr-i bu d+h+waM/mahA mu dre mAd+ha mr-i d+hAHr+g+haM de/smyen/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi gtsug ter rnam par rgyal pa'i gzu sa 'di ni 'chi bdan chen po'i dbyug pa
183a3(rgyud): 'dzin po ste/dge byed sdig 'jims par byed pa 'di gro ga 'am gzhan zhig la bris te/mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag lo/rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor byas
183a4(rgyud): mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya byas na mchog gi tshe dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyuraro//de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni lo bdun thug/lo bdun po 'i tshe ni lo
183a5(rgyud): bdun cu zu'o//de ltar mchog cho 'thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang /nad med pa dang /skye ba dran par 'gyuraro//mchod rten la bzhug su gsol nas mgo la bcangs na nad
183a6(rgyud): chen po las grol bar 'gyuraro//gos sum shing shun le gi wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas nga'i gzus bris te/can dran gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhug su gsol
183a7(rgyud): te/rang khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba stong gi mchod pas mchod cing zla ba ro re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na nad las grol zhing tshe lo brgya thub par
183b1(rgyud): 'byung//nad mdan 'dam pA'i ngang bzhin la snang bya'o//yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten la bris pa rdo rje phreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i na
183b2(rgyud): du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi wang gis bris la kham por khwa sbyar gyi nang du bzhugasu gsol gsol la/rang gi khyim du bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod pa byas
183b3(rgyud): na rtag tu srung bar 'gyuraro//gzhan yang cho ga ni si la ma lhung ba'i lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkra mo ste mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la/
183b4(rgyud): a ga ru dang du ru ka'i bdug pa byas la de bzhin du dri yi chus gang ba'i snod me tog dkar pos rgyan te/gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam sku gzugs dbus bzhugasu
183b5(rgyud): gsol la/de la g.yon pa'i lag pas reg ste/g.yas pa'i lag pas phreng ba 'dzin pas/nyi ma re re zhing nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa cig dus gsum du bzlas pa byos lnga da
183b6(rgyud): chu khyor ba gsum 'thungasnga na nad med pa dang /tshe ring ba dang /dgra yongasu nyams pa dang /'dzin blo rno ba dang /ngag btsun par btsun par 'gyu ro//skye ba nas skye bar skye ba
183b7(rgyud): dran par 'gyur ro//de'i chus khang pa dang /phyugs kyi ra ba 'am/rta'i ra ba 'am/rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na rkun mo dang /sbrul dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po la
184a1(rgyud): sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ni na kyis so su gdungs par mi 'gyur//mgau la gaN+DI na nad de las grol bar 'gyur//da ltar tshe dngag tu med
184a2(rgyud): pa'i phan yon chen po'i gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu sbyar na de dang de ru zhi ba chen por 'gyur//so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te 'chos na nad med pa dang /
184a3(rgyud): blorno ba dang /tshe ring bar 'gyuraro//chu khyor ba gsum dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa cig yongasu bzlas te'i thungs na nad thams cad las yongasu grol zhing yun ring
184a4(rgyud): du'atsho bar 'gyuraro//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor
184a5(rgyud): ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bgyi/sku gzugs la sogs pa sgrub pa ji ltar
184a6(rgyud): bgyi/'dir sbyin skrag kyi ji ltar bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dri ba lags par smras pa ni//dpa' bo chen po legs lpags//sems can kun la phan
184a7(rgyud): brtse'i phyir/'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'odra dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stongs par zhugs nas de 'a
184b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gnangs 'ad gsungs pa na 'di sa m+b+ha/oM m+b+ha mai t+yA/a ma tod d+hA ba/a ma ta k+shaH/a mait+tA&/a mo tag man/
184b2(rgyud): a mr-i ta A yun te/ga grA na tit+ti/ka raraM sad+d+h+yak+Sha shak+Sha yAM kaN+Di me swAd+ha/zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis mchod rten byed pa'i 'jim pa blang ba dang /brug pa li sogs pa dang /
184b3(rgyud): gdugs gdags pa'i bar ji srid rdzogs par bya'o//'di'i cho ga ni/mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//gser dang in+d+ra nI la dang /dngul dang /
184b4(rgyud): pad+ma ra ga la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches spras pa sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan
184b5(rgyud): bsnams pa'o//me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri lag na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin log na gdugs thogs pa dang /g.yas
184b6(rgyud): dang g.yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang /rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa bya'o//de lta bu'i tsho gas mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i
184b7(rgyud): 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzung dris la/de'i rang bsrem bya snying po can du byis la drin ma no /
185a1(rgyud): dang bsres pa'i chu gtor zhing dri nam po'i me tog gis mchod pa stong phrag cig gis mdzod pa chen po byas twa/dkar de'i phyogs kyi chos brgyud kyi nyin zhab la bsgyung /
185a2(rgyud): bar gnas shing /sems can thams cad la phan pa'i zlos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong drug gcig bzlas par bya'o//zla ba re re zhing byas na zla ba drug gos che la steng nu
185a3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//rtag tu lo gcig tu byas na tshe lo 'bum thub par 'gyur ro//rtag tu byas na tshi lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang
185a4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor mchog tu 'gyuraro//de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni rab tu dge ba'i gnas su blangs la/dri zhim pos bsres la mchod rten la
185a5(rgyud): bya'o//steng brag gcig nas brtsoms te ji srid lnga 'am gcig bar du'o//nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyu le ba yang dag par bzhug su gsol
185a6(rgyud): l-i/ji skad gsungs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te/lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o//nyi ma re re zhing tshe dang blo gter bar byed pa'i
185a7(rgyud): gzungs kyi ched du byas te/sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o//sems can rnams la bcing ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang bar bya'o//
185b1(rgyud): zla bya gzhan re ro la mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa byas pa ni rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o//cho ga 'di yis ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyuraro//
185b2(rgyud): zla rno ba dang /nud med pa dang /tshe lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /skye ba dran par 'gyuro//gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa de rjes pa
185b3(rgyud): dang 'dra bar rang gi lus dor te/mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyuraro//yang de ni dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i
185b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur//rna ba'i bu gar dmyal ba'i sgra yang thos par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur/'di rnams kyi gan su 'gro ba med//
185b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pas gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa/gang gis sems can tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang nyam nga ba'i 'khor ba las grol
185b6(rgyud): bar byed pa ni gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la tshad dang ldan pa'i mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o//de nas gtsug tor rnam par rgya lnga pa zhes bya ba'i gzugs tshon sna ma lus pas
185b7(rgyud): gzungs kyi yi ge las sprul pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o//tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi phreng ba can/pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan lo bzhugs pa/stoni ka'i zla ba
186a1(rgyud): lta bu'i 'od can/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/zhal gsum pa/spyan gsum pa/phyag brgyad pa/g.yas pa'i zhal zhi ba gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan
186a2(rgyud): pa'o//g.yon pa ni mche bas ma mchu mnan pa mi bzad pa ud pa la sngon po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dong ldan pa'o//dbus ma ni sgeg pa dang bcas shing dkar ba'o//g.yas pa'i phyag

186b3(rgyud): snga bar nam langs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das ma zhal mthong bar 'gyuraro//de nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa ste ro//yang na ni thing ka de dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs

188a1(rgyud): yang na ral gri la sogs pa sgrub par 'dod na ring bkrol dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du thang sku bkram la stong gi mchod pa chen pos mchod la/bzlas

191a4(rgyud): tiSh+Tha haM/sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThAn adz+nyoSh+NI ti/mU dre mu dwe/mAt+mamyA dre/badz+re k+ShA ya s+t+waM ha tAn+ta/pa ri shrid+d+he/sar+b+ba karme A ba rAHbiM nur+t+ti/pre ta ni badrA yai/mamra
191a5(rgyud): A yur bi shud+d+ha/sar+b+ba te thA ga tA sa ma~M ya ya d+hiSh+ThA no a d+hiSh+Thi ti/oM mu ni mu no/mahA mu ni/bi mu ni bi mu ni/ma hA bi mu ni/me ti ma ti/mahA maM ti/ma ma ti/su ma ti/
191a6(rgyud): tA thA ga d+ha/b+hU ta ko TaM/pa re shud+d+he/bi srAD+h+waM/shud+d+ha shud+d+haM/he hi/dza yA dza ya/dI dza ya bi dza ya/sma ra sma ra/s+thar sngar/stA ra ya s+phA ra ya/sad+d+ha bud+d+ha
191a7(rgyud): ts+tshaSh+ThAn me Sh+Ta ta~M/shud+d+he Tun+do/bud+d+he dud+d+he/badz+re dz+r-i/mahA dzI/su dz+nye/badz+ra ga r+b+he/dza ya gar+b+he/bidza~M ya gar+b+ha/dzA dz+nyA lA~M gar+b+ha/badz+ra ud thA ga~M
191b1(rgyud): snroH/badz+ra dz+nyAn/m+b+ha bar+d+ha/sa ma g+hAd+hA ra sarbas \u0f7f!k+Sha pa 'i Sha d+hir+yA bA rAd+d+ha/sa rnams drug d+hA pa ra u d+hAH/s+yAd+h+yat+yA thA ga d+hA shwA m+b+ha sa ma shwas yan+ta/pran+d+hadrAd+d+ha/
191b2(rgyud): sits+tsha d+ha/baud+d+ha ya bad+ha ma~M/bi To d+ha yA bi bid+d+hA ya/ma~M tsa la ma tsa ya/thim tsam gyim ces/shod+d+ha ya shaM d+d+hom/bai shwod+haye d+hi sha~M d+d+hi ya/sa mnar+tha/moHoM maiH/
191b3(rgyud): sa mon+ta rasmai pa ri shud+d+he/sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA hri dA ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/mu dre mu dre/mahA mu dre mat+ta mu dA man+ta pa da~MHAt+ma/lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba
191b4(rgyud): gzum/dran 'gro thams cad spyod pa/sdig pa dang /las dang /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/bde 'gro'i lam thams cad du 'gru ba dang ngan 'gro thams cad rnam por 'jig
191b5(rgyud): par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa/byin gyis brlabs pa/rje su yi rang bar mdzad pa/
191b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang /ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang /sems can
191b7(rgyud): dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gaushin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa/sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams dang /sdug
192a1(rgyud): bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o//de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing skal ba chung pa dang /sman pa
192a2(rgyud): dang /bsam pa nyams pa dang /sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag/lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzungs 'di zung la lha'i bu
192a3(rgyud): shin tu brtan pa la sgrogs shig bsgrags nas kyang gdon pa dang /kha ton du bya ba dang /bsam pra dang /sgom pa dang /dran par bya ba dang /mchod pa dang /gzung ba dang /
192a4(rgyud): kun chub par bya ba de sbyar bar gyis shig dang /de ltar lha'i gnas thams cad na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /'dzam bu'i gling po'i sems can rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang /
192a5(rgyud): bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang /gsang sngags 'di dag khyod la gtad//de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o//lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bskal
192a6(rgyud): pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongasu byang bar 'gyur//skye bar skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems can dmyal po dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig
192a7(rgyud): rten dang /yi dgas kyi yul dang /lha ma yin gyi ris dang /'di lta ste/gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /'byung po dang /sha za dang /srul po dang /lus srul po
