192b3(rgyud): mi skye bar shes par bya//gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa dang pyo nga/nga mam ma tha~Md klus skye ba rnam gcig gi//de rigs chen po/daMts+tsha ste/bram tshogs
192b4(rgyud): sa lo chen po lta bu 'am/rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu 'am/tshad dpon gyi rigs shing sa la chen po lho ngur skye'o zhes pa smra'o//lha'i dbang po de ltar nr-i gzungs 'di'i mthus
192b5(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying pa la mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yong su dag pa chen po 'thob ste/lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ste/lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ba/phan
192b6(rgyud): yon tsha ba/mthu stobs che ba/dge zhing shis pa yin te/lha'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad
192b7(rgyud): yongasu sbyong ba 'di bzhago/'di lta ste dper na/nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa na mkhar yong su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug/lha'i
192b8(rgyud): dbang ba de bzhin du sams can de meng shes pa med par shes par byar//'di ste ste ni/'dzam bu'i chu 'i gse na drim med pa/shin gyi lo yu dag pa/na tu nyan/
193a1(rgyud): pa/shin tu sdug pa'o//lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can de yang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar
193a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//lha'i dbang po gang na gzungs 'di ba tu ston pa dang /bye brag du na yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /gdon pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /
193a3(rgyud): mchod pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /nyan pa dang /'dzin par 'gyur ba der 'gro ba thams cad yong su dag par 'gyur/sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun ched par
193a4(rgyud): 'gyur//lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di yi ger dris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag par bye/ri mthon po 'am/khang pa mthon po 'am/mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du bzhag
193a5(rgyud): par bya'o//lha'i dbang po dge sbyong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/de las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal
193a6(rgyud): mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag pa mthong ngam/de dang de nye bar gnas par gyur na/tha na de'i grib mas phog gam/de'i rdul rlung gis btab pas phog na yang lha'i dbang po sems can
193a7(rgyud): de la sdig pa thams cad dang ngan 'gro 'gro de'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung //sems can dmyal ba pa dang /dud 'gro skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /
193b1(rgyud): yo dgas dang /ma ma rdzu thams cad du ma skye bar 'gyur//lha'i dbang ba sems can+da de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing /bla na med pa yang dag pa
193b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o//lha'i dbang po mchod pa dang //rim gro byed cing me tog dang /dag pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng ba dang /thug pa
193b3(rgyud): dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dad dong /rgyun rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang /lam brin mdor mchod rten byas te/gzungs 'di bzhag pa la thal mo sbyor ba'am/
193b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba 'am bskor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/d+h+rU'i dbang ba sems can de ni sems can chen por rig par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i srasu rig par bya'o//chos kyi gan tu
193b5(rgyud): rig par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o//de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje nub mo nam langs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor song te/bcom
193b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang /gos dang /rgyun la sogs pas/mchod pa dang /sti stang byas nas/des bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan
193b7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba legs te/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi
194a1(rgyud): 'chad par sems can dera'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing kun tu srung ba dang /yongasu bsgrub pa'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o//sems can dmyal ba thams cad las
194a2(rgyud): bzlog par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byas pa gzi bar bgyid cing /byas pa mi gze bar mi bgyid//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
194a3(rgyud): bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang /bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol/de nas
194a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i tshul bshad par bya'o//sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyir
194a5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mos tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na des sems can tshe zad pa de'i tshe phyir nur nas nad thad dang bral bar
194a6(rgyud): 'gyu ro//sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yong su thar bar 'gyur ro//tha na dud 'gro'i skye
194a7(rgyud): gan su song ba'o srog chags bya'i rna lam du gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrags par bya ste/des ni de'i ngan 'gro'i tha ma yin par rig par bya'o//gang zhig nad chen pos btab ste smin
194b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bye phyag bye ba de yang na da las ya yA thar bar 'gyur//de'i ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad kyang rgyun chud par 'gyur//sho 'dos nas kyang 'jug rten gyi khams bde ba can du
194b2(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur//de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par rig par bya'o//grong dang gong du skyes pa de dang der pad+ma'i snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro//tshe rabs thams cad du
194b3(rgyud): yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro//sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag shi ba'i dus byas pa de dag gi don du gzungs yungs kar dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu brjod/de dag gi/
194b4(rgyud): rus gong rnams kyi steng du gtor na de dag dmyal ba 'am/dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/yi dgas sam/de las gzhan ngan 'gro rnams skyes par gyur
194b5(rgyud): kyang rung ste/de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar bor 'gyu ro//de dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyuraro//su zhig 'di nyin cig bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa re re yongs
194b6(rgyud): brjod pa de 'jig rten mang po'i mchod pa'i 'osu 'gyur//tshe ring bar 'gyur//bde dmyang bar 'gyur//rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thub par 'gyuraro//
194b7(rgyud): shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro//de nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa sna tshog su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
195a1(rgyud): cad dang phrad par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung smyon par 'gyur//
195a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang 'jig rten la snang bar byed par 'gyuraro//lha'i dbang po thangs 'ongs ni 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba thang las
195a3(rgyud): yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro//de dag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongasu dag cing tshe ring bar yang 'gyur//lha'i dbang po song la lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di rje su ston
195a4(rgyud): la sgrogs shig/lha'i dbang po des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongasu dag cing tshe ring bar 'gyuraro//stobs che bar 'gyuraro//de nas lha'i dbang
195a5(rgyud): brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rje su bstan pa 'di blangs te/de'i gnasu phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di byin no//de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i bar
195a6(rgyud): du nyon drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas pa na de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta ste/ngan 'gro las ni yongasu thar/bde 'gro'i lam la yang dag
195a7(rgyud): gnas/tshe ring bar yang gyur nas/a la la sangs rgyas/a la la chos/a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ste/des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongasu tha
195b1(rgyud): par gyur te//zhes ched du brjod pa ched du badz+ra de/'phags pa dran 'gro thams cadu yo su sbyong sha gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs
195b2(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan badzi na mi traM dang /su ra~Mn+d+re ba~M d+hi dung /bu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgya gar skad du/sarbata
195b3(rgyud): thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI kalpaM hi ti/bod skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/sangs rgyas
195b4(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
195b5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugaso//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
195b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nad kyis gzir ba tshe thung ba yod//de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/kun tu gzigs
195b7(rgyud): pa'i dpal gyi mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di btsong ba dang /klag pa dang /gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa
196a1(rgyud): ni chu nga dur sgrub par byed pa'i tshad dus//de nas byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa skrun dus gzigs dbang phyug stan la sa yangs
196a2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas la to//bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ca gau drug tor rnam pa
196a3(rgyud): rgyal bu zhes bya ba'i gzus bde bar gshegs pasu bsten du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/kun
196a4(rgyud): tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka
196a5(rgyud): stsal pa/sar+b+ba trA~M lo kya pyA ta~M bi shiSh+Na ya bud+d+hA ya/oMr+d+heN+Te b+h+yAM/sho d+ha ya sho d+hA yA/bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/a sa ma sa man+t+ra a ban+d+ha sa~M skA ra Na ga ti/ka ga nA pra d+d+ha
196a6(rgyud): shud+d+he/A d+hiShiny+tsan+tam+b+hi/sar+b+ba taM thA ga trUM sug ta can/oM mr-i ta oM d+hi She shIr/man+ta mu dra man+ta pa deHA ta ras+t+rai ha ra/ma me s+t+ra yuHsanad+hA raN+Da/shwo d+ha ya
196a7(rgyud): shor+d+ha ya/shau m-i sho d+ha ya/ge ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/uSh+NI Sha bi dzi ya pa ri shud+d+he/sa ti saM d+g+ha sa~M tsa ri ti/sa te thA ga ta a wa lo ki ni/Shan+tir mi tA pa'i pUr
196b1(rgyud): thA ga d+hAn+na ta/da/au\u0f89\u0fa4 \u0f7f/sa ga da na du dz+nyA/s+yA dud+d+ha/mAn+dan+daH/t+sAk+ShAl ts+tsha k+Sha/dzATaH/sa/ak+Sha/TArmA/
196b2(rgyud): bi shud+d+he/pra ti ni brta ya/mA ma a yur bo shrad+d+he/sar+b+ba taSh+T+rA ga tA sa ma ya~M a d+hiSh+ThA na oM d+hiSh+Thi ti/oM mu ni mu ni/ma hA munaM/bi mu ni bi mu ni/man+da 'i mu na~M/ma ti ma ti/
196b3(rgyud): man+tam ti/ma ma ti/su ma ti/hwAr+dz+dzat+sA/d+hA ta~M kaTi/pa raM sh+tsar+Ne/bi s+phuH/bud t+ti shudad+d+he/het+te/dza yA dza ya/bi dza ya bi dzay+YA/slar sma ra/stAr s+phA rA/s+phAr
196b4(rgyud): stA ra ya/sar+b+ba bud d+ha a d+hidz+nyA na a d+hISh+ThA taM/shud+d+hi shud+d+he/bud+d+hi d+d+haM/badz+ri badz+re/mahArban+d+he/su badz+dzi/badz+re gar+b+he/dza yu gar+b+he/bI dzaM ya gar+b+ho/badz+ra d+h+waM lA gar+b+he/badz+ra
196b5(rgyud): ud b+ha baM/badz+re saM b+ha be/badz+re badz+rI Ni/badz+ram+b+ha ba tu ma ma sha r-I raM sar+b+ba satwA nAny+dza kA ya pa ri shud+d+hin+na ba t+ye/sa dA me sar+b+ba ga ti pA ri shud d+hish+tsa/sar+b+ba ta thA gr-i tash+tsa mAM sa ma shA
196b6(rgyud): sa yor+yA bu d+h+ya bud+d+ha/sad+d+hi sid+d+ha/kro d+hi ya bo d+hA ya/ba~M do d+ha ya bri bo d+ha ya/mo tsaM ya mo tsA ya/ri mo tsa ya ri mo tsa ye/sho d+ha ya sho d+hA ya~M/bi sho d+ha yai bi sho d+ha ye/sa min+ta
196b7(rgyud): rnam ci ya mo tsa ya~M/sa mon+ta smai ba ri shud d+he/sar+b+ba ta thA ga~M tA hri da ya~M ya d+hiSh+ThA na ad+hiSh+Thi te/mu dre mu dre/mahA mu dre ma d+hA mu d+h+waM man+t+ra pa daiHswA t+ma/'phags pa gtsug ta/
197a1(rgyud): /rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so///lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ni ngan 'gro thams cad yosu sbyong ga
197a2(rgyud): sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro ba/ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba
197a3(rgyud): brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs po/byin gyis brlabs pa/rje su yi rang bar mdzad pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/
197a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang /ngan 'gror ltung ba rnams bzlog pa dang /sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig
197a5(rgyud): rten la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams dang /sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar
197a6(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o//de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing bskal pa chung ba smad pa dang /rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skye bar lhung ba rnams dang /bsam pa nyams pa dang /seM na
197a7(rgyud): lam los nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams la gzungs 'di dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags yongasu gtad pa yino//de'i phyir lha'i
197b1(rgyud): dbang po khyod kyis yang dag par gzung bar bya'o//lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di lan gcig thos ma thug tu bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongasu byung bar 'gyur
197b2(rgyud): skye bar skyo ba sna tshogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /yi dgas kyi yul dang /lha ma yin gyi rigs dang /'di lta ste/gan
197b3(rgyud): sbyin dang /srin po dang /'byung po dang /sha zla dang /srul po dang /lus srul po dang /brjed byed dang /khyi dang /ru/sbal dang /sbrul dang /gcan zan khro bo dang /bya dang /

197b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i rigasu skye ba de /rigs chen por skye ba ste/de la rigs chen po ni 'di lta ste/bram ze'i rigs shing so la chen po lta bu 'am/rgyal rigs shing sel chen po lta
197b6(rgyud): bu'am/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu 'am/tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes nga smra'o//lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub
197b7(rgyud): kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongasu dag pa chen po 'thob ste/lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mothu che ba/phan yon che ba/mthu stobs che ba/dge ba shis pa yin te/
198a1(rgyud): lha'i dbyung po sems can+da rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzus ngan 'gro thams cad yongasu skyong ba 'di bzhag/'di lta sgra/
198a2(rgyud): dper na nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa na mkha'o ltar yongasu dag pa 'od gosal ba ni 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug/lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can
198a3(rgyud): yang gos pa med par shes par bya'o//'di lta ste dper na/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser shin tu dri ma med pa yongs su dag pa/shin tu mnyen pa/shin tu sdug pa'o//lha'i dbang

198a5(rgyud): pa dang /bye brag tu na yi ge 'drir 'jug pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /'don pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /mchod pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /nyan pa dang /

198a7(rgyud): mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag par bya/ri mthon po'am/khang pa mngon po'am/mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag par bya'o//lha'i dbang po dge slong ngam/dge slong me dang /dge
198b1(rgyud): sbyin nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/de las gzhan pa rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag pa mthong ngam/de dang nyo bar gnas par gyur na/tha na
198b2(rgyud): de'i grib mas phog gam/de'i rdul rlung gis btab pa phog na yang lha'i dbang po sems can de la sdig pa thams cad dang /ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mo 'byung //

198b7(rgyud): 'chal ba dang /bskor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/lha'i dbang po sems can 'di ni sems can chen po yin par rig par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sro su rig par bya'o//
199a1(rgyud): chos kyi gan su rig par byar//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du dag bar byad//de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje de'i nud mo de nam nangs nas bcom ldan
199a2(rgyud): 'das ga la ba der song ste/bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang /gos dang /rgyun la sogs pas mchod pa dang /sti stang du byas nas ngas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun

199a4(rgyud): 'das bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chung par sems can de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing /dus kun tu srung ba dang /yongasu bskyang ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o//sems can dmyal ba

203b6(rgyud): thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba byin par bya'o//sems can rnams la bcing ba dang brdungs pa la sogs pa spang bar bya'o//zla ba gzhan re re la mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas la
203b7(rgyud): brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba ni rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o//cho ga 'di yis ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyur//blo rno ba dang /nad med pa dang /tshe lo brgya thob cing
204a1(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad kyi du 'ong ba dang skye ba dran par 'gyuraro//keng gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa rjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te mdzes pa'i

204a5(rgyud): ba'i skud pa tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o//de nas gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs tshon sna ma lus pas gzungs kyi yi ge las sbrel pa'i mchod
204a6(rgyud): rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o//tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi phreng ba can pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
204a7(rgyud): pa/zhal gsum pa/spyan gsum pa/phyag brgyad pa/g.yas pa'i zhal zhi ba gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o//g.yon pa ni mche bas/ma mchu mnan pa mi
204b1(rgyud): bzad pa mun pa la sngon po 'di zor dang ldan po'o//dbus ma ni lkog pa dang bcas shing da/ po'o//g.yas pa'i phyag gis sbyong khar sna tshogs rdo 'o//de bzhin du pad+gal gnas pa'i 'ang
204b2(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dang /mda' dang mchog sbyin pa'o//g.yon du bsdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /de bzhin du gzhu deng /mi 'jigs pa dang /bum pa'o//yang mgo bar
204b3(rgyud): mchod rten la gnas pa'i oM dang /mgrin par AHdang snying khar hU~M //dpral bar tAM //k+She ng+ge'i phyog su d+hIH'o//rkang pa gnyis la AM a/yi ge 'dri rnams bkod la rAt+na swA hA/
204b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa 'di'i nang du rang gi ming dang spel ba'o//de'i logs gnyi su pad+ma dang /rdo rje 'chang gnyis rje yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa'o//steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs
204b5(rgyud): bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i bu gnyis//logs bzhir khro bo mi g.yo ba dang /'dod pa'i rgyal po dang /dbyug pa sngon po can dang /stobs po che zhes bya ba ste/ral gri dang /lcags
204b6(rgyud): kyu dang /dbyug pa dang /rdo rje bsnams pa'o//g.yon pa ni gdug pa can 'jigs pa'i bsdigs mdzub byed du byed pa'o//de ltar 'bad pas rdzogs par byas la ring bsrel dang bcas
204b7(rgyud): pa'i mchod rten de la bsnyung bar gnas pas mchod pa chen po sto dreg gcig gis mchod pe byad la 'dzu ma phrog gcig bzlas pa bya'o//de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig
205a1(rgyud): nanas brdung ste ji srid bcoM lnga'i bar du hU~Mng spyod bzlas pa bya'o//de nas snga bar num nangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das ma zhal mthong bar 'gyur//de nas ji ltar ngos
205a2(rgyud): grub 'dod pa ste ro//yang na na thang ka de dri zhim pa dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugasu gsol la mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing nyi ma re re zhing
205a3(rgyud): brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o//yang zla ba re re la sdong stong gi mchod pa bya zhing stod stong gi bzlas pa byas na tshe dpag tu med pa dang /stobs dpag tu med pa gnon pa dang /na mkha' la
205a4(rgyud): 'gro ba dang /nang chen po med par 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad kyi nyi ma re rare tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag tu 'gyuraro//yang na kha cig gis de lta bu byed
205a5(rgyud): par mi nus na de'i sa rang gi khyim du dri zhim po dang /bsres pa'i sa'i char bzhug su gsol la/ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas la zla ba 'ong cog gi chos brgyad la brgyad pa
205a6(rgyud): bzlas pa bya zhing nyi ma re re dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig rtse gcig brjod na blo rna ba dang /tshe ring ba dang /shos rab dang ldan pa dang /nad med pa dang /skyid po dang /me
205a7(rgyud): 'chi ba dang /skye ba dran par 'gyur//yang na rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na tshe ring ba dang /blo rno bar 'gyuraro//de nas gzhan yod sbyin sreg gi cho ga son
205b1(rgyud): thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nyo bar bshad par bya ste/khru gang gi tshod kyi thag khud zlum po rdo rje'i phreng bas rgyun pa/tsun dan dkar po 'am sra dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkar bau ga/ma
205b2(rgyud): ste/logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi po zhig la/bdug spos la sogs pos yang dag par mchod la/phyogs bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab tu mdzes pa gos
205b3(rgyud): dkar pos g.yogs pa yal gas kha rgyan pa dgod par bya'o//'o ma can gyi ye shing la me sbar la der me lha bkug ste dgang blugs gsum byas na bsang gtor byas te gshegasu gsolo//
205b4(rgyud): de nas tshe dpag tu med pa gsal por thob khung gi dbus bsams la gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang thugs gsum dbu'o//yang na oM a mr-i ti a yurda de swA hA zhes
205b5(rgyud): bya bas tshe dang /blo rno ba dang bcas pas brgyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin bsreg bya'o//gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na tshe ring ba dang /blo rno ba dang /sgyid
205b6(rgyud): pa dang /nud med par 'gyuraro//yang na zla ba re re'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la dus gsum du tshe lo stong thub par 'dod pas sbyin sreg byas na
205b7(rgyud): mchog gi tshe ring ba dang /blo rno ba sbyin par byedado//sems can rnams la smad par mi bya'o//cho ga 'dir rang gi lus nad kyis gos par mi 'gyuraro//la brgya lnga bcur 'tsho ba
206a1(rgyud): dang /dgra las rgyal ba dang /blo rna bar 'gyur//dbyangs snyan par 'gyuraro//gal to rang zlu ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas ma ni ba chen por 'gyur//
206a2(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po che dang blo rno ba dang bcas par 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas ni/dang po dang mthar stong stong gi mchod pa byas
206a3(rgyud): la yang 'dum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas ni tshe lo 'bum phrag gcig thub par 'gyuraro//bye ba byas na bye ba thu'o//de ltar 'di'i cho ga'i rim pas tshe lo dpag tu med par 'gyur
206a4(rgyud): te/na mkha' le 'gro ba dang /dpa' ba dang /dgra les rgyal bar 'gyuraro//dpal 'dod ni dbul 'bras 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur//
206a5(rgyud): rgyal po 'dod na pad+ma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po chen po thob par 'gyur ro//bye ba gcig byas na 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par 'gyuraro//yang na ral gri la sogs
206a6(rgyud): ba grub par 'dod ni ring bsrel dang bcaso pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du thang sru bkram la stong gi mchod pa chen pos mchod la bzlas pa 'bum byas te/yang lcags lnga'i rang bzhin
206a7(rgyud): gyi ral gri la bzlas pa 'bum byas te lag pa g.yas par bcangs na yid kyis 'gro ba dang /'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang /stobs che zhing gzhan gnon pa dang /
206b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad gcig tu 'don pa por gyur nas sman pa chen po'i mchog tshe dpag tu med par 'gyuraro//de ltar rdo rje dang /'khor lo dang /rtse gsum la sogs pa la yang bsgrub
206b2(rgyud): par bya'o//de ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar
206b3(rgyud): las 'grub par byed do//gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyo ma re re la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
206b4(rgyud): pa bya zhing /mchod rten chen po byas te/yang dag par bcangs la gzhan la yang rgya cher gsal bar byas na/de skyed pa 'theb cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /nad med pa dang /lo
206b5(rgyud): brgya thub pa dang /blo rno ba dang /skye ba dran par 'gyuraro//gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe/sgrol shun pa rjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor ste bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi
206b6(rgyud): khamasu skye bar 'gyur ro//dmyal ba'i sgo rna bug tu yang thos par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur/gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//
206b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya

207b1(rgyud): gzungs 'di gzung bar bya/gzhan rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las
207b2(rgyud): langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i
207b3(rgyud): gzungs bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/kun tu snang

207b6(rgyud): sra b+ha ba bi shud+d+he/a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu maM/sarba ta thA gaM tA/su gA taM ba re ba tsamr-i tA b+hi ShaM kairma d+hA mu dra man+na pa daMHA ha ra A ha ra/A yuHsaMn+d+hu ra Ni sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/bi
207b7(rgyud): d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ga ga na sr-i b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/sa ha swa rasmi saM tsi da ti/sarba ta thA ga tA ba l-i ki ni/ShaT+TA ra me tA pa ri pU ra Ni/sarba ta thA ga
208a1(rgyud): tA mA do/drA shad+d+ham prA taNI hUM/sarba tar+dz+dza kA t+yAHdAp+tA d+hAHnaN+Di/AM mu dr-i mu rbo/mar+d+ha mud+h+we rdzAk+Sha ya sa ha tA nA paR+Sha shrad+d+ha/sar+b+bakar+saSh+TArtA
208a2(rgyud): Na bi sh+tsad+d+he/me pra ti nI bad+d+ha ye s+yA d+d+hi/sarba twa thA ga tA sa ma yAM d+hiSh+ThanahU~M/oM nu ni m+b+ha ni/mad+hA mA ni/ngi mr-i nI tri mu ni/mar+d+ha bi mu nI/mai tI ma ti/mi ma ti/

208a4(rgyud): s+pha ra s+pha ra/s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/sarba bud+d+ha d+hASh+TA n+da d+hiSh+Thi ti/oM shud+d+ho shud+d+ho/bud+d+he bud+d+he/badz+ra badz+re ma hUM badz+re su bidz+ri da~Md+da gar+b+he dza ya gar+b+he/bi dza ya gar+b+he badz+re dz+wA lA gar+b+he badz+ra d+hI /

208a6(rgyud): sid+d+h+ya sid+d+ha bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/mo tsa ya ma tsa ya/bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/sa man+tan+do tsa ya sa man+ta rosmai ba ri shud+d+he/sarba taM thA gau

208b1(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs/'ba'i dbyug pa chen po 'dzin pa/thog ba bar byed parjodan spyod//gang su dag tshe ring bar 'dod pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshim pas dkrug par byar//sa phyogs

208b4(rgyud): rtsibs rnamasu na mkha' ltar 'dus pa'i bza' ston 'byung ba'i gtsug tar dang /sa'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug ter dang /nor bu'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /ro bcud kyi
208b5(rgyud): snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /snying po dpag med 'byung ba'i gtsug ter dang /gzi brjid snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /rnga'i sgra dbyangs 'byung po'i gtsug tor dang /
208b6(rgyud): ser bu 'byung ba'i gtsug tor te/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhug su gsolo//de'i yang phyi rol nyid du pad+ma 'dab mo bcu drug pa legs par bri bar bya'o//mdab mo so sor
208b7(rgyud): rerare rim pa ji lte bar thig le bcu drug las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhug su gsolo//nang stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /phyi stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug
209a1(rgyud): tor dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /
209a2(rgyud): 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /dor ba

209a5(rgyud): nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug ter dang /dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug to ro//de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor byas nas dus
209a6(rgyud): ji lta ba'i me tog rnam pa dbul bar bya'o//de'i phyed kyi steng du khri btsugs te chu'i snod du rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i mchod rten bzhugs par bya'o//shog bu 'om lo ma la
209a7(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge sgrub pa po'i ming can yang bzhugs par bya'o//bum pa chu yis bkang ba yang bzhag par bya'o//pad+ma'i phyi rol phyogs bzhor bum pa bzhi yang bzhag par
209b1(rgyud): bya'o//dar gyi lnga ldi dang gdugs dang ba dan gyis nye bar mdzes par byas nas/yang shar du bgogs rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang /lhor 'cha ba rab tu
209b2(rgyud): 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang /nub tu nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang /byang du phung po'i nad rab tu 'joms pa
209b3(rgyud): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang /mer rdo rje 'brang ba tshe sbyin ma dang /bden bral du sgyu ma chen mo dang /rlung du gser 'od ma dang /dbang ldan du gser gyi phreng ba can
209b4(rgyud): tshe sbyin ma'o//snod bani chu dri bzang dang bcas pas bkang ste/me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang du gzhug par bya'o//'da'i mthar re kha gsum rdul tshon gyis bri bar bya'o//phreng ba dang
209b5(rgyud): la sku la sogs pa med pa'i 'jim pa rlon pa la byas pa'i sa che stong phrag gcig bsgrigau par bya'o//ma 'ogrub na brgya nges par bzhugs par bya'o//phyogs bzhir bkur sti dang sti stang
209b6(rgyud): chen po'i mchod pa byas nas/tshig gzhan mi smra ba'i dam bca' 'dzin pa'i chos smra ba rnams kyis gzungs 'di bklag par bya'o//la nor re zhing mchod rten gyi dbur mchod cing
209b7(rgyud): rab tu gnas par bya'o//stong phrag gcig tu klog pas dbus kyi mchod rten gyi dngur lag pa bskyod cing mchod pa bya'o//me tog dang /bdug spos dang /mar me dang /dri
210a1(rgyud): chab dang lha ba shos la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad stong phrag so sor mchod rten gyi phreng ba'i rnam par byas nas mchod par byara'o//ji srid yongasu ma rdzogs pa
210a2(rgyud): de de srid du mar me'i phreng ba rlung gis mi nyams pa sbyar bar bya'o//mnyam par gzhag cing gtsang sbras rab tu 'jug par bya'o//de ltar byas na zhag bdun pa'i tshe la bdun du

210a5(rgyud): ba'i bshes gnyen sdom brtson dam pa 'dul ba'i gtsug lag la zla med par smra ba ne'u mkhan po'i gsung bzhin du/mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba gnas brten dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan
210a6(rgyud): bzang pos dpal thar pa gleng gi gtsug lag khang du rang gis bsgyur ba'o///rgya gar skad du/sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha br-i dz+ra ya nA ma d+ha raNI kawa sa ha ta/zod
210a7(rgyud): skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
210b1(rgyud): 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa bde ba can gyi

210b3(rgyud): kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo sdug bsngal ba nad kyis yongasu gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba rnams yod/de rnams kyi phyir sems can
210b4(rgyud): thams cad la kun tu gzigs pa'i mtshan gyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyid 'chang ba dang /klag pa dang /gzhan
210b5(rgyud): la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yun ring por gnas par sgrub pa'i ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/kun tu gzi Da

210b7(rgyud): wa te sarba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+ThA ya bud+d+hA ya te na maHtad+ya thA/oM b+h+rUM b+h+raM D+h+we/sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/bi shi d+ha ya be sho d+ha ya/a sa ma sa mar+d+ha a ra b+hA sa s+pha ra Na gau ti/ga ga na swa b+hA ba

211a3(rgyud): maM /TAM m+ba mi twA pa~M b+hu Ni/sarbatwa thA gtA mUt+pA shamahaM/s+yAHt+ta thA ga d+hAd+hAd yA ets+tshiSh+ThA nA ate/ dr-im+mu dr-i/mang+ga mu d+h+we/badz+rAk+kayA s+t+ra

217b7(rgyud): srong gi mchog thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ram gris bcad//rdo rje pur bus gdag/lce'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags rim gros bcid/

218b3(rgyud): ke b+h+yaHphaT/sarba prA ta ke b+h+yaHphaT/sarban+na de b+h+yaHphaT/sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/sarba bid+d+ha d+ha ri b+h+yaHphaT/dza ya ka ra ma d+hu kA re sid d+hi ka ra sarba ar+tha s+yA d+ha ke b+h+yaHphaTo/sarba bid+hA tsAR+Ye b+h+yaH

218b7(rgyud): swAnA~M/hi ta~M/phaT/ho ha~M phaTe/a mo b+hU ya~M phaT/oM pra te ta ta ya phaT/ba ra pre dA ya phaT/oM su ra bi d+hA ga Na kiR+Sha ya phaT/sarba debe b+h+yeHphaT/serban+de gai b+h+yaHphaT/sarba

223a7(rgyud): swAH/oM sarba twa thA ga ti sau ta ta batre hU~M phaT kAdz+dza/hUM b+h+ru~M k+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa bo ri bA ra s+ya sarbasatwA sh+tsa hU~M phaT thAhA/tad+yethA/oM ya na le an le/oM tsa mr-i ma tsa ma~M/
223b1(rgyud): khas mo kha sa mo/bI ro b+hi re/bai ra bai ra/som sau ma/sarba bud d+hA A d+hiSh+ThA na a dz+yoSh+Ti te sarba ta thA ga tiSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre sarba dur+tha tsi ta d+hA na d+h+r-i phaT swA hA/pangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor gyis shag
223b2(rgyud): pa thams cad la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
223b3(rgyud): yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yI rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
223b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdzogs//

250a1(rgyud): bdag la glan rdo rje de lta ngas na rngom pa gsum gyis bsdam par bya'o//lag na rdo rje las nges 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'di lta bu

250a5(rgyud): dga' ba thob par gyur te/tsa tsa dang ga zha'i sgra chen po byung nas a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngags 'di'i mthu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o zhe

250b5(rgyud): bskor bar bya'o//yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'od gnyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o//des ni gang ga'i klung bye ba khrag khrag phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs

252a6(rgyud): thob par 'gyu ro//gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtse gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro//tsher rabs gcig nA gcis
252a7(rgyud): tu/rgyud pa rnamasu yang shin tu yongasu dag par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro//sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa bzhin du lus
252b1(rgyud): bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'ag rten gyi khams bde can du skye bar 'gyur/'chi 'dag gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmyi lam lta bur kun tu sheso//tshes brgyad dam/bcu
252b2(rgyud): bzhi 'am/bco lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs sngags 'di gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing rnying bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bskor

252b4(rgyud): dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi dri ma dang /ser sna dang /phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro//lus dri ma med cing yangasu dag par 'gyur ro//skyes pa
252b5(rgyud): 'am/bud med dam/khye'u 'am/bu mo gang dang gtam byas pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba la smras na yang dud
252b6(rgyud): 'gro'i skye gan su gtogs pa thams cad lus yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro//bya'i tshogs thams cad la smras ni yang bya'i tshogs thams cad yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro//tha na
252b7(rgyud): khyi dang /rus sbal dang /sbrul dang /bye la dang /sre mo dang /srog chags sna tshogs la smras ni yang thams cad yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro//byem pa lan nyi shu
253a1(rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod byas te dur khrod du bla tar na/gang gi rus pa la phog pa de dag sems can dmyal ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang deng yongasu tharate/
253a2(rgyud): mtho risu skye bar 'gyur ro//gang dge mthe ris skyes pa de dag gi lus la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro//gcan zin dang /bya sna tshogos gang dag dur khrod der 'gro
253a3(rgyud): ba de dag thams cad kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//ri la gtor na ri dgas dang /bya rgyu ba de dag thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro//kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i
253a4(rgyud): 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po len brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na/gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag mnar
253a5(rgyud): med par lhung nas gdung bas bsregs pa las 'phrul du yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro//lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas/gal te 'gul nas thag pa btags te khrid pa yang
253a6(rgyud): gshin rje'i gnas nas 'phral du ldog par 'gyuraro//de'i 'jigs pa chen po las yongasu grol bar 'gyur//sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par
253a7(rgyud): 'gyur te the tshom med//chos kyi gshin rje yang bran bzhin du sems shing 'jug/lus bsam gtan gyi lam bzhin nam/sbrul gyi lpags pa brjes pa bzhin du
253b1(rgyud): lus bor nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mngon par dga' zhing 'gro bar 'gyuraro//'chi bdag gis sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyuraro//'bum byis te mchod rten gyi/
253b2(rgyud): nang du bcug na/'bum tshang nas mchod rten thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur//bdag kyang 'bar bar 'gyur//nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur//sa bcu la gan+da
253b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//gang ba'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig 'dum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dgra ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing lung /
253b4(rgyud): bstan pa thob par 'gyur//de nas mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste shing du snang ba byasen dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po 'bum gyi
253b5(rgyud): mchod rten zhes bya'o//gang dag de la bya ba rnams byed pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
253b6(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gtogs pa rnams dang /gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs gang dag der 'dod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par
253b7(rgyud): 'gyuraro//tha na gri'i mas bag na yang yi suM grol bar 'gyur na bye ba mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/'di'i yon tan dang ngan yon ni brjod par mo nus//de nas
254a1(rgyud): bra nod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /dga' ldan gyi
254a2(rgyud): gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bu de dog dang /brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /lho'i bu nor bu'i sring po dri ma med pa dang /de dag thams
254a3(rgyud): cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das gI la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud//

261a7(rgyud): pa rnams dang /khang pa brtsegs po 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa de dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod pa yang mthong //de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang /

261b3(rgyud): ba pyod pa grub par gyur ni m+b+ha//de nas de zhin gshegs de de dge dang /byang chub se mas pa'i de dag gos/bu ma da de dag gis mas rgya mo
261b4(rgyud): gas kyis mkhyen nasani che bzhin ga shegs pa byang chub sems dang 'dang tsam pa de dag gis de rjes sdugs 'di kA'i stsal pa/spyad 'i thaM da na/ shu
262a1(rgyud): /s+thU n+sa/kaT+TA/kar+N+Na /sar+ra dz+dza d+hA/d+hur+Ya/d+hu da d+hA/mar+b+bat+s+yar+yAH/kA kAr/r-iSh+TarA/ts+tsha sa/au/swar+d+hasa?/tA s+yA s+ya/ha sa pa/
262a2(rgyud): ni swA hA//de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lha'i bu zla ba dang /nyi ma rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags 'di ni sems can ngan
262a3(rgyud): song du 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gsungs pa yin te/rigs kyi bu dag u dum ba ra'i me tog na ches rnyed par sla'i/gzungs
262a4(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni 'jig rten du 'byung ba de lta ma yin na//rigs kyi bu dag gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag ni ches rnyed par sla'i/'di dag ni 'chung ba 'am/klog pa ni de lta ma yin//

262a6(rgyud): can mnar med pa na 'khod pa bskol par gnas pa/mtshams med pa lnga byid byed nga /dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir/gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di
262a7(rgyud): dag zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan gsum/mtshan lan gsum brjod na/de'i tshe gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi mthus/sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar
262b1(rgyud): myed pa kha brgyar gyes par 'gyur la/sems can de dag kyang yongasu thar bar 'gyur na/'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams lta ci smos te/gang drag gi rnal lam du grags par gyur pa de ngag/

262b3(rgyud): pa kho nar bya ste/'di la som nyi 'am/yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o//tad+ya thA/d+hu na tri/d+hu na Ti/ma hA d+hu na Ti/su ru su ru s+yAtA/shukla bi sha d+ha ni/ta ra tA ra swA hA/dzo tish+mi dI/
262b4(rgyud): biHtu ru tu ru swAhA/pad+ma mA li ni/sad t+ya ta ra bud d+hi/hu ruM du ru swA hU~M/sad t+ya bud d+he/sad t+ya aM ba lo ki na/kai ra ka ra/ki ro ki r-i s+yA hA/d+ha ra na bu Ti/a pra ti ha taM/bud+ha/tsu R+Ya
262b5(rgyud): tsu ru swA hA/yak+Sha Ne tswi te/hu ma pa ri/ha re/hu ru hu ru/bu ru khu ru swAhAM/d+ha ra d+ha ra/mA d+ha ra/d+ha ra d+ha ra/d+ha ra yan+ti ye swA hA/su pra taM/su maM he/a pra ti ha ta/bud d+hi/
262b6(rgyud): d+ha ra d+ha rI/d+ha ra yin+ti yo swA hA//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshalo//

263a3(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi pho brang gi 'khor gyi khyams chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'///

263b1(rgyud): skya'i grong khyer na gnas pa bram ze chen po ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstun pa la yid mi ches shing log par lta ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig tshe

263b3(rgyud): skrag nas yid la bsams pa/da bdag gi srog gi skyabasu la bautsal bar bya/yang dge sbyong go'u ta ma thams cad mkhyen pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhig yin no zhes grogs na
263b4(rgyud): bdag de'i gnasu song ste/de thams cad mkhyen pa yin yang dag na/de 'jigs pas nyam thag par 'gyur ba'i skyabs mdzad pa'i chos phyir ston gor ma chag/snyam bsams nas/
263b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song ba dang /rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma spobs te

263b7(rgyud): nas byams pa'i thugs kyis brtse bar dgongs pa/bka' stsal pa/bram ze chen po khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song ngan 'gro ma nar med pa'i sems can
264a1(rgyud): dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur//de nas yang rim gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu khab rgyud skye bar 'gyuraro//de las thar nas kyang rigs

264b1(rgyud): skyo ba'i sdug bsngal las sbyangs mdzad par gsol/d+hA s+yAd nus gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi sna hA/wA stsal pa/bram ze chen po khyod song la grod khyer ser skya'o lam+ba gyi sum

265a1(rgyud): par mdza//bram ze rgyan po gzhan yang dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma'am/rigs kyi bu mo grang la la
265a2(rgyud): thung ba 'am/nad mang ba zhig yod na dris mchod rten rnying pa bcos sam/gsar du brtsegs kyang rung ste/gsang sngags 'di bris la nang du bzhugs nas dkyil 'khor byi

266a1(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang mkhyen par mdzad/

266a6(rgyud): 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te/gang la la 'di'i tshi go byed par 'dod na tshes brgyad dang /bcu gsum dang /bcu bzhi dang /bco lnga rnams gang yang rung ba la mchod rten

267a4(rgyud): por bu re ra blags pa dang /yang kha zas sna tshobs sbyar ba'i gtor ma spos chu bum pa gang dang sbyar te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag/gtor ma de dang 'bras kyi drung du nye bar chogs

267a7(rgyud): ltar byas na nad pa cho zad 'chi ba'i dus byed du nye bzhag bdun nas dran pa nyams shing 'khrul par 'gyur ba yang tshe slar nu re zhing ring por 'gyur//rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal tsA
267b1(rgyud): myong bar mi 'gyuraro//gang la la zhag pas gtsang sbra cher byas te/nyin gcig ban rtag par gsang sngags lan re re ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bton na de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas longs spyod dang /

267b7(rgyud): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang po la zhig mchod rten de la bskor ba byas sam/phyag byas som/mchod pa bul yang rung ste/de bzhin gsheg po ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bla na

268a3(rgyud): sdig pa chen po dang ldan pa yang mched rten de la reg gam/de'i grib mas phog kyang rung ste/de'i sdig pa thams cad byang zhing zad par 'gyuraro//mchod rten de'i gnas
268a4(rgyud): nA 'byung ba dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /yi dgas dang /sha zu la sogs pa lus la 'jug cing gnod pa dang /gcan zan khro bo dang /thog 'bab pa dang /

268b1(rgyud): thams cad bzlog par 'gyuraro//gang gzhan zhig bsam pa ngan pas dmag dang /cham rkun gyis gnod pa bya bar sems sam/dgra rgol ba zhig byung na yang gnas der
268b2(rgyud): mchod rten de la 'od zer chen po 'byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis me lce kun tu 'bar bas bskor ba'i nang nas dmag gi dpung dang /mtshon cha'i char mngon
268b3(rgyud): par bstan pas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zhi zhing phyir bzlog par 'gyuraro//lha rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang /bskyab par bya ste/phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgya tshun
268b4(rgyud): chad du mtshams bca bsrungs pas de'i nang du 'khrug pa dang /nad 'go ba dang /phyugs nad thams cad mi 'byung //'thab cang rtsod pa mi 'byung /chos ma yin par spyod pa
268b5(rgyud): med par 'gyuraro//'di la gsang sngags gzhan gyis bcad pa dang /mnan par mi nus te/bsang sngags thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro//yang mchod rten de'i srog
268b6(rgyud): shing gI gsang sngags bshad pa/oM sarba ta thA ga tA bi pu la yaSh+Ti/ma Ni ka na rA dza ta/bi bu shi ta yaSh+Ti d+hu ru d+hu ru/sa man+te bi lo te/si ra sa ra/ma ma sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha
268b7(rgyud): NesaM bo d+ha Ni/bra ba ra yaSh+Ti/pa ri ma Ni duSh+Ti du rItsi ra ma le bi shud d+he hUM hUM swA hA/rigs kyi bu tsi nes kyang gsang sngags 'di nan tan du dgu bcu rtsa dgur yi ber bris te/
269a1(rgyud): mchod rten gyi srog shing gI ngos bzhir gzhug/de yang ga'i gzhung 'di nyid kyang dris te skyob shing gi nang du bcug/cho ga de ltar byasnu na mchod rten
269a2(rgyud): dgu khri dgu stong gi srog shing btsugs pa dang 'dra'o//de'i gang du yang mchod rten ring bsrel can dgu khri dgu stong bzhengs pa dang 'dra'o//de'i yang gong du de bzhin gshegs pa
269a3(rgyud): pa mchod pa'i las kyi phyir chos bzang lha'i mdun sa dang 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang gi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o//yang gang la la zhig gis 'jim
269a4(rgyud): pa las mchod rten chung ngu zhig byas te/de'i nang du gsang sngags 'di dag bcug na yang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten lha dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o//yang
269a5(rgyud): gang la la zhig gos mchod rten 'di la bskor ba byas sam/phyag byas sam/thal mo sbyar ram/me tog phul lam/byug pa dang /bdug spos phul lam/dril
269a6(rgyud): bu dang /ba dan dang /gdugs 'ga' zhig phul na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgu khri dgu stong gi mchod rten la phul ba'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa yin no//dge
269a7(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'i dpal dang /mthu stobs rgya chen po thob par 'gyur to/tha na bya dang sbrang ma la sogs pa mchod rten de'i grib mas phog na yang
269b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing rjesu dgongs par mdzadade//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir ma ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyuraro//
269b2(rgyud): yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di lta bu'i rmi lam du rmis sam/rgyang nas mthong nga me/dril bu'o sgra thos sam/mchod rten bzhengs pa rna bar gtam thos pa de dag
269b3(rgyud): kyang mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te/sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang ste/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis srung ba dang /rjesu dgongs pa mdzad de/bla na
269b4(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyu ro//gsang sngags 'di ni mchod rten gyi slob shing gi gsang sngags zhes bya'o//yang rigs
269b5(rgyud): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bya ba'i gsang sngags de dag gi snying po ni 'di yino//oM sarba ta thA ga ta/me la bi sho d+ha ni/rud d+ha ba le pra ti sang skar/ta tha
269b6(rgyud): ga tA d+ha tu d+ha re/d+ha ra d+ha ra/sanA d+ha ra swan d+ha ra sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+huSh+Ti te swA hA/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nA ma/dge bsnyen ma 'am/gang lA

270a1(rgyud): sau phag gam/rdo ba las byas kyang rung ste/dang por gsung sngags kyi snying po stong rtswa brgyad du bzlas brjod byas te/de'i 'og tu mchod rten/
270a2(rgyud): sen mo gang tsam gyi sa la byas sam/khru gang gi tshang du byas sam/dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas na yang rung ste/gsad sngags kyi mthu dang /sems rtse gcig
270a3(rgyud): tu byas pa'i stobs kyis mchod rten de la yang spros kyi dang ldang ste/tsan dan dang /ga pur dang /glu rtsi dang /gur gum la sogs pa'i dri bra 'am/lce'i spos dri zhim pa'i
270a4(rgyud): ngad ldang bar 'gyur ro//bdag dang gzhan mchod rten gyi las byed pa dang /bzlas brjod byed pa de bsam pa thams cad kyang yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyuraro/dge ba'i rtsa ba
270a5(rgyud): rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/yon tan dang /legs pa phun sum tshogs tshogs pa yang thob par 'gyur/tshe thung ba'i las shAg yod na yang tshe nur zhing ring bar
270a6(rgyud): 'gyur/de 'chi ba'i dus byed na yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i zhal mthong zhing //de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rjesu dgongs
270a7(rgyud): teskyes nas phyi mar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par skye bar 'gyur zhing mngon sum du lung ston par 'gyur/der yang tshe lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thub par 'gyur
270b1(rgyud): sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa dang /lha'i mig dang //lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa 'thob cing pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba shes pa 'thogro/lus
270b2(rgyud): les tsan dan gyi dri'i ngang 'byung zhing /kha na sa ud pa la'i bsung ldang bar 'gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi lamaM thob nas phyir mi ldog bI
270b3(rgyud): sa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro//yang dri'i byug pa yungs 'bru tsam yang rung ste//gsang sngags bzlas nas mchod rten bskus na de dag gi yon tan dang /legs pa sngar beshad
270b4(rgyud): pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro//yang dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang //dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bdag nyid gtsang bar byas te/gsang sngags kyi
270b5(rgyud): tshig 'di dag dkon pa dang /rin po cher 'du shes pas gzung na de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dad par bya ste/gsang sngags rnams la gus pa bskyed nas/yi ger bri
270b6(rgyud): bar bya ste/gong du bshad pa bzhin gsang sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bris nas mched rten gyi srog shing gi rtsa bar snying po bcug ste/mchod rten byos na de dge ba'i rtsa ba
270b7(rgyud): rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te//yon tan dang legs po thams cad 'thob par 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'di dag bshad
271a1(rgyud): nga cha phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjesu thugs rangs par mdzad nas gsungs pa/yang dag
271a2(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad mnyam par dgongs shing /thams cad chos kyi dbyings la bkod nas gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho
271a3(rgyud): ga byin gyis brlabs 'thob par bstan pa ni leg so legaso//shin tu yang legs te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing
271a4(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyuraro//de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /mi 'am ci
271a5(rgyud): dang /lto 'phye chen po 'dus pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /'jig rten skyong ba'i mes po tshangs pa dang /khyab 'ju
271a6(rgyud): dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /brgya byin dang /go shin rje dang /chu lha dang /ku be ro dang /de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul tsho ba'i lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
271a7(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa de thos nas bdag cag rang rang gi spyod yul la skye zhing yid 'byung bar gyur te/mthar gyis yon tan tshe na po thob par 'dod pa'i phyir gcig le gcig
271b1(rgyud): bos te smras pa/kye ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu yang rnyed par dka'o//de'i bstun pa dam pa'i chos thosta pa yang shin tu brtad par da/2/gsang
271b2(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa thos pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes smras//de nas de'i tshe bram
271b3(rgyud): ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i gsong sngags dang /cho ga'i yon tan chen po de dag thos shing thob nas sems kyi sgrib pa'i rdul dang rnyog pa rnams drangs

271b6(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par sel bas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor der rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig mngon par
271b7(rgyud): sprul nas/chos la dga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs le mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom
272a1(rgyud): ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsam+ba ldan 'das kyis gsang spags dang /phyag rgya dang /dkyil 'khor gyi tshe ba shAn tu rnyed par dka' ba sems can/
272a2(rgyud): thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can sgrib pa che ba rnams kyi don du bshad/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing tshe rang ba dang /sdug bsngal gyi
272a3(rgyud): phung po thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa lags na/de 'dir bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gsol te/
272a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs b+hi spyan sder yang dag pa'i ye shes chub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang /gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal te//na mo b+ha ga b+hA ba te/na ba na ban+d+ha
272a5(rgyud): nAMsaM myak+saM bud d+ha kr-i TA yu ta shA ta sa hA sA d+h+waM/na maHsarba Ni ba ra Na bi skam di ni b+ho d+hi s+yA tA ya/oM tu ru tu ru mA ma/sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+hA Ni/sarba ta thA ga taM/
272a6(rgyud): A yur ba lI nAM baM pre la ne m+bi sarba sid+d+hin mar+thaskr-i tAM/ba ra ba ra/sarba satwa a ba lo ki na~M/oM sarba ni b+hA ra Na biskam bi ni/ma me sarba pA pa bi shau d+hi ka ru swA hA/bcom

272b2(rgyud): temachod rten gyi nang du btsug na mchod rten de la/la la zhig gis phyag byas sam/tshig snyan pas bstod dme/spos dang /me tog dang /byug pa dang /mar me
272b3(rgyud): 'bul na rigs kyi bu de de'i tshe 'dri nyid la sdig pa thams cad byang shing las kyi sgrub pa thams cad gsal te/bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur/sangs
272b4(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong grangs med pa'i gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du mched rten ring bsrel gyi snying
272b5(rgyud): po can brgya stong bye ba khrag khrog gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod pa byis par 'gyuraro//de'i dge bo'i rtsa ba rgya chen po sogs par 'gyuraro//yang dge sbyong gang zhig gis

272b7(rgyud): te/mchod rten la bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /mtshams
273a1(rgyud): med pa lnga byas pa yang yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur/gzhan yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par gyur nas byang chub song la
273a2(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel po bdag nyid kyi lus mngon par bstan te/bsam pa thams cad dngos grub tu sbyin par mdzad cing /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
273a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi zhal yang mthong bar 'gyur//de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis nyis brgya rtsa brgyad bton na ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyuraro//gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad

273a5(rgyud): nye bar 'ongs nas lus mngon par bstan te/bsrung ba dang /skyab byed cing shes rab kyi stobs kyang skyed nas bsod nams thams cad nye bar sgrub bo//gang gis lnga
273a6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bton na dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'dus ma byas kyi lo ma la gnas pa 'thob bo//yang gong gis drug brgya rtsa brgyad gton na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te
273a7(rgyud): na mkha' la rig 'dzin gyi gan su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//yang gang gis bdun brgya rtsa brgyad gton na legs pa'i ston thams cad ldan par 'gyur//yang gang
273b1(rgyud): gos bad+mad ban+d+haHbrgyad gton nu gzhan gyis bsgo ba med pa'i rang dbang 'thob ste/sems rnam par dag par 'gyur//yang gang gis dgu brgya d+ha brgyud du gton na phung po

273b6(rgyud): yang gang gis dgu stong tshad bar gton ni rig sngags dang /gsang sngags rnams kyi bdag po gla spang ba pa'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro//yang gang gis khri tshang bar bton
273b7(rgyud): na/byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba gnon par 'gyur ro//yang gang gis nyi khri tshang bar bton na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku
274a1(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur te/seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs par 'gyuraro//yang gang la la zhig gis pha ma'i don gyi phyir bsod nams kyi las bya bar

274a6(rgyud): rgyal po gsang sngags kyi tshe ba 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'dra ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku las byung ba lags na/bcom ldan 'das snying
274a7(rgyud): po dam pa 'di dag 'dzam bu gleng na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang /sdig pa thams cad nges la nas de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
274b1(rgyud): la 'jug par 'gyur//do skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la byaka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngabs kyi cho rga
274b2(rgyud): 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten nu zhugs pa dang 'dra ba yin//ngas cho ga ji snyed bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba chungs kyang

274b4(rgyud): na de dag gi ston ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bri shad kyang mi rdzogs te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mkhyen cing

275a1(rgyud): rtswa dgu yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la ba'i lci bas byugs te/gra bzhir dri'i chu phor bu bkang
275a2(rgyud): ba re re bzhag/bdug spos kyi snod 'thul ba yang bzhog nas snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang /dri'i chu dang /'bras skam po rnams blugs te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag pa dang /
275a3(rgyud): yang til nag po dang /sgren ma mi Sha dang /'bras rnams bsres te bcos pa'i 'bras thug kri sa ra zhes bya ba dang zas dkar gsum dang /'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa
275a4(rgyud): dang /yang shing tog sna tshogs 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /kha zas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang /spos dang /me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkram
275a5(rgyud): la/gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing gri nang du bcug nas mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du dmigs te
275a6(rgyud): phyag byas lA swai mas rtse gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag gdon par bya'o//'di lto ste/oM bi pr-i la bi pu la bi ma li/pra ba re dzi na pa re sA ra sa ra/sarba ta thA ga ta d+hA tu/
275a7(rgyud): gor+N+Ne/a d+hiSh+Thi ti swA hA/a ya ta to ba ni sne hU~M/sarba de ba ne/ba ha ya bi shud+d+ha oM d+hiSh+ThA na sa ma ye swAhA/bdug spos 'thul brgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing /gas
275b1(rgyud): sa lanan+ta shUHbrgyad nga tron na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang /gnod sbyin gyi skye dpon chen po brgyad dang /gsang bapa' bdag hU~M dang /rgyal pargyu
275b2(rgyud): bzhi dang /tshangs pa dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /rim gro byed srog shang brtan par byed//de bas grong
275b3(rgyud): yang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te/mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /chos kyi spyir byin gyis rlob cing
275b4(rgyud): bsrel dang ljon por mdzad//de ltar sems theg pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na ston de dag/gzhan yang mchod rten de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i bsod
275b5(rgyud): nams thob par 'gyur te/rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan zhing lus nir
275b6(rgyud): dug la tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /bgegs thams cad kyis ma tshu gos par 'gyur ro//gang gzhan la la zhig gis mchod rten 'dri mthong ngam/mchod rten de'i dril bu'i sgra
275b7(rgyud): thos na yang las kyi sgrib pa dang /sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongasu byang nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jog
276a1(rgyud): rten du smra'o//gang la la zhig gis mdzod/nA de'i ming tsam thos pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob

276a6(rgyud): de nas yang gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te/mchod rten gyi 'phong lo rnams kyi nang du bcug ste/mchod rten rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag ste/

276b1(rgyud): /ka TI yuSh+mA shrA tA sa hA sAd+d+hA/oM ba Ta8/ tsaro//maur grwa ra tsa la bA riswA hA/cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par spyad par yang ma
276b2(rgyud): zad de/des ni rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ga ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed byis par 'gyur//yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong
276b3(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu steng la mchod cing bstan bkur byas par 'gyur//de'i gang du yang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs bsdus te/mchod rten de la yo byad
276b4(rgyud): sna tshogs sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha brang dang /yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag snyed kyis mkhyen cing
276b5(rgyud): gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i bsod nams dang /yon tan thams cad thub par mdzad//yang gang

276b7(rgyud): ba mdzad/bas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang /shar gnyer ba rnams dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /yi dgas la sogs pa thams cad kyang /gnad par

278a3(rgyud): kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gsang sngags 'da' cho ga dang /mchod rten 'gyi ba'i tshi ga ji skad gsungs pa rnams sems can thams cad la smin pa'i skung

278b6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/sarba ye na in+ta mi ta sid+d+hi s+thA pI nA ma d+hA rat+ti/bod skad du/shes pa thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs

279a3(rgyud): 'tshalo//'di skyed bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ro rab chen po sna lngas grub pa/gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas

279a5(rgyud): mchod rten du gyur pa'i gnas na/lag na rdo rje dang /'dzum dpal dang /spyan ras gzigs dang /byams pa la sogs pas bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams

279b1(rgyud): gsum rgya stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mo khyab cing brjod kyi mo ltung ba thams cad 'di zer gyi snang brgyan pas tal rgyu khang bu bzhin du gang zhing

279b4(rgyud): gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rims kyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas/na mkha'i khams thams cad yid kyi mchod rten gyi skus gang zhing rgyas par byas te 'od zer de

280a4(rgyud): ci byas pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyuraro//bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i rig pa chen mo'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs de'i cho ga 'di'o//oM t+yA d+hA serba ta thA ga tA
280a5(rgyud): hr-i da ya gar+b+he/dz+wA la d+harma d+hA tu gan+d+hi/saM ha ra Na a yuHsaM sho d+ha yaM/pa b+h+rUM sarba ta thA ga tA sa man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma laM bi shud+d+he swAhA//rig pa chen mo 'di gsungs ma

280a7(rgyud): /mo la btags na/lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang /bkur sti bya ba'i 'osu 'gyur//rig pa chen mo 'di lus sam mgul
280b1(rgyud): thogs na/de lta dang /mu dang /lA mA yan la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyi du lta bar 'gyuraro//bdag nyid rnyi bra bra gam/tshal ldam/dgon pa 'am/
280b2(rgyud): sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod ni ri dngas phyogs thams cad mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro//oM t+yA d+d+he sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gAn+d+he dz+wA la d+harma
280b3(rgyud): gar+N+No/saM hA ra rtaM/A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/pA paM sarba ta thA gaM ta sa mAn+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma li bai shud d+he/ma hA bi re dza rA gaM b+hA ra si/d+har+m+ma d+hAt+yA gan+d+he/bi bi sa ra
280b4(rgyud): a laM swA hA/zhes brjod na/sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro//bdag nyid chu 'am/mtsho 'am/rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang la rgal ba

280b6(rgyud): sa ha raH/A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/pA bAM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta bi ma la uSh+NI Sha bi shud d+hi/ma hA bi ra dze gaM b+hI ra si d+harma d+ha tu bi bi sA ra/A ma ma ka~M swAn+d+he/zhes
280b7(rgyud): brjod na/chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyuraro//gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis na mkha' gang nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bta na/

281a2(rgyud): d+ha ya/pA paM sarba tA b+hU gA te sa mAn+to/bi ma le uSh+NI Sha bi shud+d+he/ma hA ma ba ri tse ra gaM b+h+r-i ra si d+harma d+hA tu bi bi si ra a a aM khaM yaM swA hAM/zhes brjod na/na mkha'i khama?

281a5(rgyud): gang yang rung ba la rig pa'i sngags 'dis btab pa ste/mchod rten btab na rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te/oM rat+na tsi ti paM tsi ye be bI sa ra swA hA/zhes
281a6(rgyud): brjod nas pa'i lci ba la sogs pas byugs na thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur ro//rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di mi btab na/gang zhig gser dang dngul
281a7(rgyud): dang bai DUr+ya la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengasu gsol yang rdo dang /shing dang /kham pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di nyid rdzas

281b2(rgyud): bskal pa dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma dag nas/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skyes nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro//rig pa chen

281b4(rgyud): gyis bgrod de/bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyis thob par 'gyur ro//rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/gser dang /dngul dang /bai DUr+ya la sogs pa la mchod rten btab
281b5(rgyud): na de gdon mi za bar rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dris btab na mchod rten gcigs
281b6(rgyud): btab na yang bye ba btab par 'gyuraro//rig pa chen mo 'dis ma btab ni bye ba btab kyang gcig dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang ma bzhin no//rig pa chen mo de'i
281b7(rgyud): sngags 'di yin te/tad+ya thA/sUk+Sh+me sUk+Sh+me shAn+te shAn+te/nir ku l-i/yo sho te dzaM/sarba bud+d+he/a d+hiSh+Tha naM/a d+hiSh+Thi tau/a nu maM de swA hA//'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/
282a1(rgyud): pa'i dang du la lan nyi shUd+d+ha ga'adas rjod byas te/mchod rten bcig btab nA d+hi ba btab par 'gyuraro//brgyab ta bA pa'i grangs dang pan+da rung//
282a2(rgyud): ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus//sbyong btab pa'i glengs dang phan yon ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus/
282a3(rgyud): khri btab pa'i grangs dang ban yon ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi rus//'bum btab pa'i grangs dang bran yon ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de be
282a4(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus//de bas na mchod pa'i rten lnga man chad gdab pa'i mchod pa'i che gar bya ba ni thog mar mchod rten bzlog pa'i gnas sam
282a5(rgyud): mchod rten gyi 'jim paSh+Ti gnas sam/mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas gang nas blangs pa'i gnas des bdag byin gyis brlabs cing sA la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam
282a6(rgyud): sbyor ngan pa mchod rten da /dge bA las bar tshad byed pa rnams mtshams bcad par bya ste/thig skud la reg pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis gdab ste/oM badz+ra s+yA tra hUM phaT
282a7(rgyud): rjesra brjod nas thig sku de nyid che rdo rje'i skud par dmigs nas mchod rten gyis khyon ji tsom ran pa dang /'jim pa'i sa khyon ji tsam ran pa thig gis sa bcad/de bzhin
282b1(rgyud): dus sad na sag na d+ha nyid mdzo rten rgyu ron pa che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur//donas/ji nyid la song ldeng kau bla ba sor brgyang pa la rnyog pa rgyan mo'i sngags 'ang
282b2(rgyud): gdab par bya ste/oM badz+ra tA li kI lo k+ShiM lA ya sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ces bya ba 'di la ni bdun bzlas te/rdo rje phur duste dmigs te dbus dang grwa bzhir gdago//de bzhin du bat+tA
282b3(rgyud): na ma dang mi ma yin pa las srung bar 'gyu ro//sngon gyi los kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtog so//seng ldeng gi phur bu ni mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgos pa ma blas kyi
282b4(rgyud): bar du mi dbyung bar bzhag/de nas to la dang yungs kar las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//oM a mr-i tAM ha na hA na hU~M phaT/ces lan bdun bzlas te/sa'i phyod/
282b5(rgyud): su gtor bas/sa phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par 'gyuraro//de ltar sa gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs kun su byin gyis du
282b6(rgyud): ta bgegs kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa las mtshams bcad/skyes dang /me tog dang /gtor ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyangs phyogs de na gnas po'i snyi //klu dang
282b7(rgyud): lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsngos te/bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'ad bklags nas phyogs de yang shin tu bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur/

290a3(rgyud): sbyar na su//lus la byab cing bzlas na phan//'khru bag nad kyis btab pa la//sman nem ril bu kha zas la//bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang //khong du btang na phan
290a4(rgyud): por 'gyur//de yi bzlas brjod snga ma ste//'di dag rab tu bzlas par bya//nA maM rat+na tra yA yA/oM ye d+har+m+ma he tu pA b+he bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/te ShAny+dza yo ni

290a6(rgyud): dang sran chung mon spyan dang //shing tog rgun 'brum a ru ra//de dag kun la za ba yi//srin bu sbur bu phye ma leb//bye'u dang byi ba ne tse dang //lo tog za ba kha bcing
290a7(rgyud): na//zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang //bye ma sa dang thal ba la//bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas//zhing dang shing tog gtor byas na//de dag kun kyang kha bcings
290b1(rgyud): 'gyur//ha cang char pa ches pa na//bcom ldan 'das la phul ba yi//mo tog dmun ma re rol//bzlas spyod nya shu rtsa gcig bya//gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu//
290b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen pa'i di a dag cu//bum pa gang ba'i steng dag tu//kham par gseng ma'i nang du yang //mi tog gtsang ma banas pa de//bsregs na char pa 'chad pa
290b3(rgyud): 'gyur//ser ba nyid phrag lcug ma la//bzlas brjod brgyan rtsa brgyad bzlas//ser ba gang nas g.yongasu//klad la bskor zhing byangs na 'chad//yang na thal chen srungs
290b4(rgyud): kAr la//bzlas brjod pa rgyu ni rtswa brgyad bya//thum pa byas te lhag po la//btags te btsugs na ser ba 'chad//'byung ba shi za yi dgas dang //brjed byed gdan gyis
290b5(rgyud): zin pa la//dkyil 'khor 'dom gong gA bzhi la//bum bya gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste//gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang //yungs kar ga pur nar don dang //gla rtsil
290b6(rgyud): sogs sman sbyar te//bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas//gos dang zas ni dkar po sbyar//dkyil 'khor dri yi nang du bzhug/bum pa chu yis bkru bar bya//sangs rgyas
290b7(rgyud): sru bsil byas pa'i chus//bkru zhing blud na rab tu phan//nad dang gnod pa kun las thor//'byung po brjed byed sha zi yis//glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur//bus pa grong
291a1(rgyud): gyis 'jigs pa la//gi wang la ni sngags bzlas nas//snying po stongs chen 'di bris gdags//oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA pa la/ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+hA nas
291a2(rgyud): yadza Ti/laM bo dAr/u nu sh+ma kro d+hA hU~M phaT swA hA/gtsang sbra byas te mgul bar gdags//de bzhin yungs kar dgal yang //bzlas brjod byas te bsnams la gdags//
291a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro gdon gyis zin pa na//yungs kar dang ni gu gul lo//sngags gnyis lan ni bdun bdun bzlas//dud pas bdugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur//de la the tshom mi za'o//
291a4(rgyud): bus pa gdon dang nAd las thar/bud med bu ni thogs 'gyur na//chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas//blud na legs par bcas par 'gyur//bud med mo sham bud med la//
291a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu//de la bzlas brjod nyi shu bya//khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma lo//chu de blud na chu tsha 'phan//rigs brgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur//lam
291a6(rgyud): du zhugs te 'gro ba na//skud pa dang ni gos kyi grwa ra//bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun//bdud cing bzlas te song ba na//bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub//dgra dang nye
291a7(rgyud): zho med par 'gyur//yid ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na//shu dag tshon gang rnam pa la//mar srang sum ngargya drug cu la//bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang //bum pa gcog
291b1(rgyud): tu blugs la dkrug/nyi ma re re lo gcig tu//shu dag gi ni dum rI dang //mar srang dag nair+ya ro la//bzlas brjod re re bya zhing bza'//de ni yid gzhungs blo ldan 'gyur//de bzhin
291b2(rgyud): ba ni ser skya ma'i//mar dang 'o ma drag la yang //bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad du//bzlas te 'o thug dkrug cing bza'//yid gzhungs pa yi mchog tu 'gyur//mi dang 'grogs
291b3(rgyud): shing mdza' 'dod na//gang dag yid dang 'thad pa la//me tog dag ni rtsi shing la//'bras bu 'am ni 'jib dag/lag pa g.yas pa'i chang bar bcug/bzlas brjod bad+ma ni
291b4(rgyud): rtsa gcig gdab//gang gi lag tu byin pa na//de dang rtag tu mdza' bar 'gyur//rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams kun//'chi bar nye bar gnas pa na//chu dang yungs kar bcwa
291b5(rgyud): pa la/rnga bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya//de la gtor na sos par 'gyur//yang na nyungs kar brgya brgyad la//bzlas pa'i thum po mgul du gdags//de ni nad med bde bar
291b6(rgyud): 'gyur//mi rnams 'chi bos 'jigs gyur na//yungs kAr la ni bzlas brjod bya//thum po byas te mgo la gdags//bzlas brjod brgyad stong 'bum yang bzlas//mi nad dang
291b7(rgyud): ni phyugs nad kun//ming yang med cing zad par 'gyur//de dag kun gyi bzlas brjod ni//'di dag kun tu rgya cher gsungs//na mo rat+na tra yA yaM/oM ye d+har+m+ma ha~M tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te
292a1(rgyud): Sh+TAn+d+hathA ga tA t+ya ba t+ta/d+har+d+ha d+ha man dzad+hA mo bo ma hA sh+yA maNaHswAd//rtug tu gaHsa badz+rod b+h+yas na ni//bsam pa yong su rjongs par 'gyur//gnad
292a2(rgyud): pas ces kyang tshugs mi 'gyur//dam chos yongasu bzung bar 'gyur//tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag ni//mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab//cho ga 'di dag thams cad
292a3(rgyud): ni/gang lha dad pas yid chas na//'grub par the tshom med par 'gyur//bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas gyur na//dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//ston pa shAkya
292a4(rgyud): thugs rje 'di//dge slong ne ra ba na rak+Shi tas//tho gar yul nas rnyed pa ste//'gro ba kun gyi dpal du shar//'phags pa rten cing 'brel pa'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs
292a5(rgyud): rdzogaso///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya pra tI A mr-i da nA ma ma hA ya nA sU tra/bod skada'aphags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen
292a6(rgyud): po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum
292a7(rgyud): lha'i gnas na/ar mo ni ke lta bu'i rdo leb la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul lo sog pa nyan thos n+de bo rnaMs dang /dpag pa byams pa dang /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
292b1(rgyud): /phyug na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ston rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang /sred
292b2(rgyud): med kyi bu dang /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang //lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de nas
292b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo lnga btsugs
292b4(rgyud): te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par
292b5(rgyud): 'tshal ba sha stag ste/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di ro mchis na/ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang /lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas
292b6(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten dang /dge sbyong dang /bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las/dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du
292b7(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol/zhes zhus pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
293a1(rgyud): tshogasu btsud pa bka' stsal pra/ye d+har+m+ma he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA gA to h+yA ba tAng /te ShAny+dzA yo na ro d+ha a ba b+hU dI mAhA shrA ma NaH/chos gang rgyus byung /
293a2(rgyud): de dag gi/rgya dang de 'gog gang yin pa//de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsol te//dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs//spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste/rten cing
293a3(rgyud): 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te/sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //spyan ras gan/
293a4(rgyud): dbang phyug rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnos pa'i sa phyogasu mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam/srog shing ni khab tsam/gdugs

293a7(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rengs te/
293b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///'phags brten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba thob pa chen po'i rlung rgyug su/

294b1(rgyud): gyis//thug pa'i tha su byu bar byu//rlu rnams thams cad byas par 'gyur//nachog rten gnyis nyan gas m+b+ha dang //tron pani rtag pa'i rims rnams la//rngu/

297b3(rgyud): t+yes mud ga te swahA//sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa rdzogaso////bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
297b4(rgyud): songs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshalo//na mo b+ha ga wa te ran+ta ke ny+tsa d+hAd+d+hA yA/ta thA gA twA yA/sh+tsate/sa myan+ta/bud+d+hA ya/tab+h+ya/oM h+ne rAd+d+ha mad+hA rAk+ShA rAd+b+ha d+hIrmAswAn+ta/

298b6(rgyud): me swA hA/shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na/gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs//
298b7(rgyud): /rgya gar skadu/pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/bod skadadu/shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwe rA ya/
299a1(rgyud): /bad+d+hi d+b+ha ya/mAn+thasad+g+ha ya/man+tha/ru NIk+ShA y+ya/tad+yaSh+Ta/oM bi ba th+wI pa/brad+hA pa ra \u0f7fna/dA radza rA/ma bad d+hAn/b+hU D+hA drud dz+nya nga/
299a2(rgyud): d+ha ni swAhA//rig sngags 'di'i tshig ni 'di yin ti/nang re zhing rtsal mi khyor gang la len nyi shu rtsa gcig nas te/zla ba gcig gi bar du 'bung ni thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur//

299a6(rgyud): nI reni na/rten gcig la sho lo kI brgya ba lo ma/ba drug gi bar du byas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//sho lo ka bad+ma langs pa rdzog sa//

299b6(rgyud): she loka stang lobs pa'i gzungs rdzog so///dkon mchog gsum+b+ha la phyug 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phabyas pa spyan ras gis
299b7(rgyud): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo//tad+yaSh+Te/tri shwA tri shu la shwA khi/Ar+ya ba liM ki te shwo rA ya/Udz+nyA pa ya t+ye/ba ren/du ha la/mr-i du t+ya swAhA//cho ga ni 'phags pa
300a1(rgyud): spyan ras gzi bros dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te/ci 'byor pas mchod pa rgyas la/tshu la sngags kyis btab te bzhag nas/na
300a2(rgyud): bar chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro khar khaM zas 'o ma dang spags te zos na zhog bdun lon na nyin cig kyang sha~M lo ka stong lebs par 'gyur ro//yid ches pa'i rtags
300a3(rgyud): yod//sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogaso///dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshalo//

300a5(rgyud): tshul lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyu ro//de'i tshe ga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun
300a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la/dro khor kha zas 'o ma dang spags te bza' ba lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo steng lobs par 'gyur ra

300b1(rgyud): gzigs dpang phyug lnga phyug 'tsha'o//d+hAD+D+h+ya/sa ta rad+d+ha//mum ha ra thar srid pa rum swAhA/shu dag dkar po la sngags 'di ga zlas brjod byas

300b5(rgyud): sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/dran pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed la mched pa byas par 'gyur zhing
300b6(rgyud): zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro//me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye mo dang /chos gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
300b7(rgyud): dang /ba don thams cad dang /gdan dang /gding ba dang /na bza' dang /spun gzigs dang /bshos gtsang la sogs pa dang /rgyan dang /lhab lhub thams cad
301a1(rgyud): kyis mchod par 'gyuraro//sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur//sangs rgyas dang byang chub
