364a1(rgyud): zhing myur yang y-i bdang //rlud 'gugs pa dang gnan pa dang //dag tu gas pad //yun du tsho nong 'dogs pa dang //'dun
364a2(rgyud): pa 'thab mo ster bdang //bya ba nyid kyis myos pa dang //gang yad gzhan dag de 'drid pa//rtogs bas ga shin rje'i ga shed dran pas//de dag thams cad byed pa
364a3(rgyud): de nas tshig phyi ma 'di//ji ltar yin pa de bshad//lha ma yin gyi phrag sbyor song //mkhas pas rimo bkra mAnas//khri zas mi za stan gcig 'dug/ y-i b+h+r-ing
364a4(rgyud): ched bzlas byas nas//de nas bud med gzugs mchog ldan//bzang po rnams ni sbyor phyung nas//sgrub pa de yi mdun du ni//nang du gA shegs shes dga' bar byed
364a5(rgyud): de nas grogs po yid gcugs dang //sgrub pa po ni lhan cig tu//nges par dam tshig dag gis ni//dri yi gan su 'jug par bya//de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa ru//brnaM
364a6(rgyud): sbyin ma yi ming rnams dang //sha za mo 'am dri za mo//yang na glang 'dod pa yi lha'i//mang bris de yi mdun bzhag nas//ri mo la ni nyin re zhing //de yi chog ni man+ta
364a7(rgyud): sbyor nas//mi smra bar ni 'bum bzlas na//sgrub pa pa des 'jigs 'gyur nas//de dag thams cad le bar 'gyur//sgrub po srid 'dod par ni//'di rul sa rnam
364b1(rgyud): byed par 'gyur//lha rnams dag ni thams cad kyang //gnod sbyin la sogs bsgrubs bshad zin//'di yi cho ga phyi ma yi//phyi ma dag kyang bshad par bya//ri mchog dag
364b2(rgyud): gi rtse mo la//yi dgas mang po'i dkyil 'khor bri//yi dgas dkyil 'khor br-i sa nas kyang //kun la sha yi gtor ma bya//grogs po sems ni dpa' ba dang //skyon ldan
364b3(rgyud): zhing bzo ba dang //mi ro'i gos la bris pa yi//ri mo bzhag lnga de nas su//badrag gi yan lag thams cad las//rus pa dag gis khrag phyung ste//mi yi thod pa'i nang du/
364b4(rgyud): bzhag/lus la khrag ni ci byin pa//mir sgra yi pir dag gis//de nas de yi lus dag dang //mig kyang rab tu gsal bar bya//de la ba gagis kyang mang du 'gyur//de
364b5(rgyud): ni dpa' bos bshad par gsungs//dpa' bo dgra gis las kyang bya//de yi 'og tu bzo bo la//dpa' bo dag gis yon yang dbul//de nyid yongasu rdzogs par ni//gyur//
364b6(rgyud): gyi bar du tshul bzhin gyis//tha mar dpa' bo gcig pu de//ri mo mtshan mor rab 'bar ram//yang na dpyod dam g.yo yang rung //de nas dngos grub thob par bshad/
364b7(rgyud): mo de ni blangs pa yis//na mkhar 'phar ba gdon mi za//dpal ldan thogs pa med par 'gro/mtshan mo nyi ma bzhin du 'bar//dpa' bo dag gis sgrub pa 'di//rig
365a1(rgyud): 'dzin kun gyi thob mar 'gro//grub pa de lA lha rnams kyang //gdon mi za bar phyag 'tshal 'gyur//rig 'dzin rnams ni thams cad kun//kun tu bcu
365a2(rgyud): ba'i rgyal por 'gyur//yang na cho ga shes pa'i rgyal//ri mo zhi ba sngon bzhin du//blangs te bsregs pa'i steng du bzhag/de nas bsregs pa der 'dug nas//gcig pa
365a3(rgyud): ral gri blangs nasu//mtshan mo gshin rje'i gshed bzlas pa//'ber bar 'gyur gyi bar du'am//du ba 'amache ba'i bar du bzlas//'bar bar gyur pa dpal dang ldan/
365a4(rgyud): rig 'dzin du ni de 'gyur ro//du ba byung bas mi snang ba//na mkhar 'gro ba'i mchog tu 'gyur//de tshe che bar gyur na ni//sa yi rgyal por nges par 'gyur//ral gri
365a5(rgyud): mchog de bya ba yang //sor ni sum cu rtsa gnyis shing //yan lag thams cad yongs rdzogs pa//bsgrub par bya ba so yi rdo//de ltar cho ga phyi ma yang //mdor ni legs
365a6(rgyud): par bshad pa yin//lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo yis//mthe bong sbas nas gyen du ni//skyeng bar byis pa'i phyag rgyu yi/baM tsan zhes ni bsgrags pa yin//ha nyid
365a7(rgyud): kyis ni sngags ldan par//las rnams kun la bcing bar bya//spyan drangs pa dang mchod pa dang //gshegasu gsol dang bzhugs pa dang //las rnams bya ba'i tshe dag
365b1(rgyud): dang //gzhan yang dgos pa 'byung ba'i tshe//tshul bzhin phyag rgyu 'di bcings nas//gshin rje'i gshed b+hIl+yA bAn+d+ha s+ho//sngags pa rgyal po'i drang song nas//mgo bdud dbu
365b2(rgyud): mo btsugasan su//bdag nyid dang ni nor bcas par//gdon mi za bar myur du 'grub//'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po thams cad kyi phyi
365b3(rgyud): ma'i yang phyi ma las/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshod kyi gsal shing khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo phyi ma'i yang phyi ma gsang ba bcu bdun pa gsal shing
365b4(rgyud): gri rgyud rdzog so//oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn+ta ka hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/'dri yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags gzhan//oM AHhU~M 'di yang gzhano//
365b5(rgyud): yi ge bcu gcig rgyal po yi//de nyid bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyuraro//khra bo rnam par rgyal ba yi//rtsa ba dang ni phyi ma dang //de bzhin phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di//rtog pa ma lus
365b6(rgyud): rgyas pa dge/lho de rnams kyis legs thos nus//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das la kuno//thal mo rab tu sbyar na so//khro bo rnam par rgyal ba ni//gshin rje gshed la
365b7(rgyud): 'di skad smras//bcom ldan khyod kyi rdog pa 'di//sgrub pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir//rab tu ngo mtshar bshod lags te//bzlas dang hom dang mchod la sogs//dri za
366a1(rgyud): chen po brtul zhugs dang //de bzhin dka' thub drag po dang //ji skad gsungs pa'i smyung ba yis//khro bo kI li kI la las//sogs pa'ang dus la
366a2(rgyud): bab pa ni//sngags zlos pa la dngos grub ster//bcom ldan 'das kyi rtog pa dang //khyad par gyur pa ci zhig mchis//de bas bzlas dang sbyin sreg dang //sbyang dang
366a3(rgyud): brtul zhugs dka' thub dang //med par rang dbang nyid du ni//dngos grub dam pa khyod kyis gsungs//lha mchog de dag thams cad kyis//phyog 'tshal de skad smras pa
366a4(rgyud): dang /khro bo drag tu bzhad pa yis//rab tu drag pa'i tshig tu gsungs//drag tu bzhad pa'i zhal 'dzum pas//lha yi tshogs rnams 'jigs rmongs la//ma 'dzi
366a5(rgyud): ma 'jigs zhes gsungs pa'i//phan pa'i tshig gis dbugs phyung nas//khyed rnams kyis ni gang smras pa//sgrub pa dag ni med par yang //sbyor ba shes pas 'grub
366a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba//lha rnams kun gyis mnyan par gyis//bde gshegs dngos grub gcig pu las//gyes pa rno pa tha dad 'gyur//de nas ting 'dzin tshul las ni//
366a7(rgyud): mtshan ma dang ni dngos grub do//thog mar byang chub rtsal brten//shes rab de lta bu yang sgom//sems kyang rnam par mi rtag pas//bde gshegs dngos grub de
366b1(rgyud): dag thob//dro nga'i gzugasu gyur par byas//sa pani mtshon cha mang por ldan//khro bA da yi zhal drug sgyur//dril bu bsil ba'i sgra yang 'byin//khro bo'i zhal ni bcas par
366b2(rgyud): ldan//de yi gzi dang mthu ldan byas//kun tu dga' ba'i snying por ldan//gang gi yid la gang bsgrims pa//de la nga yi thugs g.yos pos//ji lta ba 'am gar yang rung //
366b3(rgyud): mdun nam yang na rgyu 'anas kyang //las kun byed nus grub par 'gyur//gang dag nga ni phyag wA ban+de//be con gdangs pas bsdigs par mdzad//d+hI shul ral gri dag sta
366b4(rgyud): po shaka ti thaMd mar dbyug/de dag las nI phyog gi sumi drug/g.yas pa ba ts+tshin mda' lA gri//g.yon na 'kha lo rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje rje gcig mig drug pa// /
366b5(rgyud): gnyer ma basbyor ba dang //khri gnyer gnyer ba'i lto bcan//'jigs pa'i sbrul gyi ro stong dkris//thod pa dag gis rgyun du byas//chere sprin sngon po'i kha dog 'dra//zhal ga
366b6(rgyud): skyon yang ma mnyam pa//'brug gi sgra dbyangs sgra sgrogs pa//sdug lcags na bzang gsal bar dgyes//mtshan cha mtshon rnams 'gyur zhing 'khrug/spyan du gtsug dung
366b7(rgyud): rtse dmar ser//zhabs gnyis gdang bo pa'i tshong ngam mdzad//sa yi steng na zaza lta//mche ba dag kyang gtsigs pa'i zhal//bcibs pa ma hi bcibs pa ste//sem
367a1(rgyud): dpa' 'amar mo la bris pa//sgrub po myur du mchod byed na//de la nga ni myur bar dra//dgyes nas mngon du phyogs par 'gyur//ji ltar 'dod pa
367a2(rgyud): don rnams ni//gdon ma za bar grub par byed//rnam par gnon pa'i gzugs 'di na//badrid las rgyal ba yin par bsgrags//thog mar bdag gi dam tshig sbyin//
367a3(rgyud): srung mchog tshul bzhin byas nasu//ras 'di sum cu sor tsha dral//sngags pa bzo be ston can//yid ni brtan par bya ba'i phyir//dben pa'i gnasu mi mngon /
367a4(rgyud): chen rtsi dag ba bzung ba yos//rlom thog mar b+hA ba b+h+yo//zin nas klung ni dben par bzhig/su la'ang bsnyen par yod mi bya//nga yi grwa dgas gyur par byas//sa ban
367a5(rgyud): mtshan cha bzang por ldan//nga yi zhal ni khro bor 'gyur//dril bu bsil ba'i sgra dang ldan//khro ba'i zhal ni bsam par //da yi gzi dang mthur ldan byas/
367a6(rgyud): kun dga' yi ni snying par ldan//gal te dam tshig mi ldan pa'i//skye bos ri mo de mthong na//myur du rnam par myos par 'gyur//de bas rnam pa thams cad du//
367a7(rgyud): ba drag po kun tu byi//gling ngapa yang na grong khyer du//rnam pa gzhon du bzhag gyur tam//gong du mchod po ma byas na//myur du 'jigs pa skye bar 'gyur
367b1(rgyud): me la ni gnas pa'i gzugs//de ltar rtag tu goms byas shing //dar bsgyur du ya? yid du 'gyur//ji srid gang dag goms gyur cing //kun tu mdun na gnas pa ru//gang
367b2(rgyud): tshe mthong bar gyur pa ni//de tshe ri mo med par yang //ji lta bu yi tshul nyid kyi//rtag tu sbyor ba byas nas ni//sbyor ba nyid kyis rtag pa ru//khro bo kun tu sbyar ba ni/
367b3(rgyud): de las las rnams thams cad byed//'di ni gsang ba bstan pa yin//yang na bdag nyid de 'dra bar//ji srid gcig tu grub pa'i bar//yid la legs par bsgom/
367b4(rgyud): na ni/de nas de yi dngos gnas par//yid la cung zad gang bsams pa//dngos por goms par byas na ni//de nyid 'bras bu yod par 'gyur//gang phyir khro bo bsgoms
367b5(rgyud): pa yis//khro bo yong ye bsgoms na ni//bzlas pa la sogs med par yang //dngos grub dam par thob par 'gyur//sgrub pa rnams la dam tshig ni//gal te sbyin par
367b6(rgyud): bya na yang //de tshe sa ni rab sbyangs nas//thog mar spos chus gdab par bya//kun tu zlum po zhes bya ba'i//dkyil 'khor 'di ni logs shig tu//kun tu zlum por bri
367b7(rgyud): par bya//mtshan rtsi nag por legs bris te//nub phyogs sgo bstod khri do tsam//de yi dbusu mchog bri ba//'gying zhing ldem bag can gyi lus//cher sprin dang ni
368a1(rgyud): bung ba'i mjug/'jam zhing mnyan pa dpal dang ldan//gser gyi dril bu'i sgra dang ldan//g.yag rnga'i bsil yab g.yob pa can//A dza na
368a2(rgyud): lta bu'i//mase chen po dam pa ni//dkyil 'khor dam pa de bris te//srung ba cho ga bzhin byas nas//sngags shes pas ni mchod byas pa//cho ga bzhin du 'dir
368a3(rgyud): bshad//spyan drangs gdan du bstabs pa dang //arga gtor mas mchod pa dang //mar me bdug pa bstan pa dang //tha mar slar gshegs bstan pa'o//gzugs
368a4(rgyud): dgod pa dag thog ma ru//lha dgod pa dag yig 'brus bskyed//sa bon gyis ni tshul bzhin bshad//de las dang por thams cad ni//sa bon khro bo'i gzugs yin
368a5(rgyud): tede nyid phal cher rab tu grags//gracig pu mtshon cha du ma'i mchog/de nyid der ni brtan bya ba'i//rtag tu mtshon cha 'bar byed pa//de yi gzugs 'dir//
368a6(rgyud): gcig bu la//sa bon gyis ni bskul ba'i zhal//dril bu'i sa bon drug rnams kyis//sgra de rnams bzhin sgrogs par brtag/'di ni khro bo'i zhal yin gsungs//
368a7(rgyud): 'di ni thog ma nyid kyi gzugs//de yi mthu yang ci 'dra ba//tshul bzhin du yang 'dir bshad//gang gis dran pa tsam gyis ni//bdud dpung gdug pa'i gdon la
368b1(rgyud): sngogs//mthu rtsal gnod pas nyams nasu//'jigs shing dpa' stod byed par 'gyur//zung shig pa yi tshig gnyis ldan//zhol yang gdang sA shing 'bar ba can//
368b2(rgyud): snying po dag par rab tu bzhag/mtshon cha 'debs pa'i mthu rtsal can//de ltar khro bo rgyal ba'i gzugs//sa bon zhes bya ba yi//sngags kyi dngos po shes nas ni//
368b3(rgyud): sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//mtshon cha 'phangs pa tsam gyis ni//de yis kun tu bsrung bar bya//sa bon bkod pa'i tshul bzhin du//bdag gis lus la
368b4(rgyud): sbyar bar bya//gzugs ni gzugs la bzhag na su//mtshon cha de nyid lag na thogs//sa bon rnams kyang khar bzhag ste//rkang pa gnyis kyang tsham dam bya//de nas
368b5(rgyud): kun tu khros na su//rung gi sa ban dgod par bya//thog ma bdug la ma yengs par//srung ba de ltar byas na su//dkyil 'khor du ni spyan drangs te//de nas mdun du mched
368b6(rgyud): pa bya/rta sngags kyi snying po tha ma la//tshu gshegs pa yi tshig gnyis dang //rtag tu ldan par byos nasu//spyan drangs pa dag bya bar bshad//me tog dag gi gdan 'di
368b7(rgyud): la don bzhug su gsol zhes rtag tu bya//de lta bur ni spyan drangs nas//me tog dag gis snga me bzhin//bzhugs shig pa yi tshig gnyis kyis//cho ga bzhin du bzhu
369a1(rgyud): su gsol//khro bo'i rgyal po de la ni//bzhugs par bya ba bstan pa yin//me tog sngags kyis btab pa yis//de ltar bzhugs par
369a2(rgyud): byas na su//arga 'di ni bizhes shig ces//tshig gi mjug tu brjod na su//spyos chu me tog sbyar ba yis//arge de la dbul bar bya//me tog bdag gis phul ba
369a3(rgyud): 'di bzhesu gsol zhes brjod na su//spros chu bzang po btab pa yi//me tog dag ni sngon bzhin dbul//sngags pas rtag tu tshig mjug la//gtor ma bdag
369a4(rgyud): gis phul ba 'di//bzhesu gsol zhes brjod nasu//gtor ma sna tshogs dbul bar bya//mar me bdag gis phul ba 'di//bzhesu gsol zhes mjug tu brjod//
369a5(rgyud): mar gyis legs par gang ba yi//mar me dge ni dbul bar bya'o//bdug pa bdag gis phul ba 'di//bzhi su gsol zhes mjug tu brjod//bdug pa thang chu
369a6(rgyud): rnam pa lnga//sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya//der ni mtshud pa byas nas kyang //dkyil 'khor dag gam ri mo la//rang gi yan lag bkod pa dag/de/
369a7(rgyud): tshig can la bsten nas ni//mthong ba tsami ni nyid kyi su//rig 'dzin dam tshig can du 'gyur//de nas rtog pa las gsungs pa'i//las rnams myur du byed
369b1(rgyud): par 'gyur//de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po yi//mchod pa lags par byas nas//sgrub pa po ni ma yongs par//sngags brjod slar yang gshegasu gsol//slar yang gshegs
369b2(rgyud): bar mdzad nasu//slar yang gshegs pa'i tshig gnyis brjod//me tog snyim pa bkang nasu//phyag 'tshal slar yang gshegasu gsol//dkyil 'khor dag gam
369b3(rgyud): gsang sngags bzlas//de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya ni//rab tu 'bar ba gcig pu bshad//gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba'i lha//gang gis grub par gyur pa'o//lag
369b4(rgyud): pa g.yas pa'i ser mo yis//mthe bong spros te gyen du ni//bsgreng bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di//be con zhes ni grags pa yis//lha nyid kyis ni sngags ldan pas//las
369b5(rgyud): rnams kun la bcing bar bya//spyan drangs pa dang mchod pa dang //gsheg su gsol dang bzhugs pa dang //las rnams bya ba'i tshe dag dang //gzhan yang rgol ba byung ba'i tshe//
369b6(rgyud): tshul bzhin phyag rgya 'di btsongs nas//gshin rje'i bshed kyang lha bzlaso//sngags pa'i rgyal po'i dung 'gro na//mgo gtung pus mo btsugs na su//gdon mi za bar
369b7(rgyud): dbang 'gyur ba//bdag nyid dang ni nor gyiso//khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa thams cad kyi phye ma'i phyi ma las khra bo rnam par rgyal ba bcos
370a1(rgyud): gshin rje'i gshod kyi rgyal ba d+h+r-ig pa phyi ma'o yang phyim gas pa'i la'u sngo bcu bdun pa rjogs/ma mo mA ma mU m+b+ha mu/mA ma mA mam
370a2(rgyud): yig zung //thog ma thu ma zung gcig tu//zung dang bsnol ba'i bye brag gis//sbyar bar bya ba 'dir bshad do//sa bon zhes bya dkyil du bzhag/khro ba dag na so so ru/
370a3(rgyud): zung mo'i zung min tshig 'di la//tha me'i zung ni ma yin//zung me'i zung mtshig 'di la//haM he ha ha hi hi hi hi ha ha he he zhes gnyis sbyar ba//khro chen tshig gis thog mar baR+ShaH
370a4(rgyud): oMd oM dang sne hA phyag 'tshal bzhag/rgyas par 'dod pas dga' bzhin du//mel tshe thun gcog rtag tu bzlas//ri mo la/cho ga bzhin du sgrub pa yis//rtag par mcho
370a5(rgyud): pa'i cho ga 'ong //mdo ru bsdus nas bshod pa yin//bzlas pa dang ni hom dag dang //brtul zhugs dka' thub ma byas kyang //sngags kyi dngos 'di shes nas ni//maN+Da//
370a6(rgyud): pa 'ba' zhig dbul bar bya//'di la mchod pa bya ba nyid//khro bo'i rgyal po rtag pa ru//mnyes byas yin par gang shes pa//sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
370a7(rgyud): rtag tu sngags pas sems dpa' dang //rtag tu sngags kyi bdag nyid 'gyur//rtag tu yid la zhen pa dang //rtag tu mchod la brtson pa dang //rtag tu khro bor 'du shes
370b1(rgyud): las rnams thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir//cho ga mdor bsdus 'dra bshad pa//khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las bsdang ba'i rtogs par gtogs pa sku
370b2(rgyud): dang po'o///ma mi mA mi/mU mu/mu mA/mi mA maM ma ni/yi ge zung dang yo bral bye brag gis//thog ma tha ma zung gcig tu//'khor lo 'di ni ci rags
370b3(rgyud): par dzaTasbyar bar bya ba 'di bshad //so bon zhes bya dkyil 'khor bzhag/khro bo dag ni so so ru//dbang dang mkhon dang bsad pa dang //de bzhin bskrad dang zhi ba dang //
370b4(rgyud): yang na rgyas par bya ba'i phyir//zung dang bsnol bas myur du 'grub//khro bo zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor na//dkyil du bzhag ste so so ru//zung shig tshi ge gnyis tha mar bzhag/
370b5(rgyud): che ge me zhig dbang du byos//mtshon cha med pa'i sa pon bzhag/sAhA'i tshig ni ba ra bar gzhug/bsgrub par bya yi gzugs byas nas//de la rkang pas brdzi ba ni//sngaT
370b6(rgyud): pas 'greng ste 'dug pa ni//rkang skyo ba yi bar du bya//rgyal po dbang du ma gyur pa//de yi dbang du myur du 'gyur//gcig po de la spos nasu//myur du ko rims bzhin
370b7(rgyud): bzhag pa'o//sa bon gnyis pa gnas la ni//gan sa nas gdong yang bsgyur na su//zung dacig tshig gnyis mtha' mar bzhag/che ge ma yi mdza' ba de//sdang bar
371a1(rgyud): b+ha zhes mtha' mar bya//bsgrag par bya ba chung bad med//bsgru ra bya ba gnyis ka s+ho//gargyas na 'dzugs pa'i las rgyud//da du
371a2(rgyud): bar mnyam ldan par//gnyis ka lA yA //dbas minan//sngags mkha na la blanas pa yis//mel tshe thun ni phyed rnam gyis//de nas sgrub pa 'dod pa bzhin/
371a3(rgyud): gnyis phan tshun dgrar gyur pas//khro bo rims bzhin bsgoms pas ni//lan gcig byas pa tsam gyis 'gyur//sa bon gnyis pa de las kyang //drag po rtsal gyis smram
371a4(rgyud): nas de//khri bo chen po mig+sa rdza dmar//gnas ni gsum pa la gnas hUM//grwa yon pa'i gnon pas mun nai bas+t+ra ni//drug po shugs can ma lus mnan//kha
371a5(rgyud): bin+d+ha dang rgyub kyang bsgyur//dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra myur 'gyur//byis kyang rims kyis 'di la gnas//logs shig khro bo'i 'khor lo'i dkyus//rkang pa'i tshung nga ma
371a6(rgyud): bzhin byas//gdod yang dal bus bsgyur na su~M//dring po'i so bon gang yin pa'i//dbang du byed la rgyas par 'gyur//de yi mtha' yang lhan cig tu//me dang 'dra
371a7(rgyud): pa 'bar ba ste//kun gyi las ni grub 'dod na//shin tu legs par sbyar bar bya//de yi zong mas bskul ba yang //so so 'am gcig tu'ang rung bar bshad//
371b1(rgyud): bo yi ni 'khor la'i mthu//brgyad pa dag las myur bar gnas//rim pa snga ma'i tshul gyis ni//mkhon pa'i sa bon dag gis bskul//sa bon zung mas bskul ba yang /
371b2(rgyud): brgyud pa 'byed par sgrub pa la//mdza' bo myur du ba zlog pa'i phyir//cho ga bzhin du rim por sbyar//rim pa snga ma'i tshul bzhin du//myur du bsad par 'dod pa yis//
371b3(rgyud): yi ni 'khor lo gnas//dgu pa A bi nA r-i mi//cho ga 'di yis dgra bo dag/myos par byas nas 'jigs par 'gyur//lha rnams kyis ni sbas pa yang //gshed po'i drung
371b4(rgyud): du khrid par 'gyur//rim pa snga ma'i tshul gyis//khro bo yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas//bcu po dag la rims kyis glanas//drag shul can gyis drag tu mnan//de yis bon gyis
371b5(rgyud): sngon gyi sa bon rab 'bar ba//snga ma bzhin du rims kyis bzlas//sngar bshad pa yi las sgru'o//'khor lo rim pa bcu gcig po//gang yin pa ni de gzung nas//de nas zhi bar byed
371b6(rgyud): pa yi//sa bon de yis bskul bar bya//snga ma'i bzhin du bskul ba dang //snga ma'i las ni byed par 'gyur//zhi ba dag la gang gsungs pa//rgyas pa dag la sbyar ba
371b7(rgyud): bya//'khor lo yi ni gnas kyi mchog/bcu gnyis pa la gnas nasu//de yi sa bon bskul bar byas//bdag gi mthu rtsal gnod brtags pas//sa bon zung ma sbyor
372a1(rgyud): ba yis//sa bon mthu ni 'bar ba can//'khor lo bkod pa'i las rnams ni//sngon gsungs pa dag grub par bya//de ltar khro bo'i 'khor lo//
372a2(rgyud): ni/cho gar bcas pa rgyas pa dag/gsang ba bskul mar bcas pa yi//sbyor ba ma lus bshad pa yin//sa bon zung mas bskul pa gang //gnyis pa rab tu graT
372a3(rgyud): ba yin//dri 'dir sa bon gnyis pa yin//myur du grub par 'gyur bar bshad//tha ma'i sa bon thams cad la//phul ba'i tshig gnyis rtag tu sbyar//zung ma'i zung
372a4(rgyud): ma'i tshig 'di la//ya tha dpa dang tha ma ru'o//'khor lo bkod pa bstan pa 'di//ji ltar rim par shes na ni//sbyin sreg bzlas brjod ma byas kyang //khro bo'i rgyal ba'i
372a5(rgyud): dngos grub thob//khro bo'i 'khor lo gsang ba ni//'di mi shes par gang sbyor ba//de 'di dngos grub mi 'thob kyi//myur du skye ba thob par 'gyur//mo mi ma mu myu
372a6(rgyud): drug rnams kyis//dbang dang mkhon dang bsad pa dang //bskrad dang zhi dang rgyas pa'i mthar//mkhas pa dag gis bsgrub par bya//de dag ljid la bzlog pa yis/
372a7(rgyud): de bzhin de ni bskul bar bya//ji skad gsungs pa 'di rnams ni//ma grub na ste gzhan du med//de la mu mu mi ma mo ni//mi ni rgyas la de bzhin du//'khor lo
372b1(rgyud): rtsibs kyi gnas rnams ni//de dang de dag gnyis sbyar//de bzhin 'khor lo'i nang du yang //khro bo sku mchog sa bon yang //bzhag nas cho gi mtha' mar yang //khro bo'i dril bu
372b2(rgyud): dkrol ba dgod//'khor lo'i mu ran nang dag tu//zung shig pa yi tshig gnyis brjed//mkhas pas 'khor lo'i mig gi nang //sa bon bkod pa rnamyal gnas//khwa
372b3(rgyud): byo'i 'khor lo bsgrubs pa ni//shes na ji skad bshad pa yi//dngos grub rnams ni thob par 'gyur//dngos grub tshul bzhin 'thob 'gyur ba//de yi sbyor ba bshad par bya/
372b4(rgyud): thog mar phyag rgya bats+tshings na su//sku dang sku ni skur bsgyur te//las rnams tshul bzhin mthong ba yis//spyi re ba dag ni legs par bya//gdong dang kha mig rkang pa mnyi/
372b5(rgyud): rab tu dang zhing zho ba'i sems//snying yang de bzhin rab tu dga'//dbang du bye ba'i sngags gsungs pa//shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgrub//rkang pa ya gcig thung
372b6(rgyud): du bzhag/gdong dang nu 'jing bcus te mnanA//kha dang mog ni ya cig 'dzums//tsham dam gnon pa chen po byas//be con la ni mig gis blta//bsgrub par bya
372b7(rgyud): bsgrub la 'bad//gang dag dbye bar 'dod pa yis//de dag dbye ba brtsam par bya//rkang pa gnyis pa bteg pa yis//tsham ngam bya ba slar la bzhag/bzhin bsnyer
373a1(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing snga na su//khro bar lta zhing yid kyang khros//rab tu dpa' ba phran dang bcas//rtsal gyis gnon par rab tu 'dud//sngags pa sngon bzhin
373a2(rgyud): sngags tshul gnas//gong 'dod pa ni gzhim par bya//de la rkang pa ya cig kyang //drug shul can du brkyang ste bzhag/bzur te 'dug pa'i tshul du gnas//gdong yang
373a3(rgyud): yon por bsnyer bar bya//mdzub mo sgreng ste gdengs pa dang //khe con phyag rgya dag gis bsdigs//dgra dag bskrad par 'dod na ni//myur du bskrad par bya bar 'gyur//de nas
373a4(rgyud): rkang pa mnyam par gzhag/lag pa g.yas pa mtho bar bya//dpa' dang ldan pas g.yon pa sbed//zhi bar 'dod na zhi bar 'gyur//phyed ni dmar por bkug sten nas//
373a5(rgyud): rkang pa g.ya pra tsham dam byed//sngags tshul gnas pas bsgrims nas ni//rgyas par 'dod na thob par 'gyur//slar yang de bzhin shes bya ba//bzlog ste bya ba gzhan
373a6(rgyud): du med//grub pa bdag nyid chen po yi//tsham dam rim pa drug gsungs pa//drang po'i ming ni log par phyogs//de yi 'og ma rgyub kyis phyogs//de bzhin cham
373a7(rgyud): ngam gsum pa ni//khro bo che zhes bsgrags pa yin//bzhi pa mdzub mo sgreng ba yis//lnga pa la ni stobs zhes byas//drug pa stobs po che zhes bya//'di rnams tsham pa
373b1(rgyud): drug tu bsgrags//tshong ma gdangs pa byas pa yis//dgra yi 'khor rnams g.yon spyod pa//'khor lo'i mchogal goms byed pas//glags pa chen po thob par 'gyur//khwa
373b2(rgyud): chen pos gsungs pa yi//rab gsungs pa yi rgyud 'di dkon//khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'di//de bas kyang ni shin tu dkon//gsang ba'i rten pa bzang po 'di//kun tu dngos
373b3(rgyud): grub kun sbyin par//gsang ba'i rtog pa de bas kyang //'khor lo 'di ni shin tu dkon//ho ma dang ldan pa yongs mi dgos//sngon du bsnyen pa bya ma dgos//khro bo'i rgyal po'i
373b4(rgyud): brtul zhugs dang //dka' thub drag po'ang bya mi dgos//bsam gtan sbyor ba'ang mi dgos te//gang la 'khor lo 'ba' zhig yod//gang gsungs pa yi dngos grub nas//de
373b5(rgyud): ma thag tu dngos grub thob//de bas 'di ni bsod byas nasra//thams cad sgrub pa'i sgrub pa pos//bdag gi don mchog gang 'dod pa//shin tu legs par bsgrub par bya//
373b6(rgyud): bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las gsang ba'i rtog pa gnyis pa'o///khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub ni//sna tshogs thogs med tha dad pa//sngags pa 'dodapa
373b7(rgyud): cho ga mchog/dang por byas na dngos grub thob//rab tu gsang ba'i sngags 'di ni//re shig 'di yi mtshan nyid ni//gzhan dag 'dir ni bshad par bya//de yi las ni gang //
374a1(rgyud): gsungs pa//gang dag phyis kyang grub 'gyur ba//dpa' bo gcig pu 'ba' zhig gis//thams cad nyid gung dgasungs pa//thams cad ni bshad par bya
374a2(rgyud): sngags de sna las rnams kun byas pas//rgyud la dngos grub gang gsungs pa//dpa' blo gcig pu'i mthus kyang 'grub//oM ni de yi thog ma ste//bde bar gshegs
374a3(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig yin//thog ma dang ni gnyis pa yang //drag po'i rtsig gi phul ba'i lugs//klad kyi 'khor gyis mnan pa'i rigs//sngags kyi yi ge phreng
374a4(rgyud): bkod la//sngags rnams thams cad gsal byed pa//khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po ni//gsum po de nas sbyar bar bya//de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yi//sku ni de yi 'og
374a5(rgyud): tu bstan//sngags pas sngags rnams kun gyi mtshan//de dag rtag tu rig par bya//thogs pa med pa'i sngags rnams ni//bdag nyid chen po'i thams cad kyis//
374a6(rgyud): srung la sogs pa'i las rnams kun//go rims bla shad pa bzhin du bya//thams cad bdag nyid chen po 'dis//srung ba dag ni byas na su//sngon gyi tshul bzhin rab
374a7(rgyud): dben pa//sku gzugs don mchog gzhan nas ni//cho ga ji skad sngar gsungs pa//cho ga bzhin du mchod pa bya//nyin re me tog phreng ba la//lan bdun bzlas
374b1(rgyud): ba rnams kyis mchod//mchod nas ka rA bi ra yis//me tog dmar po kha 'bus pa'i//brgya ni rtsa brgyad grangs rnams kyis//bu don la ni phog par dbul//cho ga 'di na dus
374b2(rgyud): gsum du//zla ba gcig tu byas nas ni//khro bo mngon sum nye gyur nas//rmi lam du ni dngos grub stor//cho ga 'di ltar sngar byas na//gang 'dod pa yi dgos pa dag/de
374b3(rgyud): tshe gdon mi za bar 'grub//de yi cho ga mchog bshad pa//de ltar zla gcig bsnyen byas na//mi yi las rnams gang bya ba//de yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas//da ni legs
374b4(rgyud): par bshad par bya//de nas dang 'gro dang sbyar ba'i//dug ni rnam pa gsum ngag dang //gdon dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang //lto 'phye srin por bcas pa 'jig/bdag
374b5(rgyud): gis byas pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags//sbyor ba lan gcig bdag gis srung //yid la bsams pa tsam gyis kyang //gzhan dag gis kyang mchod par byed//bzhi pa'i rims la

374b7(rgyud): bdag dgar phab nas dgos pa'i don//gang dang gang dag 'dod por ni//bsgoms pas de dang de dag byed//yid la bsams pas de dag thar//rdol lan gsum bzlas
375a1(rgyud): pa yi//chu srin kun bir la sogs//mche ba can dag phyogs med par//chubs la ba ye mchog tu 'byung //'gro tshe yid la bzlas na ni//lAm

375a3(rgyud): nas ni//rgyal po khros pa myur rab tu//brkyang nas thal mos sbyor bar byed//shags 'gyed pa dang rgyan po dang //mtshon dang me yis 'jigs pa la//yid la

375a5(rgyud): sprin dgra mnan par bya ba dang //'dod bzhin myur du slar yang bzlog/gnam lcags ser ba 'thob pa yang //dbyug pa'i phyag rgyas zhi bar byed//phyag rgyas btsongs pa

375a7(rgyud): ser ba bcad par bya//sbyor ba mkhas pas ci 'dod pa//tshor ba dag kyang bcad par bya//gos ni sngon po bgos ni ni//kho ra khor yug srung byas nas//mid par nub par/
375b1(rgyud): chur zhugs te//nyin gsum log smra par bzlas byas nas//brgya byin gyis ni sprin bsdus nas//'dod pa bzhin du chur pa 'bebs//de nas sprin chen las byung ba//char//
375b2(rgyud): pas sa sbrengs khyab par 'gyur//nyi ma lan mngon phyogs nas//nyin re rtag tu bzlas byas na//bdag dang de bzhin gzhan rnams kyis//nid rnams de nas med par 'gyur//

375b4(rgyud): bdun du//bzlas brjod legs par byas na ni//de ni myur du cho ga 'dis//blun bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur//zhag gcig smyung ba byas pa yis//dmangs rigs dag ni dbang

376a1(rgyud): zhag gsum dang bzhi dag gis//rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze'o//ji ltar ji skad gsungs pa yi//las kyis byA yi gzhan gyis min//gang yang rung ba/

379a2(rgyud): dang de ru sngags rnams ni//bskul bar byed pas dri bzhin bskul//cho ga shes pas nan tin du//gang dang gang 'di bsgrub par bya//khro bo sgom dang ldan pa yis//
379a3(rgyud): he la'i 'khor lo yongs bsgoms nas//dka' zhing sgrub tu'ang mi rung ba//brtul zhugs ho dang bcas la sogs//de yis dgod pa ma byas kyang //sngags bkod
379a4(rgyud): shes na sgrub pa'o//he la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pa//de yis dka' ba ma byas kyang //gdon mi za bar myur du 'grub//brtul zhugs ho dang bsam gtan dang //ji ltar

379a6(rgyud): mtshan ston pa'o//hUM la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pas//ring por mi thogs bde ba ni//khro bor sgom pa dang ldan zhing //he la'i 'khor lo gnas 'dug ni//khams gsuM
379a7(rgyud): ngag kyang lan gcig gis//thogs med myur du g.yos par byed//de bas rab tu bsgrims na su//khro bo bsgom pa goms byas te//he la'i 'khor lo las 'byung sngags//
379b1(rgyud): sbyor ba dag gis goms par bya//zla ba rnam par rgyal ba yis//rtag pa dang phyir gang bsgrags pa//de yi rtog pa gsang bshad pa//cho gla 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog/khro
379b2(rgyud): 'khor lo bsgrags pa 'di//cho ga ngo bas shin tu gosang //khro bo'i 'khor lo gsang bshad pa/rab tu snang byed de bas kyang/he la'i 'khor l-i bsgrags pa 'di//rab tu
379b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchog yin te//rtog pa 'di dag thams cad kyi//rab tu gsang ba bshad pa yin//rtog pa rab du gsang ba ni//'di dag rnam pa kun la yang //he la'i 'khor
379b4(rgyud): lo 'dra ba yi//'khor lo ma byung phyis mi 'byung //gang zhig 'di yi don thos nas//khro bo'i grub pa sgom byed na//de yi 'bad pa ma byas kyang //'jig rten na ni sgrub dka
379b5(rgyud): med/he la'i 'khor lo'i gnas lnga ni//ji ltar 'dod par gnas na su//khro ba sgom drang rab ldan pas//khro bo'i gzugs gnas nas ni//rtse gcig tu yang tshig gi
379b6(rgyud): mchog/sgrub pa mchog ni sbyin par byed//thogs pa med par 'jam dpal mthong //ji ltar rig pa'i don bzhin du'o//khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las gsang ba'i
379b7(rgyud): rtog par gtogs pa ste bzhi pa'o///khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar//bskul cig ces bya'i nig gnyis bzhag/bskul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis maH
380a1(rgyud): khro bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o//zla chen po phreng ba dang //bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'dri yi mthung //kun tu dang byo g.yo ba dang //sngags shes chang ngam
380a2(rgyud): mdzes pa yi//he la'i 'khor lo la gnas te//dang po gan su 'dug nasu//betso nA phyag rgya lan cig bcing //dri nas khro bo'i sngags bzlas pa//sngags pa 'greng
380a3(rgyud): ste 'dug pa ni//rkang pa gnyis ni bsgyur ba dang //khro bo sgom pa 'di la ni//sems ni rab tu zhen byas nas//sa 'di rab tu g.yos pa 'am//ri dgas g.yo ba'i bar
380a4(rgyud): du'o/de nas 'khor lo sgrub pa yis//gnyis pa'i gnas la song na su//khro bo chen po'i tshi go mthar gnas//skoms shig ces par dbang bskuro//de tshig
380a5(rgyud): thithog mar bkod na ni//do yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil//de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i mthar//rdo rje me yi rgyal po'i sngags//rab tu g.yo ba mdzes po dang //tsham
380a6(rgyud): ngam gsal ba dag la gnas//be con phyag rgya bcings nas ni//khro bo bsgoms pas sngags bzlaso//rab tu sbyor ba'i thabs 'di ni//mtsho dang rdzing chen klung chen
380a7(rgyud): rnams//khros pas myur du skems par byed//'bab chu dag kyang byin du 'bebs//khro bo mthu chen gnon ldan po//sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya//rtsibs rnams
380b1(rgyud): rnams pas blan mAnan+ta ga/rmAHsa pa d+ma las sanas//dan ga sum pad+mo gnas la 'du/myuT+TaN+Dal ldan pas pad+ha munanA//zhunachen pa'i chog mAT+TarA/
380b2(rgyud): smad bar byas nas tshig gnyis bskul//de ni snyam beni ni bkod nag//de pe tha mang du hU~M 'khyi la//khro bo bdu kyi 'khyil ba'i mthar//rab tu drug pa'i shug
380b3(rgyud): /rlom par sgrub byed gsal gyi skyes//zla bo rgyam mi bsnyen pa gnas// kyi myo sa pa'i phyogs cand//mngon du 'ong bar 'gyur na yang //do ma b+hag tu sgeg
380b4(rgyud): /myos pa'i blug so dang //skud lag pa na dz+nyAn du/ rnaM yo bu' bzhin du ng+ge/gleng po'i rmyi la bai dAm+b+has shing //de ba mthon pa
380b5(rgyud): byA bo sgom pa yi//cho ga'i tshul ni de bzhin//he la'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i//ngan pa'i gan se la 'dug nas kyang //khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar//non cig ces
380b6(rgyud): po'i tshig gnyis bskul//de nas che ga sngar gshed pas//bdud rtsi 'khyil po bzhag par bya//bdud rtsi 'khyil pa de yi mthar//khro ba chen po stobs chen bzhag/kun
380b7(rgyud): tsa sdom pa mdzes pa yi//tsham ngam gyis nom galar mnan//de rgyang ma yang na blang ba'am//glu' mo meng na shing rta'am//rta dang me lug la sogs//khra ba brnam
381a1(rgyud): pa'i tshul bzhin byas//sbyor ba de la gnas nas nI//rab tu munan pa byas par 'gyur//dri nas ho la zhes bya ba'o//'kho la lta ba la
381a2(rgyud): gnas nas//khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthor//dkrugs shig dkrugs shig tshig gnyis bzhago/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang //mtha' yi tshig gi gan suM bzhag/
381a3(rgyud): khro bo rgya chen zhes bya ba//rab tu 'bar bar gyur par bya//khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang //rab tu 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i//tsham ngam mchog gis myur du ni//dgra
381a4(rgyud): dpung rnams phan tshun du//rab tu rnam par dpyugs por bya//de nas ha la'i 'khor lo yi//rim pa drug la gnas nas ni//khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthor//rmongs par
381a5(rgyud): gyur ces tshig gnyis bskul//khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil po yang //tshig gi tha mar kun tu bzhag/khro bo gzhan gyi me thub pa//cho ga snga ma bzhin du bsgral//rmongs par
381a6(rgyud): byed pa'i tsham ngam gyis//cho ga bzhin du rab bskul nas//ri mo dag la gnas pa bzhin//'gro ba myur du rmongs par 'gyur//de nas he la'i 'khor lo 'di//rim
381a7(rgyud): bdun pa la gnas na su//khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar//sgrogs shig sgrogs shig tshig gnyis bzhag/khro bo 'dzin par byed pa yis//bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskul
381b1(rgyud): bar byed//'jigs par gyur pa'i sgra sgrogs pa//khro bo'i tshe ma dAm myur bar ni//dus min par yang sprin gyis khebs//de nas 'drod bzhin char pa 'bobs//de nas ho la'o/
381b2(rgyud): 'khor lo yi//rtsibs kyi rim pa brgyad pa la//gnas nas 'dir ni snga ma bzhin//khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar//hi hi sa bon gnyis bzhag nas//de yi 'og tu bdud rtsi
381b3(rgyud): 'khyil//khro bo zur du de bzhin du//bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i tha mar bzhag/khro bo tshang ngamA kha gdangs pa//mchog ces bya ba myur bar ni//rkang pa ya gcig gdangs pa'i stabs
381b4(rgyud): s+yAd dang ser ba rlung la sogs//dus sam yang na dus min par//sgrub pa khro bo bsgoms pa yi//khro bo'i sngags kyi tshul bzhin du//sA yi steng du 'bebs par byed//hUM la'i 'khor
381b5(rgyud): lo gnas brgyad po//sgrub pa yi ni ser bor na//khro bo'i sa bon cho ga gsal ba//dgu pa bzang po la gnas te//khro bo chen po tshig gi mabar//slong shig pa yi tshig gnyis
381b6(rgyud): bskul//khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi//tha mar phongs pa sgrol ba bzhag/khro bo bsgoms pas mdzes pa yi//tsham dram gsal ba byas nas ni//khro bo gshin rje'i gshed
381b7(rgyud): bi bzlas//khro bo nyid kyi tshig gis gsal//hUM zhes bya ba bzang po yis//khro bo dngos por bsgoms nas ni//shing gi rtse dang yol ga dgug/yang na shing chen rtsa nas
382a1(rgyud): 'byin//me tog 'bras bu zlog pa 'am//yang na 'dod bzhin g.yo bar byed//ljon shing chen po rnams kyang nI//ji ltar 'dod par myi g.yor
382a2(rgyud): 'gyur//he la zhes bya'i 'khor lo yi//rtsibs ni bcu pa la gnas nas//khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar//tshems shig ces pa'i tshig gnyis bskul//khro bo chen
382a3(rgyud): rab 'joms pa//khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i mthar//snga ma bzhin du bzhag par bya//'jigs par byed pa'i tshim dam byed//ri chen dag gi rtsi mo dang //sgo dang
382a4(rgyud): lcags sgrogs rnams kyi ni//khro bo'i rgyal por stan bzhin du//bsgoms na rab mchog grub byed pa//ha la yi ni 'khor lo yis//rtsibs ni bcu gcig la gnas te//
382a5(rgyud): khro bo chen po'i tshigi mthar//rnyil cig ces pa'i tshig gis bskul//khro bo kI li kI la yis//bdud rtsi 'khyil pA bskul bya ba//tshig gi tha mar gnas pa ste//cho ga
382a6(rgyud): bzhin du bshad pa bzhin//kI li kI la zhes bya ba//tshwam nga me mchog le de bzhin gnas//be con gyi ni phyag rgya bcings//gshin rje'i gshed po bsgoms pa ni//
382a7(rgyud): rin chen rtsa ba brtan pa yang //rtse mo nas kyang rnyil bar byed//yang na ri kar skye ba yi//brtan pa'i shing rnams 'gyel bar byed//de nas he la'i 'khor lo yis//bcu
382b1(rgyud): pa yi rtsibs la gnas//khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar//zhugs shig ces pa'i tshig gos bskul//bskul nas dro yi tha mar ni//bdud rtsi 'khyol ba bzhag par bya//blan
382b2(rgyud): k+Shu likA la ya//de yi ba mar bzhag par bya//kI li kI li chen pozhes//bya ba'i tshim de ma de bzhin gyi//btson phyag rgya bci sa ni suM//Sh+Ta ba chen po gshin
382b3(rgyud): gi shing//yid la rab tu goms byas na//rtsig pa shing skam rdo la sogs//babs na phyung ste na mkhor gnas//namakho' la ni byung nas kyang //'dod pa bzhin du ltung bar//
382b4(rgyud): byed/'di ni rang 'byung ngo mtshar la//'di ni dus gsum sngon du byung //spyod pa gzhan yang snga ma bzhin/khro bo bsgoms pas byed par gsungs//he la'i 'khor lo
382b5(rgyud): dgod pa ni//rab tu gsang ba yin par bshad//gsang dang bcas shing sbyo bcas pa//shes na dngos grub thob par 'gyur//de nas gzhan yang ci rigs par//tsham ngam
382b6(rgyud): bcu gnyis sbyor ba dag/mdo dang rgyas pa'i tshul dag gis//da ni rab tu bshad pa bya//kun tu g.yo ba dang po yin//de bzhin rab tu g.yo bar bshad//skrag par byed pa
382b7(rgyud): gsum pa ste//bzhi pa kun tu sdom par byed//rab tu 'khrug ces bya ba lnga//rmongs par byed pa de bzhin drug/myur ba tsham ngam de la gnas//kha gdangs pa ni brgyang par
383a1(rgyud): DA kAd+tha// r+k+ka nas byu gyun//'a sa blar bya sma sbyin//twA me+e lA zhes d+hA // la ldan pa //\u0f7f
383a2(rgyud): dam 'acug s+ho//'dir gi rims bzhin pa shod pa 'on//zag mar bags pa rim pa mas ldan pa nas rang gnags shin du//
383a3(rgyud): sngags pa dag gis shes par bya//rang gi gzugs kyang pa gnas pa//bsdigs shing tsam ngam byed la sogs//sgeg par byed pa'i kha nu napa//khro ba'i lta ba ga
383a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba//rkang pa 'gyed pa ro bzhag pa dag/tshamya m+b+ha mtshan nyid bshed pa yin//rkang pa yo gcig myur du bzhig/gding dang nu 'jing yon po byas//khro gan+d+he
383a5(rgyud): 'jigs par byed par bster//g.yan pa mdzub mo gcig gis bsdigs//tsham dam byed rnying btson gdengs//gdang dang bad+ma dang rkang pa ga yon//kun tog yo zhes bya ba
383a6(rgyud): zla batsha ma ma rnams dang//kun tu gam ba'i rim gsungs ste//rangab drugs sa blo ba//cung zad du ni dbus dman pa'o//rab tu gso pa rtag par bya//de bzhin
383a7(rgyud): dargya pa brkyang ba dang //rkang pa g.yan pa gdangs pa dang //yin gnyis drug tu bab ni//de minan smrig par byed par ba da//brtson la ni lta bar gtad//rkang pag sa
383b1(rgyud): pa gsal bar gyur//de ni kun tu snum par na shad//g.yon pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs par byed//dpung pa gladangs pa g.yon bzhin du//mig ni mdzub mo gcig la gad//rkang /
383b2(rgyud): pa g.yas pa phyir ba ni//kun tu 'khrug pa zhes bya'o//rkang pa g.yon pa gdangs byas te//g.yon phyogasu ni phyar zhing bskor//dpung pa brkyang ba'i be con gdengs//bsdigs pa
383b3(rgyud): gcig tu rmongs par byed//myur du tshim ngam zhes bya ba//de nyid dpung brdabs bsdigs pa'o//de nyid lnga ni kha gdangs pa//kha gdangs pa zhes bsgrags pa yin//sran dang bcas
383b4(rgyud): la bzhi ni bskor//mthu rtsal che ba'i stabasu stsol//mchu yi mtha' ma so yis mnan//lag pa phyar te bsdigs par byed//bsnyems dang bcas shing sgra yang 'byin//'jigs
383b5(rgyud): par byed pa'i hUM bsgrags pa'i//tsham ngam legs par bshad pa ni//mdzes pa'i khro bos gnon pa'o//btsan thabasu ni bskor bar bya//rkang pa g.yas pa btsugs te man na//
383b6(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ka drug rdob pa//byas nas 'jigs pa bya ba ni//de bzhin snyems dang bcas bshad pa//tsham ngam bdag nyid chen po 'di//'jigs par byed pa zhes bya
383b7(rgyud): ste/rtag tu khro bo sgom pa'o//rkang pa mnyam par gzhag ste 'dug/g.yas pa cung zad mtho bar bya//dpal dang ldan pas g.yon pa smad//g.yon pa sor mo gcig ni
384a1(rgyud): bsdigs//dbyung ba bteg s+t+ya btson 'gyur//rkang pa dang ni gdod bsgyur k+Sha/rtag tu phra ba sgom pa ni//kI l-i kI lA zhes bya'o//k+t+wA l+r-ikI li chen da//
384a2(rgyud): de nyid las ni rgyab tu blta//khro bo mig ni ya gcig btsums//myur du mchod skyabs byed pa'o//'di ni cham ngam sbyor ba ste//he laM'i 'khor lo rtsibs rims las//ma
384a3(rgyud): ni ji ltar dgod pa dag/legs par bshad pa 'di yin//he la'i 'khor lo'i mthu sngogs dang //tsham ngam g.yos kyi mthu dga' yis//las rnams rab tu ngo mtshar ba
384a4(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams bya'o//bsgrubs pa de dag gsang rgyud dang //he la'i 'khor lo 'di shes na//khro bo dngos dang gcig 'gyur bas//khro bo'i skad spyod par
384a5(rgyud): 'gyur//rtag pa 'di ni gsang por bcas//gsang ba'i snying pa'i mchog tu bshad//khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog 'di las//mchog tu gyur pa bzhan med//lci bo rnam par
384a6(rgyud): rgyal ba las//rtog pa phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di/rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba//thos nas gsang ba'i drin bsgoms pas//lha dri thams cad yi rang nas//khro bo mchog la
384a7(rgyud): phyog 'tshal to//rab tu dga' ba'i mchog tu gyur//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed po la/rje su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
384b1(rgyud): khro gau Sha ma sna gsum rnam par rgyal pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs////rgyu gar skad du/Ar+ya TA ma Ni nA ma d+hA ra Na/bod skad du/'phags
384b2(rgyud): pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal//dkon
384b3(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo//phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba mtha' yas pa mi lus par khyab pa mchog
384b4(rgyud): tu rma du byung zhing rnam por dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ophags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen
384b5(rgyud): po dang ldan pa/mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/phongs pa thams cad las yongasu skyob par mdzad pa/'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa mdzad pa/yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa
384b6(rgyud): thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/mi mthun pa dang /rtsod pa dang /'thob pa dang /'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/sdig pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa dang
384b7(rgyud): 'byung po dang /ro langs dang /gshis ngan du 'chi ba dang /rmi lam ngan pa dang /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
385a1(rgyud): myu ga dang /mya ngan gyis 'jigs pa thams cad zlog par mdzad pa/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /

385a3(rgyud): ra langs dang /bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshalo//gshed byed thams cad sel mdzad pa//sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid/
385a4(rgyud): nor dang 'bru rnams 'brel mdzad pa//bdag gi bu dang tsha ba dang //g.yog 'khor rtag tu ma gyur pa//phyir bzlog pa ni brjod par bya//lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed
385a5(rgyud): tsherna brgya byin lha min rnams las pham//de nas rnying pa kho nar ni//'jig rten dbang gi drung song ste//de nas snying ni rab skyug nas//'di skad kyis ni tshig gsal to//
385a6(rgyud): lha min bdag pham 'jig rten dbang //ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi//'jig rten dbang po bdag lnga ni//lha yis gzigs pas rtag tu gzigs//brgya byin gyi ni
385a7(rgyud): tshig gsan nas//dbang phyug gis ni 'di skad gsungs//lha yi dbang bang la nyan//khyod la ngas ni bsrung ba byin//lha'i dbang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/'jig
385b1(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug 'di las/ngas gtsug gi
385b2(rgyud): nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir bzlog pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye bas gsungs pa'i gzung ste//mkhas pa gang gis rig sngags 'di//bros nas spyi bor 'dogs pa 'am//'don tam 'on/
385b3(rgyud): te klog na yang //de yi 'jigs pa kun med//rtag tu bsrung zhing sba ba dang //g.yul 'gyed pa ni rgyal bar byed//sdig dang rmi lam zhi bo dang //bsod nams bkra shes rab tu
385b4(rgyud): 'phril//lha yi dbang po de bas na//gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur 'dod pas//bris te spyi bor gdags par bya//yid la rtag tu dran par gyis//g.yul 'gyed 'ba' zhig ma yin te/
385b5(rgyud): 'di ni rtag tu sdig pa 'phrog/bud med rnams la bu pho bskyed//mngal na gnas pa yongasu srong //phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed//sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig/'di
385b6(rgyud): ming phyir bzlog byed ces bya//yan lag rnams la phyir 'beb byed//lha'i dbang po phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba//rege sngags kyi rgyalo mo chen ma sems can thams cad la phan par
385b7(rgyud): byed pa//lha mo yin thams cad pham par byed pa/pha rol gyi ngo mag tshegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa gzung zhig/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//chos la phyag 'tshalo//
386a1(rgyud): smra dun//dug ga smra na na na rgyun / dun dang /rnachu ma 'du
386b1(rgyud): shA/ Sh+Thaka na/sman+da non m+sa \u0f88\u0f90 shAk+ShanA~M/ m+bu m+b+has+thA/ r+b+ba/ma mam /rnam / nas/
386b2(rgyud): \u0f7f/ la mi na!mr-id+b+hikaM shaza na mr-i/bo g+ma lAk+ShId+himu khI s+thAhA/[।]rA/sa ras /sa ro hr-i dI/su su h+yaM/muT+Tam+mASh+Ta/muSh+Ta/
386b3(rgyud): yaM/b+ha sha ma ya/br-i shun ya/su~M dz+yo t+tA ra Ni phaT/d+hI ni r-i ma~M laM ka rI Ti/u su ni g+hA ta ni/phaTadzA ya ka ri Ta/prI ti ka rI phaT/sit+tas+t+rai nau r-I pheMT/
386b4(rgyud): smar+g+hahU~M phaT/san s+yA nAMd+hIT/ hU~M d+hI d+hA nu matepa/d+hI ni sha ni phaT/ a ts+tshak+Shani phaT/pA rmAk+ShanA bar ni badz+ra/pa ra san+ya bi dra ba ni pAH
386b5(rgyud): kr-id+h+we/karmaswA nA~M phaT/saHSh+T+rId+hib+h+rU~M shrIm+ba ni dzaT/sarbe ga tad skad nA~M phaT/l+le/mAMs rbaM Tad+hA d+hi sin+d+ra na/saMt+su skr-id+hinAn/sadwem+b+ha A kan+d+hanA~M/saM pa'i
386b6(rgyud): nAn/twe dza sa ma ma shir ran+ta/sarbab+hU ya~M pad+mi b+he b+h+yaHser+b+ba yud+h+ye b+h+yaHsUr+b+ba b+hUd+hib+h+yaHsarba d+ha b+h+yan+ta sarba kri t+ya~M ka lirje b+h+yaHsarba biSh+Te b+h+yoHsarba kA ya~M tsid+d+ha b+h+r-i d+hi b+hab+hUsh+tsa/
386b7(rgyud): A m+b+ha s+thAn+d+ha//gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir bzlog pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byeng bar byed pa/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/thams cad du zhi bar byed do//

394a7(rgyud): 'gyur//'thab cing 'gyed dang g.yul ngor yang //myur du rgyal bar byed pa yin//sems can rnams la gnod gzigs nas//'jig rten mgon gyis rab gsungs pa//
394b1(rgyud): rgyu rgyu du sa na r+m+ma/ rgyu na du nan tu rgyu na ga / rmang/smra /
395a1(rgyud): srung bar byed pa 'di//'gro 'am yang na ci yang rung //de dag 'ga' la bris te 'chang //srin pa 'joms pa bsod nams mchog/sdig pa'i rnyog pa
395a2(rgyud): 'jig par byed//g.yul 'gyed pa dang 'thab pa dang //kun tu rgyal bar byed pa dag/mi gang gtsang sbra byas na su//rig sngags 'di bris bcang ba dang //bklags dran
395a3(rgyud): shes rab can de la//'jugs pa kun du mi 'byung //tshi ga bzhin du klog 'chang na//gsang ba po kun rtog tu srung //yongasu skyong bar byed par 'gyur//rtag tu rgya
395a4(rgyud): bar byed pa ste//dper na rin chen phreng ba yis//mgo bo rgyun na mdzes pa ltar//de bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mdzes//gang dag rig sngags 'di 'chang na//de yi
395a5(rgyud): gdon rnams rnam par 'jig/nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur//bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel//de yi 'khor ni bzang por 'gyur//sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
395a6(rgyud): bye brag tu ni byas pa'i phyir//de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyis//rig sngags 'di ni byin byas brlabs//lha yi rgyal po rnams dang ni//de bzhin byang chub sems
395a7(rgyud): dnga'i srung //de la phyogs bcu rnams kyi ni//de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs par mdzad//dge ba deng ni nor rnams 'phel//sdig pa rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur//
395b1(rgyud): rmi lam dran pa nyes byas las//grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//tad+ya thA/myu ni mu na mu ni mu ni mu ni ri/ma ti ma ti ma tA/ma hA ma tI/bdag 'dzegs pa thams cad las
395b2(rgyud): bsrung shig bsrung shig/sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal//yams kyi nang dang /gnod pa thams cad las bde legasu gyur cig swAhA//'phags pa gzhan gyis
395b3(rgyud): mi thub pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+hi ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la

395b6(rgyud): yul rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/a mra' tshal lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugaso//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin/bcom ldan 'das ga la

398a7(rgyud): pa'i shes rab dang //log dang sel ba'i stobs nyid dang //gser thub kyi ni rlabs pa dang //'od srung gi ni ston dang //shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus kyis//bdag ni rtag tu/

401b7(rgyud): dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /dam bca' ba bzang ba dang /chos la mi gnas pa dang /bdag the tshom ma mchis pa dang /
402a1(rgyud): slob dpon pa mArmis pU dang /rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bAsha gsol/bad+mo byar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/

402a3(rgyud): sems dpa' gzungs thob pa la sti stang byed dam/bla mar byed dam/rim gror byed dam/mchod na des sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang byas par 'gyuraro//gang dag
402a4(rgyud): gis gzungs 'di thos pa dang /gang dag mos pa de dag kyang /sangs rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'o su 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro//

424b4(rgyud): rnams le bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong dge ngas ni chos zab mo
424b5(rgyud): mthong bar dka' ba/rtogs par dka' ba/cha phra ba/brtags pa/mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba rtogaso//ngas ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la
424b6(rgyud): bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che'i don dang /lha dang /mi rnams la phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor tI//ngas tho
424b7(rgyud): pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o//dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs zhes bya bIn+do gyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
425a1(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/blo gros dang ldan pa/rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/
425a2(rgyud): shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/spobs po mchog dang ldan pa/mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing beshad pa yod de/gang dag de
425a3(rgyud): shes pa dang /deng da/dri 'dzin pa de dag gi ni myur ba kho nar chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro//lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro//
425a4(rgyud): brjed nges pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing ches bzung ba rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/
425a5(rgyud): ba dang /yi ge dang don dang tshig le 'jug pa'i sbubs pa thogs pa myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams kyi rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas sngon gyi gnas
425a6(rgyud): rjesu dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhi'o//de
425a7(rgyud): nga yang 'jog go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sdom gyi gni bsdu ba khyod la bsten
425b1(rgyud): par bya ste/de na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro//thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyuraro//gzung ba'i chos rnams ni nyamasu len par 'gyur//
425b2(rgyud): nyam su blangs pa'i chos ni gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed//tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /de bzhin du ma thos pa'i chos
425b3(rgyud): kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /bla na med pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba dang /sa nas sa rtags pa'i yi ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /nges dri'i tshig dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab
425b4(rgyud): tu dbye ba'o//de la 'di dag ni gzi byin brtan par byed po'i tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /grul
425b5(rgyud): bu mo dang /yi dgas dang /sha za 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags pa thams cad kyis gang zag de la zas kyi rnam grangs rnams dang /sman rnams sbyin par 'gyur ro//de la
425b6(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag la mi gnod pa/de bzhin gshegs pasa? gsungs pa/lha dang /klu dang ni/gnod sbyin dang /dri za rnams kyis
425b7(rgyud): mnos pa/bstan pa yongasu 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te/kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig/khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/s+yAd ya the da na/karma ke ta ma
426a1(rgyud): /rmAn+do/rAn+matA rnama?/b+hUmAn/ts+tshal tA/a swog la swA du m+be na /oM shau g+humA A shAs+t+ra/kaun+ta An+mag+ha/mu dum/
426a2(rgyud): b+he/pa b+he ma gur ba ya bA a s+yo bAk+Sha s+yA baM l-i ga/be la ma thA/shrI ba baR+Shi pany+tsa ka/pra sa te/oM ba de la/a gra be la/ni shi khru uMHdz+dza me/u
426a3(rgyud): ma/kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbab pa grub pa dang /gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
426a4(rgyud): mthong la bstan bkur yang byed byed/rim gro yang byed byed pa rnams 'ching ste/kun dga' bo khyod kyi gnod sbyin bab pa grub pa/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa
426a5(rgyud): rnams zung shig/kun dga' bo gang la la gseng sngags kyi tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po chen
426a6(rgyud): po bzhi sems bzhin du gnaso//kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'byung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas rnams dang
426a7(rgyud): bral bar mi 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags pa'i gling na ni gnod sbyin srid pa snang byed ces bya ba gnas//kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyad kyi gling na ni/
426b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin cher spyod ces bya ba gnas//kun+da dga' ngo byang gri sgra mi snyan gyi gling na ni/gnod sbyin rnam grags zhes bya ba gnas//kun dga' bo 'dzom bu gling na ni gnod sbyin gra/
426b2(rgyud): thob ces bya ba gnas te/kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rje su dran par 'gyuraro// ni dga' bo gnod sbyin gzhan gzi brjed zla ba glang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa tho
426b3(rgyud): 'gyuraro//dad pa thob par gyur nas kyang dang po mi byed par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed//kun dga' bo de la 'di dag ni de bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis bstan pa dag /
426b4(rgyud): te/kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang skyong gri mchog gri tshig gi mchog srog tshegs 'byung po thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zung shig dang
426b5(rgyud): ngas bshad//kun dga' bo de la de'i phyin 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mi nuso//s+yAd ya thi dAn/dan d+hA ra ma hA ha re/hA ra ma ba ran+ta/
426b6(rgyud): rung dra tra/ku ma ti dr-i traM/in dra man tu kai/a ba te/saM hwA nAM/sa d+d+ha ma ti/i la la ba ma ti/e bai ti/ta raM be ra/yaM biSh+Ta sa dI baSh+TiM/a ba tiSh+Tha/nga
426b7(rgyud): '-i oM sha~M badz+ra/sa dang /kram kram na/a sa~M phe la na ts+yaiH/tha sha su d+d+ha d+hur/uSh+Ta muSh+Ta/uSh+TaH/bi sa pra mi ti/thams cad da ldan
427a1(rgyud): gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang /'byung po dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas dang /srul po dang /klu dang /dri za dang /
427a2(rgyud): sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi rlung na gnas pa dang /la mo du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag thos nas dga'//
427a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo khyod kyi gzung so sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig/phyis 'gyod tA re/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka'
427a4(rgyud): stsal to//gnod sbyin grub po 'di dag ni//gleng bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya//gsong sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba//de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnams kyi
427a5(rgyud): gsungs pa yi//go nod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni//chos rgyal rnams kyi bstan pa dag/nyams par gyur pa de la ston//dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po yang //mthar
427a6(rgyud): gyis su ni song nas kyang //zab cing don dang ldan pa yi//tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya//'di dag chos kun rtsa ba ste//de dag mkhas rnams nyan par gyis//drag po dag/
427a7(rgyud): gis thos nas yang //phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste//gang la bde dang sdug bsngal med//de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur//sa 'di chags pa med pa ste//sangs rgyas sa
427b1(rgyud): ni bsam mi khyab//chags pa med par bstan pa yi//bsam yus de thod gyur nas//nyi ma smin las byung ba ltar//dri ni sa stong ngo bzhin snang //'di la skye mchod phung po rnams
427b2(rgyud): bden dang byang chub yan lag dbang //dge bo'i chos ni zab mo rnams//sangs rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod//dri yi thos pa'i tshogs rnams gang /namos kyang chud zar ma
427b3(rgyud): 'gyur te//ma thos chos rnams de dag thos//nyes dang nyes min rnams la mkhas//rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog/mig bzang rnams kyang dag par 'gyur//'chang

427b6(rgyud): gling bzhi'o gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag/ma dad pa dang dad par bstano//gang la rtogs pa mi snang ba/de la don kun don ston 'gyur//gnod sbyin skur gdong gang yin+da dang /glang

428a1(rgyud): ku kha dang sna bzang dang //ral gri'i sku can blong bu rnams//thams cad grub par byed par shog/gsad+ma spyugs 'di ga su 'dzin la//gnod sbyin
428a2(rgyud): srin po de dag ni//spro bar gyur nis 'jud par byed//rtag tu de ni spobs pa dang /tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang //nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang //yi ge rnams
428a3(rgyud): mkhas par 'gyur//lung mnos pa yang chud mi za//rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 'gyur//rtag tu don dang yi ge la//de yi shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur//
428a4(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang //mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa yang //de yi legs bshad ldan pa rnams//de yi mod la 'dran par byed//s+yAd ya thA dan/

428a7(rgyud): a ga b+ha re/tha d+ha sa tu/e ti ya/tsA dru/tsa tur dwI bi ka yan/tha hu ma hu/ug+na hu/d+ha re sa hu/saM bra ha/a bi na bra ha/oM bi na gra ha/prats+tshe d+de
428b1(rgyud): ye/na hrus tu/ka ra ku ru/d+hA swA du/dri la 'di skad ces bya skye/gsang sngags kyi ni tshig 'di dag/gang gi lag dang lus la yod//de ni thos la rmongs pa med//de ni shes/
428b2(rgyud): rab meng mi 'gyur//skar mda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin//zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin//de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang //mya ngan 'das pa'i bar la reg/de nas bcom ldan 'das

428b5(rgyud): kun mA no//sak+Sh+ma/nA bI n+d+ha pe/tsu baM/tsuM lun+ye lu/pu lu bu lu/bya ba prA sa ra/ka ra kA b+hin d+h+we/bi dz+nyA bi dze/a pra ti san d+hi/nA nA nu ma twAM/pra na nr-i mi t+te/
428b6(rgyud): a rI de si/dziSh+Te nu pa ni dwe/a saM g+ha a pa tau/rig sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lus la thogs te 'chang na/glang bzhi pa chen po 'jig
428b7(rgyud): rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas dang /sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing /dbang du ma gyur pa rnams

429a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zer ba ces pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par ba

429a6(rgyud): tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skod/gA thA dI ya d+hA ra NI/bod skadadu/tshi gsu bcad pa gnyis
429a7(rgyud): ba'i gzungs/'dzem dpal gzho nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha lo//sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang //le lo dang ni cung zad chog par 'dzin//'dod chags
429b1(rgyud): dang ni nga rgyal spyod pa dang //'gyod pa dang ni ma nges spyod pa rnams//sems can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste//de'i gnyen por theg pa mchog bstan pa//de yis bar du

429b4(rgyud): bcu dag thob par 'gyur//khams rnams mtha' dag rtas par 'gyur ba dang //'chi ba'i tshe na mchog dga' dam pa 'thob//ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang //tha~Mng

429b6(rgyud): gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du thob//tshig su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs rdzogaso///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya Sha Ta mu khi nA ma d+hA ra NaM/bong
429b7(rgyud): skad du/'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
430a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa/rin po che sna bdun rab tu phye bas rnam par smras pa
430a2(rgyud): na/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/
430a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di zung shig/de 'di lta ste/bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sdug bsngal

430a5(rgyud): de sems can tha~Md dang thun mong du yongs su spyad par gyur cig/bdag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa gang la la yod pa de/so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma
430a6(rgyud): bshags par ma gyur cig/bdag la bdud kyi las gang dag yod pa de dag yongasu shes pa bla na med pas dngosu mi shes par ma gyur cig/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol
430a7(rgyud): tu phyin pa dang ldan pa/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa gang yang rung gang ci yod pa de bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig/bdag gi rnam par
430b1(rgyud): gol ba gang yin pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar bar gyur cig/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la bdag gnas par ma gyur cig/tad+ya thA/oM k+Sha me k+Sha me/
430b2(rgyud): k+ShAn+te k+Shan+te/da me da me/dan+te dAn+te/b+ha dre b+ha dr-i/su b+ha dre su b+he dre/su b+hadwe/tsan+ne tsan+tau/su tsan+d+ra su tsan+ne/tsan+na ki ra Ne/tsan+na ba te/te dze ba tI/d+ham+ma ba te/ya shi ba ti/
430b3(rgyud): brah+ma biM taM/saR+Wa kle sha bi sho d+ha nI/sarba ar+tha sa d+ha ni/sarba ar+tha pA sha ma ni/pa ra mAMr+tha sA d+ha ni/kAM ya bi sho d+ha no/bAg bi sha d+hi ni/na maHsaM sho d+ha ni swAhA//rigs kyi
430b4(rgyud): bu dag/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la las sgo drug pa'i gzungs 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na/de las kyi sgrib pa thams cid byang nas/myur
430b5(rgyud): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sa da

430b7(rgyud): gzungs rdzog so/////rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya Sha TA kA ra bid+ye/bod skad/'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags dang /sangs rgyas dang
431a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te//
431a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug dang /
431a3(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa/yi ge drug pa'i rog sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzung zhig/
431a4(rgyud): tshong zhog/kun chub par gyis shig/tad+ya thA/dan ti laM/kun ti laM/dan+da mi ti/ma d+hu ma ma ti/ma d+h+ya mA ti/ka rIn+te tAM/ko rat+na dA bi ti/ko shA bI/cha TA dza/

431a6(rgyud): ba dang /rna ba na ba dang /so na ba dang /sna na pa dang /lce na ba dang /snying na ba dang /lto ba na ba dang /rgyab na ba dang /rtsib logs na ba dang /chu so na ba dang /byin pa
431a7(rgyud): na ba dang /rkang pa na ba dang /yan lag na ba dang /nying lag na ba dang /zas ma zhu ba dang /spos pa dang /mngal du thogs pa dang /rlung las gyur pa dang /mkhris
431b1(rgyud): pa las byung pa dang /nga kun las gyur pa dang /'dus pa las gyur pa dang /mas drun pa dang /nyenagaci ga nga/nyan na nyas du dang /nyon gsum pa dang /nyon pazhi pa dang /
431b2(rgyud): su rnam pa dang /ma'i rnams dang /mtshan mo'i rims kyis la pa la/yu~M ga drug pa'i rig sngags 'dis snang ba dang /sangs sgru pa dang /yongs myeng ba
